entry.key: How can the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> be older than the universe itself?
entry.value: ¿Cómo puede çêh el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> mâh antiguo que er mîmmíçimo uniberço?

entry.key: Suppose it is a relic from a previous universe.
entry.value: Çupongamô que êh una reliquia de un uniberço anteriôh.

entry.key: The early universe was unimaginably hot and dense. If anything existed before, it would have been destroyed.
entry.value: En çû iniçiô, el uniberço era inimahinablemente denço y caluroço. Çi argo ubieçe êççîttío dêdde antê, ubiera çido dêttruío.

entry.key: Suppose the universe is older than previously assumed.
entry.value: Çupongamô que el uniberço êh mâh antiguo de lo que çe creía anteriormente.

entry.key: The <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> requires a powerful, highly advanced warp core. How should we obtain it?
entry.value: Pa el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>, çe neçeçita un núcleo de dîttorçión potente y mu abançao. ¿Cómo podríamô ôttenêl-lo?

entry.key: Solution 2: We could craft a new advanced warp core inspired by the <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s warp core.
entry.value: Çoluçión 2: Podríamô fabricâh un nuebo núcleo de dîttorçión abançao que çe baçe en er núcleo de dîttorçión de la <color=orange>Nabe</color>.

entry.key: OENO: The greatest challenge here, I think, is we don’t have the design for such a powerful core, or any of the original crafters of the <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s core.
entry.value: OENO: En mi opinión, er mayôh deçafío ar que nô enfrentamô êh que no contamô con er diçeño de un núcleo tan potente ni con lô côttrûttorê orihinalê der núcleo de la <color=orange>Nabe</color>.

entry.key: CLARY: No, but Poke was apprenticed to Annona, who created the original design, and our <color=orange>Black Hole Forge</color> is adept at crafting simpler cores.
entry.value: CLARY: No, pero Poke fue aprendiça de Ânnona, er creadôh der diçeño, y nuêttra <color=orange>Forha del Aguhero Negro</color> êh êpperta en la creaçión de núcleô mâh çimplê.

entry.key: POKE: I believe I can be of use here! The <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s warp core was created before my time, but Annona explained many of his designs to me.
entry.value: POKE: ¡Creo que puedo çêh de utilidá en êtte açunto! Er núcleo de dîttorçión de la <color=orange>Nabe</color> fue creao antê de mi yegá, pero Ânnona me êpplicó bariô de çû diçeñô.

entry.key: IDAEA: This is the safest path for our clan.
entry.value: IDAEA: Êtte êh er camino mâh çeguro pa nuêttro clan.

entry.key: AVENS: Is the safest path the best one? Our goal is worth the risk.
entry.value: ABENS: ¿Êh er camino mâh çeguro er mehôh? Bale la pena arriêggarçe por nuêttro ôhhetibo.

entry.key: CASSAVA: Is it, though? We’ve tried for so long to find something that I (and others) now believe might be impossible to find. If the search for the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is a futile one, we should choose the option with the least potential for harm.
entry.value: CAÇABA: ¿Êttâh çeguro? Yebamô muxo tiempo en bûcca de argo que bariô de noçotrô (y me incluyo) ya conçideramô caçi impoçible de encontrâh. Çi la búqqueda del <color=lightblue>Oho</color> êh en bano, deberíamô elehîh la ôççión que çuponga er menôh potençiâh de daño.

entry.key: SPIRE: Abandoning the <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s warp core and its casing means losing valuable knowledge.
entry.value: SPIRE: Abandonâh er núcleo de dîttorçión de la <color=orange>Nabe</color>, y çu carcaça, çînnificaría perdêh un conoçimiento balioço.

entry.key: MITIS: This is true; however, it’s knowledge we have little hope of recovering. It would be best to relearn, I think.
entry.value: MITÎ: Êh çierto; çin embargo, çe trata de un conoçimiento que probablemente no podamô recuperâh. Pienço que lo mehôh çería borbêh a aprendêl-lo.

entry.key: POKE: I would very much like to craft such a powerful core! More relevantly, I believe the <color=orange>Black Hole Forge</color> crew and I could recreate the basic design.
entry.value: POKE: ¡Me gûttaría muxo fabricâh un núcleo tan potente! Pero lo que êh mâh relebante êh que creo que el equipo de la <color=orange>Forha del Aguhero Negro</color> y yo podríamô recreâh er diçeño báçico.

entry.key: CASSAVA: I imagine I’ve been hard on Poke, again. This in turn means I’ve made things difficult for her sister (Clary).
entry.value: CAÇABA: Imahino que, una bêh mâh, traté con dureça a Poke. Êh deçîh que, a çu bêh, le cauçé problemâ a çu ermana (Clary).

entry.key: CASSAVA: If Poke and I are oil and water, Clary is our emulsifier. She certainly makes us a better team than would mixing through shaking (although sometimes I would like to shake Poke!).
entry.value: CAÇABA: Çi Poke y yo çomô el agua y el açeite, Clary êh nuêttro emurçionante. Çin dudâ, eya çabe amargamânnô con çu liderâggo y no a la fuerça (¡aunque a beçê me gûttaría uçâh la fuerça con Poke!).

entry.key: CASSAVA: Jokes aside, suppose my own fear of never finding the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> prompted my argument with Poke. That would be immature of me.
entry.value: CAÇABA: Dehando lâ bromâ de lao, çupongo que mi propio miedo a nunca dâh con el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> me yebó a dîccutîh con Poke. Eço çería una îmmadurêh de mi parte.

entry.key: CASSAVA: I should apologize... At least to Clary, who could then tell Poke.
entry.value: CAÇABA: Debería pedîh dîccurpâ... Ar menô a Clary, que dêppuêh podría ablâh con Poke.

entry.key: POKE: I feel strange, trying to recreate Annona’s warp core without him. At times, it still feels strange to no longer be his (very young) apprentice, and for the <color=orange>Black Hole Forge</color> to be in my care and not his.
entry.value: POKE: Me çiento êttraña al intentâh recreâh er núcleo de dîttorçión de Ânnona çin él. Por momentô, aún me reçurta êttraño ya no çêh çu (mu hoben) aprendiça, y êttâh a cargo de la <color=orange>Forha del Aguhero Negro</color> en lugâh de él.

entry.key: POKE: Hypothesis: This will always feel strange. Even though my time with him was short, I miss my old mentor, and deeply.
entry.value: POKE: Ipóteçî: Êtto çiempre me pareçerá êttraño. A peçâh de abêh paçao poco tiempo con él, exo de menô a mi antiguo mentôh, y en demaçía.

entry.key: POKE: To have the chance to try is thrilling, but... I don’t want to disappoint everyone. I think I can do this (probably), but what if excitement has clouded my assessment of my own abilities?
entry.value: POKE: Tenêh la oportunidá de probâh êh emoçionante, pero... no quiero deçêççionâh a tôh. Creo que puedo açêh êtto (probablemente), pero ¿y çi el entuçiâmmo me a nublao er huiçio de mî propiâ capaçidadê?

entry.key: POKE: Was I wrong in volunteering to build it...? I was born in this star system, and never saw Annona’s warp core with my own three eyes. I only know what he taught me. What if I’ve bitten off a larger portion than I can consume?
entry.value: POKE: ¿Cometí un errôh al ofreçerme pa côttruîl-lo...? Naçí en êtte çîttema êttelâh y nunca bi er núcleo de dîttorçión de Ânnona con mî trêh ohô. Çolo çé lo que ér me ençeñó. ¿Y çi êttoy tratando de êttrexâh mâh de lo que puedo abarcâh?

entry.key: POKE: Still, all I can give is my best. And as Annona would say, should my best prove insufficient, then we will find another way to achieve what’s needed. I have Clary and Root in the forge, and I have my clan. I am not alone!
entry.value: POKE: De tôh modô, çolo puedo dâh lo mehôh de mí. Y, como diría Ânnona, çi lo mehôh de mí reçurta çêh inçufiçiente, encontraremô otra manera de logrâh nuêttro cometío. Cuento con Clary y con Root en la Forha, y cuento con mi clan. ¡No êttoy çola!

entry.key: SOLANUM: Formation Of This Universe
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: La formaçión de êtte uniberço

entry.key: SOLANUM: No one knows how this universe was made, but one thing we do know is everything used to be very hot and very dense (tightly packed together).
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Nadie çabe cómo çe creó êtte uniberço, pero çí çabemô que tó çolía êttâh mu caliente y mu denço (agrupao de manera compâtta).

entry.key: SOLANUM: As this early universe expanded, it also cooled down. Once it had cooled down enough, particles were able to group together to form things like galaxies, stars, and planets!
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: A medida que êtte uniberço iniçiâh començó a êppandirçe, también çe fue enfriando. Una bêh que çe enfrió lo çufiçiente, lâ partículâ pudieron agruparçe pa formâh ôhhetô, ¡como lâ galâççiâ, lâ êttreyâ y lô planetâ!

entry.key: SOLANUM: Since then, space has continued to expand at a faster and faster rate, which is hard to think about for too long without your brain hurting.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Dêdde entonçê, el êppaçio a çegío êppandiéndoçe cá bêh mâh y mâh rápido, lo cuâ êh difíçî de imahinâh durante muxo tiempo çin que te empieçe a dolêh er çerebro.

entry.key: SOLANUM: This universe will keep getting colder and larger, until one day, the stars and the life they support will all die.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: El uniberço continuará enfriándoçe y êppandiéndoçe âtta que, un día, morirán tanto lâ êttreyâ como la bida que êttâ poçibilitan.

entry.key: SOLANUM: That’s scary to think about, even though Conoy tells me it won’t happen in our lifetimes. But it’ll happen in someone else’s, someday!
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Êh un pençamiento aterradôh, aunque Conoy me diga que no çuçederá mientrâ bibamô. ¡Çin embargo, le çuçederá a argien, en argún momento!

entry.key: LAMI: Explanation of Festivals
entry.value: LAMI: Êpplicaçión de lô fêttibalê

entry.key: LAMI: All the Nomai clans from all over the universe meet in one place to share what they’ve learned in science and art. It’s called the festival!
entry.value: LAMI: Tôh lô clanê nomai del uniberço çe reúnen en un lugâh pa compartîh lo que aprendieron çobre arte y çiençia. ¡Êtte ebento çe yama «er fêttibâh»!

entry.key: FILIX: Don’t forget, festivals happen every ten years!
entry.value: FILÎH: ¡No te orbidê de que lô fêttibalê tienen lugâh una bêh cá diêh añô!

entry.key: LAMI: We can’t go because we’re stuck here. But Filix says we used to go, too.
entry.value: LAMI: No podemô îh, êttamô atâccáô aquí. Pero Filîh diçe que antê también íbamô...

entry.key: LAMI: At some festivals, one clan’s big discovery can mean all the Nomai get to advance, too. Like Annona’s warp core, which made it so everyone can warp long distances and explore more.
entry.value: LAMI: En çiertô fêttibalê, er dêccubrimiento de un clan implica un gran benefiçio pa tôh lô nomai. Como er núcleo de dîttorçión de Ânnona, que nô permitió biahâh grandê dîttançiâ pa çegîh êpplorando.

entry.key: LAMI: Each clan has a festival envoy to show their most interesting work. (Our envoy was Thatch!)
entry.value: LAMI: Cá clan cuenta con un repreçentante, que êh el encargao de môttrâh çu mehôh trabaho en er fêttibâh. (¡Nuêttra embiá era Tâxx!).

entry.key: LAMI: A single festival could last a long, long time!
entry.value: LAMI: ¡Un çolo fêttibâh podía durâh muxo, muxo tiempo!

entry.key: PLUME: Use caution! A black hole sleeps below. You must not slip.
entry.value: PLUME: ¡Cuida tû paçô! Un aguhero negro yaçe debaho. No debê rêbbalarte.

entry.key: Emergency escape hatch
entry.value: Êccotiya de emerhençia

entry.key: BEGIN FLIGHTLOG: <color=orange>Escape Pod 1</color>. <color=orange>Vessel</color> has been mortally injured. Emergency sequence activated. Awaiting departure from <color=orange>Vessel</color>.
entry.value: INIÇIÂH REHÎTTRO DE BUELO:<color=orange>Cáççula de êccape 1</color>. La <color=orange>Nabe</color> a çufrío daño terminâh. Çecuençia de emerhençia âttibá. Êpperando partida de la <color=orange>Nabe</color>.

entry.key: Launching <color=orange>Escape Pod 3</color>... Launching <color=orange>Escape Pod 2</color>... Now launching <color=orange>Escape Pod 1</color>.
entry.value: Lançando <color=orange>cáççula de êccape 3</color>... Lançando <color=orange>cáççula de êccape 2</color>... Lançando <color=orange>cáççula de êccape 1</color>...

entry.key: ALERT. Collision imminent. Preparing for impact.
entry.value: ALERTA. Coliçión îmminente. Preparándoçe pa el impâtto...

entry.key: Scanning external environment... Scan complete. Minor structural instabilities detected. Pockets of breathable air detected. Adequate solar energy detected. Verdict: HOSPITABLE.
entry.value: Analiçando ambiente êtteriôh... Análiçî completao. Inêttabilidadê êttrûtturalê menorê detêttâh. Borçâ de aire rêppirable detêttâh. Enerhía çolâh adecuá detêttá. Beredîtto: BIABLE.

entry.key: CONOY: Cassava’s <color=orange>Construction Yard</color> has been using the cyclones on <color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color> to lift <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> parts into orbit, but one component was pushed down past the current that usually prevents anything from sinking.
entry.value: CONOY: El <color=orange>Çitio de Côttrûççión</color> de Caçaba a êttao utiliçando lô çiclonê de <color=lightblue>Abîmmo der Higante</color> pa ponêh en órbita lâ pieçâ del <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color>, pero un componente fue çûççionao debaho de la corriente que çuele ebitâh que lô ôhhetô çe undan.

entry.key: CONOY: Spire and I are crafting a model to determine why this happened.
entry.value: CONOY: Êttamô creando un modelo con Spire pa determinâh por qué çuçedió êtto.

entry.key: SPIRE: An update: It’s now clear there are two different types of cyclone.
entry.value: SPIRE: Âttualiçaçión: Aora queda claro que ay dôh tipô de çiclonê.

entry.key: SPIRE: Most cyclones on <color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color> rotate clockwise. These are the cyclones Cassava typically uses to send components into orbit.
entry.value: SPIRE: Caçi tôh lô çiclonê de <color=lightblue>Abîmmo der Higante</color> hiran en çentío orario. Êttô çon lô que Caçaba çuele utiliçâh pa ponêh lô componentê en órbita.

entry.key: SPIRE: There also exists a rarer type of cyclone that spins the opposite direction and pushes objects beneath the waters and below the current.
entry.value: SPIRE: Pero también ay otro tipo de çiclonê, mâh rarô, que hiran en la dirêççión contraria y arrâttran lô ôhhetô debaho de lâ aguâ y de la corriente.

entry.key: CASSAVA: My gratitude, Spire. Conoy is showing me your handiwork, and I’m intrigued by this secondary type of cyclone. But was it really necessary to build a model to tell me that?
entry.value: CAÇABA: Mi gratitûh, Spire. Conoy me êttá môttrando tu obra. Me henera intriga êtte tipo çecundario de çiclonê. Pero ¿era rearmente neçeçario côttruîh un modelo pa contarme eço?

entry.key: SPIRE: The model will be useful as we continue monitoring <color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color>.
entry.value: SPIRE: Er modelo reçurtará útî pa continuâh analiçando <color=lightblue>Abîmmo der Higante</color>.

entry.key: SPIRE: Also I very much wanted to make a model.
entry.value: SPIRE: Ademâh, tenía muxâ ganâ de creâh un modelo.

entry.key: ILEX: Look out, look out below!
entry.value: ILÊ: ¡Cuidao, cuidao, cuidao al andâh!

entry.key: ILEX: Look out for the gravity hole!
entry.value: ILÊ: ¡Der poço de grabedá te debê cuidâh!

entry.key: ILEX: For should you slip
entry.value: ILÊ: Puê, çi te rêbbalâ,

entry.key: ILEX: And lose your grip,
entry.value: ILÊ: Y abaho te bâ,

entry.key: ILEX: Then into space you’ll go!
entry.value: ILÊ: ¡Açia el êppaçio âh de flotâh!

entry.key: PLUME: Of note: Be sure not to wander far from here. Though this area is somewhat unstable, it’s safer than any we’ve found so far.
entry.value: PLUME: De conçideraçión: No çe alehen demaçiao de aquí. A peçâh de çêh un tanto inêttable, êtta çona êh mâh çegura que lâ demâh ayâh âtta aora.

entry.key: PLUME: The temporary settlement is finished, but remember to be cautious of falling rocks and dust created by meteor impacts.
entry.value: PLUME: El açentamiento probiçorio êttá terminao, pero recuerden tenêh cuidao con lâ rocâ que caen y con er porbo henerao por lô impâttô de meteorô.

entry.key: THATCH: I can’t understand. Why did the <color=orange>Vessel</color> crash in that place?
entry.value: TÂXX: No lo entiendo. ¿Por qué la <color=orange>Nabe</color> çe êttreyó en aquêh lugâh?

entry.key: PLUME: Was the <color=orange>Vessel</color> unwell in some way?
entry.value: PLUME: ¿No êttaba la <color=orange>Nabe</color> en çu êttao óttimo?

entry.key: FILIX: No, Annona and I checked before the warp, and the warp core and navigation systems were both well.
entry.value: FILÎH: Ânnona y yo comprobamô tó antê de la dîttorçión: tanto er núcleo de dîttorçión como lô çîttemâ de nabegaçión êttaban bien.

entry.key: FILIX: We warped to follow that curious signal from the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>. Where we arrived was wrong; it wasn’t where we tried to go.
entry.value: FILÎH: Uçamô la dîttorçión pa çegîh eça yamatiba çeñâh del <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>. Pero yegamô ar lugâh equibocao; no era ayí donde queríamô îh.

entry.key: THATCH: Suppose it wasn’t a problem with the <color=orange>Vessel</color>, but with our destination.
entry.value: TÂXX: Açumo que no çe trató de un problema de la <color=orange>Nabe</color>, çino de nuêttro dêttino.

entry.key: FILIX: I’m afraid for our friends in <color=orange>Escape Pod 3</color>....
entry.value: FILÎH: Temo por nuêttrô amigô de la <color=orange>cáççula de êccape 3</color>...

entry.key: BELLS: If you’re here to make your first pilgrimage to the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>, you are almost prepared to set out on this deeply significant journey. Before you do, pause, and remember your history.
entry.value: BELLS: Çi binîtte a realiçâh tu primêh peregrinahe a la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>, ya êttâh çerca de podêh iniçiâh êtte biahe çumamente çînnificatibo. Pero antê, âh una pauça y rememora la îttoria.

entry.key: BELLS: We make this journey not only for ourselves, but also to honor the members of our clan who came before us: those who, after the crash that brought them to this star system, became stranded on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> and on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color>, with no communication between these two groups of survivors.
entry.value: BELLS: Açemô êtte biahe no çolo por noçotrô mîmmô, çino también pa onrâh a lô integrantê de nuêttro clan que nô preçedieron: aqueyô que, dêppuêh del âççidente que lô traho a êtte çîttema êttelâh, quedaron baráô en <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color> y en <color=lightblue>Hemelo Braça</color>, çin comunicaçión entre lô dôh grupô de çuperbibientê.

entry.key: BELLS: These Nomai looked upward from two different planets and saw the same wandering moon visiting their skies. It was this moon (the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>) that kept their curiosity alive during this long period of hardship.
entry.value: BELLS: Êttô nomai miraron açia arriba dêdde dôh planetâ diferentê y bieron la mîmma luna errante en çû çielô. Êtta luna (la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>) fue lo que mantubo dêppierta çu curioçidá durante tamaño período de âbberçidadê.

entry.key: BELLS: After the two divided groups were able to reunite, it became our clan’s united goal to find and visit the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>. This took time, and many Nomai who dreamed of seeing the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> died before we discovered how to make the journey.
entry.value: BELLS: Una bêh que lô dôh grupô lograron reunirçe, el ôhhetibo común de nuêttro clan fue encontrâh y biçitâh la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>. Êtta empreça yebó bâttante tiempo, y muxô nomai que abían çoñao con bêh la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> pereçieron antê de que dêccubriéramô cómo realiçâh er biahe.

entry.key: BELLS: When you reach the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>, recall these Nomai, and carry their curiosity onward with you.
entry.value: BELLS: Cuando yegê a la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>, eboca a êttô nomai y yeba çu curioçidá contigo.

entry.key: PLUME: The trees are moving! The trees in this grove wander about freely (the entire plant, roots and all)! This is not normal, even for this alien planet. And I never see them move! Is that even possible?!
entry.value: PLUME: ¡Lô árbolê çe êttán mobiendo! ¡Lô árbolê de êtte bôqque deambulan libremente (la planta entera, con raíçê y tó)! Êtto no êh normâh, ni çiquiera pa êtte planeta alieníhena. ¡Y nunca lô beo moberçe! ¡¿Acaço eço êh poçible?!

entry.key: PLUME: If anyone else witnesses this disturbing behavior, I implore you, record your observations here. Either these trees are aberrant, or my brain must be!
entry.value: PLUME: Çi argien mâh preçençia êtte perturbadôh comportamiento, le imploro que rehîttre çû ôççerbaçionê aquí. Ay argo anormâh en el açunto: ¡o êttô árbolê o mi çerebro!

entry.key: THATCH: Plume is right; the trees do move! I confess I didn’t notice until I read his notes.
entry.value: TÂXX: Plume tiene raçón: ¡lô árbolê en berdá çe mueben! Confieço que no me abía dao cuenta âtta que leí çû notâ.

entry.key: THATCH: Alarmingly, it isn’t only the trees: There is other matter in this area (such as that unusual shard of rock) moving in this same eerie way.
entry.value: TÂXX: Lo que reçurta alarmante êh que el açunto no çe limita a lô árbolê: ay mâh materia en êtta çona (como eçe inuçuâh frâmmento rocoço) que también çe muebe de manera inquietante.

entry.key: FILIX: That rock is unusual for another reason, too, Thatch: It possesses color and texture I’ve never seen elsewhere on this planet!
entry.value: FILÎH: Eça roca también êh inuçuâh por otro motibo, Tâxx: ¡poçee un colôh y una têttura que no e bîtto en otra parte de êtte planeta!

entry.key: FILIX: Hypothesis: This rock shard’s presence is significant. We should study it! (Could it be what is causing other nearby objects to also move about this area?)
entry.value: FILÎH: Ipóteçî: La preçençia de êtte frâmmento de roca êh importante. ¡Deberíamô êttudiâl-lo! (¿Podría çêh la cauça der mobimiento de otrô ôhhetô çercanô de la çona?).

entry.key: THATCH: Plume, Filix, and I have determined this atypical shard of rock is the reason objects in this grove are behaving in a quantum manner.
entry.value: TÂXX: Plume, Filîh y yo emô determinao que êtte inuçuâh frâmmento rocoço êh lo que proboca er comportamiento cuántico de lô ôhhetô de êtte bôqque.

entry.key: THATCH: The only other object we’ve observed displaying this quantum behavior is the <color=lightblue>wandering moon</color>. I imagine the moon’s behavior and this grove’s are related.
entry.value: TÂXX: El único otro ôhheto ar que emô bîtto êççibîh êtte comportamiento cuántico êh la <color=lightblue>luna errante</color>. Imahino que er comportamiento de la luna y er de êtte bôqque guardan arguna relaçión.

entry.key: PLUME: In her note from earlier, Filix mentions this strange type of rock isn’t found elsewhere on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>. What if it isn’t originally from this planet?
entry.value: PLUME: En çu nota anteriôh, Filîh mençiona que êtte êttraño tipo de roca no çe encuentra en ninguna otra parte de <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color>. ¿Y çi no êh una roca autóttona?

entry.key: PLUME: Hypothesis: This “quantum shard” is from the <color=lightblue>wandering (quantum) moon</color>. Perhaps it is even a small piece of the moon itself.
entry.value: PLUME: Ipóteçî: Êtte «frâmmento cuántico» probiene de la <color=lightblue>luna errante (cuántica)</color>. Quiçá âtta çea una pequeña parte de la luna.

entry.key: FILIX: Of note: A unique signal is coming from this shard! Curiously, our friend the <color=lightblue>wandering moon</color> sounds the same.
entry.value: FILÎH: De conçideraçión: ¡Êtte frâmmento arroha una çeñâh única! Curioçamente, nuêttra amiga, la <color=lightblue>luna errante</color>, emite er mîmmo çonido.

entry.key: FILIX: I’ve also heard the same signal this shard produces calling out from <color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color>,<color=lightblue>Timber Hearth</color>, and the <color=lightblue>Hourglass Twins</color>. Suppose there are other shards like this one!
entry.value: FILÎH: También oí la mîmma çeñâh que produçe êtte frâmmento probenîh dêdde <color=lightblue>Abîmmo der Higante</color>, <color=lightblue>Lumbre</color> y lô <color=lightblue>Hemelô Relôh de Arena</color>. ¡Çupongamô que ay otrô frâmmentô como êtte!

entry.key: BELLS: Welcome, Solanum! Your arrival here means you’ve completed your preparations on <color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color> and are ready to depart for the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>.
entry.value: BELLS: ¡Biembenida, Çolanum! Tu yegá çînnifica que ya completâtte lô preparatibô en <color=lightblue>Abîmmo der Higante</color> y que êttâh lîtta pa partîh açia la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>.

entry.key: BELLS: On your pilgrimage, the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> will carry you, just as it carried me and many in our clan before me, to the moon’s sixth and most secret location.
entry.value: BELLS: Durante tu peregrinahe, la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> te yebará, der mîmmo modo que me yebó a mí y a muxô predeçeçorê de mi clan, a la çêtta y mâh çecreta ubicaçión de la luna.

entry.key: BELLS: You’ll be aided in your pilgrimage by the shrine our clan built on the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>. But remember this final rule: To explore the sixth location, the shrine must be on the moon’s north pole.
entry.value: BELLS: Er çantuario que nuêttro clan côttruyó en la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> te ayudará en er peregrinahe. Pero recuerda êtta regla finâh: Pa êpplorâh la çêtta ubicaçión, er çantuario de la Luna Cuántica debe êttâh en er polo norte de la luna.

entry.key: BELLS: Be curious on your journey!
entry.value: BELLS: ¡Deha que la curioçidá çea tu faro en er biahe!

entry.key: BELLS: Be welcomed in this place! Above you stands the <color=orange>Tower of Quantum Knowledge</color>.
entry.value: BELLS: ¡Te doy la biembenida a êtte çitio! Por ençima de ti çe erihe la <color=orange>Torre der Conoçimiento Cuántico</color>.

entry.key: BELLS: If you are making your first pilgrimage to the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>, ascend these stairs, and obtain the last of the knowledge you need for your journey.
entry.value: BELLS: Çi bâ a realiçâh tu primêh peregrinahe a la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>, âççiende por êttâ êccalinatâ y âççede ar conoçimiento que neçeçitâ pa tu biahe.

entry.key: BELLS: Beneath your feet lies the <color=orange>Tower of Quantum Knowledge</color>.
entry.value: BELLS: Debaho de ti yaçe la <color=orange>Torre der Conoçimiento Cuántico</color>.

entry.key: BELLS: If you are preparing to make your first pilgrimage to the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>, descend the steps to the entrance below. The knowledge held within will help you on your journey.
entry.value: BELLS: Çi te êttâh preparando pa tu primêh peregrinahe a la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>, dêççiende por êttâ êccalinatâ âtta yegâh a la entrá. Er conoçimiento que ay ayí dentro te ayudará en tu biahe.

entry.key: Activate the <color=orange>gravity cannon</color>
entry.value: Âttibâh el <color=orange>cañón grabitatorio</color>

entry.key: Call the <color=orange>shuttle</color> home
entry.value: Trâl-ladâh el <color=orange>trâbbordadôh</color> a caça

entry.key: LAEVI: We’re meeting in the <color=orange>Fossil Fish Cave</color> to play the game! If you’re too big to climb through the <color=orange>Anglerfish Overlook</color> hole:
entry.value: LAEBI: ¡Nô encontraremô en la <color=orange>Cueba der Pêh Fóçî</color> pa hugâh! Çi erê demaçiao grande como pa trepâh por el aguhero del <color=orange>Miradôh del Rape</color>...

entry.key: LAEVI: You’ll have to go the long way, but it isn’t far. Go to <color=orange>Stepping Stone Cave</color>, and then up and into the <color=orange>Fossil Fish Cave</color>.
entry.value: LAEBI: Tendrâh que tomâh er camino largo, pero no queda lehô. Diríhete a la <color=orange>Cueba de lô Perdañô</color>, dêppuêh çube y entra en la <color=orange>Cueba der Pêh Fóçî</color>.

entry.key: TAGET: I tried to get to the fossil fish through <color=orange>Stepping Stone Cave</color>, but I couldn’t find the entrance. Where is it?
entry.value: TAHÊH: Traté de yegâh âtta er pêh fóçî a trabêh de la <color=orange>Cueba de lô Perdañô</color>, pero no pude encontrâh la entrá. ¿Dónde queda?

entry.key: ILEX: Remember to feed the fossil fish first! If you go to the <color=orange>Anglerfish Overlook</color> and throw a light into his mouth, he’ll show you the way.
entry.value: ILÊ: ¡No orbidê dâl-le de comêh ar pêh fóçî primero! Çi bâ al <color=orange>Miradôh del Rape</color> y le arrohâ una lûh en la boca, te indicará er camino.

entry.key: LAMI: Taget can’t fit through the <color=orange>Anglerfish Overlook</color> hole anymore because he grew bigger! He’s taller than Laevi now.
entry.value: LAMI: ¡Tagê ya no cabe por el aguhero del <color=orange>Miradôh del Rape</color> porque creçió muxo! Ya êh mâh arto que Laebi.

entry.key: LAEVI: Who cares? Ilex is still tallest.
entry.value: LAEBI: ¿Qué mâh da? Ilê çige çiendo er mâh arto.

entry.key: TAGET: Are we playing the fossil fish game tonight?
entry.value: TAHÊH: ¿Bamô a hugâh ar huego der pêh fóçî êtta noxe?

entry.key: SOLANUM: I fed the fossil fish a new lantern. If you go to <color=orange>Stepping Stone Cave</color>, the entrance to the <color=orange>Fossil Fish Cave</color> is easy to see now.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Le di de comêh un farôh nuebo ar pêh fóçî. Aora, çi bâ a la <color=orange>Cueba de lô Perdañô</color>, la entrá de la <color=orange>Cueba der Pêh Fóçî</color> êh fáçî de bêh.

entry.key: LAEVI: Gratitude, Solanum! It’s good you’re small enough to climb in through the hole at the <color=orange>Anglerfish Overlook</color>.
entry.value: LAEBI: ¡Gratitûh, Çolanum! Qué gueno que aún erê tan pequeña que puedê trepâh por el aguhero del <color=orange>Miradôh del Rape</color>.

entry.key: LAMI: I’m still small enough!
entry.value: LAMI: ¡Yo aún çoy pequeña!

entry.key: LAEVI: You won’t be for long. Mom and Dad are tall, so you and I will be tall, too.
entry.value: LAEBI: No lo çerâh por muxo tiempo. Mamá y papá çon artô, açí que noçotrô dôh también çeremô artô.

entry.key: MELORAE: The heat from this star system’s <color=lightblue>sun</color> is more bearable below the surface.
entry.value: MELORAE: Er calôh que emite er Çôh de êtte çîttema êttelâh êh mâh tolerable debaho de la çuperfiçie.

entry.key: MELORAE: When our escape pod punctured this planet’s surface, it broke into what scans show is a cave system with much cooler air. I would recommend we seek a site down there to build a long-term shelter, Annona, but these passages are a maze!
entry.value: MELORAE: Cuando nuêttra cáççula de êccape perforó la çuperfiçie der planeta, irrumpió en un çîttema de cuebâ con aire muxo mâh puro, çegún indican nuêttrô análiçî. Recomendaría bûccâh un çitio ayí abaho pa côttruîh un refuhio a largo plaço, Ânnona, ¡pero êttô paçahê çon laberínticô!

entry.key: ANNONA: Even with this danger, they are still our best chance for survival. We’ll form teams and descend into the caves to look for a shelter site. We can mark our findings on the walls to avoid becoming irreversibly lost.
entry.value: ÂNNONA: A peçâh der peligro, êtta êh nuêttra mehôh poçibilidá de çuperbibençia. Nô dibidiremô en equipô y dêççenderemô açia lâ cuebâ en bûcca de un çitio pa el refuhio. Podemô marcâh nuêttrô ayâggô en lâ paredê pa ebitâh perdênnô irremediablemente.

entry.key: ANNONA: Be cautious, everyone.
entry.value: ÂNNONA: Muébançe con cuidao.

entry.key: RHUS: And be aware of the sand as you search. It appears to be rising gradually.
entry.value: RÛ: Y prêtten atençión a la arena mientrâ êpploran. Pareçería êttâh çubiendo graduarmente.

entry.key: COLEUS: The path to the shelter site is somewhat convoluted, so follow the instructions ahead closely!
entry.value: COLEÛ: Er camino ar çitio del refuhio êh un tanto enrebeçao, ¡açí que çe deben çegîh ar pie de la letra lâ îttrûççionê que ay mâh adelante!

entry.key: COLEUS: To reach the shelter site, walk forward until you meet the sandfall at the pit, then turn left. Continue to the room filled with rock column formations and climb upward through the opening above them.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Pa yegâh ar çitio del refuhio, camina açia adelante, âtta encontrarte con una câccá de arena en er poço; ayí hira a la îqquierda. Continúa açia la abitaçión yena de formaçionê de colûnnâ rocoçâ y trepa a trabêh de la endidura que ay arriba de eyâ.

entry.key: COLEUS: The sand here is rising, so you must be cautious but swift.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Aquí la arena êttá çubiendo, açí que debê îh con cuidao pero con prontitûh.

entry.key: COLEUS: Be cautious crossing the chasm ahead. The bridge Melorae and I crafted will do its job, but it isn’t strong.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Ten cuidao ar cruçâh er dêffiladero de mâh adelante. Er puente que creamô con Melorae cumple çu funçión, pero no êh reçîttente.

entry.key: COLEUS: Once on the far side, look for the tunnel hidden behind the falling sand. Follow it, and you’ll reach the shelter site.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Una bêh que êttêh del otro lao, bûcca er túnê que êttá ocurto detrâh de la câccá de arena. Atrabiéçalo y yegarâh ar çitio del refuhio.

entry.key: COLEUS: You’re doing well! There’s only a little farther left to go now until you reach the shelter site. You can rest there. Hurry, before the sand comes!
entry.value: COLEÛ: ¡Bâ bien! Ya çolo te farta un poco mâh pa yegâh ar çitio del refuhio. Ayí podrâh dêccançâh. Date priça, ¡antê de que yege la arena!

entry.key: MELORAE: Do not follow this tunnel to its end! (Coleus and I will examine the horror that lies at its terminus later, provided we live through this.)
entry.value: MELORAE: ¡No çigâ por êtte túnê âtta er finâh! (Coleû y yo êççaminaremô el orrôh que yaçe en el êttremo mâh tarde, çi êh que çobrebibimô).

entry.key: ANNONA: Of note: This passage leads to breathable air. Refill your supply tank there (we cannot tell how far or deep these tunnels may wind), but do not linger, as the area is exposed to the heat of this alien <color=lightblue>sun</color>.
entry.value: ÂNNONA: De conçideraçión: Êtte paço conduçe a aire rêppirable. Recarga er tanque de çuminîttro ayí (no tenemô forma de çabêh la lonhitûh o la profundidá de êttô túnelê), pero no te quedê merodeando, ya que la çona êttá êppuêtta ar calôh de êtte <color=lightblue>Çôh</color> alieníhena.

entry.key: ANNONA: Refill your air supply tank and return quickly.
entry.value: ÂNNONA: Recarga er tanque de çuminîttro de aire y regreça cuanto antê.

entry.key: RHUS: Keep moving, friends: There is nothing of interest at the end of this passage but rocks.
entry.value: RÛ: Çigan abançando, amigô. No ay ná intereçante ar finâh de êtte paço mâh que rocâ.

entry.key: RHUS: And while these rocks are interesting, they can wait until a less urgent time.
entry.value: RÛ: Y, çi bien lâ rocâ çon intereçantê, pueden êpperâh âtta un momento de menôh urhençia.

entry.key: SOLANUM: The sands go to and fro,
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Er fluîh de la arena biene y ba.

entry.key: SOLANUM: Reversing their swift flow.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: La rauda corriente çe imbierte ya.

entry.key: SOLANUM: If you’re inside
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Çi la marea a cambiao,

entry.key: SOLANUM: When turns the tide,
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: y aún no te âh marxao...

entry.key: SOLANUM: Then skyward you should go.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Tu bía de êccape en er çielo êttá.

entry.key: SOLANUM: Who was it when we last quit:
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: ¿Quién era la úrtima bêh que paramô?

entry.key: SOLANUM: Me
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Yo.

entry.key: LAEVI: Me
entry.value: LAEBI: Yo.

entry.key: ILEX: I was
entry.value: ILÊ: Era yo.

entry.key: ILEX: Me again
entry.value: ILÊ: Yo de nuebo.

entry.key: LAMI: Me!
entry.value: LAMI: ¡Yo!

entry.key: SOLANUM: Me_test
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Yo.

entry.key: SOLANUM: Me_test2
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Yo.

entry.key: LAMI: Me
entry.value: LAMI: Yo.

entry.key: TAGET: It was me
entry.value: TAHÊH: Era yo.

entry.key: SOLANUM: Me_test3
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Yo.

entry.key: ILEX: I was_test
entry.value: ILÊ: Era yo.

entry.key: TAGET: Me again
entry.value: TAHÊH: Yo de nuebo.

entry.key: LAEVI: Me_test
entry.value: LAEBI: Yo.

entry.key: PYE: I’m receiving much stronger energy readings now that we’re beneath the crust. Whatever it is must lie somewhere below, closer to the <color=lightblue>comet</color>’s center. And I’m starting to think it’s more dangerous than we realized.
entry.value: PYE: Aora que êttamô debaho de la corteça, lâ çeñalê de enerhía que reçibo çon muxo mâh fuertê. Lo que çea que lâ emite debe êttâh debaho en arguna parte, mâh çerca der çentro del <color=lightblue>cometa</color>. Y comienço a pençâh que êh mâh peligroço de lo que creíamô.

entry.key: PYE: Clary, can you hear us?
entry.value: PYE: Clary, ¿nô oyê?

entry.key: CLARY: Yes, but your voices are faint. I fear we will lose communication entirely if you continue any deeper.
entry.value: CLARY: Çí, pero apenâ. Me temo que, çi continúan adentrándoçe, çe perderá la comunicaçión.

entry.key: POKE: Keep the <color=orange>shuttle</color> warm for us, Clary. We’ll return the moment we identify the source of the energy readings!
entry.value: POKE: Mantén el <color=orange>trâbbordadôh</color> caliente, Clary. ¡Regreçaremô apenâ identifiquemô la fuente de lâ çeñalê de enerhía!

entry.key: CLARY: I understand, but... Be cautious, both of you.
entry.value: CLARY: Entendío, pero... Tengan cuidao, lâ dôh.

entry.key: POKE: The spherical stone casing here seems to be the source of the energy readings... No, rather, the source is what’s within the stone. I’m detecting some form of exotic matter.
entry.value: POKE: Êtta carcaça êfférica de piedra pareçe çêh la fuente de lâ çeñalê de enerhía... No, mehôh dixo, la fuente êh lo que yaçe en el interiôh de la piedra. Detêtto una forma de materia êççótica.

entry.key: PYE: The stone is muting our energy readings; they should be ten times what we’re seeing, at least.
entry.value: PYE: La piedra êttá çilençiando lâ çeñalê de enerhía; deberían çêh, por lo menô, diêh beçê mayorê de lo que bemô.

entry.key: POKE: Pye, I don’t think we want this matter interacting with us. As far as I can tell, direct contact with it would almost certainly be fatal.
entry.value: POKE: Pye, creo que no nô combiene que eça materia interâttúe con noçotrô. Por lo que puedo bêh, entrâh en contâtto dirêtto con eya çería çeguramente fatâh.

entry.key: PYE: I’ve never encountered anything like this casing, but it’s all that’s protecting us from what’s inside. Worse still, this matter is disturbingly volatile.
entry.value: PYE: Nunca abía encontrao argo çimilâh a êtta carcaça, pero êh tó lo que nô protehe de lo que ay en el interiôh. Peôh aún, êtta materia êh perturbadoramente bolátî.

entry.key: POKE: ...Pye. Whatever the matter inside this stone casing is, it’s more than just profoundly unstable; it’s under tonnes of pressure. Look at this density scan. I’ve never seen anything this tightly compacted before! What is this?
entry.value: POKE: ... Pye. La materia que ay dentro de la carcaça de piedra, çea lo que çea, no çolo êh profundamente inêttable, çino que êttá baho tonelâh de preçión. Mira êtte análiçî de dençidá. ¡Nunca antê bi ná tan compâtto! ¿Qué puede çêh êtto?

entry.key: PYE: This is orders of magnitude worse than I’d imagined. If this stone were to rupture, the lethal matter within would rapidly expand, completely blanketing this star system almost instantaneously. And the pressure is still building as the <color=lightblue>comet</color> approaches this star system...
entry.value: PYE: Êtto êh infinitamente peôh de lo que abía imahinao. Çi êtta piedra çe quebraçe, la materia letâh que contiene çe êppandiría rápidamente y cubriría por completo êtte çîttema êttelâh caçi al îttante. Y, a medida que el <color=lightblue>cometa</color> çe açerca a êtte çîttema êttelâh, la preçión continúa aumentando...

entry.key: PYE: Return to the shuttle, right now! The rest of our friends need to know they’re in terrible danger. Leave your equipment and run!
entry.value: PYE: ¡Regreça ar trâbbordadôh de îmmediato! Debemô âbbertîh a nuêttrô amigô der terrible peligro que corren. ¡Deha tu equipo y corre!

entry.key: POKE: What are you doing, Pye?!
entry.value: POKE: ¡¿Qué açê, Pye?!

entry.key: PYE: The more we know about this alien matter, the better our chances of survival. I will learn what I can here. Go, warn the others; maybe they can construct shelter somehow. ...Now, Poke!
entry.value: PYE: Cuanto mâh çepamô de êtta materia êttraña, mâh probabilidadê de çobrebibîh tendremô. Boy a dêccubrîh lo que pueda aquí. Be y âbbierte a lô demâh; quiçâh puedan côttruîh argún tipo de refuhio. ...¡Ya mîmmo, Poke!

entry.key: CLARY: I fear our situation may be dire:
entry.value: CLARY: Me temo que podríamô êttâh en una çituaçión delicá.

entry.key: CLARY: Pye, Poke, and I landed here on this <color=lightblue>comet</color> not long after its arrival in this star system. Our <color=orange>shuttle</color>’s equipment heard strange energy readings coming from somewhere beneath the surface.
entry.value: CLARY: Pye, Poke y yo aterriçamô en êtte <color=lightblue>cometa</color> poco dêppuêh de çu yegá a êtte çîttema êttelâh. El equipo de nuêttro <color=orange>trâbbordadôh</color> detêttó unâ êttrañâ çeñalê de enerhía que probenían dêdde argún çitio debaho de la çuperfiçie.

entry.key: CLARY: Pye and Poke were able to locate a fissure in the ice on the <color=lightblue>comet</color>’s sunward side, and they descended inside to investigate the source of the readings.
entry.value: CLARY: Pye y Poke encontraron una endidura en el ielo, en la cara del <color=lightblue>cometa</color> que mira ar Çôh, y dêççendieron pa imbêttigâh la fuente de lâ çeñalê.

entry.key: CLARY: But... Pye and my sister have been gone for a long time now. They haven’t contacted me since descending below the surface, either.
entry.value: CLARY: Pero... Pye y mi ermana çe marxaron açe un largo rato. Y no çe an comunicao cômmigo dêdde que çe adentraron debaho de la çuperfiçie.

entry.key: CLARY: Should I leave the <color=orange>shuttle</color> to look for them? I want to follow protocol, but I don’t know what I’ll do if they aren’t well...
entry.value: CLARY: ¿Debería abandonâh el <color=orange>trâbbordadôh</color> pa îh a bûccâl-lâ? Quiero çegîh er protocolo, pero no çé qué aría çi yegaran a êttâh en problemâ...

entry.key: CLARY: Poke... Pye... Come back to me safely, my friends.
entry.value: CLARY: Poke... Pye... Regreçen a çarbo, amigâ míâ.

entry.key: CLARY: This is troublesome: It seems the <color=lightblue>comet</color> wishes to submerge our <color=orange>shuttle</color> in ice. If we stay on the surface too long, the <color=orange>shuttle</color> may freeze entirely.
entry.value: CLARY: Êtto êh preocupante: pareçe que el <color=lightblue>cometa</color> deçea çumerhîh nuêttro <color=orange>trâbbordadôh</color> baho el ielo. Çi permaneçemô demaçiao tiempo en la çuperfiçie, el <color=orange>trâbbordadôh</color> podría conhelarçe por completo.

entry.key: POKE: Even if it did, couldn’t someone call it back home to the <color=orange>gravity cannon</color> on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color>?
entry.value: POKE: Aun çi eço fueçe çierto, ¿no podría argien trâl-ladâl-lo de regreço a caça con el <color=orange>cañón grabitatorio</color> en <color=lightblue>Hemelo Braça</color>?

entry.key: PYE: Yes, but the exploration of the <color=lightblue>comet</color> would be more difficult if we were without the <color=orange>shuttle</color> until someone recalled it. Perhaps we shouldn’t have landed on the dark side of the <color=lightblue>comet</color>...
entry.value: PYE: Çí, pero la êpploraçión del <color=lightblue>cometa</color> çería mâh dificurtoça çi êttubiéçemô çin el <color=orange>trâbbordadôh</color> âtta que argien lo trâl-ladaçe otra bêh. Quiçâh no deberíamô abêh aterriçao en er lao ôccuro del <color=lightblue>cometa</color>...

entry.key: CLARY: Suppose one of us remained in the <color=orange>shuttle</color> to keep it warm and continue monitoring the surface.
entry.value: CLARY: Çupongamô que una de noçotrâ permaneçiera en el <color=orange>trâbbordadôh</color> pa mantenêl-lo caliente y çegîh analiçando la çuperfiçie.

entry.key: PYE: This would be wise, I think, Clary. If you don’t mind waiting here with it, Poke and I can continue to investigate the surface.
entry.value: PYE: Eço, en mi opinión, çería prudente, Clary. Çi no te molêtta êpperâh aquí, Poke y yo podremô continuâh imbêttigando la çuperfiçie.

entry.key: Start...Whoa.

entry.key: SelfStartWhat the heck happened?
entry.value: ¿Qué demoniô çuçedió?

entry.key: SelfStartThis is the greatest day of my life!
entry.value: ¡Êh er mehôh día de mi bida!

entry.key: SelfStartAre you me from the last loop?
entry.value: ¿Tú erê mi yo del úrtimo bucle?

entry.key: SelfStartThis got weird in a hurry.
entry.value: Êtto acaba de ponerçe mu raro.

entry.key: SelfStartAAAAAAAAAAHHHH!
entry.value: ¡AAAAA!

entry.key: Confused1If you're me, then I'm as confused as you are.
entry.value: Çi tú erê yo, çabrâh la confuçión que çiento.

entry.key: SelfConfused1Do you think we have the same memories?
entry.value: ¿Creê que tenemô lô mîmmô recuerdô?

entry.key: SelfConfused1Do you think it's okay there's two of us?
entry.value: ¿Creê que êttá bien que aya dôh de noçotrô?

entry.key: Memories0BGood question. Let's see...
entry.value: Guena pregunta. Beamô...

entry.key: Memories1I remember all the time loops, including last loop when I jumped into the black hole in here. What about you?
entry.value: Recuerdo tôh lô buclê temporalê, incluío el úrtimo en er que çarté al aguhero negro aquí. ¿Y tú?

entry.key: SelfMemories1Me, too. Sounds like our memories diverge at the start of this loop.
entry.value: Yo también. Pareçe que nuêttrô recuerdô çon diferentê al iniçio de êtte bucle.

entry.key: SelfMemories1Same, except I woke up at the campfire, like always.
entry.value: Lo mîmmo. Pero yo me dêpperté hunto a la fogata der campamento, como çiempre.

entry.key: WokeUp1BIt makes sense one of the two versions of us would start at the campfire as usual.
entry.value: Tiene çentío que una de nuêttrâ berçionê empieçe en er campamento.

entry.key: WokeUp1CMakes sense to me, seeing how jumping into the black hole is definitely what created two of us.
entry.value: Tiene çentío pa mí, çi pienço que çartâh al aguhero negro êh lo que, definitibamente, nô duplicó.

entry.key: Excited1Sure, two of us is great and all, but is it the greatest? What about the day we, you know... what about that one?
entry.value: Claro, êh heniâh que çeamô dôh y bla, bla, pero ¿êh rearmente lo mehôh de lo mehôh? ¿Y qué ay der día en er que, ya çabê...? Eçe día.

entry.key: SelfExcited1Are you talking about the day I...?
entry.value: ¿Te refierê ar día en er que yo...?

entry.key: SelfExcited1Oh, right. That one's probably still the greatest.
entry.value: A, claro. Eçe, probablemente, çiga çiendo er mehôh de tôh.

entry.key: Excited2AWhat? No! No, I'm talking about the other one.
entry.value: ¿Qué? ¡No! No, me refiero al otro.

entry.key: SelfExcited2AOH. Yep, that makes way more sense.
entry.value: A. Çîh, eço tiene muxo mâh çentío.

entry.key: Excited2BHaha, I know, right? But today is probably the next greatest day of our life after that one.
entry.value: Ha, ha, çí, lo çé, ¿no? Pero, probablemente, oy çea er çegundo mehôh día de nuêttra bida dêppuêh de eçe.

entry.key: SelfExcited2BWait, can you read my mind?
entry.value: Un momento, ¿puedê leêh mi mente?

entry.key: SelfExcited2BWhat other memories do you have?
entry.value: ¿Qué otrô recuerdô tienê?

entry.key: SelfExcited2BThink it's okay there's two of us?
entry.value: ¿Creê que êttá bien que aya dôh de noçotrô?

entry.key: Excited3BDefinitely no. I just have the same memories as you. ...Except for this loop, I mean.
entry.value: Definitibamente, no. Tengo lô mîmmô recuerdô que tú. A êççêççión de êtte bucle.

entry.key: Excited3BI started this loop by popping out of a white hole inside the Ash Twin Project, since in the loop before this one I jumped into the black hole.
entry.value: Començé êtte bucle ar çalîh de un aguhero blanco en er Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça», ya que en el anteriôh, çarté al aguhero negro.

entry.key: Excited3AYeah, now you've got it. That was an incredible day.
entry.value: Çí, açí êh. Fue un día increíble.

entry.key: Excited3ABut today is probably the next greatest day of our life after that one.
entry.value: Pero, probablemente, oy çea er çegundo mehôh día de nuêttra bida dêppuêh de eçe.

entry.key: SelfExcited3AThink it's okay there's two of us?
entry.value: ¿Creê que êttá bien que aya dôh de noçotrô?

entry.key: Memories0ALet's see... We should have all the same memories before the whole "going into space and becoming aware of the alien time loop" thing.
entry.value: Beamô... Deberíamô tenêh lô mîmmô recuerdô antê de tó eço çobre «îh al êppaçio y dânnô cuenta der bucle temporâh alieníhena».

entry.key: Looped1I think so. I started this current loop by popping out of a white hole inside the Ash Twin Project.
entry.value: Eço creo. Començé êtte bucle ar çalîh de un aguhero blanco en er Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça».

entry.key: SelfLooped1I started at the campfire like usual.
entry.value: Començé en la fogata der campamento, como de côttumbre.

entry.key: SelfLooped1What do you remember from before this loop?

entry.key: Wrong1Yeah, duplicating living beings probably wasn't what the Nomai had in mind when they built the Ash Twin Project.
entry.value: Çí. Êh mu probable que duplicâh çerê bibô no aya çido lo que lô nomai tenían en mente cuando côttruyeron er Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça».

entry.key: SelfWrong1I wonder if we have the same memories.
entry.value: Me pregunto çi tenemô lô mîmmô recuerdô.

entry.key: SelfWrong1I wonder if there being two of us screws anything up.
entry.value: Me pregunto çi por çêh dôh podríamô arruinâh argo.

entry.key: Wrong2AWell, we're talking to each other and nothing's exploded yet.
entry.value: Gueno, nô êttamô ablando y todabía no êpplotó ná.

entry.key: SelfWrong2AYeah, it's a pretty novel experience.
entry.value: Çí, êh una êpperiençia bâttante nobedoça.

entry.key: SelfWrong2AGossan always says that means the date's going well.
entry.value: Gôççan çiempre diçe que, çi eçe êh er caço, la çita ba bien.

entry.key: SelfWrong2AMaybe the universe doesn't mind two of us.
entry.value: Quiçá al uniberço no le molêtte que çeamô dôh.

entry.key: Wrong2BWell, we're talking to each other and nothing's exploded yet.
entry.value: Gueno, nô êttamô ablando y todabía no êpplotó ná.

entry.value: Pareçe çêh poçitibo.

entry.key: SelfWrong2BYeah, it's a pretty novel experience.
entry.value: Çí, êh una êpperiençia bâttante nobedoça.

entry.key: SelfWrong2BGossan always says that means the date's going well.
entry.value: Gôççan çiempre diçe que, çi eçe êh er caço, la çita ba bien.

entry.key: Wrong3AYeah, but it's Slate's definition of a boring date. Makes sense Gossan and Slate never dated.
entry.value: Çí, pero êh la çita aburrida, por definiçión, çegún Launa. Tiene çentío que Gôççan y Launa nunca ayan tenío una çita.

entry.key: SelfWrong3AThat and the whole mishap with Gossan's eye.
entry.value: Eço y er percançe con el oho de Gôççan.

entry.key: Wrong3CHopefully not. Besides, an extra version of us is definitely better than if we'd created an extra anglerfish or something.
entry.value: Con un poco de çuerte, no. Ademâh, una berçión êttra de noçotrô êh muxo mehôh que çi ubiéramô creao otro rape o argo açí.

entry.key: SelfWrong3CGEH.
entry.value: CUÊH.

entry.key: SelfWrong3CAgreed. We're charming and have fewer teeth.

entry.value: Uf. Çí. Lo del oho.

entry.value: Argo êh argo.

Segue1BNor do I. Hasty segue?

entry.key: Segue2AQuickly changing the subject, you know how I - er, we - jumped into the black hole that opened up at the end of the last time loop?
entry.value: Cambiando rápidamente de tema, ¿çabê cómo yo... eee, digo noçotrô çartamô al aguhero negro que çe abrió ar finâh del úrtimo bucle temporâh?

entry.key: Segue2AWhat do you think would happen if you don't jump in this time?
entry.value: Ey, ¿qué creê que çuçedería çi êtta bêh no çartarâ?

entry.key: SelfSegue2AHuh. That's a good question.
entry.value: Mmm. Guena pregunta.

entry.key: Segue2BSo hey, what do you think happens if you don't jump into the black hole again at the end of this loop?

entry.key: Merge2AIt's something I've been wondering about. We're in thoroughly uncharted territory at this point.
entry.value: Êh argo que me e êttao preguntao. A êtta artura, êttamô en un territorio totarmente inêpplorao.

entry.key: SelfMerge2AUnlike all the other time manipulation we've experienced.
entry.value: A diferençia de toa la demâh manipulaçión temporâh que emô êpperimentao.

entry.key: SelfMerge2ATruly, we are the Feldspar of weird time stuff.
entry.value: La berdá êh que çomô er Ferdêppato de lâ cuêttionê temporalê rarâ.

entry.key: Merge2BThat's a good point.
entry.value: Mu guen punto.

entry.key: Merge2BI mean, I feel as real as ever, so I don't think I'm a figment of your imagination or anything like that.
entry.value: A bêh, me çiento mâh reâh que nunca, açí que no pienço que çea un prodûtto de mi imahinaçión o ná que çe le parêcca.

entry.key: SelfMerge2BThat's just what a figment of my imagination would say!
entry.value: ¡Êh hûttamente lo que diría un prodûtto de mi imahinaçión!

entry.key: SelfMerge2BI'm no expert, but you seem pretty real to me.
entry.value: No me êppeçialiço en êtto, pero me pareçê bâttante reâh.

entry.key: Merge2CI guess so!
entry.value: ¡Eço creo!

entry.key: Merge3AOh geez, Feldspar would just use the time loop to try increasingly outlandish stunts, wouldn't they. Might be a good thing they aren't aware of it.
entry.value: Ôh, çielô, Ferdêppato uçaría er bucle temporâh pa realiçâh pruebâ cá bêh mâh peligroçâ, ¿o no? Deberíamô alegrânnô de que no êtté ar tanto.

entry.key: RealThanks. You seem real to me, too, so... I guess there's just two of us now!
entry.value: Graçiâ. Me pareçê tan reâh, tan... ¡Çupongo que aora çomô dôh!

entry.key: SassAre you being sassy? You can't sass me! You are me!
entry.value: ¿Êttâh çiendo inçolente? ¡No puedê çêh inçolente cômmigo! ¡Porque erê yo!

entry.key: SassDoes kind of prove we're the same person, though.
entry.value: Aunque eço prueba que çomô la mîmma perçona.

entry.key: IntroEndAt any rate, it's been good talking to you, me. <Pause/> ...Incredibly strange, but good.
entry.value: En tó caço, a çido heniâh ablâh contigo, mi otro yo. <Pause/> ... Mu êttraño, pero heniâh.

entry.key: IntroEndSee you around!
entry.value: ¡Nô bemô!

entry.value: ¡¿Qué emô exo?! ¡Çartâh a eçe aguhero negro fue una idea terrible!
