entry.key: post intro menuHey, me.
entry.value: Oye, yo.

entry.key: Selfpost intro menuRemember leaving on our first solo trip?
entry.value: ¿Recuerdâ cuándo te fuîtte en tu primêh biahe çin tripulaçión?

entry.key: Selfpost intro menuRemember landing our ship on the Sun Station?
entry.value: ¿Recuerdâ abêh aterriçao nuêttra âttronabe en la Êttaçión Çolâh?

entry.key: should be deadYeah! That feels like ages ago.\\n\\nWe'd have died that first time out if the time loop didn't exist, though. Isn't that weird to think about?
entry.value: ¡Çí! Pareçe que fue açe çiglô.\\n\\nÇi er bucle temporâh no êççîttiera, ubiéçemô muerto eça primera bêh. ¿No êh raro pençâh en eço?

entry.key: Selfshould be deadWeirder than there being two of us now?
entry.value: ¿Mâh raro que çêh dôh aora?

entry.key: Selfshould be deadWe were disasterously unprepared for space.
entry.value: No teníamô ninguna noçión de cómo mobênnô en el êppaçio.

entry.key: should be dead 2bTuff was right - I AM the worst.
entry.value: Toba tenía raçón. Çoy de lo peôh.

entry.key: should be dead 2aWow, I guess I AM pretty sarcastic.
entry.value: Guau, creo que mi çarcâmmo êh bâttante gueno.

entry.key: should be dead 3It's unsettling to think about. Especially when you remember even Riebeck survived their first launch.
entry.value: Êh perturbadôh pençâh en eço. Êppeçiarmente, cuando recuerdâ que incluço Riebeck çobrebibió ar primêh lançamiento.

entry.key: sun stationYES. I can’t believe no one was around to see that.\\n\\nWe’re probably the best pilot in the space program by now.
entry.value: ÇÍ. No puedo creêh que no aya abío nadie pa bêl-lo.\\n\\nProbablemente, çeamô quienê mehôh pilotan âttronabê en er programa êppaçiâh.

entry.key: Selfsun stationYeah, but we’ve also died more than anyone else.
entry.value: Çí, pero çomô quienê mâh muertê acumulamô.

entry.key: Selfsun stationNot that anyone else knows it.
entry.value: Aunque nadie mâh lo çepa.

entry.key: Selfsun stationI needed to brag about that to someone a little.
entry.value: Neçeçitaba preçumîh con argien çobre eço.

entry.key: Selfsun stationDid that technically happen, with how the time loop works?
entry.value: Por cómo funçiona er bucle temporâh, ¿eço çuçedió ténnicamente?

entry.key: sun station 2That’s true. <Pause> I’m not sure how to factor that in.
entry.value: Êh çierto. <Pause> No çé mu bien cómo conçiderâl-lo.

entry.key: sun station 3Still, it’s kind of nice to get to say it out loud. Even if it’s just to ourself.
entry.value: Aun açí, çe çiente bien deçîl-lo en bôh arta. Aunque mâh no çea a mi réplica.

entry.key: sun station 4That’s fine. It’s kind of nice to hear it said out loud.
entry.value: Êttá bien. Çe çiente bien êccuxâh que argien lo diçe en bôh arta.

entry.key: sun station 5What? ...Oh, come on, don’t take that away from us!
entry.value: ¿Qué...? ¡Ay, por fabôh, deha que lo dîffrutemô!

entry.key: Selfsun station 5Just kidding, I don't care how time works.
entry.value: Çolo bromeo, no me importa cómo funçiona er tiempo.

entry.key: Selfsun station 5But given it only happened in a previous loop...
entry.value: Pero como çolo çuçedió en un bucle anteriôh...

entry.key: sun station 5aHaha, yeah, me either. <Pause> ...Obviously.
entry.value: Ha, ha, çí, a mí tampoco. <Pause> Ôbbiamente.

entry.key: sun station 5bThe worst part is we’re the same person, and you know I’m going to agree with you. (Sigh...)
entry.value: La peôh parte êh que çomô la mîmma perçona, por lo que çabê que boy a êttâh de acuerdo contigo. Uf...

entry.key: CLARY: Regarding the warp towers on <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>: Does each tower have to be perfectly aligned with the center of the astral body to which it’s tuned?
entry.value: CLARY: Rêppêtto de lâ torrê de dîttorçión en <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>: ¿Acaço cá torre debe êttâh perfêttamente alineá con er çentro der cuerpo âttrâh ar que çe ahûtta?

entry.key: CLARY: I enjoy precision as much as the next Nomai, but if, for example, a tower’s base were to shift even slightly, that tower might no longer align with its astral body.
entry.value: CLARY: Dîffruto de la preçiçión como cuarquiêh nomai, pero, por ehemplo, çi la baçe de una torre çe mobiera apenâ, tar bêh ya no podría alinearçe con çu cuerpo âttrâh.

entry.key: POKE: We don’t need the alignment angle to be exact; it only needs to be within five degrees of the astral body’s center.
entry.value: POKE: El ángulo de alineaçión no tiene que çêh êççâtto; debe êttâh dentro de lô çinco gráô der çentro der cuerpo âttrâh.

entry.key: POKE: Of note: This gives us a slightly longer warp window. I imagine this window will last roughly several seconds.
entry.value: POKE: De conçideraçión: Êtto nô da una bentana de dîttorçión un poco mâh larga. Imahino que êtta bentana debería durâh bariô çegundô.

entry.key: POKE: As such, any Nomai stepping onto the warp platform during the active window will be immediately warped. We will need to be careful around the platform for the duration of the time it’s active to avoid accidental transportation.
entry.value: POKE: Êh por eço que cuarquiêh nomai que piçe la plataforma de dîttorçión mientrâ la bentana de dîttorçión êtté âttiba çerá trâpportao de îmmediato. Deberemô tenêh muxo cuidao con la plataforma mientrâ la bentana êtté âttiba pa ebitâh trâpportaçionê âççidentalê.

entry.key: CLARY: More accurately, I enjoy precision as much as the next Nomai, provided the next Nomai is not Poke.
entry.value: CLARY: Reformularé lo que dihe: dîffruto de la preçiçión como cuarquiêh nomai, çiempre y cuando eçe nomai no çea Poke.

entry.key: ROOT: Where am I taking this first black hole core? (And where am I taking the remaining cores once they’re ready?)
entry.value: ROOT: ¿Dónde yebaré êtte núcleo de aguhero negro? (¿Y dónde yebaré lô núcleô rêttantê cuando êttén lîttô?).

entry.key: CLARY: All of the warp towers are being constructed on <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>, so the black hole cores will go there.
entry.value: CLARY: Toâ lâ torrê de dîttorçión çe êttán côttruyendo en <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>, açí que ayí irán lô núcleô de aguhero negro.

entry.key: POKE: The white hole cores are for the warp receivers. Each of the six receivers are being constructed at different locations, so those deliveries will be a greater pain in your cervical spine.
entry.value: POKE: Lô núcleô de aguhero blanco çe uçarán en lô reçêttorê de dîttorçión. Lô çeî reçêttorê çe êttán côttruyendo en ubicaçionê diferentê, açí que entregâl-lô çerá un dolôh de êppina çerbicâh.

entry.key: ROOT: My gratitude! In that case: Poke, Clary, I’m leaving for delivery! I’ll send Yarrow your regards.
entry.value: ROOT: ¡Mi gratitûh! En eçe caço: Poke, Clary, ¡me iré a açêh la entrega! Çaludaré a Yarrow de çu parte.

entry.key: CLARY: Poke, I’ll return to the <color=orange>forge</color> shortly; I’m going to catch up to Root and help him deliver the first core to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>, just to make sure Yarrow receives it.
entry.value: CLARY: Poke, regreçaré a la <color=orange>forha</color> en brebe. Arcançaré a Root pa ayudâl-lo con la entrega der primêh núcleo a <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color> y me açeguraré de que Yarrow lo reçiba.

entry.key: POKE: Of course you are.
entry.value: POKE: Por çupuêtto que lo arâh.

entry.key: POKE: The tower designs in the <color=orange>High Energy Lab</color> on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> reveal each receiver's location. Ask Yarrow; he is familiar with them.
entry.value: POKE: Lô planô de la torre en el <color=orange>Laboratorio Urtraenerhético</color> de <color=lightblue>Hemelo Braça</color> muêttran la ubicaçión de cá reçêttôh. Yarrow lô conoçe bien, pregúntale.

entry.key: WARNING: Be cautious near the boarding area while the <color=orange>Black Hole Forge</color> is in operation.
entry.value: ÂBBERTENÇIA: Çe debe tenêh cuidao çerca del área de abordahe mientrâ la <color=orange>Forha del Aguhero Negro</color> êtté en funçionamiento.

entry.key: POKE: Of note: Yarrow believes he spotted a flaw in the warp tower designs: namely, that one of the warp towers on <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> will never activate, because its warp receiver will never align overhead.
entry.value: POKE: De conçideraçión: Yarrow cree abêh detêttao una faya en lô planô de la torre de dîttorçión. Diçe que una de lâ torrê en <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color> no çe âttibará hamâh porque çu reçêttôh de dîttorçión no êttá alineao dirêttamente ençima.

entry.key: POKE: Does your romantic interest think a warp tower’s alignment point is its receiver? Does he not know that a warp tower always aligns with the center of its corresponding astral body?
entry.value: POKE: ¿Tu interêh amoroço cree que er punto de alineaçión de una torre de dîttorçión êh çu reçêttôh? ¿Acaço no çabe que una torre de dîttorçión çiempre çe alinea con er çentro de çu cuerpo âttrâh corrêppondiente?

entry.key: CLARY: That isn’t an unreasonable belief, given the receiver does have to be located on (or in close orbit around) the relevant astral body.
entry.value: CLARY: No careçe de fundamento, dao que el reçêttôh debe êttâh ubicao en er cuerpo âttrâh corrêppondiente o, ar menô, en çu órbita.

entry.key: CLARY: I seem to recall that was your understanding of warp technology, at first.
entry.value: CLARY: Creo recordâh que tú también creíâ eço çobre la tênnolohía de dîttorçión ar prinçipio.

entry.key: CLARY: No, Yarrow understands the distinction. He likely doesn’t realize the <color=lightblue>Hourglass Twins</color> are so close together they function as a single astral body, with a shared alignment point in between them.
entry.value: CLARY: No, Yarrow comprende la diferençia. Creo que no çe êttá percatando de que lô <color=lightblue>Hemelô Relôh de Arena</color> êttán tan çerca uno del otro que funçionan como un çolo cuerpo âttrâh con un mîmmo punto de alineaçión.

entry.key: Exit to surface.
entry.value: Çalîh a la çuperfiçie.

entry.key: <color=orange>Black Hole Forge</color>\\n(north 40m)
entry.value: <color=orange>Forha del Aguhero Negro</color>\\n(40 m ar norte)

entry.key: PYE: The Ash Twin Project will be one of our biggest undertakings (metaphorically and physically). To build it, we need a way to travel quickly between Ash Twin and each location that holds crucial project materials.
entry.value: PYE: El Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça» çerá nuêttro emprendimiento mâh grande (tanto de forma metafórica como fíçica). Pa côttruîl-lo, neçeçitamô una forma de biahâh rápido entre Hemelo Çeniça y cá lugâh que contenga materialê cruçialê pa er proyêtto.

entry.key: ROOT: What if we used warp towers (like the one we have on the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color>) to connect <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> directly to each critical location?
entry.value: ROOT: ¿Y çi uçáramô torrê de dîttorçión (como la que tenemô en la <color=orange>Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco</color>) pa conêttâh cá ubicaçión crítica dirêttamente con <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>?

entry.key: CLARY: Poke, Root, and I can begin work on this immediately in the <color=orange>Black Hole Forge</color> (this will keep us busy!).
entry.value: CLARY: Poke, Root y yo començaremô a trabahâh de îmmediato en la <color=orange>Forha del Aguhero Negro</color> (¡eço nô mantendrá ocupáô!).

entry.key: YARROW: Of note: Each tower on <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> will warp to a different planet.
entry.value: YARROW: De conçideraçión: Cá una de lâ torrê de <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color> apuntará a un planeta dîttinto.

entry.key: PHLOX: We can design each tower to visually reflect its warp destination!
entry.value: PHLÔH: Podemô diçeñâh cá torre pa que reflehe de forma biçuâh er dêttino de la dîttorçión.

entry.key: PHLOX: The <color=orange>Giant’s Deep tower</color>, for instance, could resemble a cyclone. And we could model the <color=orange>Timber Hearth tower</color> after a geyser mountain!
entry.value: PHLÔH: La <color=orange>torre de Abîmmo der Higante</color>, por ehemplo, podría pareçerçe a un çiclón. ¡Y podríamô modelâh la <color=orange>torre de Lumbre</color> pa que çe parêcca a una montaña de lô héiçerê!

entry.key: YARROW: My gratitude to those who noted my imprecise language! Yes, the <color=lightblue>sun</color> is not a planet. I believe this has been sufficiently clarified (kindly stop reminding me!).
entry.value: YARROW: ¡Mi gratitûh a quienê notaron la impreçiçión de mi bocabulario! Çí, el <color=lightblue>çôh</color> no êh un planeta. Creo que lo emô aclarao lo çufiçiente (ya no açe farta que me lo recuerden).

entry.key: Retrieving previous launch data from <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>.
entry.value: Recuperando datô de lançamientô anteriorê de <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>.

entry.key: Total number of probes launched: <NbTimeloops>
entry.value: Totâh de çondâ lançâh: <NbTimeloops>

entry.key: Deep space anomaly matching all known criteria for the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color> found by probe <FirstLoop>.
entry.value: La çonda número <FirstLoop> encontró una anomalía en el êppaçio profundo que coinçide con tôh lô criteriô conoçíô del <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>.

entry.key: CLARY: I have good news, Yarrow! The advanced warp core is ready to be installed in the central chamber of <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>.
entry.value: CLARY: ¡Traigo guenâ notiçiâ, Yarrow! Er núcleo de dîttorçión abançao êttá lîtto pa çêh îttalao en la cámara çentrâh de <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>.

entry.key: YARROW: I’m intrigued, love! Everyone here working on the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is excited to see it (Pye is beside herself with joy!).
entry.value: YARROW: ¡Qué intriga, cariño! Tôh lô que êttán trabahando en el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color> êttán mu emoçionáô por bêl-lo (¡Pye no puede contenêh er húbilo!).

entry.key: POKE: No, it isn’t!
entry.value: POKE: ¡No êh çierto!

entry.key: YARROW: Is everything well at the <color=orange>forge</color>?
entry.value: YARROW: ¿Êttá tó en orden en la <color=orange>forha</color>?

entry.key: CLARY: Don’t worry, love; Poke is only nervous. The core is extraordinary, and her design work is beautifully clever.
entry.value: CLARY: No te preocupê, cariño. Poke çolo êttá nerbioça. Er núcleo êh êttraordinario, y er diçeño que iço êh perfêttamente inhenioço.

entry.key: POKE: The core’s durability could still be improved! I need more time!
entry.value: POKE: ¡La durabilidá der núcleo podría mehorarçe! ¡Neçeçito mâh tiempo!

entry.key: CLARY: Ignore her, Yarrow. The core is finished. And if my sister tells you otherwise, then she will be finished, as well.
entry.value: CLARY: Înnórala, Yarrow. Er núcleo êttá terminao. Y çi mi ermana me contradiçe, terminaré con eya.

entry.key: YARROW: My gratitude for the latest shipment, Oeno! This ore should be the last we’ll need for the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>.
entry.value: YARROW: ¡Mi gratitûh por la mâh reçiente remeça, Oeno! Êtte minerâh debería çêh el úrtimo que neçeçitamô pa el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>.

entry.key: YARROW: Once we’ve finished the shell that seals off the central chamber, we’ll check to ensure there are no longer any physical entrances. Ramie and I will be checking the interior and then the exterior for cracks (our final safety check).
entry.value: YARROW: Una bêh que completemô la carcaça que çeya la cámara çentrâh, debemô berificâh que no ayan quedao entrâh fíçicâ. Ramie y yo controlaremô que no aya grietâ en el interiôh o el êtteriôh (la berificaçión de çeguridá finâh).

entry.key: OENO: This is exciting news! Can I offer an extra set of eyes for this final check (specifically, mine)? If my work here is complete, I’d be delighted to help.
entry.value: OENO: ¡Qué notiçiâ emoçionantê! ¿Neçeçitan otro conhunto de ohô pa la comprobaçión finâh? ¿Lô míô, êppeçíficamente? Çi mi trabaho aquí ya a finaliçao, êttaré encantao de ayudâh.

entry.key: YARROW: We’d be grateful if you would! The more eyes, the better, as the smallest flaw or opening in the shell that protects the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> could lead to disaster.
entry.value: YARROW: ¡Te lo agradeçeríamô muxo! Cuantô mâh ohô, mehôh. La faya o apertura mâh pequeña en la carcaça que protehe el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color> podría produçîh un deçâttre.

entry.key: OENO: I’m still amazed by how much ore the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> requires!
entry.value: OENO: ¡Aún me çorprende la cantidá de minerâh que çe neçeçita pa el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>!

entry.key: CYCAD: Isn’t this the ore for the remaining towers being built on <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>? The completed towers I’ve seen are quite large!
entry.value: CYCÂ: ¿No êh êtte er minerâh neçeçario pa côttruîh lâ torrê rêttantê en <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>? ¡Lâ torrê terminâh que e bîtto çon enormê!

entry.key: OENO: No, the material for those towers is all being taken from <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>. The ore we’re mining here will be used to craft an immensely thick protective shell that will physically seal off the chamber inside <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>’s core.
entry.value: OENO: No, er materiâh que çe uçó pa eçâ torrê çe tomó de <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>. Er minerâh que êttamô êccabando aquí çe utiliçará pa creâh una îmmença carcaça protêttora que çeyará fíçicamente la cámara interiôh der núcleo de <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>.

entry.key: COLEUS: I’m relieved by our clan’s decision to use <color=lightblue>Timber Hearth</color>’s ore only for constructing the shell. If, eventually, life on this planet were to evolve to the point of advanced metallurgy, I’m confident we won’t have destroyed their ability to create!
entry.value: COLEÛ: Me alibia que nuêttro clan aya deçidío uçâh er minerâh de <color=lightblue>Lumbre</color> pa côttruîh la carcaça únicamente. Çi, arguna bêh, la bida en êtte planeta eboluçionara âtta logrâh una metalurhia abançá, no dudo de que la capaçidá de creaçión êttaría intâtta.

entry.key: CYCAD: If they're sealing off all entrances, I hope they've planned a-core-dingly!
entry.value: CYCÂ: Çi çeyan toâ lâ entrâh, ¡no çe podrá ingreçâh núnclea mâh!

entry.key: OENO: I thought you had forbidden your apprentice from making puns, Coleus.
entry.value: OENO: Pençé que le abíâ proibío lô huegô de palabrâ a tu aprendîh, Coleû.

entry.key: COLEUS: How else would he improve?
entry.value: COLEÛ: ¿De qué otra manera podría mehorâh çi no?

entry.key: <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> warp network status: All towers online.
entry.value: Êttao de la ré de dîttorçión de <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>: toâ lâ torrê en línea.

entry.key: <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> warp network status: <color=orange>Sun tower</color> offline as of <MinutesSinceRedGiant> minutes <SecondsSinceRedGiant> seconds ago.\\nAll other towers online.
entry.value: Êttao de la ré de dîttorçión de <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>:La <color=orange>torre çolâh</color> çe dêcconêttó açe <MinutesSinceRedGiant> minutô y <SecondsSinceRedGiant> çegundô.\\nTodâ lâ otrâ torrê êttán en línea.

entry.key: Sun tower offline as of <MinutesSinceRedGiant> minutes <SecondsSinceRedGiant> seconds ago.\\nAll other towers online.
entry.value: La torre çolâh çe dêcconêttó açe <MinutesSinceRedGiant> minutô y <SecondsSinceRedGiant> çegundô.\\nTodâ lâ otrâ torrê êttán en línea.

entry.key: POKE: Welcome to the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color>! If you fell through the black hole by accident (don't worry, you aren’t the first), this warp tower can return you to <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>.
entry.value: POKE: ¡Te doy la biembenida a la <color=orange>Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco</color>! Çi caítte en el aguhero negro por âççidente (no te preocupê, çuçede con frecuençia), êtta torre de dîttorçión puede yebarte de regreço a <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color>.

entry.key: POKE: Every warp tower is tuned to a specific astral body. A tower's warp can only be used during the brief window when the tower is aligned with its corresponding astral body (in this case, <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>).
entry.value: POKE: Cá torre de dîttorçión êttá conêttá con un cuerpo âttrâh êppeçífico. La dîttorçión de una torre çolo puede uçarçe durante la brebe bentana de tiempo en la que la torre êttá alineá con çu cuerpo âttrâh êppeçífico (en êtte caço, <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color>).

entry.key: You must be standing on the warp platform on the floor during this alignment to be warped.
entry.value: Deberâh pararte en la plataforma de dîttorçión durante êtta alineaçión pa que te trâpporte.

entry.key: POKE: If you look up while the station is rotating, you can see the alignment happens when the astral body is directly overhead.
entry.value: POKE: Çi mirâ açia arriba mientrâ la êttaçión rota, berâh que la alineaçión çuçede cuando er cuerpo âttrâh êttá dirêttamente ençima.

entry.key: Gabbro
entry.value: Gabro

entry.key: MeetGabbro3FNice, it’s you. Good to see you made it here in one piece. The first solo launch is a doozy, isn’t it?
entry.value: A, heniâh, erê tú. Me alegra que ayâ yegao âtta aquí con bida. Er primêh dêppege çin tripulaçión êh increíble, ¿o no?

entry.key: MeetGabbro3FSo hey, don’t freak out or anything, but lately I keep, like, dying repeatedly. I dunno, it’s pretty weird.
entry.value: E... no te açûttê, pero creo que úrtimamente me la paço... muriendo una y otra bêh. No çé, êh mu êttraño.

entry.key: MeetGabbro3FWhat about you? Have you died lately, or is it just me?
entry.value: ¿Y tú? ¿Âh muerto reçientemente o çolo çoy yo?

entry.key: GabbroMeetGabbro3FNo, it’s me, too. We’re in a time loop.
entry.value: No, yo también. Êttamô en un bucle temporâh.

entry.key: Gabbro3F_2Time has been behaving unusually lately. Yeah, a time loop makes sense. Cool.
entry.value: Er tiempo çe a êttao comportando mu raro úrtimamente. Lo der bucle temporâh tiene muxo çentío. Heniâh.

entry.key: GabbroGabbro3F_2You’re taking this pretty well.
entry.value: Te lo êttâh tomando mu bien.

entry.key: GabbroGabbro3F_2What did you think it was?
entry.value: ¿Qué creíâ que paçaba?

entry.key: Gabbro3F_3Heh, right back at you.
entry.value: He, lo mîmmo digo.

entry.key: Gabbro3F_3Personally, I like new experiences, and I’ve never been in a time loop before. I mean, I don’t think I’ve been in a time loop before this one.
entry.value: La berdá êh que me gûttan lâ êpperiençiâ nuebâ, y nunca antê abía êttao en un bucle temporâh. O, ar menô, creo que nunca abía êttao en un bucle temporâh âtta aora.

entry.key: Gabbro3F_4I figured it’d be some kind of fidgety time business, but I wasn’t really thinking about what’s happening to the shape of time, you know? But a loop makes sense here. Let’s go with “loop” for now.
entry.value: Me imahiné que argo raro paçaba con er tiempo, pero nunca pençé que tendría que bêh con la forma der tiempo, ¿çabê? Un bucle tiene muxo çentío. Yamémôl-lo «bucle» por aora.

entry.key: Gabbro3F_5It looks like you and I are the only ones who can tell that time’s gone all weird. I tried radioing Hornfels and asking if they’d died, too, but they thought I was being metaphorical.
entry.value: Pareçe que çolo tú y yo nô percatamô de que er tiempo êttá açiendo coçâ rarâ. Yamé a Cônné por la radio y le pregunté çi también abía muerto, pero pençó que êttaba uçando una metáfora.

entry.key: Gabbro3F_5Even if I tell Hornfels about the time loop, they never remember by the next one. They don’t realize anything’s different.
entry.value: Aun çi le cuento lo der bucle temporâh a Cônné, ya no lo recordará en er próççimo. No çe da cuenta de que ay argo dîttinto.

entry.key: Gabbro3F_5And here’s another weird one for you - every time I die, all of my memories from that loop replay back to me. I’m pretty sure that’s related to this big stone Nomai statue I found on one of the other islands.
entry.value: Y tengo otro dato êttraño pa ti: cá bêh que muero, tôh mî recuerdô de eçe bucle çe reproduçen ante mî ohô. Tengo la çerteça de que êtto êttá relaçionao con la enorme êttatua nomai que encontré en una de lâ otrâ îl-lâ.

entry.key: Gabbro3F_5I was looking at it, and the statue opened its eyes and started glowing. It replayed my memories like it’d seen them through my own eyes, just like what happens each time I die.
entry.value: La êttaba mirando, y de repente la êttatua abrió lô ohô y començó a briyâh. Reproduçía mî recuerdô como çi yo lô biera con mî propiô ohô, de la mîmma forma que çuçede cá bêh que muero.

entry.key: GabbroGabbro3F_5That happened to me with the statue at the museum.
entry.value: Eço mîmmo me çuçedió con la êttatua en er muçeo.

entry.key: Gabbro3F_6You too, huh? Then the Nomai statues must have something to do with why we’re the only ones aware of the time loop. So... no glowing statue, no time loop awareness?
entry.value: A ti también, ¿e? Entonçê lâ êttatuâ nomai deben tenêh argo que bêh con el exo de que çolo tú y yo nô percatemô der bucle temporâh. Entonçê... ¿çin êttatuâ briyantê no ay perçêççión der bucle temporâh?

entry.key: Gabbro3F_6I think that’s going to be my leading theory, but if you find out anything new about the statues or the time loop, let me know, okay? I’ll be here.
entry.value: Creo que eça çerá mi ipóteçî prinçipâh por aora, pero çi dêccubrê argo nuebo çobre lâ êttatuâ o er bucle temporâh, abíçame, ¿çí? Êttaré aquí.

entry.key: Gabbro3F_6Anyway, that’s what’s new with me. But hey, this is your first solo voyage! ...Kind of! Let’s talk about you, you know?
entry.value: En fin, eçâ çon mî nobedadê. Pero, ¡ey! ¡Êh tu primêh biahe çin tripulaçión! O argo açí... Mehôh ablamô de ti, ¿no creê?

entry.key: Gabbro3F_SecondaryHave you ever watched a cyclone for so long, it started to hypnotize you? I’m telling you, they’ll put you in a trance if you stare at ’em long enough.
entry.value: ¿Arguna bêh te quedâtte mirando un çiclón durante tanto tiempo que terminó por înnotiçarte? Te huro que, çi lô mirâ fihamente lo çufiçiente, quedâ en trançe.

entry.key: GabbroMenuHow’s space treating you?
entry.value: ¿Cómo te êttá tratando el êppaçio?

entry.key: GabbroGabbroMenuI found something!
entry.value: ¡Dêccubrí argo!

entry.key: GabbroGabbroMenuWhat are you doing out here?
entry.value: ¿Qué êttâh açiendo aquí?

entry.key: GabbroGabbroMenuWhere should I explore on Giant’s Deep?
entry.value: ¿Dónde debería êpplorâh en Abîmmo der Higante?

entry.key: GabbroGabbroMenuWhat’s up with this planet?
entry.value: ¿Qué me diçê de êtte planeta?

entry.key: GabbroGabbroMenuWhere’s your ship?
entry.value: ¿Dónde êttá tu âttronabe?

entry.key: GabbroGabbroMenuI found your ship!
entry.value: ¡Encontré tu âttronabe!

entry.key: GabbroGabbroMenuI saw your ship again.
entry.value: Borbí a bêh tu âttronabe.

entry.key: GabbroGabbroMenuSee you later.
entry.value: Âtta luego.

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_3FWell, what are any of us doing here, really?
entry.value: Gueno, ¿qué êttamô açiendo tôh aquí, en realidá?

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_3F...Nah, I’m just kidding. I’m out here exploring our solar system, same as you.
entry.value: Na, êh broma. Êttoy êpplorando nuêttro çîttema çolâh, iguâh que tú.

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_3FBut I tell you what, outer space really gives you room to think. It’s quiet and peaceful out here.
entry.value: Pero te diré argo: el êppaçio êtteriôh te da lugâh pa pençâh. Aquí fuera ay tanta pâh y tranquilidá...

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_3FI mean, it’s usually quiet and peaceful. Sometimes a cyclone comes by and lifts my little island paradise clean out of the water. Then: less peaceful.
entry.value: Gueno, caçi çiempre ay pâh y tranquilidá. A beçê paça un çiclón y çe yeba bolando mi pequeño paraíço inçulâh. Y aí ay menô pâh.

entry.key: WhereToExplore_3FHere’s something you might like — I keep seeing a bright flash in the sky at the start of every loop. Something must be happening up there in orbit around the planet.
entry.value: Ay argo que creo que te gûttará: ar comienço de cá bucle temporâh, beo una lûh briyante en er çielo. Argo debe êttâh paçando ayí arriba, en la órbita der planeta.

entry.key: WhereToExplore_3FWhat else, what else... Have you been to Statue Island? That’s what I’ve been calling it, seeing as it’s the island where I found the glowing Nomai statue. ...Get it?
entry.value: Qué mâh, qué mâh... ¿Âh êttao en la Îl-la de la Êttatua? Açí la bautiçé, dao que êh la îl-la donde encontré la êttatua nomai briyante. ... ¿Lo entiendê?

entry.key: WhereToExplore_3FI was on the beach on Statue Island when the whole glowy business happened, by the way. It’s a nice beach for that kind of thing. I give it a solid 7 out of 10 on the Gabbro Relaxation Scale.
entry.value: Êttaba en la playa de la Îl-la de la Êttatua cuando çuçedió tó eço der briyo. Êh una guena playa pa que ocurra argo açí. Le doy 7 de 10 puntô en la êccala de relahaçión de Gabro.

entry.key: WhereToExplore_3FIf you feel like checking out Statue Island, it’s the one with two islands connected by a natural rock arch. Well... mostly connected, anyway. You’ll see.
entry.value: Çi quierê îh a bêh la Îl-la de la Êttatua, êh una de lâ dôh îl-lâ conêttâh por un arco rocoço naturâh. Gueno, conêttâh caçi der tó. Ya lo berâh.

entry.key: ThisPlanet_3FHaha, I know, right?
entry.value: Ha, ha, çí, lo çé, ¿no?

entry.key: ThisPlanet_3F...Oh, you meant, like, tell you more about it? I gotcha. Well, Giant’s Deep is massive, and mostly water. No surprises there.
entry.value: A... ¿quierê que te cuente mâh? De acuerdo. Puê, Abîmmo der Higante êh enorme, y êttá compuêtto mayormente de agua. Aí no ay çorpreçâ.

entry.key: ThisPlanet_3FThere’s a strong current a ways beneath the surface that prevents anything from sinking below it. Seriously, I tried everything I could think of to get past that current, and neither idea worked.
entry.value: Tiene una fuerte corriente que paça por debaho de la çuperfiçie y no deha que ná çe unda. De berâ, intenté tó lo que çe me ocurrió pa paçâh eça corriente, y ninguna de mî ideâ tubo éççito.

entry.key: ThisPlanet_3FAs for land masses, I’ve counted four islands, including this one. There’s also the one with that Nomai statue I saw on the beach.
entry.value: En cuando a lâ maçâ terrêttrê, conté cuatro îl-lâ, incluida êtta. También êttá la que tiene la êttatua nomai que bi en la playa.

entry.key: ThisPlanet_3FYou’ve seen the cyclones? Yeah, they’re hard to miss. They’ll toss up everything in their path, islands included. Little tip — if you get picked up, try to land in water. Less likely to kill you.
entry.value: ¿Âh bîtto lô çiclonê? Çí, êh difíçî no bêl-lô. Çe yeban tó lo que encuentran en er camino, y eço incluye a lâ îl-lâ. Un conçeho: çi te yeba uno, intenta aterriçâh çobre agua. Açí tienê menô probabilidadê de morîh.

entry.key: GabbrosShipThat’s a good question.
entry.value: Guena pregunta.

entry.key: GabbrosShipIt’s definitely on this planet somewhere. I mean, unless a cyclone came by and tossed it into space, I guess. Heh, that would be pretty nuts.
entry.value: Êttá en argún lugâh de êtte planeta. Çarbo que aya paçao un çiclón y la aya arrohao al êppaçio. He, eço çería una locura.

entry.key: GabbrosShipI hope it’s not lonely.
entry.value: Êppero que no çe çienta çola.

entry.key: GabbrosShip2An excellent question. I haven’t seen it around lately.
entry.value: Êh una pregunta êççelente. Açe un tiempo que no la beo.

entry.key: GabbrosShip2I hope it’s not lonely.
entry.value: Êppero que no çe çienta çola.

entry.key: GabbrosShip3Oh, cool. So it’s floating in the ocean, huh?
entry.value: A, heniâh. Entonçê ¿êttá flotando en el êppaçio?

entry.key: GabbrosShip3Did it look like it was having a good time?
entry.value: ¿Pareçía que çe êttaba dibirtiendo?

entry.key: GabbrosShip4I hope it’s having fun! Did you say hi for me?
entry.value: ¡Êppero que la êtté paçando bien! ¿La çaludâtte de mi parte?

entry.key: GoodbyeCool, cool. Take it easy out there.
entry.value: Tó bien. Cuídate, ¿çí?

entry.key: FoundSomethingMenuNice, nice. Whatcha got for me?
entry.value: Heniâh, heniâh. ¿Qué nobedadê tienê?

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomethingMenuI reached the inside of Statue Island.
entry.value: Yegé al interiôh de la Îl-la de la Êttatua.

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomethingMenuI found the source of the time loop.
entry.value: Encontré la fuente der bucle temporâh.

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomethingMenuI found Nomai masks inside the Ash Twin Project.
entry.value: Encontré máccarâ nomai dentro der Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça».

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomethingMenuI found what happened to the Orbital Probe Cannon.
entry.value: Dêccubrí lo que le çuçedió ar Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh.

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomethingMenuI found your quantum poem.
entry.value: Encontré tu poema cuántico.

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomethingMenuI found a photo of you inside the old radio tower.
entry.value: Encontré una foto tuya dentro de la bieha torre de radio.

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomethingMenuActually, nevermind.
entry.value: En realidá, no importa.

entry.key: FoundSomething1_3FSo the Nomai created those head statues to record memories, huh? ...Yeah, I could see the Nomai doing that. Not sure what for, but it seems like their sort of thing.
entry.value: Entonçê lô nomai crearon eçô bûttô pa armaçenâh recuerdô, ¿e? Çí, eço êh argo que arían lô nomai. No çé bien con qué fin, pero çuena como argo típico de eyô.

entry.key: FoundSomething1_3FDo you think the statues are recording our memories, then? ’Cause I remember that one on the beach looked at me funny. That must be my memory-friend!
entry.value: ¿Creê que lâ êttatuâ êttén armaçenando nuêttrô recuerdô? Porque la que bi en la playa me miró raro. ¡Debe çêh mi amiga mnemónica!

entry.key: FoundSomething1bRight, right, the cavern inside Statue Island is where the memory-recording statues were made, I remember.
entry.value: Çierto, çierto. La cabênna dentro de la Îl-la de la Êttatua êh donde çe crearon lâ êttatuâ que armaçenan recuerdô.

entry.key: FoundSomething1bSo your memory statue is the one in the museum back in the crater, and mine’s the one I found on the beach. I kinda dig having my own personal memory-friend.
entry.value: O çea que tu êttatua mnemónica êh la que êttá en er muçeo der crátê y la mía êh la que encontré en la playa. Debo âmmitîh que me gûtta tenêh mi propia amiga mnemónica.

entry.key: FoundSomething1bIf you come up with any hunches about what the Nomai wanted to record memories for, feel free to run them by me! You know where I’ll be.
entry.value: Çi çe te ocurre arguna idea çobre el ôhhetibo que tenían lô nomai pa grabâh çû recuerdô, no dehê de contármela. Ya çabê dónde êttaré.

entry.key: FoundSomething2_3FWait, whoa, really? The Nomai carved out Ash Twin and built a time loop device inside? ...That is wild.
entry.value: Un momento. Guau, ¿en çerio? ¿Lô nomai perforaron Hemelo Çeniça y côttruyeron un dîppoçitibo de bucle temporâh dentro? Eço êh... demençiâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething2_3FNow we know what’s causing the loop, then. And... if it’s caused by a device, that must mean it had to be switched on, right? Huh...
entry.value: Entonçê ya çabemô qué êh lo que êttá cauçando er bucle. Y, çi un dîppoçitibo lo êttá probocando, eço implica que argien tiene que abêl-lo ençendío, ¿berdá? Mmm...

entry.key: FoundSomething2_3FHey, what do you think would happen if you turned off the time loop? Like, there’s a part of me thinks maybe you shouldn’t, what with the sun blowing up and all.
entry.value: Ey, ¿qué creê que çuçedería çi deçâttibarâ er bucle temporâh? Una parte de mí me diçe que no lo deberíâ açêh, por el açunto de la êpploçión der Çôh y tó eço.

entry.key: FoundSomething2_3FThen again, who wants to spend eternity being blown up by the sun?
entry.value: Pero ¿quién querría paçâh la etênnidá çufriendo el êttayío der Çôh?

entry.key: FoundSomething2_3F...I dunno, I’m no time loop expert. I’m just gonna sit here and ponder the intricacies of time and space. Maybe take a nap, too, if I feel like it.
entry.value: ... No lo çé, no me êppeçialiço en buclê temporalê. Creo que mehôh me çiento aquí a pençâh en lâ complehidadê del êppaçio y er tiempo. Tar bêh me duerma una çiêtta también, çi me da çueño.

entry.key: FoundSomething2bMy head’s still all full of scenarios for what would happen if you turned off the time loop. I’ll probably notice if you decide to mess with it, though, right? Seems like something I’d notice.
entry.value: Mi cabeça no deha de reproduçîh lô diferentê reçurtáô que podrían darçe çi deçâttibarâ er bucle temporâh. Çi le açê argo ar bucle, probablemente me dé cuenta, ¿berdá? Tendría çentío que me percatara.

entry.key: FoundSomething2bThis is all pretty wild.
entry.value: Tó êtto êh una locura.

entry.key: FoundSomething3_3FYou’re saying the statues were made so memories could be sent back in time? I guess that makes sense, considering we both have our memories of every loop we’ve gone through.
entry.value: ¿Diçê que côttruyeron eçâ êttatuâ pa podêh embiâh lô recuerdô ar paçao? Çupongo que tiene çentío çi conçideramô que tenemô recuerdô de cá bucle por er que paçamô.

entry.key: FoundSomething3_3FWait, then it’s just our memories being sent back in time to us, right? Then... are we really experiencing multiple time loops, or not?
entry.value: Un momento, entonçê çolo nuêttrô recuerdô biahan ar paçao, ¿çierto? Entonçê... ¿êttamô êpperimentando bariô buclê temporalê o no?

entry.key: FoundSomething3_3FThat’s pretty deep... Like, maybe our consciousnesses have been through all these loops, but maybe our bodies haven’t, because technically the loops never happened.
entry.value: Eço êh mu profundo... Êh como que... tar bêh nuêttrâ conçiençiâ paçaron por tôh êttô buclê, pero tar bêh nuêttrô cuerpô no, porque ténnicamente nunca çuçedieron.

entry.key: FoundSomething3_3FMeaning we’re receiving memories of things that will never happen to us. Cool, huh?
entry.value: O çea que êttamô reçibiendo recuerdô de coçâ que nunca nô çuçederán. Heniâh, ¿no?

entry.key: FoundSomething3bRight, you told me earlier that the point of the statues is to send memories back in time. Which I guess makes sense, considering we both have our memories of every loop we’ve gone through.
entry.value: Me dihîtte antê que el ôhhetibo de lâ êttatuâ êh embiâh recuerdô ar paçao. Çupongo que tiene çentío çi conçideramô que tenemô recuerdô de cá bucle por er que paçamô.

entry.key: FoundSomething3bI thought about it some more, and I think that means our minds have gone through all these loops, but we haven’t actually gone through them ourselves.
entry.value: Êttube pençando al rêppêtto, y eço implica que nuêttrâ mentê paçaron por cá uno de eçô buclê, pero noçotrô no lo içimô.

entry.key: FoundSomething3bMeaning we’re receiving memories of things that technically will never happen to us. Cool, huh?
entry.value: O çea que êttamô reçibiendo recuerdô de coçâ que ténnicamente nunca nô çuçederán. Heniâh, ¿no?

entry.key: FoundSomething4_3FWhoa, that’s the cannon breaking apart at the start of each time loop? For real?
entry.value: Guau, ¿eçe êh er cañón que çe rompe al iniçio de cá bucle temporâh? ¿En çerio?

entry.key: FoundSomething4_3FDid you figure out why?
entry.value: ¿Dêccubrîtte er porqué?

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomething4_3FToo much power.
entry.value: Demaçiá potençia.

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomething4_3FOverenthusiasm.
entry.value: Entuçiâmmo êççeçibo.

entry.key: FoundSomething4FollowUp_3F...It’s kind of scary how much that sounds like something Slate or Feldspar would do. I’m pretty surprised the Nomai built something that actually broke!
entry.value: ... Me açûtta pençâh que eço çuena como argo que arían Launa o Ferdêppato. ¡Me çorprende que lô nomai ayan côttruío argo que çe rompe!

entry.key: FoundSomething4FollowUp_3FCome to think of it, though, “broke” might be the wrong word. Because it looks like the Orbital Probe Cannon is still firing successfully at the beginning of each time loop.
entry.value: Aunque, aora que lo pienço, «romperçe» tar bêh çea la palabra equibocá. Porque pareçe que er Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh çige dîpparando corrêttamente al iniçio de cá bucle temporâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething4b_3FSo the cannon breaks apart right after it launches, huh. Explains what I’m seeing fall from the sky every loop.
entry.value: Entonçê er cañón çe rompe hûtto dêppuêh der lançamiento, e... Eço êpplicaría lo que beo caêh dêdde er çielo en cá bucle.

entry.key: FoundSomething4b_3FI’m still surprised the Nomai built something that isn’t holding together, you know? Them being genius crafters and all.
entry.value: Me çorprende que lô nomai ayan côttruío argo que pueda romperçe, ¿çabê? Eran heniô de la creaçión.

entry.key: FoundSomething4b_3FOn the other hand, maybe we should be impressed they made something that could last until modern day in the first place. And it looks like the cannon is still firing successfully at the start of each time loop.
entry.value: Por otro lao, tar bêh debería impreçionânnô que ayan creao argo con la capaçidá de durâh âtta er día de oy. Y pareçe que er cañón çige dîpparando corrêttamente ar comienço de cá bucle temporâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething5_3FYeah, the one in the woods, I remember writing that. Pretty fun, right? It works out to a good 24 poems.
entry.value: Çí, er que êttá en er bôqque, recuerdo abêl-lo êccrito. Dibertío, ¿berdá? Çon 24 poemâ mu guenô.

entry.key: FoundSomething5_3FWhen I’m done exploring, I want to make some more quantum art. Maybe some kind of creature sculpture that just, like, shows up and scares the daylights out of you.
entry.value: Cuando termine de êpplorâh, me gûttaría creâh mâh arte cuántico. Tar bêh argún tipo de êccurtura de una criatura, que çe aparêcca de repente y te mande al iperêppaçio de un çûtto.

entry.key: FoundSomething6AgainYeah, you mentioned that before. Did I look busy in it? I hope I looked busy.
entry.value: Çí, ya lo abíâ mençionao. ¿Pareçía que êttaba trabahando? Êppero que çí.

entry.key: FoundSomething6BaseNice. Did I look busy in it? I hope I looked busy.
entry.value: Heniâh. ¿Pareçía que êttaba trabahando? Êppero que çí.

entry.key: FoundSomething6Must have been from the time Hornfels sent me to check on the deep space satellite. They thought Ol’ Spacey might be malfunctioning, but I couldn’t find a single thing wrong with it.
entry.value: Debe çêh de la bêh en que Cônné me embió a imbêttigâh er çatélite del êppaçio profundo. Pençaron que er Bieho Cômmo podría êttâh fayando, pero no encontré que tubiera ningún dêpperfêtto.

entry.key: FoundSomething6Which is probably how it got a shot of my beautiful be-helmeted face, come to think of it.
entry.value: Probablemente açí êh cómo conçigió fotografiâh mi ermoço rôttro con câcco, aora que lo pienço.

entry.key: FoundSomething6I always thought it was kinda sweet that the best way to find Ol’ Spacey is to use a map that’s generated by the satellite itself, isn’t it? Like it’s inviting us to visit. Good ol’ deep space satellite, always making sure we know where we’re going.
entry.value: Çiempre me pareçió heniâh que la mehôh manera de encontrâh ar Bieho Cômmo fuera uçâh un mapa que henera er mîmmo çatélite, ¿no lo creê? Como çi nô imbitara a biçitâl-lo. Er bieho y querío çatélite del êppaçio profundo, çiempre açegurándoçe de que çepamô a dónde êttamô yendo.

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomething6Why’d Hornfels think it was broken?
entry.value: ¿Por qué pençó Cônné que êttaba aberiao?

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomething6Um. “Ol’ Spacey”?
entry.value: E... ¿El “Bieho Cômmo”?

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomething6I have a map?!
entry.value: ¡¿Tengo un mapa?!

entry.key: FoundSomething6aDunno. Hornfels probably told me why, but Hornfels tells me lots of things, and sometimes I tune out. Or pretend there’s signal interference and I can’t hear them.
entry.value: No lo çé. Cônné probablemente me diho por qué, pero me diçe muxâ coçâ, y a beçê deho de prêttâl-le atençión. O ago de cuenta que ay interferençiâ en la çeñâh y no puedo êccuxâh bien.

entry.key: FoundSomething6aBest guess says the deep space satellite must have sent Timber Hearth some weird pictures, but like… what’s considered “weird” for a satellite, you know?
entry.value: Lo mâh probable êh que er çatélite del êppaçio profundo aya embiao argunâ fotô rarâ a Lumbre, pero, gueno… ¿qué çe conçidera “raro” pa un çatélite, no?

entry.key: FoundSomething6aAnyway, if you ever want to visit Ol’ Spacey, fastest way is to jump into your ship and use your solar system map to lock on to the satellite, same as you would any astral body.
entry.value: En fin, çi quierê biçitâh ar Bieho Cômmo, la manera mâh rápida êh çubirte a tu âttronabe y uçâh er mapa der çîttema çolâh pa fihâh er çatélite como ôhhetibo, al iguâh que lo aríâ pa cuarquiêh cuerpo âttrâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething6bI mean, the satellite’s not super old, but it’s hardly brand-new. “Ol’” is more a term of affection. ...You’re being very literal-minded about this.
entry.value: Digo, er çatélite no êh tan bieho, pero tampoco êttá reçién êttrenao. Er término “bieho” êh mâh bien cariñoço. ... Êttâh pençándolo de manera mu literâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething6bOl’ Spacey likes visitors, you know! Fastest way to find it is to jump into your ship and use your solar system map to lock on to our faithful satellite friend, same as you would any astral body.
entry.value: ¡Ar Bieho Cômmo le gûttan lô biçitantê, çabê! La manera mâh rápida de encontrâl-lo êh çubirte a tu âttronabe y uçâh er mapa der çîttema çolâh pa fihâh er çatélite como ôhhetibo, al iguâh que lo aríâ pa cuarquiêh cuerpo âttrâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething6cYeah, um, the one that’s standard with all our spacesuits? The one you have with you at all times that opens with the press of a button? …That map?
entry.value: Çí, e... ¿er que tienen tôh nuêttrô trahê êppaçialê? ¿Er que yebâ contigo en tó momento y çe abre preçionando un botón? ¿Eçe mapa?

entry.key: FoundSomething6cYou didn’t get conked on the head by a rock or a meteorite or something on your way here, did you? No shame in that. Happens to me all the time!
entry.value: No te gorpeâtte la cabeça con una roca o un meteorito o argo açí en er camino, ¿berdá? No ay ná de qué abergonçarçe. ¡Me paça tó er tiempo!

entry.key: FoundSomething6cIn case you were hit especially hard, don’t forget that you can jump into your ship and use your solar system map to lock on to any astral body. It’s the easiest way to visit Ol’ Spacey, too.
entry.value: En caço de que te ayâ gorpeao mu fuerte, no orbidê que puedê çubirte a tu âttronabe y uçâh er mapa der çîttema çolâh pa fihâh cuarquiêh cuerpo âttrâh como ôhhetibo. Ademâh, êh la manera mâh fáçî de biçitâh ar Bieho Cômmo.

entry.key: FoundSomethingExitNo worries. Feel free to let me know when you do find something cool, though. You know where to find me.
entry.value: No ay problema. Pero abíçame çi encuentrâ argo heniâh. Çabê dónde encontrarme.

entry.key: Gabbro3T_1I was hoping you’d be back - something really weird is going on.
entry.value: Qué gueno que regreçâtte. A êttao ocurriendo argo mu êttraño.

entry.key: GabbroGabbro3T_1Do you think we’re in a time loop?
entry.value: ¿Creê que êttemô en un bucle temporâh?

entry.key: GabbroGabbro3T_1We’re definitely in a time loop.
entry.value: Çin dudâ êttamô en un bucle temporâh.

entry.key: Gabbro3T_2Yeah, a time loop makes the most sense, right? Or at least, it’s some kind of fidgety time business. Hard to say what’s happening to the shape of time, exactly, but let’s go with “loop” for now.
entry.value: Çí, lo der bucle temporâh êh lo que tiene mâh çentío, ¿no? O, ar menô, argo raro paça con er tiempo. Êh difíçî definîh con êççâttitûh qué le êttá çuçediendo a la forma der tiempo, pero yamémôl-lo «bucle» por aora.

entry.key: Gabbro3T_3Oh. Yeah, that makes sense. Cool.
entry.value: A. Çí, eço tiene çentío. Heniâh.

entry.key: GabbroGabbro3T_3You’re taking this pretty well.
entry.value: Te lo êttâh tomando mu bien.

entry.key: GabbroGabbro3T_3What did you think it was?
entry.value: ¿Qué creíâ que paçaba?

entry.key: Gabbro3T_4Heh, right back at you. Personally, I like new experiences, and I’ve never been in a time loop before.
entry.value: He, lo mîmmo digo. La berdá êh que me gûttan lâ êpperiençiâ nuebâ, y nunca antê abía êttao en un bucle temporâh.

entry.key: Gabbro3T_4Well. I don’t think I’ve been in a time loop before this one, but then, it’s not like I can know that for sure.
entry.value: Gueno. Ar menô, creo que nunca abía êttao en un bucle temporâh âtta aora, pero êh impoçible çabêl-lo con çerteça.

entry.key: Gabbro3T_5I figured it’d be some kind of fidgety time business, but I wasn’t really thinking about what’s happening to the shape of time, you know? But a loop makes sense here. Let’s go with “loop” for now.
entry.value: Me imahiné que argo raro paçaba con er tiempo, pero nunca pençé que tendría que bêh con la forma der tiempo, ¿çabê? Un bucle tiene muxo çentío. Yamémôl-lo «bucle» por aora.

entry.key: Gabbro3T_6So it looks like you and I are the only ones who know we’re in a time loop. And even if you tell them about it, no one remembers by the next loop. What’s with that?
entry.value: Pareçe que çolo tú y yo nô percatamô de que êttamô en un bucle temporâh. Y, aun çi lo comentâ, nadie lo recordará en er próççimo bucle. ¿Por qué çerá?

entry.key: Gabbro3T_6Maybe it’s because we both made some seriously intense eye contact with a Nomai statue?
entry.value: ¿Tar bêh çea porque içimô contâtto biçuâh intenço con una êttatua nomai?

entry.key: Gabbro3T_6I’m seeing my memories replay each time I die, just like I did when the Nomai statue on the beach opened its eyes and looked at me. So maybe... no glowing statue, no time loop awareness?
entry.value: Cá bêh que muero, beo cómo çe reproduçen mî recuerdô, der mîmmo modo que cuando la êttatua de la playa abrió lô ohô y me miró. Entonçê, tar bêh... ¿çin êttatuâ briyantê no aya perçêççión der bucle temporâh?

entry.key: Gabbro3T_6I think that’s going to be my leading theory, but if you find out anything new about the statues or the time loop, let me know, okay? I’ll be here.
entry.value: Creo que eça çerá mi ipóteçî prinçipâh por aora, pero çi dêccubrê argo nuebo çobre lâ êttatuâ o er bucle temporâh, abíçame, ¿çí? Êttaré aquí.

entry.key: Gabbro3T_SecondaryHey, my time buddy’s back!
entry.value: ¡Ey, regreçâtte, camará der tiempo!

entry.key: GabbroMenuSo what’s new?
entry.value: ¿Qué me cuentâ?

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_3TWell, what are any of us doing here, really?
entry.value: Gueno, ¿qué êttamô açiendo tôh aquí, en realidá?

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_3T...Nah, I’m just kidding. I’m out here exploring our solar system, same as you.
entry.value: Na, êh broma. Êttoy êpplorando nuêttro çîttema çolâh, iguâh que tú.

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_3TBut I tell you what, outer space really gives you room to think. It’s quiet and peaceful out here.
entry.value: Pero te diré argo: el êppaçio êtteriôh te da lugâh pa pençâh. Aquí fuera ay tanta pâh y tranquilidá...

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_3TI mean, it’s usually quiet and peaceful. Sometimes a cyclone comes by and lifts my little island paradise clean out of the water. Then: less peaceful.
entry.value: Gueno, caçi çiempre ay pâh y tranquilidá. A beçê paça un çiclón y çe yeba bolando mi pequeño paraíço inçulâh. Y aí ay menô pâh.

entry.key: WhereToExplore_3THere’s something you might like — I keep seeing a bright flash in the sky at the start of every loop. Something must be happening up there in orbit around the planet.
entry.value: Ay argo que creo que te gûttará: ar comienço de cá bucle temporâh, beo una lûh briyante en er çielo. Argo debe êttâh paçando ayí arriba, en la órbita der planeta.

entry.key: WhereToExplore_3TWhat else, what else... Have you been to Statue Island? That’s what I’ve been calling it, seeing as it’s the island where I found the glowing Nomai statue. ...Get it?
entry.value: Qué mâh, qué mâh... ¿Âh êttao en la Îl-la de la Êttatua? Açí la bautiçé, dao que êh la îl-la donde encontré la êttatua nomai briyante. ... ¿Lo entiendê?

entry.key: WhereToExplore_3TI was on the beach on Statue Island when the whole glowy business happened, by the way. It’s a nice beach for that kind of thing. I give it a solid 7 out of 10 on the Gabbro Relaxation Scale.
entry.value: Êttaba en la playa de la Îl-la de la Êttatua cuando çuçedió tó eço der briyo. Êh una guena playa pa que ocurra argo açí. Le doy 7 de 10 puntô en la êccala de relahaçión de Gabro.

entry.key: WhereToExplore_3TIf you feel like checking out Statue Island, it’s the one with two islands connected by a natural rock arch. Well... mostly connected, anyway. You’ll see.
entry.value: Çi quierê îh a bêh la Îl-la de la Êttatua, êh una de lâ dôh îl-lâ conêttâh por un arco rocoço naturâh. Gueno, conêttâh caçi der tó. Ya lo berâh.

entry.key: ThisPlanet_3THaha, I know, right?
entry.value: Ha, ha, çí, lo çé, ¿no?

entry.key: ThisPlanet_3T...Oh, you meant, like, tell you more about it? I gotcha. Well, Giant’s Deep is massive, and mostly water. No surprises there.
entry.value: A... ¿quierê que te cuente mâh? De acuerdo. Puê, Abîmmo der Higante êh enorme, y êttá compuêtto mayormente de agua. Aí no ay çorpreçâ.

entry.key: ThisPlanet_3TThere’s a strong current a ways beneath the surface that prevents anything from sinking below it. Seriously, I tried everything I could think of to get past that current, and neither idea worked.
entry.value: Tiene una fuerte corriente que paça por debaho de la çuperfiçie y no deha que ná çe unda. De berâ, intenté tó lo que çe me ocurrió pa paçâh eça corriente, y ninguna de mî ideâ tubo éççito.

entry.key: ThisPlanet_3TAs for land masses, I’ve counted four islands, including this one. There’s also the one with that Nomai statue I saw on the beach.
entry.value: En cuando a lâ maçâ terrêttrê, conté cuatro îl-lâ, incluida êtta. También êttá la que tiene la êttatua nomai que bi en la playa.

entry.key: ThisPlanet_3TYou’ve seen the cyclones? Yeah, they’re hard to miss. They’ll toss up everything in their path, islands included. Little tip - if you get picked up, try to land in water. Less likely to kill you.
entry.value: ¿Âh bîtto lô çiclonê? Çí, êh difíçî no bêl-lô. Çe yeban tó lo que encuentran en er camino, y eço incluye a lâ îl-lâ. Un conçeho: çi te yeba uno, intenta aterriçâh çobre agua. Açí tienê menô probabilidadê de morîh.

entry.key: FoundSomething1_3TSo the Nomai created those head statues to record memories, huh? ...Yeah, I could see the Nomai doing that. Not sure what for, but it seems like their sort of thing.
entry.value: Entonçê lô nomai crearon eçô bûttô pa armaçenâh recuerdô, ¿e? Çí, eço êh argo que arían lô nomai. No çé bien con qué fin, pero çuena como argo típico de eyô.

entry.key: FoundSomething1_3TDo you think the statues are recording our memories, then? ’Cause I remember that one on the beach looked at me funny. That must be my memory-friend!
entry.value: ¿Creê que lâ êttatuâ êttén armaçenando nuêttrô recuerdô? Porque la que bi en la playa me miró raro. ¡Debe çêh mi amiga mnemónica!

entry.key: FoundSomething2_3TWait, whoa, really? The Nomai carved out Ash Twin and built a time loop device inside? ...That is wild.
entry.value: Un momento. Guau, ¿en çerio? ¿Lô nomai perforaron Hemelo Çeniça y côttruyeron un dîppoçitibo de bucle temporâh dentro? Eço êh... demençiâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething2_3TNow we know what’s causing the loop, then. And... if it’s caused by a device, that must mean it had to be switched on, right? Huh...
entry.value: Entonçê ya çabemô qué êh lo que êttá cauçando er bucle. Y, çi un dîppoçitibo lo êttá probocando, eço implica que argien tiene que abêl-lo ençendío, ¿berdá? Mmm...

entry.key: FoundSomething2_3THey, what do you think would happen if you turned off the time loop? Like, there’s a part of me thinks maybe you shouldn’t, what with the sun blowing up and all.
entry.value: Ey, ¿qué creê que çuçedería çi deçâttibarâ er bucle temporâh? Una parte de mí me diçe que no lo deberíâ açêh, por el açunto de la êpploçión der Çôh y tó eço.

entry.key: FoundSomething2_3TThen again, who wants to spend eternity being blown up by the sun?
entry.value: Pero ¿quién querría paçâh la etênnidá çufriendo el êttayío der Çôh?

entry.key: FoundSomething2_3T...I dunno, I’m no time loop expert. I’m just gonna sit here and ponder the intricacies of time and space. Maybe take a nap, too, if I feel like it.
entry.value: ... No lo çé, no me êppeçialiço en buclê temporalê. Creo que mehôh me çiento aquí a pençâh en lâ complehidadê del êppaçio y er tiempo. Tar bêh me duerma una çiêtta también, çi me da çueño.

entry.key: FoundSomething3_3TYou’re saying the statues were made so memories could be sent back in time? I guess that makes sense, considering we both have our memories of every loop we’ve gone through.
entry.value: ¿Diçê que côttruyeron eçâ êttatuâ pa podêh embiâh lô recuerdô ar paçao? Çupongo que tiene çentío çi conçideramô que tenemô recuerdô de cá bucle por er que paçamô.

entry.key: FoundSomething3_3TWait, then it’s just our memories being sent back in time to us, right? Then... are we really experiencing multiple time loops, or not?
entry.value: Un momento, entonçê çolo nuêttrô recuerdô biahan ar paçao, ¿çierto? Entonçê... ¿êttamô êpperimentando bariô buclê temporalê o no?

entry.key: FoundSomething3_3TThat’s pretty deep... Like, maybe our consciousnesses have been through all these loops, but maybe our bodies haven’t, because technically the loops never happened.
entry.value: Eço êh mu profundo... Êh como que... tar bêh nuêttrâ conçiençiâ paçaron por tôh êttô buclê, pero tar bêh nuêttrô cuerpô no, porque ténnicamente nunca çuçedieron.

entry.key: FoundSomething3_3TMeaning we’re receiving memories of things that will never happen to us. Cool, huh?
entry.value: O çea que êttamô reçibiendo recuerdô de coçâ que nunca nô çuçederán. Heniâh, ¿no?

entry.key: FoundSomething4_3TWhoa, that’s the cannon breaking apart at the start of each time loop? For real?
entry.value: Guau, ¿eçe êh er cañón que çe rompe al iniçio de cá bucle temporâh? ¿En çerio?

entry.key: FoundSomething4_3TDid you figure out why?
entry.value: ¿Dêccubrîtte er porqué?

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomething4_3TToo much power.
entry.value: Demaçiá potençia.

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomething4_3TOverenthusiasm.
entry.value: Entuçiâmmo êççeçibo.

entry.key: FoundSomething4FollowUp_3T...It’s kind of scary how much that sounds like something Slate or Feldspar would do. I’m pretty surprised the Nomai built something that actually broke!
entry.value: ... Me açûtta pençâh que eço çuena como argo que arían Launa o Ferdêppato. ¡Me çorprende que lô nomai ayan côttruío argo que çe rompe!

entry.key: FoundSomething4FollowUp_3TCome to think of it, though, “broke” might be the wrong word. Because it looks like the Orbital Probe Cannon is still firing successfully at the beginning of each time loop.
entry.value: Aunque, aora que lo pienço, «romperçe» tar bêh çea la palabra equibocá. Porque pareçe que er Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh çige dîpparando corrêttamente al iniçio de cá bucle temporâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething4b_3TSo the cannon breaks apart right after it launches, huh. Explains what I’m seeing fall from the sky every loop.
entry.value: Entonçê er cañón çe rompe hûtto dêppuêh der lançamiento, e... Eço êpplicaría lo que beo caêh dêdde er çielo en cá bucle.

entry.key: FoundSomething4b_3TI’m still surprised the Nomai built something that isn’t holding together, you know? Them being genius crafters and all.
entry.value: Me çorprende que lô nomai ayan côttruío argo que pueda romperçe, ¿çabê? Eran heniô de la creaçión.

entry.key: FoundSomething4b_3TOn the other hand, maybe we should be impressed they made something that could last until modern day in the first place. And it looks like the cannon is still firing successfully at the start of each time loop.
entry.value: Por otro lao, tar bêh debería impreçionânnô que ayan creao argo con la capaçidá de durâh âtta er día de oy. Y pareçe que er cañón çige dîpparando corrêttamente ar comienço de cá bucle temporâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething5_3TYeah, the one in the woods, I remember writing that. Pretty fun, right? It works out to a good 24 poems.
entry.value: Çí, er que êttá en er bôqque, recuerdo abêl-lo êccrito. Dibertío, ¿berdá? Çon 24 poemâ mu guenô.

entry.key: FoundSomething5_3TWhen I’m done exploring, I want to make some more quantum art. Maybe some kind of creature sculpture that just, like, shows up and scares the daylights out of you.
entry.value: Cuando termine de êpplorâh, me gûttaría creâh mâh arte cuántico. Tar bêh argún tipo de êccurtura de una criatura, que çe aparêcca de repente y te mande al iperêppaçio de un çûtto.

entry.key: GabbroMainHey, time pal! Nice weather we’re having, huh? <Pause/>...Wait. Have I used that one before?
entry.value: ¡Ola, camará der tiempo! Êttamô teniendo guen clima, ¿e? <Pause />... Êppera. ¿Ya uçé eço antê?

entry.key: GabbroMainIf it isn’t my time buddy! How’s space treating you this loop?
entry.value: ¡Pero çi êh mi camará der tiempo! ¿Cómo te êttá tratando el êppaçio en êtte bucle?

entry.key: GabbroMainHeyo, time buddy. It’s a good thing I never get bored of rain, huh?
entry.value: Aló, camará der tiempo. Menô mâh que nunca me canço de la yubia, ¿e?

entry.key: GabbroMainYou know, I kind of wish I’d built a hammock here before we ended up in this time loop.
entry.value: ¿Çabê? Ohalá ubieçe côttruío una amaca aquí antê de que termináramô en êtte bucle temporâh.

entry.key: GabbroMainA few loops ago, a cyclone came by and tossed my little island into space. Dying like that was kind of unpleasant.
entry.value: Açe argunô buclê, paçó un çiclón y arrohó mi îl-lita al êppaçio. Morîh de eça forma fue un poco deçagradable.

entry.key: GabbroMain_SecondaryHello again. ...Again.
entry.value: Ola de nuebo... de nuebo.

entry.key: GabbroMenuWhat’s up?
entry.value: ¿Qué tal?

entry.key: GabbroGabbroMenuHow do you stay so calm in the face of repeated impending death?
entry.value: ¿Cómo açê pa conçerbâh la carma çabiendo que êttâh por morîh una y otra bêh?

entry.key: HowDoYouStayCalmDeep breaths... no, seriously, I meditate.
entry.value: Rêppiraçionê profundâ... No, en çerio, me gûtta meditâh.

entry.key: MeditateMenuWant me to teach you? It'll be the next loop before you know it.
entry.value: ¿Quierê que te ençeñe? Antê de que te dê cuenta, ya êttaremô en er próççimo bucle.

entry.key: GabbroMeditateMenuSure, why not.
entry.value: Gueno, ¿por qué no?

entry.key: GabbroMeditateMenuNah, I'm good.
entry.value: No, graçiâ.

entry.key: YesMeditateOk, close your eyes...
entry.value: Mu bien. Çierra lô ohô...

entry.key: NoMeditateOk, let me know if you change your mind. Time flies when you're in a deep, meditative trance.
entry.value: Gueno, dime çi cambiâ de opinión. Er tiempo buela cuando êttâh en un trançe profundo y meditatibo.

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_mergeWell, what are any of us doing here, really?
entry.value: Gueno, ¿qué êttamô açiendo tôh aquí, en realidá?

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_merge...Nah, I’m just kidding. I’m out here exploring our solar system, same as you.

entry.value: Woa, tâh’s te cânnon breaking apart at te start of eâh time loôh? Fôh reâh?

entry.key: FoundSomething4_mergeDid you figure out why?
entry.value: Dîh you figure oûh wy?

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomething4_mergeToo much power.
entry.value: Too mûh powêh.

entry.key: GabbroFoundSomething4_mergeOverenthusiasm.
entry.value: Oberentuçiâmm.

entry.value: ...It’s kind of scary ow mûh tâh çounds like çometing Slate or Ferdspâh wourd do. I’m prêtty çurpriçé te Nomai buirt çometing tâh âttuayy broke!

entry.key: FoundSomething4FollowUp_mergeCome to think of it, though, “broke” might be the wrong word. Because it looks like the Orbital Probe Cannon is still firing successfully at the beginning of each time loop.
entry.value: Come to tink of it, toûh, “broke” mîtt be te wrong word. Becauçe it looks like te Orbitâh Probe Cânnon is stiy firing çûççessfuyy at te behînning of eâh time loôh.

entry.key: FoundSomething5_mergeOh yeah, the one in the woods, I remember writing that. Pretty fun, right? It works out to a good 24 poems.
entry.value: Ôh yea, te one in te woods, I remembêh writing tâh. Prêtty fun, rîtt? It works oûh to a goôh 24 poems.

entry.key: FoundSomething5_mergeWhen I’m done exploring, I want to make some more quantum art. Maybe some kind of creature sculpture that just, like, shows up while your back is turned and scares the daylights out of you.
entry.value: Wen I’m done êpploring, I want to make çome more quantum art. Maybe çome kind of creature scurpture tâh hûtt, like, çows up wile yoûh back is tûnné and scarê te daylîtts oûh of you.

entry.key: RECORDING
entry.value: RECORDING

entry.key: RecordingGabbro here, checking in on the deep space satellite per ground control's request to check out a possible equipment problem. See, Hornfels? I do too work!
entry.value: Abla Gabro, êttoy rebiçando er çatélite del êppaçio profundo çegún er pedío de contrôh en tierra pa comprobâh çi ay argún problema con el equipo. ¿Lo bêh, Cônné? ¡Yo también trabaho!

entry.key: RecordingYou know, I wouldn’t mind being a satellite. It's peaceful out here, among the distant stars and the soft, velvety darkness… Bet it's (yawn) awfully nice for naps, too...
entry.value: ¿Çabê argo? No me molêttaría çêh un çatélite. Ay muxa pâh aquí afuera, entre lâ êttreyâ lehanâ y la ôccuridá çuabe como er terçiopelo... Apuêtto a que también êh (bôtteço) un mu guen lugâh pa dormîh la çiêtta...

entry.key: Recording...
RecordingOh, right. The lens.
entry.value: A, çierto. La lente.

entry.key: RecordingAlright, little satellite, let's see what the trouble is.
entry.value: Mu bien, pequeño çatélite, beamô cuâh êh er problema.

entry.key: Recording...Huh. Everything looks a-okay, ground control. No dust or scratches on the lens, and no evidence of sparking or violent explosions. Guess that rules out an equipment malfunction, after all.
entry.value: Baya. Tó pareçe en orden, contrôh en tierra. La lente no tiene porbo ni rayadurâ, y no ay indiçiô de xîppâ o êpploçionê biolentâ. Pareçe que eço dêccarta una faya del equipo.

entry.key: RecordingHear that, pal? You’re in great shape. Keep up the good work out here!
entry.value: ¿Êccuxâtte eço, camará? Êttâh en perfêttâ condiçionê. ¡Çige açiendo un guen trabaho aquí afuera!

entry.key: SIGN
entry.value: ÇÎNN

entry.key: SignCLOSED DUE TO FIRE DAMAGE
entry.value: ÇERRAO DEBÍO A DAÑÔ POR INÇENDIO

entry.key: SignThe old radio tower, while an important landmark, is unfortunately closed thanks to the unsanctioned flight testing of an extremely powerful model rocket.
entry.value: Por dêggraçia, aunque la antigua torre de radio êh un monumento importante, êttá çerrá debío a la prueba de buelo no autoriçá de un modelo de coete êttremadamente potente.

entry.key: SignWhile we hope to repair the radio tower in the future, all construction efforts are currently focused on the planned museum expansion at the Observatory.
entry.value: Çi bien êpperamô reparâh la torre de radio en un futuro, por aora êttamô dedicando tôh nuêttrô êffuerçô a la êppançión planificá der muçeo en el Ôççerbatorio.

entry.key: SignSincerest apologies, except to Slate and Mica,\\n\\nHornfels (museum curator)
entry.value: Mî mâh çinçerâ dîccurpâ, êççêtto a Launa y Mica,\\n\\nCônné (curadôh der muçeo)

entry.key: SignThe radio tower here on Timber Hearth was built to receive transmissions from our deep space satellite, and to this day still houses the first-ever photos taken of the entire solar system.
entry.value: La torre de radio que çe encuentra en Lumbre çe côttruyó pa reçibîh lâ trâmmiçionê de nuêttro çatélite del êppaçio profundo, y âtta er día de oy todabía arberga lâ primerâ fotô que çe tomaron de tó er çîttema çolâh.

entry.key: SignThese photos were made possible by the deep space satellite’s unusual vertical orbit that carries it high above (and below) the plane of the solar system.
entry.value: Êttâ fotô pudieron tomarçe graçiâ a la inuçuâh órbita berticâh der çatélite del êppaçio profundo, que le permite paçâh mu por arriba (y por abaho) der plano der çîttema çolâh.

entry.key: SignThanks to a recent upgrade, the deep space satellite is now responsible for generating the real-time solar system map used by our newest astronauts.
entry.value: Graçiâ a una mehora reçiente, er çatélite del êppaçio profundo aora çe encarga de henerâh er mapa der çîttema çolâh en tiempo reâh que uçan nuêttrô nuebô âttronautâ.

entry.key: SignOur new expansion was made possible by the generous contributions of esteemed museum visitors like you. Thank you very much for your support!
entry.value: Nuêttra nueba êppançión fue poçible graçiâ a lâ heneroçâ contribuçionê de baloráô biçitantê der muçeo como tú. ¡Muxâ graçiâ por tu apoyo!

entry.key: SignFUTURE SITE OF OUR NEXT EXHIBIT!
entry.value: ¡FUTURA UBICAÇIÓN DE NUÊTTRA PRÓÇÇIMA ÊÇÇIBIÇIÓN!

entry.key: SignIf you’ve enjoyed your time with Outer Wilds, please consider supporting our planned museum expansion.
entry.value: Çi dîffrutâtte de tu tiempo con Outer Wilds, conçidera ayudânnô con nuêttra êppançión planificá der muçeo.

entry.key: SignOur quest to explore the furthest reaches of our solar system wouldn’t be possible without generous visitors like you! We thank you profusely for your support, and we hope to see you again soon.
entry.value: Nuêttra miçión de êpplorâh lô rinconê mâh lehanô de nuêttro çîttema çolâh no çería poçible çin biçitantê heneroçô como tú. Agradeçemô muxo tu apoyo y êpperamô borbêh a berte pronto.

entry.key: Slate
entry.value: Launa

entry.key: Scientist1AThere’s our pilot! Back from your pre-launch campout under the stars, I see.
entry.value: ¡Qué gueno berte, piloto! Beo que regreçâtte de tu noxe de prelançamiento baho lâ êttreyâ.

entry.key: Scientist1ASo it’s Launch Day, eh? Seems like only yesterday you joined the space program, and suddenly here you are, leaving on your first solo voyage.
entry.value: Yegó er día der lançamiento, ¿e? Pareçiera que fue ayêh cuando te unîtte ar programa êppaçiâh y, de repente, aquí êttâh, a punto de çalîh en tu primera trabeçía en çolitario.

entry.key: Scientist1AWhat do you say - ready to get this beauty off the ground? It’s all fueled up and ready to go!
entry.value: ¿Qué diçê? ¿Arâh que êtta beyeça lebante buelo? ¡Tiene er tanque yeno de combûttible y êttá lîtta pa partîh!

entry.key: SlateScientist1AAll systems go!
entry.value: ¡Tôh lô çîttemâ preparáô!

entry.key: SlateScientist1AI’m ready if you are.
entry.value: Çi tú diçê que êttá tó lîtto...

entry.key: SlateScientist1AYou’re sure you fixed the retro rockets?
entry.value: ¿Çeguro que reparâtte lô retrocoetê?

entry.key: Scientist1BHey, you ready to get this thing off the ground? Ship’s all fueled and ready to go.
entry.value: ¿Arâh que êtta coça lebante buelo? La âttronabe êttá yena de combûttible y lîtta pa partîh.

entry.key: SlateScientist1BDid... did I just... die?
entry.value: ¿Acabo... acabo de... morîh?

entry.key: SlateScientist1BAll systems go!
entry.value: ¡Tôh lô çîttemâ preparáô!

entry.key: SlateScientist1BI’m ready if you are.
entry.value: Çi tú diçê que êttá tó lîtto...

entry.key: SlateScientist1BYou’re sure you fixed the retro rockets?
entry.value: ¿Çeguro que reparâtte lô retrocoetê?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer11Whoa, bad dream or something? You still look half asleep, but that’s a negative on being deceased.
entry.value: Guau, ¿tubîtte una peçadiya o argo açí? Tu cara no dêppide muxâ luçê, pero te confirmo que no âh muerto.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer11I know it’s tradition to sleep out under the stars the night before a launch, but if you ask me it makes you all a bit jumpy.
entry.value: Çé que la tradiçión dîtta dormîh baho lâ êttreyâ la noxe anteriôh a un lançamiento, pero, en mi opinión, açe que çe te dîpparen lô nerbiô.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer12Glad you’re excited, but remember, if you wreck the ship I’m not building you a new one. I’m not made of lightweight reentry grade aluminum alloys, you know.
entry.value: Me alegra que çeâ puro entuçiâmmo, pero recuerda: çi arruinâ êtta âttronabe, no te côttruiré una nueba. Mi cuerpo no êttá exo de aleaçionê de aluminio liherâ de grao de reentrá, ¿çabê?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer13Are you kidding? Of course I’m ready - it’s finally time to test the new landing hydraulics with a pilot instead of the autoflight system!
entry.value: ¿Bromeâ? Claro. ¡Por fin, yegó la ora de probâh er nuebo aterriçahe idráulico con un çêh bibo de berdá, y no con er çîttema de buelo automático!

entry.key: ScientistAnswer13...Speaking of pilots, make sure you don’t crash the ship the first time you put it down, you hear?
entry.value: Ablando de pilotô, açegúrate de no êttropeâh la âttronabe en tu primêh aterriçahe, ¿me oyê?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer14That was only a problem one time. And then maybe a few times after that, but hey, no reason to dwell on the past, right?
entry.value: Fue un problema de una çola bêh. Y quiçá, unâ beçê mâh dêppuêh, pero oye: no ay raçón pa ôççeçionarçe con er paçao, ¿no?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer15Anyway, you’ll need to get the <color=orange>launch codes from Hornfels at the observatory</color> before you can lift off. Just bring those here once you’ve said your goodbyes or whatever.
entry.value: En cuarquiêh caço, antê de dêppegâh, tendrâh que pedîl-le <color=orange>a Cônné lô códigô de lançamiento en el ôççerbatorio</color>. Tráelô una bêh que te ayâ dêppedío de tôh o lo que çea que bayâ a açêh.

entry.key: Scientist2Not having second thoughts, are you?
entry.value: No lo êttâh dudando, ¿no?

entry.key: SlateScientist2Where are the launch codes again?
entry.value: ¿Me repitê dónde êttán lô códigô de lançamiento?

entry.key: SlateScientist2How’s the ship looking?
entry.value: ¿Cómo bêh la âttronabe?

entry.key: SlateScientist2How safe would you say this thing is?
entry.value: ¿Çerá çegura êtta coça?

entry.key: SlateScientist2What’s my mission once I’m in space?
entry.value: ¿Cuâh çerá mi miçión una bêh que yege al êppaçio?

entry.key: SlateScientist2What else should I do before liftoff?
entry.value: ¿Qué otra coça debería açêh antê de dêppegâh?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer24Hey, you’re the pilot - you tell me. Aren’t you pilot-types all eager to get up there and explore for yourselves?
entry.value: Oye, tú êttâh ar mando. Deberíâ çabêl-lo. Creía que lô pilotô çiempre tenían ganâ de çalîh al êppaçio y êpplorâh çin compañía.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer24Doesn’t matter if you go to the moon or Brittle Hollow or just the other side of Timber Hearth. It’s all the same to me. Get out there and have fun!
entry.value: No importa çi tu dêttino êh la Luna, Ondoná Fráhî o la otra punta de Lumbre. Pa mí, êh lo mîmmo. ¡Çâh y dibiértete!

entry.key: ScientistAnswer24Just don’t hurt the ship, that’s all I ask.
entry.value: Tó lo que te pío êh que cuidê de la âttronabe.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer25If you have any goodbyes to say, better say ’em now. I think your friend Hal is in the observatory waiting to see you off.
entry.value: Çi quierê dêppedirte de argien, çerá mehôh que lo agâ aora. Creo que Ali êttá êpperándote en el ôççerbatorio pa çaludarte.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer25Oh, and Gossan says they have the zero-g chamber set up if you want a refresher on making ship repairs in space. Not saying you have to, but uh, it’d help get Gossan off my back if you did.
entry.value: A, y Gôççan diçe que tiene lîtta la cámara con grabedá çero, por çi quierê repaçâh er temita de lâ reparaçionê en el êppaçio. No digo que debâ açêl-lo, pero me ayudaríâ a que Gôççan dehe de molêttarme.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer21Hornfels has the launch codes. Should be up at the observatory, like usual. I’m starting to think they live there.
entry.value: Cônné lô tiene. Çeguramente êttá en el ôççerbatorio. Empieço a pençâh que bibe aí.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer22Great! Hey, you might get a kick out of this - I’ve repurposed the spare oxygen tank to be used as an extra combustion chamber!
entry.value: ¡Heniâh! A, oye, ¡êtto debería encantarte! E reutiliçao er tanque de ôççíheno de repuêtto y lo e trâfformao en una cámara de combûttión adiçionâh.

entry.key: SlateScientistAnswer22What does that do?
entry.value: ¿Pa qué çirbe?

entry.key: SlateScientistAnswer22Is that... safe?
entry.value: ¿Y çe podría deçîh que eço êh... çeguro?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer221Well, it’s all very conceptual, but basically, it’s like taking a regular second-stage booster and strapping a bigger rocket onto it. \\nIsn’t that great?
entry.value: Puê, êh tó mu conçêttuâh, pero báçicamente êh como tomâh un propurçôh normâh de çegunda façe y agregâl-le un coete mâh grande. \\n¿No êh heniâh?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer222Probably!
entry.value: ¡Probablemente!

entry.key: ScientistAnswer23Oh, it’s a perfect ten. Unless you’re factoring in pilot error, in which case it’s about a four.\\nNo offense.
entry.value: Claro, le pondría un diêh. A menô que tengâ en cuenta lô errorê de pilotahe, en cuyo caço, le pongo un cuatro.\\nÇin ofendêh, claro.

entry.key: Scientist3Oh, hold up, you’re going to want to get the launch codes from the observatory first.
entry.value: Un momento, primero tendrâh que bûccâh lô códigô de lançamiento en el ôççerbatorio.

entry.key: SlateScientist3I already got them from the observatory, remember?
entry.value: Ya lô fui a bûccâh al ôççerbatorio, ¿recuerdâ?

entry.key: SlateScientist3How did I get back here? Didn’t I already lift off?
entry.value: ¿Cómo regreçé aquí? ¿No dêppegé antê?

entry.key: SlateScientist3Wait, did I just die, or...?
entry.value: Un momento, ¿acabo de morîh o...?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer31Huh. Must be inhaling more fumes than I realized. That stuff is potent.
entry.value: Mmm. Debo êttâh inalando mâh gaçê de lo que pençaba. Eça coça çí que êh potente.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer31Well, if you’ve got the codes, I’m not gonna stop you. Good luck, and take care of that ship!
entry.value: Gueno, çi ya tienê lô códigô, no boy a detenerte. ¡Guena çuerte y cuida bien de la âttronabe!

entry.key: ScientistAnswer32Trust me -- with the modifications I’ve made to those rockets? There’s no way I would have missed that.
entry.value: Créeme: con lâ modificaçionê que lê içe a eçô coetê, no ay manera de que me lo aya perdío.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer32I won’t ask how you got the launch codes, but since you have ’em, get a move on! I want to see whether the new cockpit stays attached during liftoff.
entry.value: No te preguntaré cómo conçegîtte lô códigô de lançamiento, pero ya que lô tienê, ¡adelante! Quiero bêh çi la cabina nueba no çe çale de lugâh durante er dêppege.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer33Uh, no...? You have a bad dream or something?
entry.value: E, no... ¿Tubîtte una peçadiya o argo açí?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer33I won’t ask how you got the codes, so hurry up and launch before Hornfels decides to ground you for medical reasons. I want to see whether the new cockpit stays attached during liftoff.
entry.value: No te preguntaré cómo conçegîtte lô códigô, pero date priça y dêppega de una bêh antê de que Cônné deçida que no puedê açêl-lo por raçonê médicâ. Quiero bêh çi la cabina nueba no çe çale de lugâh durante er dêppege.

entry.key: Scientist4Looks like you’re ready for takeoff! The excitement of a launch is fun and all, but I can’t wait to get back to working on the new ship.\\nWe’re working on fixing the autopilot’s avoidance system for this one!
entry.value: ¡Pareçe que ya puedê dêppegâh! Un lançamiento çiempre êh emoçionante y dibertío, pero no beo la ora de borbêh a trabahâh en la âttronabe nueba.\\n¡Êttamô tratando de arreglâh er çîttema anticoliçión der piloto automático!

entry.key: Scientist4...Uh, sorry.
entry.value: Uy, lo çiento.

entry.key: Scientist5There’s our pilot! Ready to get this beauty off the ground?
entry.value: ¡Qué gueno berte, piloto! ¿Arâh que êtta beyeça lebante buelo?
