entry.key: Scientist5Hey, what can I do you for?
entry.value: Ey, ¿en qué puedo ayudarte?

entry.key: SlateScientist5You know the ship is a death-trap, right?
entry.value: Çabê que la âttronabe êh una trampa mortâh, ¿no?

entry.key: SlateScientist5You’re lucky I’m in a time loop, because otherwise I’d be super dead.
entry.value: Tienê çuerte de que me encuentre en un bucle temporâh, porque çi no, ya me abría muerto.

entry.key: SlateScientist5The autopilot flew my ship directly into the sun!
entry.value: ¡Er piloto automático conduho mi âttronabe dirêttamente açia er Çôh!

entry.key: SlateScientist5I keep getting killed by ghost matter.
entry.value: La materia fantâmmâh me mata una y otra bêh.

entry.key: SlateScientist5The sun is going to go supernova, by the way.
entry.value: Por çierto, er Çôh ba a êttayâh en una çupênnoba

entry.key: SlateScientist5Did you know it’s just an endless void outside our solar system?
entry.value: ¿Çabíâ que fuera de nuêttro çîttema çolâh ay un baçío infinito?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer35Well yeah, it’s a death-trap, but a really powerful death trap. What, you suddenly care about safety now?
entry.value: Puê çí, êh una trampa mortâh, pero una rearmente poderoça. ¿De repente empieça a importarte la çeguridá?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer36And you’re lucky I don’t have you grounded for medical reasons, because I have no idea what you’re talking about.
entry.value: Y tú tienê çuerte de que no te proíba bolâh por raçonê médicâ, porque no tengo ni idea de qué êttâh ablando.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer37Had an exciting dream, did you?
entry.value: Tubîtte un çueño emoçionante, ¿e?

entry.key: ScientistAnswer37It’s not exactly impossible for the autopilot to get you too close to the sun, but it’s not like it’ll try to take you there on purpose.
entry.value: No êh êççâttamente impoçible que er piloto automático te açerque demaçiao ar Çôh, pero no intentará açêl-lo a propóçito.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer37Make sure the sun isn’t between you and your destination when you engage autopilot, and you’ll be fine.
entry.value: Çi te açegurâ de que er Çôh no êtté entre tú y tu dêttino cuando ençiendâ er piloto automático, no tendrâh problemâ.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer38Use your scout to detect it, you dumb idiot! Did you think I made that just so you could take pretty little pictures of trees? It has multiple uses!
entry.value: ¡No te matará çi uçâ tu êpploradôh pa detêttâl-la, idiota! ¿O acaço creê que çolo lo côttruí pa que tomê fotô bonitâ de lô árbolê? ¡Tiene muxô uçô!

entry.key: ScientistAnswer38You do know you can use it as a light source, right? Stars above, please tell me you knew that.
entry.value: Çabê que puedê uçâl-lo como fuente de lûh, ¿berdá? Por lâ êttreyâ, dime que çabíâ eço.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer39Oh yeah, the observatory has an exhibit about that.
entry.value: A, çí, el ôççerbatorio tiene una muêttra al rêppêtto.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer39Between you and me, I glossed over some of the finer details. Astrophysics is really more Hornfels’s domain.
entry.value: A deçîh berdá, paçé por arto argunô de lô detayê mâh êppeçíficô. Cônné êh quien çabe de âttrofíçica.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer39Me, I’m here for the rocket science and the marshmallows.
entry.value: Yo me dedico a lô marbabîccô y er deçarroyo de coetê.

entry.key: ScientistAnswer40Yeah, I’d stick to exploring our solar system, if I were you. As much as I hate to admit it, our ships aren’t deep-space-worthy.
entry.value: Çí, en tu lugâh, me dedicaría a êpplorâh çolo nuêttro çîttema çolâh. No me gûtta âmmitîl-lo, pero nuêttrâ âttronabê no êttán preparâh pa el êppaçio profundo.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_IntroHey, hold up a sec!
entry.value: ¡Oye, aguarda un momento!

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_IntroYeah yeah yeah, I already know about the launch codes.
entry.value: Çí, çí, ya çé lo de lô códigô de lançamiento.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_1What? No, I was going to tell you about using the ship log to set destination markers for locations you’ve visited before.
entry.value: ¿Qué? No, iba a deçirte que puedê uçâh el rehîttro de la âttronabe pa ponêh marcadorê de dêttino en lô lugarê que ya ayâ biçitao.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_1It’s a brilliant feature, if I say so myself. Dead useful. And the risk it poses of shorting out the fuel regulator and causing the ship to explode is so minimal that only Gossan would worry about it.
entry.value: En mi opinión, êh una funçión briyante. Enormemente útî. Y el riêggo de que dañe el reguladôh de combûttible y aga êpplotâh la âttronabe êh tan pequeño que çolo Gôççan çe preocuparía por eço.

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_1Wait, so how do I use it?
entry.value: Aguarda, ¿cómo lo uço?

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_1Use the ship log to mark a location I want to revisit. Got it.
entry.value: Puedo uçâh el rehîttro de la âttronabe pa marcâh la ubicaçión que quiero borbêh a biçitâh. Entendío.

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_1How minimal are we talking?
entry.value: ¿Qué tan pequeño êççâttamente?

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_1What about locations I haven’t visited before?
entry.value: ¿Y qué çuçede con lô lugarê que todabía no biçité?

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_1aWhen you’re on your ship, open up its log to the location you want to mark. Anywhere’s fine, as long as you’ve been there at least once.
entry.value: Cuando êttêh en tu âttronabe, abre tu rehîttro en er lugâh que quierâ marcâh. Cuarquiêh lugâh êttará bien mientrâ lo ayâ biçitao ar menô una bêh.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_1aHop in the pilot seat, and the ship will throw up a destination marker on your display. It’s that easy.
entry.value: Çúbete al açiento der piloto, y la âttronabe te môttrará un marcadôh de dêttino en tu pantaya. Êh açí de fáçî.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_1bMinimal! Stars above, you worry too much. If anything’s going to kill you, it’s the autopilot.
entry.value: ¡Mínimo! Por lâ êttreyâ, te preocupâ demaçiao. Çi argo te matará, çerá er piloto automático.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_1cOh, sure, I’ll just magically have the system know all the possible locations you plan to discover throughout the entire solar system, shall I?
entry.value: A, claro, aré que er çîttema çepa toâ lâ ubicaçionê que planeâ dêccubrîh en tó er çîttema çolâh como por arte de mahia, ¿no?

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_2“Wow, Slate! How do you come up with these incredible ideas?” Oh, I do the best I can with what I’ve got. Really, you’re too kind.
entry.value: «¡Baya, Launa! ¿Cómo çe te ocurren êttâ ideâ briyantê?» A, ago lo mehôh que puedo con lo que tengo. En çerio, erê mu amable.

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_2Slate, you are a technological marvel.
entry.value: Launa, erê una marabiya con la tênnolohía.

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_2This was extraordinarily convenient timing. Thanks!
entry.value: Êtte fue un momento increíblemente oportuno. ¡Graçiâ!

entry.key: SlateSlate_ShipLog_2That’s not what my voice sounds like.
entry.value: Açí no çuena mi bôh.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_2a...Whoa, say that again! Please? That sounds so good when it’s not sarcastic.
entry.value: ... Çielô, ¡dilo de buerta! ¡Por fabôh! Çuena tan bien cuando no êh çarcáttico.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_2bSure thing, hatchling!
entry.value: ¡Por çupuêtto, retoño!

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_2cEveryone’s a critic.
entry.value: Tôh çon críticô.

entry.key: Slate_ShipLog_3Anyway, I’ve got a fire to enjoy, and you’ve got launch codes to grab. Go wild with the marking feature while you're out there. Just, uh, try not to follow it so directly you fly into the sun, okay?
entry.value: En fin, tengo que îh a dîffrutâh de un fuego, y tú tienê que îh a bûccâh unô códigô de lançamiento. Uça la funçión de marcao tó lo que quierâ cuando êttêh aí afuera. Çolo, e... ebita çegîl-lo ar pie de la letra pa que no buelê dirêtto açia er çôh, ¿de acuerdo?

entry.key: WARNING: Increased solar activity detected.
entry.value: ÂBBERTENÇIA: Çe detêttó un aumento de la âttibidá çolâh.

entry.key: WARNING: Increased volcanic activity detected.
entry.value: ÂBBERTENÇIA: Çe detêttó un aumento de la âttibidá borcánica.

entry.key: VERDICT: Location is now inhospitable. Evacuation recommended.
entry.value: BEREDÎTTO: La ubicaçión çe a buerto inóppita. Çe recomienda ebacuâh.

entry.key: ERROR: Unable to determine orbit. No signal detected matching any known criteria for the Eye of the universe.
entry.value: ERRÔH: Impoçible determinâh la órbita. No çe detêttó ninguna çeñâh que coinçida con lô criteriô conoçíô del Oho del uniberço.

entry.key: Feldspar
entry.value: Ferdêppato

entry.key: Feldspar1Whoa!
entry.value: ¡Guau!

entry.key: Feldspar1Where’d you come from? No one’s come here in... well, ever, actually. That makes you the second Hearthian to ever reach Dark Bramble — after me, of course. Well done!
entry.value: ¿De dónde çalîtte? Nadie a benío aquí en... gueno, nunca. Erê el único otro abitante de Lumbre en yegâh a Êppinôccuro... ademâh de mí, claro. ¡Bien exo!

entry.key: Feldspar1...Say, it’s you! They made you an astronaut? And you haven’t blown yourself up yet, good for you!
entry.value: ¡Eyyy, erê tú! ¿Te içieron âttronauta? Y beo que te lâ arreglâtte pa no êpplotâh en pedaçô, ¡guen trabaho!

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar1Let me guess: anglerfish?
entry.value: Déhame adibinâh: ¿rapê?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar1Feldspar! You’re alive!
entry.value: ¡Ferdêppato! ¡Bibê!

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar1We all thought you were dead for sure.
entry.value: Pençábamô que çin dudâ abríâ muerto.

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar1Have you been here in Dark Bramble all this time?
entry.value: ¿Âh êttao en Êppinôccuro tó êtte tiempo?

entry.key: Feldspar2...You never were the brightest hatchling, were you.
entry.value: Nunca fuîtte un retoño mu intelihente, debo deçîh.

entry.key: Feldspar2Yeah, that’s right, I’m alive. Been camping out here since my ship, uh, y’know. Crashed.<Pause> Violently.
entry.value: Çí, çí, no e muerto. E êttao acampando aquí dêdde que mi âttronabe... gueno, ya çabê. Çe êttreyó.<Pause> Biolentamente.

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar2Wait, what?
entry.value: Êppera, ¿cómo?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar2You crashed? But you’re the greatest pilot in Hearthian history!
entry.value: ¿Te êttreyâtte? ¡Pero no a abío piloto mehôh que tú en la îttoria de Lumbre!

entry.key: Feldspar2aI haven’t lived in polite society for a while, so I’m just going to go ahead and assume that wasn’t sarcasm.
entry.value: Açe tiempo que no bibo en una çoçiedá çibiliçá, açí que boy a açumîh que lo que dihîtte no fue çarcáttico.

entry.key: Feldspar3What! Me, killed off by thorny, extradimensional plants that entirely violate the laws of space and time, and a couple of giant predatory fish with gaping maws and enormously sharp fangs? Not in this lifetime, little buddy.
entry.value: ¡Qué! ¿Çêh bíttima de plantâ êttradimençionalê yenâ de êppinâ que biolan por completo lâ leyê del êppaçio y er tiempo, mâh argunô peçê açeçinô higantê con fauçê enormê y cormiyô urtrafiloçô? ¿Yo? Ni lo çueñê, mequetrefe.

entry.key: Feldspar3I set up camp here when my ship got stuck here in Dark Bramble. Been living off the land ever since.
entry.value: Acampé aquí cuando mi âttronabe quedó bará en Êppinôccuro. E êttao bibiendo de la tierra dêdde entonçê.

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar3So what exactly happened to your ship?
entry.value: ¿Qué le paçó êççâttamente a tu âttronabe?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar3“Got stuck”? But aren’t you the greatest pilot in Hearthian history?
entry.value: ¿Quedó «bará»? ¿Acaço no erê la êttreya entre lô pilotô de toa la îttoria lumbreana?

entry.key: Feldspar4Depends on how long “all this time” is. I’ve been here a while, I guess. Ever since I crashed my ship into — that is, ever since my daring escape from the jaws of an anglerfish!
entry.value: Depende de la definiçión de «tó êtte tiempo». Çe podría deçîh que açe bâttante que êttoy aquí. Dêdde que êttreyé mi âttronabe contra... Êh deçîh, dêdde mi baliente êccape de lâ fauçê de un rape furioço.

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar4Tell me more about your flying prowess!
entry.value: ¡Cuéntame mâh çobre tû proeçâ de buelo!

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar4You crashed your ship, didn’t you.
entry.value: Êttreyâtte tu âttronabe, ¿o no?

entry.key: Feldspar4aHaha, you flatter me! ...I like it!
entry.value: ¡Ha, ha, ha! Me alagâ. ¡Y eço me gûtta!

entry.key: Feldspar4bObviously, yes. No need to be rude.
entry.value: Êh ôbbio que çí. No açe farta que lo digâ açí.

entry.key: Feldspar5...well, like I said, I crash. Blammo! On impact, my ship starts making noises like it’s coming apart from the inside, and I think, well, that ain’t great. Sure enough, I barely get out of there before the electrical systems start sparking like crazy.
entry.value: ... Gueno, como dihe, me êttreyé. ¡Puuuuuum! Mi âttronabe començó a açêh ruíô êttrañô trâ el impâtto, como çi çe êttubiera deçarmando dêdde dentro. Y gueno, pençé, eço no podía çêh ná gueno. Por çuerte, logré çalîh antê de que lô çîttemâ eléttricô començaran a largâh xîppâ.

entry.key: Feldspar5It’s either move fast or die unpleasantly, so I had to put a little distance between me and my poor, fried ship.
entry.value: Mî ôççionê eran aleharme rápido o morîh de un modo deçagradable, açí que tube que ponêh dîttançia entre mi cuerpo y mi pobre âttronabe frita.

entry.key: Feldspar5I camped out near where I crashed at first. I found this skeleton later — great find, would’ve been stupid not to use it.
entry.value: Ar prinçipio, acampé çerca der lugâh de la coliçión. Dêppuêh encontré êtte êqqueleto... Un gran ayâggo, no podía no uçâl-lo.

entry.key: Feldspar5So I moved my setup over here and planted my emergency tree seeds. Been here ever since!
entry.value: Açí que trâl-ladé er campamento aquí y planté mî çemiyâ de árbolê de emerhençia. ¡Y e êttao aquí dêdde entonçê!

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar5...Wow.
entry.value: ... Guau.

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar5I can’t believe you didn’t die.
entry.value: No puedo creêh que no ayâ muerto.

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar5I can’t believe you destroyed your ship.
entry.value: No puedo creêh que ayâ dêttruío tu âttronabe.

entry.key: FeldsparFeldspar5No wonder there are so many stories about you back home!
entry.value: ¡Con raçón cuentan tantâ îttoriâ çobre ti en Lumbre!

entry.key: Feldspar5aMy story goes like this. I’d just finished exploring the core of Giant’s Deep, and I wanted to try my hand at Dark Bramble, seeing as no one had ever been before.
entry.value: Mi îttoria êh la çigiente. Terminaba de êpplorâh er núcleo de Abîmmo der Higante y quiçe repetîh la açaña en Êppinôccuro, dao que nadie antê lo abía exo.

entry.key: Feldspar5aGetting around in Dark Bramble was easy, mind you. Once you’ve dodged one massive, interdimensional vine bristling with thorns, you’ve dodged ’em all.
entry.value: Pa tu informaçión, recorrêh Êppinôccuro fue mâh fáçî de lo que creía. Una bêh que logrâ êqquibâh una enorme iedra interdimençionâh con êppinâ açeçinâ, logrâ êqquibâh toâ.

entry.key: Feldspar5aBut after a while, I run into this huge anglerfish — you’ve seen ’em? Big gnarly things, and this was the biggest one I’ve ever seen. I pull a few stunts, try to shake the thing off — nothing too fancy. I’m going full-speed when the fish clips me, knocks me into a vine, and...
entry.value: Pero, poco dêppuêh, me encontré con un rape enorme... ¿Âh bîtto arguno? Çon peçê higantê y deçagradablê, y êtte era er mâh grande que hamâh abía bîtto. Intenté argunâ maniobrâ pa quitármelo de ençima, ná demaçiao elaborao. Iba a toa beloçidá cuando er pêh me enganxa y me arroha contra una iedra y...

entry.key: Feldspar5bOh, this is a good story. I’d just finished exploring the core of Giant’s Deep and needed a new challenge, and none of us had ever been inside Dark Bramble, so I think, hey, let’s give that a try.
entry.value: A, êtta êh una îttoria mu guena. Terminaba de êpplorâh er núcleo de Abîmmo der Higante y neçeçitaba un nuebo deçafío. Çe me ocurrió adentrarme en Êppinôccuro, ya que nadie antê abía êttao ayí.

entry.key: Feldspar5bI’ve been cruising around for a while, dodging the odd massive, interdimensional vine bristling with thorns, when I run into this huge anglerfish, the biggest I’ve ever seen.
entry.value: Yebaba un guen rato dando buertâ y êqquibando lâ enormê iedrâ interdimençionalê con êppinâ açeçinâ cuando me encontré con un rape higante, er mâh grande que hamâh abía bîtto.

entry.key: Feldspar5bI pull a few stunts, try to shake the thing off — nothing too fancy. I’m going full-speed when the fish clips me, knocks me into a vine, and...
entry.value: Intenté argunâ maniobrâ pa quitármelo de ençima, ná demaçiao elaborao. Iba a toa beloçidá cuando er pêh me enganxa y me arroha contra una iedra y...

entry.key: Feldspar5cHaha, you flatter me! ...I like it!
entry.value: ¡Ha, ha, ha! Me alagâ. ¡Y eço me gûtta!

entry.key: Feldspar5cI came to Dark Bramble for the excitement. I’d just finished exploring the core of Giant’s Deep and needed a new challenge, and none of us had ever gone farther than Dark Bramble’s ice fields, so I thought, hey, let’s give it a try.
entry.value: Bine a Êppinôccuro por la diberçión. Terminaba de êpplorâh er núcleo de Abîmmo der Higante y neçeçitaba un nuebo deçafío. Çe me ocurrió îh mâh ayá de lâ tundrâ de Êppinôccuro, ya que nadie antê abía êttao ayí.

entry.key: Feldspar5cI’ve been cruising around for a while, dodging the odd massive, interdimensional vine bristling with thorns, when I run into this huge anglerfish, the biggest I’ve ever seen.
entry.value: Yebaba un guen rato dando buertâ y êqquibando lâ enormê iedrâ interdimençionalê con êppinâ açeçinâ cuando me encontré con un rape higante, er mâh grande que hamâh abía bîtto.

entry.key: Feldspar5cI pull a few stunts, try to shake the thing off — nothing too fancy. I’m going full-speed when the fish clips me, knocks me into a vine, and...
entry.value: Intenté argunâ maniobrâ pa quitármelo de ençima, ná demaçiao elaborao. Iba a toa beloçidá cuando er pêh me enganxa y me arroha contra una iedra y...

entry.key: Feldspar6aYeah, pretty much.
entry.value: Gueno, argo açí.

entry.key: Feldspar6bYou know, in the old days, I used to think the same thing every time I came back from a flight in one piece.
entry.value: Çabê, en otra época çolía pençâh eço mîmmo cá bêh que regreçaba de un buelo en una pieça.

entry.key: Feldspar6bThese days, I’m used to it.
entry.value: Aora ya me acôttumbré.

entry.key: Feldspar6cEasy for you to say. Your ship probably has all kinds of fancy modifications and upgrades, like “working retro boosters” and “non-flammable construction materials.”
entry.value: Pa ti êh fáçî deçîl-lo. Tu âttronabe debe tenêh tó tipo de modificaçionê y mehorâ, como un «retroimpurço funçionâh» y «materialê de côttrûççión înnífugô».

entry.key: Feldspar6dHeh. You’re not half-bad yourself, making it here in one piece.
entry.value: He. Gueno, no êh poco que ayâ yegao âtta aquí con bida.

entry.key: Feldspar7Anyway, that’s how it all went down, hatchling!
entry.value: En fin, açí fue como çuçedió tó, retoño.

entry.key: Feldspar7Story’s over, but feel free to stay and enjoy the fire a while.
entry.value: La îttoria terminó, pero puedê quedarte un rato a dîffrutâh der fuego.

entry.key: Feldspar7Or don’t. Fire’s not going anywhere.
entry.value: O no. Er fuego no çe irá a ningún lao.

entry.key: FeldsparSkipHeh, you got it in one. Kind of hard not to, once you’ve seen one of those fish up close and personal-like.
entry.value: He. Açertâtte a la primera. Êh difíçî no açêl-lo cuando ya êttubîtte cara a cara con uno de eçô peçê.

entry.key: FeldsparSkipWell, take a load off and refill your oxygen tank, hatchling! There’s plenty of fire to go around.
entry.value: Bien, puedê acomodarte y reyenâh tu tanque de ôççíheno, retoño. Ay fuego de çobra.

entry.key: FeldsparPrimaryMenuAnything else you wanted?
entry.value: ¿Queríâ argo mâh?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparPrimaryMenuI found something!
entry.value: ¡Encontré argo!

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparPrimaryMenuWhere should I explore here?
entry.value: ¿Dónde debería êpplorâh por aquí?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparPrimaryMenuYou reached the core of Giant’s Deep? How’d you do it?
entry.value: ¿Yegâtte ar núcleo de Abîmmo der Higante? ¿Cómo lo içîtte?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparPrimaryMenuWhere’s your ship?
entry.value: ¿Dónde êttá tu âttronabe?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparPrimaryMenuWhat happened to this anglerfish?
entry.value: ¿Qué le çuçedió a êtte rape?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparPrimaryMenuShouldn’t I tell ground control to come get you?
entry.value: ¿Debería deçîl-le ar contrôh lumbreano que te benga a bûccâh?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparPrimaryMenuNah, I’m good.
entry.value: Na, êttoy bien.

entry.key: FeldsparSecondaryHey, hatchling, pull up a marshmallow stick!
entry.value: Ey, retoño, ¡pon un marbabîcco en er fuego!

entry.key: FeldsparSecondaryCome to hear tales of my heroic exploits, have you?
entry.value: Binîtte a êccuxâh lâ îttoriâ de mî abenturâ eroicâ, ¿berdá?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparSecondaryI found something!
entry.value: ¡Encontré argo!

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparSecondaryWhere should I explore here?
entry.value: ¿Dónde debería êpplorâh por aquí?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparSecondaryYou reached the core of Giant’s Deep? How’d you do it?
entry.value: ¿Yegâtte ar núcleo de Abîmmo der Higante? ¿Cómo lo içîtte?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparSecondaryWhere’s your ship?
entry.value: ¿Dónde êttá tu âttronabe?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparSecondaryWhat happened to this anglerfish?
entry.value: ¿Qué le çuçedió a êtte rape?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparSecondaryShouldn’t I tell ground control to come get you?
entry.value: ¿Debería deçîl-le ar contrôh lumbreano que te benga a bûccâh?

entry.key: FeldsparFeldsparSecondaryNah, I’m good.
entry.value: Na, êttoy bien.

entry.key: FeldsparFishOh, the skeleton? It was like this when I got here.
entry.value: A, ¿el êqqueleto? Ya êttaba açí cuando yegé.

entry.key: FeldsparFishAs near as I can tell, this anglerfish must have been chewing on the vine and eaten a seed, and then the seed grew and grew in the poor fish’s stomach until... this happened.
entry.value: Me atrebo a deçîh que el rape debe abêh êttao mordîqqueando la iedra y çe tragó una çemiya. Luego la çemiya creçió y creçió en el êttómago der pobre pêh âtta que... êtto çuçedió.

entry.key: FeldsparFishGross, huh?
entry.value: Âqqueroço, ¿e?

entry.key: FeldsparFishThis skeleton was a good find. Keeps the fish away. See, they’re territorial, so they mostly avoid each other. That’s why I set up camp here.
entry.value: Êtte êqqueleto fue un gran ayâggo. Aleha a lô peçê. Como çon territorialê, ebitan cruçarçe entre eyô. Por eço acampé aquí.

entry.key: FeldsparCoreGiant’s Deep’s core, huh? Ahhh, that was a wild one.
entry.value: Er núcleo de Abîmmo der Higante, ¿e? A... eço fue una locura.

entry.key: FeldsparCoreBut since you’re asking, I gotta assume you haven’t made it down there yourself yet, right? If I tell you how, it kinda feels like cheating.
entry.value: Pero, ya que preguntâ, açumiré que aún no âh êttao ayí, ¿berdá? Çi te digo cómo lo içe, çería açêh trampa.

entry.key: FeldsparCoreHm...
entry.value: Mmm...

entry.key: FeldsparCore...On a completely unrelated note, that sure was a big, hollow vine my ship crashed into. Yep.
entry.value: Tema completamente aparte, la iedra contra la que çe êttreyó mi âttronabe era grande y gueca. Çí.

entry.key: FeldsparCoreIf I were you, I’d go take a walk and see where it ends.
entry.value: Çi fuera tú, iría caminando a bêh âtta dónde yega.

entry.key: FeldsparCoreYou’ll want to go to the tail end of this anglerfish skeleton here and look for a flickering light in the fog — that’ll be my old ship. Path starts there.
entry.value: Deberíâ îh açia el êttremo de la cola del êqqueleto de rape y bûccâh una lûh que titila entre la niebla... Eça êh mi bieha âttronabe. Ayí empieça er camino.

entry.key: FeldsparGoodIf you change your mind, you know where to find me!
entry.value: Çi cambiâ de opinión, çabê dónde encontrarme.

entry.key: FeldsparRescueWell... yeah, sure, whenever you have the time.
entry.value: E, çí, claro... cuando tengâ tiempo.

entry.key: FeldsparRescueFrankly, I kinda like it out here. Quiet, peaceful...ish.
entry.value: A deçîh berdá, me gûtta êttâh aquí. Êh tranquilo y... relatibamente paçífico.

entry.key: FeldsparRescueYou’re a little young to understand, but it’s a lot of pressure, being the best that ever was. Been nice to have a break.
entry.value: Erê demaçiao hoben como pa entendêl-lo, pero er título de «mehôh de la îttoria» te pone muxa preçión. Bengo dîffrutando de êtte dêccanço.

entry.key: FeldsparExploreThat’s the spirit!
entry.value: ¡Eça êh la âttitûh!

entry.key: FeldsparExploreAnywhere’s good, but you should know that space is weird here. Intensely.
entry.value: Cuarquiêh lugâh êh gueno, pero deberíâ çabêh que aquí el êppaçio êh êttraño. MU.

entry.key: FeldsparExploreEver tried throwing your scout into one of these weird seeds? See there, with the little opening? It’s just big enough to launch one through.
entry.value: ¿Intentâtte lançâh tu çonda por una de êttâ çemiyâ êttrañâ? ¿Bêh la pequeña apertura? Êh lo çufiçientemente grande como pa lançâh una çonda a trabêh de eya.

entry.key: FeldsparExploreYour scout tracker will tell you the scout is in two places at once, but I don’t think that’s... wrong, exactly, because space doesn’t work right in here. That seed looks small, see? But inside, it’s bigger.
entry.value: El râttreadôh te dirá que la çonda êttá en dôh lugarê a la bêh, pero no creo que çea... der tó incorrêtto, porque el êppaçio no funçiona bien aquí. La çemiya pareçe pequeña, ¿bêh? Pero êh mâh grande por dentro.

entry.key: FeldsparExploreMuch bigger.
entry.value: Muxo mâh grande.

entry.key: FeldsparExploreI’ve had a lot of time to think about this, and my theory is space in Dark Bramble kind of expands as you go through each sphere. That’s why it’s bigger inside those seeds.
entry.value: Tube bâttante tiempo pa pençâh en êtto, y mi teoría êh que el êppaçio en Êppinôccuro çe êppande a medida que atrabieçâ cá êffera. Por eço êh mâh grande dentro de lâ çemiyâ.

entry.key: FeldsparExploreWell, that’s my theory. Keep that in mind while you’re exploring Dark Bramble and maybe you won’t get lost inside forever.
entry.value: O, ar menô, eça êh mi teoría. Tenlo en cuenta cuando êpplorê Êppinôccuro y tar bêh no te pierdâ pa çiempre.

entry.key: FeldsparExploreGood luck!
entry.value: ¡Guena çuerte!

entry.key: FeldsparShipwreckNot far from here, as a matter of fact! If you go straight past the tail of this anglerfish skeleton here, you’ll see a flickering light in the fog.
entry.value: No êttá lehô de aquí, de exo. Çi paçâ el êttremo de la cola del êqqueleto de rape, berâh una lûh que titila entre la niebla.

entry.key: FeldsparShipwreckFollow that, and you’ll find my old ship.<Pause> What’s left of it, anyway.
entry.value: Çígela y encontrarâh mi bieha âttronabe.<Pause> O lo que queda de eya, ar menô.

entry.key: FoundSomethingMenuLay it on me, hatchling!
entry.value: ¡Cuéntame tó, retoño!

entry.key: FeldsparFoundSomethingMenuI went to the core of Giant’s Deep.
entry.value: Êttube en er núcleo de Abîmmo der Higante.

entry.key: FeldsparFoundSomethingMenuI found the frozen jellyfish near your ship.
entry.value: Ayé la meduça conhelá çerca de tu âttronabe.

entry.key: FeldsparFoundSomethingMenuI found the Anglerfish nest.
entry.value: Ayé er nido de lô rapê.

entry.key: FeldsparFoundSomethingMenuI found a Dark Bramble seed on Timber Hearth.
entry.value: Ayé una çemiya de Êppinôccuro en Lumbre.

entry.key: FeldsparFoundSomethingMenuI found Nomai writing saying anglerfish are blind.
entry.value: Ayé têttô nomai que diçen que lô rapê çon çiegô.

entry.key: FeldsparFoundSomethingMenuI found a Nomai shuttle and flew it!
entry.value: ¡Encontré un trâbbordadôh nomai y lo piloté!

entry.key: FeldsparFoundSomethingMenuActually, nevermind.
entry.value: En realidá, no importa.

entry.key: FoundSomething1So you figured out the ol’ tornado trick, did you? Good work!
entry.value: Açí que dêccubrîtte er truco der tônnao, ¿e? ¡Guen trabaho!

entry.key: FoundSomething1I found that bit out by accident, but let’s keep that between you and me, hey? Hornfels would have my very handsome head if they knew I’d been riding the cyclones again.
entry.value: Yo lo dêccubrí por âççidente, pero no le digamô eço a nadie, ¿çí? Cônné me cortaría mi ermoça cabeça çi çupiera que borbí a nabegâh por lô çiclonê.

entry.key: FoundSomething1“The ship is fragile! It can break! You can’t subject it to extreme conditions!” Not like I was flying the thing into the sun, now, was I?
entry.value: «¡La âttronabe êh fráhî! ¡Çe puede rompêh! ¡No puedê çometêl-la a condiçionê êttremâ!». No êttaba bolando la âttronabe açia er Çôh ni ná de eço, ¿no te pareçe?

entry.key: FoundSomething1And the jellyfish, you figured those out, too? Hatchling, I tell you what, you’ve done real well for yourself! You’re a fine astronaut, sure, but you might just become a pilot yet!
entry.value: Y lâ meduçâ, ¿ya dêccubrîtte eço también? Retoño, ¡debo deçîh que te a ido mu bien! Tû abilidadê como âttronauta çon guenâ, çí, ¡tar bêh âtta te combiertâ en piloto argún día!

entry.key: FoundSomething2Ha! So the old thing still there, is it? That’s where I first camped out after the crash, you know. It was pretty cozy inside!
entry.value: ¡Ha! Açí que eçe behêttorio çige ayí, ¿e? Eçe êh er lugâh donde acampé ar prinçipio, hûtto dêppuêh de la coliçión. ¡Era bâttante acohedôh!

entry.key: FoundSomething2It does lack the structural integrity and indomitable spirit of a camp made in the shelter of the very bones of the species that tried to eat you, I suppose.
entry.value: Aunque diría que le farta la integridá êttrûtturâh y el êppíritu indomable de un campamento ergío en lô gueçô de la mîmmíçima êppeçie que intentó deborarte.

entry.key: FoundSomething2Still. Very cozy.
entry.value: Aun açí... Era mu acohedôh.

entry.key: FoundSomething3So that’s where the blasted things come from, is it? Stars above, if I still had a working ship, I’d be sorely tempted to go show ’em what’s what!
entry.value: Entonçê de aí bienen eçâ marditâ criaturâ, ¿e? Por lâ êttreyâ, çi tan çolo tubiera una âttronabe en guen êttao, ¡me moriría de ganâ de dâl-lê çu mereçío!

entry.key: FoundSomething3<color=grey>Sigh...</color>
entry.value: <color=grey>Uf...</color>

entry.key: FoundSomething3Probably best to leave ’em alone, though, really. More trouble than it’s worth to mess with anglerfish.
entry.value: Creo que êh mehôh dehâl-lô en pâh. No bale la pena açêh enohâh a lô rapê.

entry.key: FoundSomething4...That’s bad business, hatchling.
entry.value: Êh un mâh negoçio, retoño.

entry.key: FoundSomething4As Chert will tell you if you so much as glance in Dark Bramble’s direction, there used to be a fifth planet where the Bramble is now.
entry.value: Como te diría Xert çi apenâ mirarâ en dirêççión a Êppinôccuro, çolía abêh un quinto planeta en çu lugâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething4This infernal plant appeared at the center and kept growing, and growing, and growing, until it shattered the planet and scattered its pieces across space.
entry.value: Êtte planeta infênnâh apareçió en çu çentro y creçió y creçió çin parâh âtta dêttruîh er planeta y dêpparramâh çû partê por tó el êppaçio.

entry.key: FoundSomething4If we don’t get that seed you found sorted real quicklike, I suspect Timber Hearth will be heading toward the same fate. And I tell you what, we Hearthians have overcome far too much to be done in by some worthless seed.
entry.value: Çi no reçorbemô pronto el açunto de la çemiya que encontrâtte, me temo que Lumbre correrá la mîmma çuerte. Y, ¿çabê qué? Lô lumbreanô çuperamô demaçiâh dificurtadê como pa que una míçera çemiya acabe con noçotrô.

entry.key: FoundSomething5A-ha! So the blasted things do have a weakness!
entry.value: ¡A-há! ¡Açí que eçâ criaturâ marditâ tienen una debilidá!

entry.key: FoundSomething5Meaning my fly-as-fast-as-I-can approach to dealing with them could have used a bit more thought behind it.
entry.value: O çea que podría abêh pençao mehôh mi táttica de bolâh lo mâh rápido poçible pa lidiâh con eyâ.

entry.key: FoundSomething5Ah, well, at least they didn’t eat me. All’s well that ends well, eh, hatchling?
entry.value: Gueno, ar menô no me comieron. Bien êttá lo que bien acaba, ¿e, retoño?

entry.key: FoundSomething7You flew a Nomaian shuttle? You don’t say! How was it? How did it handle?
entry.value: ¿Pilotâtte un trâbbordadôh nomai? ¡No me digâ! ¿Qué tar te fue? ¿Cómo çe comportó?

entry.key: FoundSomething7Can’t say I’d mind having a go at that myself, hatchling. Once I return to Timber Hearth, maybe that’ll have to be my next stop.
entry.value: Debo deçîh que me encantaría intentâl-lo, retoño. Tar bêh eça çea mi próççima pará cuando regreçe a Lumbre.

entry.key: FoundSomething7A brand-new astronaut, and you’re already a pro adventurer! Outer Wilds Ventures is in good hands with you, I can tell. The flight program is going places!
entry.value: No tendrâh muxa êpperiençia como âttronauta, ¡pero tienê un gran êppíritu abenturero! Outer Wilds Ventures êttá en guenâ manô contigo, lo çé. ¡Er programa de buelo yegará lehô!

entry.key: FoundSomething6Nothing you want to share with me? Sounds like you’d better get out there and start exploring!
entry.value: ¿No ay ná que quierâ deçirme? ¡Pareçe que êh ora de que bayâ a êpplorâh!

entry.key: SignDespite my checking on them at least a thousand times over, the images are STILL not ready to print over in the radio tower. Well, it’s like they say — a watched satellite never transmits data! <size=20>(Haha, that’s a little joke for you, journal. No one says that.)</size>
entry.value: Aunque ya lâ e rebiçao ar menô mîh beçê, lâ imáhenê AÚN no êttán lîttâ pa imprimirçe en la torre de radio. Gueno, êh como diçen: ¡un çatélite bihilao nunca trâmmite informaçión! <size=20>(¡Ha, ha! Êh una bromita pa ti, diario. Nadie diçe eço).</size>

entry.key: SignSomeday, I’ll have to study the mechanics of how time manages to slow to a syrupy crawl whenever I’m anticipating something. In the meantime, I’ve turned to Gabbro, our resident expert in leisurely whiling away the hours, who recommends the following:
entry.value: Argún día tendré que êttudiâh la mecánica de cómo er tiempo abança a paço de tortuga cá bêh que antiçipo argo. Mientrâ tanto, e recurrío a Gabro, reçidente con êpperiençia en dehâh paçâh lâ orâ çin priça, que recomienda lo çigiente:

entry.key: SignGABBRO’S 3 FOOLPROOF STEPS FOR DOZING OFF\\n 1. Light a nice, cozy campfire and get comfortable.\\n 2. Gaze deeply into the serene warmth.\\n 3. Let time begin to slip away as you allow the flames to lull you into a peaceful slumber.
entry.value: 3 PAÇÔ FÁÇILÊ DE GABRO PA DORMIRÇE\\Nro. 1. Ençiende una fogata acohedora y reláhate.\\Nro. 2. Contempla la çerenidá der calôh.\\Nro. 3. Deha que er tiempo trâccurra mientrâ lâ yamâ te arruyan en un çueño tranquilo.

entry.key: Sign(If Gabbro knew I’d taken notes, they’d probably think I’d finally cracked, but I refuse to accept sass from an astronaut who deliberately burns their marshmallows.)
entry.value: (Çi Gabro çupiera que tomé notâ, probablemente pençaría que enloqueçí, pero me niego a reçibîh bûl-lâ de argien que quema deliberadamente çû marbabîccô).

entry.key: SignCharting stars again out by the radio tower — they’re so bright out here! I only wish I were able to record them faster. Admittedly, I could use more patience. I get so engrossed in my work that sunrise becomes an unwelcome deadline, and daylight a grating slog.
entry.value: Buerbo a traçâh er mapa de lâ êttreyâ çercanâ a la torre de radio. ¡Çon tan briyantê aquí afuera! Ohalá pudiera râttreâl-lâ mâh rápido. Debo reconoçêh que me bendría bien çêh mâh paçiente. Me conçentro tanto en mi trabaho que el amaneçêh çe buerbe inoportuno y la lûh der día, un fâttidio.

entry.key: Sign...Aaand we’re recording! Ahem. It’s been two days since the launch of the deep space satellite, and I’m about to view the first batch of photos. Let the record show that on this historic day, Outer Wilds Ventures has—
entry.value: … ¡Y... êttamô grabando! Ehem. An paçao dôh díâ dêdde er lançamiento der çatélite del êppaçio profundo, y êttoy por bêh er primêh lote de fotô. Que côtte que, en êtte día îttórico, Outer Wilds Ventures a…

entry.key: SignAaaah! They’re printing, they’re printing! Here they come!
entry.value: ¡Aaaa! ¡Çe êttán imprimiendo, çe êttán imprimiendo! ¡Aquí bienen!

entry.key: Sign…Stars above, will you look at that. There’s Brittle Hollow. And look, look there, that’s Hollow’s Lantern! And there’s Giant’s Deep, and — and the Quantum Moon! I’m speechless, completely speechless.
entry.value: … Por lâ êttreyâ, mira eço. Ayí êttá Ondoná Fráhî. ¡Y mira, mira aí! ¡Êh er Faro de la Ondoná! Y aí êttá Abîmmo der Higante, y… ¡la Luna Cuántica! No tengo palabrâ. Ni una.

entry.key: SignEvery single astral body in our magnificent solar system, looking stunning from every angle in each of these three images. And in color, no less! Now this is art. I could stare at these photos forever. Doesn’t Timber Hearth look tiny from —
entry.value: Cá uno de lô cuerpô âttralê de nuêttro mânnífico çîttema çolâh tiene un âppêtto impreçionante dêdde cuarquiêh ángulo en cá una de êttâ trêh imáhenê. ¡Y en colôh, ná menô! Êtto çí que êh arte. Podría quedarme mirando êttâ fotô pa çiempre. ¿No pareçe pequeño Lumbre bîtto dêdde...

entry.key: SignHold on. What is that?
entry.value: Êppera. ¿Qué êh eço?

entry.key: SignThat can’t be right. That’s… I mean, that’s not even possible. Am I interpreting this photo correctly? What’s even stranger is it doesn’t show up in either of the other photos. Just this one…
entry.value: No puede çêh çierto. Eço… Quiero deçîh, eço no êh poçible. ¿Êttoy interpretando êtta foto corrêttamente? Lo que reçurta aún mâh êttraño êh que no apareçe en ninguna de lâ otrâ fotô. Çolo en êtta…

entry.key: SignWell, there must have been an equipment malfunction, I suppose. Only sensible explanation for it. I’ll radio Gabbro and ask them to go examine the satellite’s lens for defects.
entry.value: Gueno, debe abêh abío una faya en el equipo, çupongo. Êh la única êpplicaçión lóhica. Yamaré a Gabro por la radio y le pediré que êççamine la lente der çatélite en bûcca de fayâ.

entry.key: the Prisoner
entry.value: te Priçonêh

entry.key: WaitingForOthersThis fire… what a warm and beautiful light it makes.
entry.value: Êtta fogata… Qué lûh tan cálida y ermoça.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersGo, find the others. What comes next cannot be done alone.
entry.value: Be a bûccâh a lô demâh. Neçeçitarâh ayuda pa lo que biene aora.

entry.key: ReadyToPlayI hadn’t dared to hope that anyone would hear the signal, for how briefly I set it free… Yet, here we are. Are you ready for the final step?
entry.value: No êpperaba que argien êccuxara la çeñâh, por lo poco que duró… Çin embargo, aquí êttamô. ¿Tó lîtto pa er paço finâh?

entry.key: the PrisonerReadyToPlayYes.
entry.value: Çí.

entry.key: the PrisonerReadyToPlayNot yet.
entry.value: Aún no.

entry.key: StartPlayingThen it’s time! Time to send our spark out into the darkness.
entry.value: Entonçê, ¡a yegao er momento! Êh ora de embiâh nuêttra xîppa açia la ôccuridá.

entry.key: NotYetI have awaited this moment for a long time. For so long. It is no trouble to wait a little longer.
entry.value: E êpperao êtte momento durante muxo tiempo. Muxo tiempo. No me molêtta êpperâh un poco mâh.

entry.key: Farewell...How beautiful. It’s different than I’d envisioned.
entry.value: … Cuánta beyeça. Êh diferente de lo que abía imahinao.

entry.key: FarewellWhatever happens next, I do not think it is to be feared.
entry.value: Paçe lo que paçe, creo que no debemô tenêh miedo.

entry.key: WaitingForInvitationWhen my kind found the Eye and realized what it was capable of, they were terrified. It was too difficult a truth. Like a light too bright to look upon directly, it burned them.
entry.value: Cuando lô de mi êppeçie encontraron el Oho y çe dieron cuenta de lo que era capâh de açêh, çe aterroriçaron. Era una berdá demaçiao incómoda. Como una lûh demaçiao briyante pa mirâl-la dirêttamente, lê quemaba.

entry.key: WaitingForInvitationWhat they could not unlearn was hidden away in darkness — obfuscated, then lost. They did not want to see their story end.
entry.value: Lo que no pudieron orbidâh quedó ocurto en la ôccuridá, confundío y, finarmente, perdío. No querían bêh er finâh de çu îttoria.

entry.key: WaitingForInvitationMy kind weren’t always like this. We weren’t always so afraid. I did what I could to set things right, yet I am still of my kind, and you know now what they did. I cannot promise our fear won’t stain your mind.
entry.value: Lô de mi êppeçie no çiempre fueron açí. No çiempre tubimô tanto miedo. Içe lo que pude pa arreglâh lâ coçâ, pero çigo perteneçiendo a eça êppeçie, y aora çabê lo que içieron. No puedo prometêh que nuêttro miedo no imbadirá tu mente.

entry.key: WaitingForInvitationAnd so, a choice: Are you certain you want to remember me?
entry.value: Entonçê, puedê elehîh: ¿aún deçeâ recordarme?

entry.key: the PrisonerWaitingForInvitationJoin us. Let’s see what happens.
entry.value: Únete a noçotrô. Beamô qué ocurre.

entry.key: the PrisonerWaitingForInvitationYour journey is over now. You did well.
entry.value: Tu biahe a terminao. Lo âh exo mu bien.

entry.key: the PrisonerWaitingForInvitationI’m not ready to decide.
entry.value: Aún no puedo deçidîh.

entry.key: JoinUsI don’t want to repeat my kind’s mistakes. But if you’re willing to take the risk, then so am I.
entry.value: No quiero repetîh lô errorê de mi êppeçie. Pero çi deçeâ arriêggarte, entonçê, yo también lo aré.

entry.key: YourJourneyIsOverMy role in this ended long ago, and now I’ve learned my efforts weren’t in vain. Thank you for facing what was hidden in the dark.
entry.value: Mi miçión aquí terminó açe tiempo, y aora çé que mî êffuerçô no fueron en bano. Graçiâ por enfrentarte a lo que êttaba ocurto en la ôccuridá.

entry.key: NotReadyEvery decision is made in darkness. Only by making a choice can we learn whether it was right or not.
entry.value: Toâ lâ deçiçionê çe toman en la ôccuridá. Çolo cuando deçidimô argo, podemô çabêh çi fue lo corrêtto o no.

entry.key: NotReadyI will wait until you are ready.
entry.value: Êpperaré tó er tiempo que neçeçitê.

entry.key: Nomai1...
the PrisonerNomai1Who are you?
entry.value: ¿Quién erê?

entry.key: the PrisonerNomai1Where are we?
entry.value: ¿Dónde êttamô?

entry.key: Nomai2...
IPNotFoundThe radio tower on Timber Hearth was built to receive transmissions from our deep space satellite, and housed some of the last-ever photos taken of the entire solar system.
entry.value: La torre de radio que çe encuentra en Lumbre fue côttruida pa reçibîh lâ trâmmiçionê de nuêttro çatélite del êppaçio profundo y arbergó argunâ de lâ úrtimâ fotô que çe tomaron de tó er çîttema çolâh.

entry.key: IPNotFoundHornfels noticed a curious anomaly in one of the photos, but it ultimately went unexplained.
entry.value: Cônné detêttó una curioça anomalía en una de lâ fotô, pero nadie pudo êpplicâl-la.

entry.key: IPFoundThe radio tower on Timber Hearth was built to receive transmissions from our deep space satellite, and housed some of the last-ever photos taken of the entire solar system.
entry.value: La torre de radio que çe encuentra en Lumbre fue côttruida pa reçibîh lâ trâmmiçionê de nuêttro çatélite del êppaçio profundo y arbergó argunâ de lâ úrtimâ fotô que çe tomaron de tó er çîttema çolâh.

entry.key: IPFoundOne of these photos revealed the existence of an invisible ring world inhabited by a species whose presence in our solar system predated even the Nomai.
entry.value: Una de eçâ fotô rebeló la êççîttençia de un mundo aniyo imbiçible abitao por una êppeçie cuya preçençia en nuêttro çîttema çolâh preçede incluço a lô nomai.

entry.key: IPDreamLibrariesFoundThis species traveled from a nearby star system in search of the Eye of the universe, but, horrified by what they discovered, decided to block the Eye’s signal so that no one else would ever find it.
entry.value: Êtta êppeçie biahó dêdde un çîttema êttelâh çercano en bûcca del Oho del uniberço pero, orroriçáô por lo que dêccubrieron, deçidieron bloqueâh la çeñâh del Oho pa que nadie mâh pudiera encontrâl-lo.

entry.key: IPFinishedOne individual, however, rebelled against the decision, and was able to briefly release the Eye’s signal back into space before being caught and imprisoned in solitude for this betrayal.
entry.value: Çin embargo, uno de eyô çe rebeló ante êtta deçiçión y pudo liberâh momentáneamente la çeñâh del Oho açia el êppaçio, antê de çêh câtturao y encarçelao en çoledá por çu traiçión.

entry.key: CASSAVA: Conoy, Daz and I were lifting Orbital Probe Cannon components into orbit for assembly, and one somehow sank down down beneath the current.
entry.value: CAÇABA: Conoy, Dâh y yo êttubimô poniendo en órbita lô componentê del Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh pa çu ençamblahe, y uno terminó undiéndoçe en lo mâh profundo de la corriente.

entry.key: DAZ: Cassava convinced me not to try to recreate the phenomenon myself using other cannon parts, but we’re very curious to know what happened! How could something pass through the current?
entry.value: DÂH: Caçaba me combençió de que no intentara recreâh er fenómeno por mî propiô mediô utiliçando otrâ pieçâ der cañón, ¡pero nô intereça çabêh qué çuçedió! ¿Cómo êh poçible que argo aya atrabeçao la corriente?

entry.key: CONOY: My gratitude for your interesting question! This is exciting: Spire constructed a model of <color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color> here at <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>’s <color=orange>Southern Observatory</color>, and it's revealed how an object might sink below the current.
entry.value: CONOY: ¡Mi gratitûh por tan intereçante pregunta! Êtto êh emoçionante: Spire côttruyó un modelo de <color=lightblue>Abîmmo der Higante</color> aquí, en el <color=orange>Ôççerbatorio Çûh</color> de <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color>, y demuêttra cómo un ôhheto podría undirçe en la corriente.

entry.key: CASSAVA: Conoy, I’m unable to grasp the answer by looking through the <color=orange>projection pool</color>. If I visit the <color=orange>observatory</color>, would you kindly explain?
entry.value: CAÇABA: Conoy, no logro ôttenêh la rêppuêtta mirando a trabêh de la <color=orange>arberca de proyêççión</color>. Çi boy âtta el<color=orange>ôççerbatorio</color>, ¿tendríâ la amabilidá de êpplicármelo?

entry.key: CONOY: If you don’t mind the trek beneath the surface to the south pole, I’d be delighted to see you! (There are two trailheads, one at <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>'s <color=orange>gravity cannon</color> and one at the <color=orange>Tower of Quantum Knowledge</color>.)
entry.value: CONOY: Çi no te molêtta açêh una trabeçía debaho de la çuperfiçie açia er polo çûh, ¡me encantará berte! (Ay dôh puntô de partida: uno en <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color> y otro en la <color=orange>Torre der Conoçimiento Cuántico</color>).

entry.key: DAZ: Conoy, you should’ve seen it! We’d thought it was impossible for any cannon components to sink even partially below the current, but ours sank straight to the core!
entry.value: DÂH: ¡Conoy, deberíâ abêl-lo bîtto! Pençábamô que era impoçible que lô componentê de un cañón çe undieran en la corriente, incluço de forma parçiâh, ¡pero er nuêttro çe undió âtta er núcleo!

entry.key: COLEUS: I was upstairs testing the <color=orange>Eye signal locator</color>, and it can hear and follow the signals from the <color=lightblue>sun</color>, <color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color>, and <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Êttube arriba probando el <color=orange>localiçadôh de çeñâh del Oho</color>. Puede oîh y çegîh lâ çeñalê del <color=lightblue>Çôh</color>, de <color=lightblue>Abîmmo der Higante</color> y de<color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color>.

entry.key: COLEUS: However, something strange is happening when I ask the <color=orange>Eye signal locator</color> to follow the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s signal: The device’s indicator rotates wildly and never points to just one direction.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Çin embargo, çuçede argo êttraño cuando le indico al <color=orange>localiçadôh de çeñâh</color> que çiga la çeñâh del <color=lightblue>Oho</color>: el indicadôh der dîppoçitibo hira çin contrôh y nunca apunta en una çola dirêççión.

entry.key: THATCH: This is a curious result. It’s possible the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> has stopped calling out its signal.
entry.value: TÂXX: Êh un reçurtao yamatibo. Êh poçible que el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> aya dehao de emitîh çu çeñâh.

entry.key: FILIX: I see! I most likely calibrated the locator incorrectly. Privet (my apprentice) and I will make adjustments and try again.
entry.value: FILÎH: ¡Ya beo! Lo mâh probable êh que aya calibrao incorrêttamente er localiçadôh. Pribê (mi aprendiça) y yo aremô argunô ahûttê y lo intentaremô otra bêh.

entry.key: FILIX: An update: Disappointingly, everything is correctly calibrated after all.
entry.value: FILÎH: Âttualiçaçión: Pa nuêttra deçêççión, reçurta que tó êttá calibrao corrêttamente.

entry.key: CASSAVA: It saddens me to posit this, my friends, but I believe this <color=orange>locator</color> cannot detect the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s signal. We would need to build a more sensitive device if we want to locate the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>.
entry.value: CAÇABA: Me entrîtteçe planteâh êtto, amigô míô, pero creo que êtte <color=orange>localiçadôh</color> no detêtta la çeñâh del <color=lightblue>Oho</color>. Neçeçitamô côttruîh un dîppoçitibo mâh çofîtticao çi queremô dêccubrîh la ubicaçión êççâtta del <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>.

entry.key: THATCH: Then we will build it. Don’t lose hope, Cassava; our search for the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is what brought our clan to this place. We won’t give up so easily!
entry.value: TÂXX: Entonçê, lo côttruiremô. No pierdâ la êpperança, Caçaba; la búqqueda del <color=lightblue>Oho</color> êh lo que traho a nuêttro clan a êtte lugâh. ¡No nô rendiremô tan fáçirmente!

entry.key: Hal
entry.value: Ali

entry.key: Friend1aHey, hey, it’s my favorite astronaut! Launch day at last, huh, buddy? It’s the translator tool’s inaugural flight, too! I’m so excited it’s making me nauseous.
entry.value: Oye, ola, ¡pero çi êh mi çuperâttronauta! Por fin yegó er día der lançamiento, ¿no? ¡También êh er buelo inaugurâh de la erramienta de tradûççión! Çiento tanta emoçión que çe me rebuerbe el êttómago.

entry.key: Friend1aJust think - you’ll be able to translate any Nomai text you want, anywhere you are. The two of us put a lot of hours into inventing that tool, so don’t break it, okay? Haha! ...Oh, geez. Do not break it.
entry.value: Imahina: podrâh traduçîh cuarquiêh têtto nomai que quierâ, çin importâh dónde êttêh. Imbertimô muxâ orâ en eça erramienta, açí que intenta no êttropeâl-la, ¿çí? Ha, ha. ... Ay, çielô. No la êttropeê.

entry.key: Friend1a...Ugh, ignore me, okay? I’m just nervous. And I’m not even the one going into space! How are you feeling?
entry.value: Uf, mehôh no me agâ caço. Çiento muxô nerbiô. ¡Y ni çiquiera çoy yo quien çe lançará açia el êppaçio! ¿Cómo te çientê tú?

entry.key: HalFriend1aI’m excited!
entry.value: ¡Çiento entuçiâmmo!

entry.key: HalFriend1aI’m terrified!
entry.value: ¡Çiento miedo!

entry.key: FriendExcitedGood! You’ve only been waiting for this day since we were hatchlings. I can’t wait to see all your training pay off!
entry.value: ¡Qué bien! Âh êttao êpperando êtte día dêdde que erâ un retoño. ¡Me muero por bêh materialiçao tó tu entrenamiento!

entry.key: FriendScaredAw, don’t let me make you nervous. You’ve been training for this day since we were hatchlings, remember? You’ll do great, I promise!
entry.value: A, no dehê que te paçe mî nerbiô. Âh êttao entrenándote pa êtte día dêdde que erâ un retoño, ¿recuerdâ? ¡No tengo dudâ de que te irá heniâh!

entry.key: Friend1bSo what’s the dirt? You here to see the new Nomai statue?
entry.value: ¿Qué nuebâ traê? ¿Bienê a bêh la êttatua nomai nueba?

entry.key: HalFriend1bNew statue?
entry.value: ¿Êttatua nueba?

entry.key: HalFriend1bOf course!
entry.value: ¡Por çupuêtto!

entry.key: HalFriend1bJust here for the launch codes.
entry.value: Çolo bine por lô códigô de lançamiento.

entry.key: Friend2Heh, I knew you’d want to see it before you headed off! Hornfels just finished prepping it for display today. Amazing, isn’t it?
entry.value: He, çabía que querríâ bêl-la antê de partîh. Cônné acaba de terminâh de preparâl-la pa êpponêl-la. Increíble, ¿e?

entry.key: Friend3You haven’t heard? Gabbro brought it back with them from Giant’s Deep, and Hornfels just finished prepping it for display. This is it right here. Neat, huh?
entry.value: ¿No te enterâtte? Gabro la traho de Abîmmo der Higante, y Cônné acaba de preparâl-la pa êpponêl-la. Êttá hûtto aquí. Heniâh, ¿no?

entry.key: Friend4Yeah, I get that you’re dying to head out into space, but seriously, you’ve got to see this statue before you go. It’s an amazing find!
entry.value: Çí, imahino que ya quierê irte al êppaçio, pero, en çerio, antê tienê que bêh la êttatua. ¡Êh un ayâggo increíble!

entry.key: Friend5Makes me wish we could see what a real live Nomai looks like, but I guess this is as close as we’ll ever get. Check it out - looks like they had fur! Fur is weird.
entry.value: Me encantaría çabêh cómo êh un nomai de berdá, pero çupongo que êtto êh lo mâh çerca que êttaremô de bêl-lô. Mira êtto, ¡pareçe que tubiera piêh! La piêh êh... rara.

entry.key: Friend5This is the first fully intact statue ever found, you know. And for how old it is, it’s in great shape!
entry.value: Êtta êh la primera êttatua totarmente intâtta que hamâh çe aya encontrao. Y teniendo en cuenta çu antiguedá, ¡êttá en perfêtto êttao!

entry.key: Friend5...Ah geez, I got a little carried away there. Go on, you have a ship to launch! Take care of yourself out there, you hear?
entry.value: Çielô, me dehé yebâh un poco. Be, te êppera er lançamiento. Ten muxo cuidao, ¿me oyê?

entry.key: StatueEyesOpenHey, I was just about to come find you! Look look look, you’ve gotta see this — the Nomai statue’s eyes are open!
entry.value: Oye, ¡êttaba hûtto por benîh a bûccarte! Mira, mira, mira, tienê que bêh êtto: ¡lô ohô de la êttatua nomai êttán abiertô!

entry.key: StatueEyesOpenThey, uh, used to be closed. Probably should’ve started with that. And now they’ve opened!
entry.value: Antê... e, êttaban çerráô. Debería abêh dixo eço primero. ¡Y aora êttán abiertô!

entry.key: StatueEyesOpenWe’re not sure why they opened, since no one actually saw it happen, but this is huge news!
entry.value: No çabemô por qué çe abrieron, ya que nadie bio cuándo çuçedió, ¡pero çon grandê notiçiâ!

entry.key: StatueEyesOpenShould someone tell Gabbro? Or maybe Riebeck? Oh, stars, this is so exciting, it’s making my stomach hurt!
entry.value: ¿Deberíamô informâl-le a Gabro? ¿O a Riebeck? A, por lâ êttreyâ... Tó êtto êh tan emoçionante que me da dolôh de êttómago.

entry.key: HalStatueEyesOpenHal! Can you help me translate this new alien language I found?
entry.value: ¡Ali! ¿Me ayudâ a traduçîh êtte nuebo idioma alieníhena que dêccubrí?

entry.key: MoreTranslationA new language?! YES! Absolutely! Stars above, you BET I can!
entry.value: ¡¿Un nuebo idioma?! ¡ÇÍ! ¡Claro que çí! Por lâ êttreyâ, ¡POR ÇUPUÊTTO que puedo!

entry.key: MoreTranslationJust give me… let’s call it a hundred samples, some form of epigraphical codex, and six months, and I should have the vague gist of the sort of graphemes this new language is working with!
entry.value: Çolo dame unâ… çien muêttrâ, argún tipo de códiçe epigráfico y çeî meçê, ¡y podría tenêh una baga idea der tipo de grafemâ que çe encuentran en êtte nuebo idioma!

entry.key: MoreTranslationGosh, I can’t wait to get started!
entry.value: ¡Baya! ¡Qué ganâ de empeçâh!

entry.key: FriendNot5_TO_CHANGEHey again! What’s up?
entry.value: ¡Ola, de nuebo! ¿Qué tal?

entry.key: HalFriendNot5_TO_CHANGEWhere on Giant’s Deep would I find Gabbro?
entry.value: ¿En qué parte de Abîmmo der Higante podría encontrâh a Gabro?

entry.key: HalFriendNot5_TO_CHANGEWhere did this statue come from?
entry.value: ¿De dónde bino êtta êttatua?

entry.key: HalFriendNot5_TO_CHANGEWhy did the Nomai make this statue?
entry.value: ¿Por qué lô nomai içieron la êttatua?

entry.key: HalFriendNot5_TO_CHANGEThink I’ll discover anything cool in space?
entry.value: ¿Piençâ que dêccubriré argo heniâh en el êppaçio?

entry.key: HalFriendNot5_TO_CHANGESorry, nevermind.
entry.value: Lo çiento, no importa.

entry.key: FriendMenuWas there something else?
entry.value: ¿Abía argo mâh?

entry.key: HalFriendMenuWhere’d you say this statue came from?
entry.value: ¿De dónde dihîtte que bino êtta êttatua?

entry.key: HalFriendMenuWhere can I find Gabbro?
entry.value: ¿Dónde puedo encontrâh a Gabro?

entry.key: HalFriendMenuWhy did the Nomai make this statue?
entry.value: ¿Por qué lô nomai içieron la êttatua?

entry.key: HalFriendMenuThink I’ll discover anything cool in space?
entry.value: ¿Piençâ que dêccubriré argo heniâh en el êppaçio?

entry.key: HalFriendMenuNope, that was it.
entry.value: Nôh, ná mâh.

entry.key: Friend6Good question! So Gabbro found this fully intact statue on Giant’s Deep, right? Well, Hornfels told me it’s made from the same type of special stone as the partial statue Chert brought back from the Hourglass Twins.
entry.value: ¡Guena pregunta! Gueno, Gabro encontró êtta êttatua intâtta en Abîmmo der Higante, ¿berdá? Y Cônné me contó que êttá exa der mîmmo tipo de roca êppeçiâh que aqueya êttatua inconcluça que Xert traho de lô Hemelô Relôh de Arena.

entry.key: Friend6That’s why when Gabbro, you know, chipped the Giant’s Deep statue, that stone fragment was repurposed for your ship’s computer.
entry.value: Por eço cuando Gabro, ya çabê, âttiyó la êttatua del Abîmmo der Higante, eçe frâmmento de piedra çe reutiliçó pa la computadora de tu âttronabe.

entry.key: Friend6Maybe the statues were made for storing information?
entry.value: ¿Êh poçible que lâ êttatuâ çe ayan côttruío pa armaçenâh informaçión?

entry.key: Friend7From Giant’s Deep! Gabbro fished it out of the oceans and brought it back here for study.
entry.value: ¡De Abîmmo der Higante! Gabro la çacó de lô oçéanô y la traho aquí pa êttudiâl-la.

entry.key: Friend7Hornfels doesn’t know much about it yet, just that it’s crazy old and super tough. I wonder why the Nomai carved it?
entry.value: Cônné no çabe muxo de eya aún. Çolamente que êh çuperantigua y mu reçîttente. Me pregunto por qué lô nomai la tayaron...

entry.key: Friend7Apparently, Gabbro went back to Giant’s Deep to try to learn more about the statue. Maybe they’ll find some answers there.
entry.value: Aparentemente, Gabro borbió a Abîmmo der Higante pa aberiguâh mâh coçâ çobre la êttatua. Quiçá encuentre mâh rêppuêttâ ayí.

entry.key: Friend8Hey, you never know — maybe you’ll be the one to solve the mysteries of the Nomai!
entry.value: Oye, ¡nunca çe çabe! ¡Quiçá çeâ tú quien reçuerba lô mîtteriô de lô nomai!

entry.key: Friend8Or maybe you’ll discover a new kind of rock or something.
entry.value: O quiçá dêccubrâ argún tipo nuebo de roca o argo açí.

entry.key: Friend8But honestly, as long as they don’t end up naming new safety equipment after you, I’m sure you’ll have done a great job.
entry.value: Pero, francamente, mientrâ no terminen poniéndole tu nombre a un equipamiento de çeguridá nuebo, abrâh exo un guen trabaho.

entry.key: Friend9No problem. Take it easy!
entry.value: No ay problema. ¡Tómalo con carma!

entry.key: Friend10Alright then! Be careful out there, okay?
entry.value: Mu bien. Cuídate ayí afuera, ¿çí?

entry.key: WheresGabbroGabbro said they were going back to Giant’s Deep to wherever they found that Nomai statue. One of the islands, I think.
entry.value: Gabro diho que borbería a Abîmmo der Higante, ar lugâh donde ayó la êttatua nomai. Una de lâ îl-lâ, creo.

entry.key: WheresGabbroYou remember Gabbro plays a flute, right? Like, all the time? I bet your signalscope could find them easily.
entry.value: Recuerdâ que Gabro toca una flauta, ¿no? Digamô, tó er tiempo. Apuêtto a que tu çeñalôccopio localiçará çu paradero ençegida.

entry.key: WheresGabbroIf you do see Gabbro, say hi for me!
entry.value: Çi bêh a Gabro, ¡dale un çaludo de mi parte!

entry.key: ANNONA: The <color=orange>Quantum Moon locator</color> is functioning. We have markers for each of the places the moon goes.
entry.value: ÂNNONA: El <color=orange>localiçadôh de la Luna Cuántica</color> êttá en funçionamiento. Tenemô marcadorê pa cá lugâh por donde paça la luna.

entry.key: MELORAE: Annona, Bur, I just observed the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> in orbit around <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color>.
entry.value: MELORAE: Ânnona, Bûh, acabo de bêh la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> en la órbita de <color=lightblue>Êppinôccuro</color>.

entry.key: ANNONA: You have keen eyes, my friend. So this moon travels to a total of five locations, not four.
entry.value: ÂNNONA: Tienê ohô aguçáô, amiga mía. Entonçê êtta luna biaha a un totâh de çinco ubicaçionê, no cuatro.

entry.key: BUR: I added a marker for <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color>.
entry.value: BÛH: Agregé un marcadôh pa <color=lightblue>Êppinôccuro</color>.

entry.key: BUR: I thought the <color=orange>locator</color> now accounted for all of the <color=lightblue>phantom moon</color>’s locations, but sometimes the <color=orange>locator</color> can’t tell where the moon is. Perhaps there’s a problem with the device?
entry.value: BÛH: Pençé que el <color=orange>localiçadôh</color> daba cuenta de toâ lâ ubicaçionê de la <color=lightblue>luna fantâmma</color>, pero a beçê no puede dêççifrâh dónde çe encuentra la <color=lightblue>luna</color>. ¿Êttará aberiao er dîppoçitibo?

entry.key: MELORAE: It’s also possible there exists a sixth place in this star system to which the <color=lightblue>phantom moon</color> travels.
entry.value: MELORAE: También êh poçible que la <color=lightblue>luna fantâmma</color> biahe a una çêtta ubicaçión de êtte çîttema êttelâh.

entry.key: Melorae: If you’ve come here to look for Coleus, this is where we were when he vanished. He’s been missing for two days now!
entry.value: MELORAE: Çi binîtte a bûccâh a Coleû, êttábamô hûtto aquí cuando çe êffumó. ¡Ya paçaron dôh díâ dêdde çu deçapariçión!

entry.key: Annona: Your strange, wandering rock friend is here, though Coleus isn’t.
entry.value: ÂNNONA: Tu amiga êttraña, la roca errante, çí êttá aquí, pero Coleû no.

entry.key: Melorae: Coleus and I observed this unusual-looking rock shard (and several smaller rocks) in at least two other caverns. I’m unsure if this is relevant.
entry.value: MELORAE: Coleû y yo ôççerbamô êtte frâmmento rocoço de âppêtto êttraño (y otrâ rocâ mâh pequeñâ) en, ar menô, dôh cabênnâ mâh. No çé çi êtto çerá relebante.

entry.key: BUR: What happened before Coleus disappeared?
entry.value: BÛH: ¿Qué çuçedió antê de que Coleû deçapareçiera?

entry.key: Melorae: We were examining the different rocks. I recall Coleus standing on the largest one (the wandering rock). I was taking notes, and then my lantern died.
entry.value: MELORAE: Êttábamô êççaminando lâ dîttintâ rocâ. Coleû êttaba parao çobre la mâh grande (la roca errante). Yo êttaba tomando notâ, y de pronto mi farôh çe apagó.

entry.key: Melorae: When I lit it again, Coleus and the rock were both gone.
entry.value: MELORAE: Cuando borbí a ençendêl-lo, no abía râttrô de Coleû ni de la roca.

entry.key: Should we build the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> to power the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>?
entry.value: ¿Deberíamô côttruîh la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color> pa ponêh en marxa el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>?

entry.key: IDAEA: I almost can’t comprehend this is being suggested seriously. The purpose of the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> goes against every standard we hold ourselves to and everything we believe in as a species!
entry.value: IDAEA: Que êttén çuhiriendo êtto en çerio ba mâh ayá de mi comprençión. ¡Er propóçito de la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color> ba en contra de nuêttrô balorê y creençiâ como êppeçie!

entry.key: PYE: Unsurprisingly, Idaea, I disagree. We’re pushing a possible new technology further than ever before. That, in my experience, is the defining characteristic of our species.
entry.value: PYE: Como era de êpperâh, Idaea, no êttoy de acuerdo. Êttamô deçarroyando una poçible tênnolohía nueba a límitê nunca antê arcançáô. Y eço, en mi êpperiençia, êh la carâtteríttica que nô define como êppeçie.

entry.key: YARROW: Are there other ways to generate this level of power?
entry.value: YARROW: ¿Êççîtten otrâ formâ de henerâh eça cantidá de enerhía?

entry.key: PYE: Theoretically, yes. Practically, no. I can’t imagine discovering them in our lifetimes...
entry.value: PYE: En teoría, çí. En la práttica, no. No creo que lo logremô mientrâ bibamô...

entry.key: RAMIE: I understand this proposal is unsettling, but the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> must be built if we hope to complete the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>.
entry.value: RAMIE: Entiendo que êtta êh una propuêtta polémica, pero tenemô que côttruîh la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color> çi queremô completâh el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>.

entry.key: COLEUS: If we fail (and the probability of this is not insignificant), we will without question destroy ourselves, all life here, and the rest of this star system. I wish to protect these species.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Çi fayamô (coça que no êh improbable), çin dudâ moriremô, y dêttruiremô toa la bida der lugâh y el rêtto de êtte çîttema êttelâh. Mi deçeo êh protehêh a êttâ êppeçiê.

entry.key: IDAEA: The potential annihilation of an entire star system is too severe a cost. We shouldn’t build the <color=orange>Sun Station</color>, no matter how badly we want the knowledge that comes with it.
entry.value: IDAEA: La poçible aniquilaçión de un çîttema êttelâh êh un preçio demaçiao arto. No creo que debamô côttruîh la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color>, por mâh que deçeemô er conoçimiento que nô brindaría.

entry.key: POKE: Fear of failure is a poor reason not to try. I believe, if we’re cautious, the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> will work. I believe in Pye.
entry.value: POKE: Er miedo ar fracaço no êh un motibo bálido pa no intentâl-lo. Creo que, çi tenemô cuidao, la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color> funçionará. Creo en Pye.

entry.key: PYE: Poke, I’m deeply honored. Idaea, I comprehend your position; however, if we aren’t all but certain the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> will not cause destruction once we’ve built it, then I won’t support the station’s use.
entry.value: PYE: Poke, lo que dihîtte me onra. Idaea, comprendo tu poçiçión. Çin embargo, a menô que tengamô la çerteça âççoluta de que no cauçaremô dêttrûççión una bêh que la côttruyamô, no apoyaré el uço de la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color>.

entry.key: RAMIE: Note: This door will need to remain closed for some time! Pye and I are running an experiment based on the extraordinary findings from the White Hole Station.
entry.value: RAMIE: Nota: ¡Êtta puerta deberá permaneçêh çerrá durante un tiempo! Pye y yo êttamô realiçando un êpperimento baçao en lô êttraordinariô dêccubrimientô de la Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco.

entry.key: PYE: Ramie and I will be running this experiment until one of us (specifically, me) can prove the other wrong, so although it’s inconvenient, the lab currently can only be accessed by the path from the <color=orange>Sunless City</color>.
entry.value: PYE: Ramie y yo realiçaremô êtte êpperimento âtta que una de lâ dôh (yo, êppeçíficamente) pueda demôttrâl-le a la otra que tiene raçón. Açí que, por mâh que çea incombeniente, el único camino por er que çe puede âççedêh ar laboratorio en êtte momento êh dêdde la <color=orange>Çiudá Çin Çôh</color>.

entry.key: RAMIE: Inviting sand inside would disrupt our setup and could have enormous consequences. (We realize this is an intriguing prospect, but the door must remain closed nonetheless!)
entry.value: RAMIE: El ingreço de arena perturbaría la îttalaçión y tendría conçecuençiâ çînnificatibâ. (¡Çabemô que êh un panorama enîmmático, pero la puerta debe permaneçêh çerrá de toâ formâ!).

entry.key: RAMIE: An update: The <color=orange>High Energy Lab</color> is now being used to design the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>! If you’re here to help (or even just to observe), be sure to use the <color=orange>Sunless City</color> path to the lab.
entry.value: RAMIE: Âttualiçaçión: ¡El <color=orange>Laboratorio Urtraenerhético</color> çe uça aora pa diçeñâh el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>! Çi binîtte a ayudâh (o incluço çolo a ôççerbâh), açegúrate de dirihirte ar laboratorio a trabêh der camino de la <color=orange>Çiudá Çin Çôh</color>.

entry.key: RAMIE: The <color=orange>Southern Observatory</color> is asking if creating a 22 minute interval is possible (that is, to have something arrive 22 minutes before it is actually sent through the warp).
entry.value: RAMIE: El <color=orange>Ôççerbatorio Çûh</color> pregunta çi êh poçible creâh un interbalo de 22 minutô (êh deçîh, logrâh que argo yege 22 minutô antê de que lo embíen rearmente mediante la dîttorçión).

entry.key: RAMIE: We’ve learned the negative interval of time between departure and arrival can be increased by adding more energy to the warp core. Problematically, the energy required to extend the interval increases at an exponential rate.
entry.value: RAMIE: Dêccubrimô que el interbalo de tiempo negatibo entre la partida y la yegá çe puede aumentâh agregando mâh enerhía ar núcleo de dîttorçión. Er problema êh que la enerhía neçeçaria pa êttendêh lô interbalô aumenta êpponençiarmente.

entry.key: PYE: Hypothesis: Creating a 22-minute-long interval is possible, but we are currently unable to generate the necessary energy.
entry.value: PYE: Ipóteçî: Creâh un interbalo de 22 minutô êh poçible, pero çomô incapaçê de henerâh la enerhía neçeçaria con nuêttrô métodô corrientê.

entry.key: PYE: Ramie and I believe it would be necessary to invent a new method of producing energy, a thrilling but enormous undertaking. We would also require advanced warp technology able to handle such energy.
entry.value: PYE: Ramie y yo creemô que çería neçeçario imbentâh un nuebo método de prodûççión de enerhía, una empreça fâççinante pero abrumadora. También neçeçitaríamô una tênnolohía de dîttorçión abançá capâh de çoportâh dixa enerhía.

entry.key: PYE: We would also likely need an enormous space to fit these proposed new energy and warp technologies together. The only location large enough would be <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>.
entry.value: PYE: Êh probable que también neçeçitemô un êppaçio enorme donde pudiéramô montâh êttâ nuebâ tênnolohíâ de dîttorçión y enerhía huntâ. El único lugâh lo çufiçientemente grande çería <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>.

entry.key: RAMIE: The energy is currently unavailable, you say? You’re a gas, Pye!
entry.value: RAMIE: ¿Diçê que no podemô dîpponêh de eça enerhía con nuêttrô métodô corrientê? ¡Erê gaçeoça, Pye! Digo, graçioça.

entry.key: PYE: My pun was unintended, Ramie, so I believe it’s you who’s aeriform!
entry.value: PYE: ¡Fue çolo un xîtte, Ramie, tú erê la aeriforme!

entry.key: PYE: Records show Nomai arriving at the warp receiver on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> very slightly before departing from the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color>. Ramie and I are devising an experiment to test if this is a real phenomenon or simple machine error.
entry.value: PYE: Lô rehîttrô indican que lô nomai yegaron al reçêttôh de dîttorçión de <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color> poco antê de partîh dêdde la <color=orange>Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco</color>. Ramie y yo êttamô diçeñando un êpperimento pa diluçidâh çi êtto çe trata de un fenómeno reâh o de un errôh de máquina.

entry.key: RAMIE: In theory, what we want to try to reproduce is a negative amount of time elapsing between something entering the black hole and exiting the white hole at its destination.
entry.value: RAMIE: En teoría, lo que queremô intentâh reproduçîh êh una cantidá negatiba de tiempo trâccurrío entre el ingreço de argo en el aguhero negro y çu çalida del aguhero blanco en er dêttino.

entry.key: PYE: Initial things first: Our experiment setup will first pair a small black hole core with a small white hole core to mimic the setup on the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color>.
entry.value: PYE: Primero lo iniçiâh: nuêttro êpperimento conêttará un pequeño núcleo de aguhero negro con un pequeño núcleo de aguhero blanco pa imitâh la dîppoçiçión de la <color=orange>Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco</color>.

entry.key: RAMIE: Hypothesis: It is possible for an object to exit a white hole before entering the corresponding black hole.
entry.value: RAMIE: Ipóteçî: Un ôhheto puede çalîh de un aguhero blanco antê de ingreçâh en el aguhero negro corrêppondiente.

entry.key: RAMIE: An update: Our experiment here reproduced the anomaly in arrival and departure times, but Pye is unconvinced it’s more than an equipment error. I hope to strengthen the effect to render it visible to the unaided eyes.
entry.value: RAMIE: Âttualiçaçión: Nuêttro êpperimento logró reproduçîh la anomalía de lô momentô de partida y de yegá, pero Pye aún cree que çolo çe trata de un errôh de máquina. Êppero çêh capâh de reforçâh el efêtto pa que reçurte ebidente a çimple bîtta.

entry.key: PYE: To that end, we’ve decided to try adding more energy. I imagine the <color=orange>Sunless City</color>’s energy supply should prove sufficient.
entry.value: PYE: Pa tar fin, emô deçidío tratâh de agregâh mâh enerhía. Imahino que er çuminîttro enerhético de la <color=orange>Çiudá Çin Çôh</color> debería çêh çufiçiente.

entry.key: PYE: Of note, Ramie: Yarrow requests that we let him know before we reroute energy to the experiment.
entry.value: PYE: De conçideraçión, Ramie: Yarrow çoliçita que lo notifiquemô antê de redirihîh la enerhía al êpperimento.

entry.key: RAMIE: I’d hate to leave him in the dark!
entry.value: RAMIE: ¡No me gûttaría dehâl-lo a ôccurâ!

entry.key: PYE: All available energy has been rerouted from the city to our experiment. Ramie and I are about to run a new test.
entry.value: PYE: Toa la enerhía dîpponible a çido redirihida dêdde la çiudá açia nuêttro êpperimento. Ramie y yo êttamô por iniçiâh una nueba prueba.

entry.key: RAMIE: Hypothesis confirmed! Hypothesis confirmed! I saw it! Pye saw it! Hypothesis confirmed!
entry.value: RAMIE: ¡Ipóteçî confirmá! ¡Ipóteçî confirmá! ¡Lo bi! ¡Pye lo bio! ¡Ipóteçî confirmá!

entry.key: PYE: This is beyond extraordinary! This changes everything! What a beautiful day for the intersection of abstract theory and practical application!
entry.value: PYE: ¡Êtto êh mâh que êttraordinario! ¡Êtto lo cambia tó! ¡Qué día tan marabiyoço pa la interçêççión de la teoría âttrâtta y la aplicaçión práttica!

entry.key: SECCA: Our <color=orange>escape pod</color> crashed as we tried to flee this place, destroying our movement and communication capabilities in the process.
entry.value: ÇÊCCA: Nuêttra <color=orange>cáççula de êccape</color> çe êttreyó cuando intentábamô huîh de êtte lugâh. Perdimô toa capaçidá de mobimiento y comunicaçión a cauça del âççidente.

entry.key: SECCA: We’ve held out as long as we could here, but this pod’s supply of breathable air is nearly depleted, and the anglerfish attack more and more frequently.
entry.value: ÇÊCCA: Aguantamô tó lo que pudimô aquí, pero er çuminîttro de aire rêppirable de la cáççula êttá por agotarçe, y lô rapê nô atacan con mayôh frecuençia cá bêh.

entry.key: SECCA: Our best chance at survival is to return to the <color=orange>Vessel</color> to either repair the damage or, more probably, await rescue.
entry.value: ÇÊCCA: Çi queremô çobrebibîh, nuêttra mehôh ôççión êh regreçâh a la <color=orange>Nabe</color> y reparâh lô dañô o, mâh probablemente, êpperâh ayí a que nô rêccaten.

entry.key: ESCALL: Secca, is the message finished? The <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s beacon is already growing fainter; it will be gone in a matter of hours. We need to leave here, quickly.
entry.value: ÊCCALL: Çêcca, ¿êtte mençahe êttá terminao? La baliça de la <color=orange>Nabe</color> çe êttá debilitando; en cuêttión de orâ, çe apagará por completo. Debemô înnô de aquí aora mîmmo.

entry.key: CANNA: To any Nomai clans whose Vessels can hear this message:
entry.value: CÂNNA: Êtte mençahe êh pa tôh lô clanê nomai con Nabê en funçionamiento:

entry.key: CANNA: It’s clear the universe is dying. There are fewer and fewer resources and safe places within space now, so my clan and I believe the best option is for all of our clans to stay together.
entry.value: CÂNNA: Çabemô que el uniberço êttá muriendo. El êppaçio ya caçi no tiene recurçô ni lugarê çegurô y, por eço, mi clan y yo creemô que la mehôh ôççión êh que tôh lô clanê permanêccamô huntô.

entry.key: CANNA: If you can reach the Gloaming Galaxy, we’ve found that Blackrock’s suns are fairly stable, and life in this star system is (comparatively) thriving. We live in relative safety.
entry.value: CÂNNA: Intenten yegâh a la galâççia Ocaço. Dêccubrimô que lô çolê de Rocanegra çon relatibamente êttablê, y que la bida en êtte çîttema êttelâh (en comparaçión con lô demâh) êh próppera. Goçamô de çierta çeguridá.

entry.key: CANNA: If you prefer to continue exploring alone, know you will be on your own.
entry.value: CÂNNA: Çi prefieren çegîh êpplorando por çu cuenta, no podremô ayudâl-lô.

entry.key: BROMI: Canna, we’re making our way to you.
entry.value: BROMI: Cânna, êttamô yendo en çu dirêççión.

entry.key: CANNA: It’s good to hear from you, Bromi! We’ll watch for your Vessel.
entry.value: CÂNNA: ¡Qué gueno êh êccuxarte, Bromi! Êttaremô atentô a la yegá de çu Nabe.

entry.key: CANNA: Has anyone heard from Neem? His clan was on its way to our Vessel, but they never arrived, and he hasn’t sent any messages. I’m beginning to worry.
entry.value: CÂNNA: ¿Argien tiene notiçiâ de Neem? Çu clan çe dirihía a nuêttra Nabe, pero nunca yegaron y no nô embiaron mençahê... Êttoy empeçando a preocuparme.

entry.key: BROMI: That is unsettling. It reminds me of that old myth my grandfather used to tell, the Disappearance of Escall.
entry.value: BROMI: Çin duda, êh perturbadôh. Me recuerda ar bieho mito que me contaba mi aguelo, er de la deçapariçión de Êccall.

entry.key: CLEM: I remember hearing that story as a child! One day, Escall’s <color=orange>Vessel</color> simply stopped responding. The other clans searched and searched, but found no trace. It was as if their missing friends had warped out of existence.
entry.value: CLEM: ¡Recuerdo abêh êccuxao eça îttoria en mi infançia! Un guen día, la <color=orange>Nabe</color> de Êccall dehó de rêppondêh çin mâh. El rêtto de lô clanê la bûccaron çin çeçâh, pero no encontraron râttrô... Pareçía como çi el êppaçio ubieçe combertío a çû amigô en porbo êttelâh.

entry.key: HYSSOP: That’s no myth, friends; Escall’s clan existed, and their story was real.
entry.value: HISSÔ: No êh un mito, amigô. Er clan de Êccall êççîttió, y la îttoria fue reâh.

entry.key: BROMI: What a curious event to have passed into myth! Our ancestors’ ancestors were told that story when they were young. Are you sure it’s true, Hyssop?
entry.value: BROMI: Êh un ebento demaçiao curioço como pa aberçe combertío en mito. Lô ançêttrô de nuêttrô ançêttrô êccuxaron eça îttoria cuando eran hóbenê... ¿Tienê çerteça de que la îttoria êh reâh, Hissô?
