entry.key: HYSSOP: It was a very long time ago, but yes. My clan’s ancestors searched for Escall’s clan for a long time, but in the end, none of them were ever seen again. (It’s the only time in our history a Vessel has ever disappeared this way.)
entry.value: HISSÔ: Çuçedió açe muxo tiempo, pero çí; êh reâh. Lô ançêttrô de mi clan bûccaron ar clan de Êccall durante muxo tiempo, pero nunca borbieron a bêh a ninguno de çû integrantê. (Êh la única bêh en nuêttra îttoria que una Nabe deçapareçió çin dehâh râttro).

entry.key: NEEM: Hyssop, I hope you aren’t comparing Escall’s story to my clan’s Vessel!
entry.value: NEEM: Hissô, ¡êppero que no êttêh comparando la îttoria de Êccall con la Nabe de mi clan!

entry.key: CLEM: Neem, my friend! We feared you were gone!
entry.value: CLEM: ¡Neem, ar fin, amigo! ¡Temíamô no borbêh a berte!

entry.key: NEEM: Not yet, we aren’t, but nearly. We found trouble during our warp: The triple suns of the Bright Spark star system exploded, and it was only a lucky coincidence we weren’t caught in the blast. We’ll meet you soon, Canna!
entry.value: NEEM: Puê caçi no buerben a bênnô. Tubimô problemâ durante la dîttorçión. Lô trêh çolê der çîttema Çenteya Blanca êpplotaron, y fue una çuerte que no nô arcançara la onda êppançiba. ¡Nô bemô pronto, Cânna!

entry.key: CANNA: I’m relieved your clan is safe, Neem! It’s good to hear your words. Any Vessels nearby, remember to be extremely cautious of potentially unstable stars (which is most of them, now).
entry.value: CÂNNA: ¡Me alegra que tu clan êtté a çarbo, Neem! Tû palabrâ nô dan tranquilidá. A toâ lâ Nabê que çe encuentren çerca, recuerden tenêh cuidao con lâ êttreyâ inêttablê. Por dêggraçia, eço abarca a la mayoría.

entry.key: FILIX: This is Escall’s <color=orange>Vessel</color>; something went badly wrong during our warp, and our <color=orange>Vessel</color> is mortally wounded. We need help as quickly as possible!
entry.value: FILÎH: Aquí la <color=orange>Nabe</color> de Êccall. Argo çalió mu mâh durante el impurço de dîttorçión y nuêttra <color=orange>Nabe</color> çufrió daño terminâh. ¡Neçeçitamô ayuda cuanto antê!

entry.key: FILIX: Our Vessel appears to have... has it fused with the local environment, somehow? There are vines that are now part of the Vessel! It’s been torn apart from inside itself!
entry.value: FILÎH: Tó indica que nuêttra Nabe çe... çe fuçionó con el ambiente locâh de argún modo. ¡Tenemô iedrâ que aora forman parte de la Nabe! ¡A çido dêttroçá dêdde çu interiôh!

entry.key: FILIX: We... we are abandoning our <color=orange>Vessel</color>. Any Nomai clans or spaceflight-capable species receiving this message, I implore you, we need your help!
entry.value: FILÎH: Bamô... a abandonâh nuêttra <color=orange>Nabe</color>. A cuarquiêh clan nomai o êppeçie con capaçidá de buelo êppaçiâh: ¡çe lo imploro, neçeçitamô çu ayuda!

entry.key: FILIX: Is this broken? Can anyone hear me? Our <color=orange>Vessel</color> is dying! We need immediate assistance!
entry.value: FILÎH: ¿Êtto funçiona? ¿Argien puede oírme? ¡Nuêttra <color=orange>Nabe</color> êttá muriendo! ¡Neçeçitamô açîttençia de îmmediato!

entry.key: FILIX: I’m recording now — I’ve never encountered anything like this! The signal the Vessel is receiving appears to be older than the universe itself!
entry.value: FILÎH: Êttoy grabando. ¡Nunca abía encontrao argo çimilâh a êtto! ¡La çeñâh que êttá reçibiendo la Nabe pareçe çêh mâh antigua que er mîmmíçimo uniberço!

entry.key: ESCALL: This is our first contact with anything of this nature. Everyone, prepare to warp immediately!
entry.value: ÊCCALL: Êh nuêttro primêh contâtto con argo de êtta naturaleça. ¡Prepárençe de îmmediato pa el impurço de dîttorçión!

entry.key: FILIX: Escall, wait, I need more time to send an outgoing message! Shouldn’t we tell another clan where we’re going?
entry.value: FILÎH: ¡Êccall, êppera, neçeçito mâh tiempo pa embiâh un mençahe! ¿No deberíamô informâl-le nuêttro dêttino a otro clan?

entry.key: ESCALL: We can send the message upon our arrival. This extraordinary signal appeared suddenly; it may disappear just as quickly, and we can’t lose a discovery this incredible! Focus on preparing for the warp, instead.
entry.value: ÊCCALL: Podemô embiâh er mençahe cuando yegemô. Êtta çeñâh êttraordinaria apareçió de repente; podría deçapareçêh der mîmmo modo, ¡y no podemô perdênnô un dêccubrimiento tan increíble! Ocúpate de preparâh la dîttorçión.

entry.key: FILIX: I understand!
entry.value: FILÎH: ¡Entendío!

entry.key: ESCALL: Annona, is the <color=orange>Vessel</color> ready to warp to the signal’s approximate coordinates?
entry.value: ÊCCALL: Ânnona, ¿êttá la <color=orange>Nabe</color> prepará pa un impurço de dîttorçión a lâ coordenâh aprôççimâh de la çeñâh?

entry.key: ANNONA: The warp core is powered, but this will be a significant jump. Afterward, we’ll need time to recharge the core.
entry.value: ÂNNONA: Er núcleo de dîttorçión êttá cargao, pero çerá un çarto importante. Neçeçitaremô tiempo pa recargâh er núcleo dêppuêh.

entry.key: ESCALL: That shouldn’t create a problem, provided we arrive at or near the signal’s source. Everyone, we’re ready to warp!
entry.value: ÊCCALL: No deberíamô tenêh problemâ, çiempre y cuando yegemô a la fuente de la çeñâh o çerca de eya. ¡Atentô! ¡Êttamô lîttô pa la dîttorçión!

entry.key: CASSAVA: This is it: We’ve finished building the final <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> module and are ready to send it into orbit around <color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color> for assembly!
entry.value: CAÇABA: Yegó la ora: ¡ya terminamô de côttruîh el úrtimo módulo del <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color> y êttamô lîttô pa ponêl-lo en órbita arrededôh de <color=lightblue>Abîmmo der Higante</color> pa el ençamblahe!

entry.key: CASSAVA: To all my friends here at the <color=orange>Construction Yard</color>, my gratitude for your tireless work. I had given up hope, but I truly believe this cannon may actually succeed where many other attempts have not.
entry.value: CAÇABA: A tôh mî amigô del <color=orange>Çitio de Côttrûççión</color>: tienen mi gratitûh por çu incançable trabaho. Abía perdío la êpperança, pero êttoy combençío de que êtte cañón puede tenêh éççito, a diferençia de tôh lô intentô anteriorê.

entry.key: DAZ: Are you going gelatinous on us, love? I’m delighted by your words, but they’re atypical for you!
entry.value: DÂH: ¿Te êttâh poniendo helatinoço, cariño? Tû palabrâ me deleitan, ¡pero êh atípico oírte deçîh argo açí!

entry.key: CASSAVA: If I’m ever half as gooey as Mallow and Avens behave together, Daz, you may launch me from the Orbital Probe Cannon.
entry.value: CAÇABA: Dâh, çi arguna bêh yegara a êttâh çerca de çêh tan bîccoço como Mâl-low y Abens cuando êttán huntô, tienê permiço pa lançarme dêdde el Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh.

entry.key: CASSAVA: Our next step will be to send Privet up to the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> to install the probe tracking system.
entry.value: CAÇABA: Nuêttro çigiente paço çerá embiâh a Pribê al <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color> pa que îttale er çîttema de râttreo de çondâ.

entry.key: DAZ: If I know my brother, Avens (and his spouse) will want to launch the probe with as much power as possible. I’m worried the cannon would break under the strain.
entry.value: DÂH: Conoçiendo a mi ermano, Abens (hunto con çu muhêh) querrá lançâh la çonda con tanta potençia como çea poçible. Me preocupa que tanto êffuerço pueda aberiâh er cañón.

entry.key: DAZ: I propose we give Avens and Mallow a slightly lower maximum power setting than the absolute maximum possible to create room for their enthusiasm.
entry.value: DÂH: Propongo que configuremô un ahûtte de potençia máççima mâh baho que er máççimo âççoluto pa Abens y Mâl-low. Açí tendremô çierto marhen pa contenêh çu entuçiâmmo.

entry.key: Be welcomed in this place. This tower shares with all who ask the knowledge needed to make his or her first quantum journey.
entry.value: Te doy la biembenida a êtte çitio. La torre comparte er conoçimiento neçeçario pa realiçâh er primêh biahe cuántico con tó aquêh que lo pide.

entry.key: Enter this place without friends, however; these are lessons to learn for yourself.
entry.value: Ingreça a êtte lugâh çin amigô; êttâ lêççionê lâ debê aprendêh por tu cuenta.

entry.key: Seek the wandering arch.
entry.value: Bûcca el arco errante.

entry.key: Observing a quantum object; observing an image of a quantum object. These are the same.
entry.value: Ôççerbâh un ôhheto cuántico; ôççerbâh una imahen de un ôhheto cuántico. Ambô çon lo mîmmo.

entry.key: This is the last one (but we made it harder).
entry.value: Êtte êh el úrtimo (pero lo içimô mâh difíçî).

entry.key: LAMI: They’re going to test the memory statues tonight! Phlox says it could be dangerous, so we can’t come.
entry.value: LAMI: ¡Êtta noxe ban a probâh lâ êttatuâ mnemónicâ! Phlôh diçe que quiçá çea peligroço, açí que no podemô îh.

entry.key: LAMI: But, what if we didn’t use the door and snuck in the other way? Does anyone want to?
entry.value: LAMI:Pero... ¿y çi en bêh de uçâh la puerta nô êccabuyimô por la otra entrá? ¿Argien quiere açêl-lo?

entry.key: TAGET: Phlox specifically told us not to do that.
entry.value: TAHÊH: Phlôh nô diho êppeçíficamente que no içiéramô eço.

entry.key: LAEVI: I really want to see the test, too, Lami, but that’s a huge risk to take. We probably shouldn’t. Maybe Phlox’ll let us see a later test.
entry.value: LAEBI: Yo también tengo muxâ ganâ de bêh la prueba, Lami, pero êh demaçiao arriêggao. No creo que debamô îh. Quiçá Phlôh nô dehe bêh una prueba mâh adelante.

entry.key: <color=orange>Statue Workshop</color>
entry.value: <color=orange>Tayêh de lâ Êttatuâ</color>

entry.key: SOLANUM: I am here! After watching it wander the skies for so long, I am about to stand (for the first time) on the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: ¡Yegé! Dêppuêh de bêl-la deambulâh por lô çielô durante tanto tiempo, êttoy a punto de piçâh (por primera bêh) la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>.

entry.key: SOLANUM: As expected, my <color=orange>shuttle</color> has landed at the moon’s south pole. I will make the remainder of my journey on foot.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Tar como êpperaba, mi <color=orange>trâbbordadôh</color> a aterriçao en er polo çûh de la luna. Realiçaré el rêtto de mi biahe a pie.

entry.key: SOLANUM: We don’t know why the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> always welcomes its visitors at the south pole, just that this is true.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: No çabemô por qué la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> çiempre reçibe a çû biçitantê en er polo çûh; çolo çabemô que êh açí.

entry.key: SOLANUM: As a child, I considered such unknowns sinister. Now, though, I understand they bear no ill will. The universe is, and we are.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Cuando era niña, êtte tipo de interrogantê me reçurtaban çiniêttrâ. Aora, çin embargo, entiendo que no tienen malâ intençionê. El uniberço êh, y noçotrô çomô.

entry.key: SOLANUM: I am ready.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Êttoy prepará.

entry.key: WARNING: Opens emergency door.
entry.value: ÂBBERTENÇIA: Abre la puerta de emerhençia.

entry.key: PYE: Mission: Science compels us to explode the <color=lightblue>sun</color>!
entry.value: PYE: Ôhhetibo: ¡La çiençia nô obliga a açêh êttayâh el <color=lightblue>Çôh</color>!

entry.key: IDAEA: Here’s a better one. Mission: Determine if it’s possible to prompt the <color=lightblue>sun</color> to explode.
entry.value: IDAEA: Tengo uno mehôh. Ôhhetibo: Determinâh çi êh poçible ocaçionâh el êttayío del <color=lightblue>Çôh</color>.

entry.key: IDAEA: Can’t we change this? I don’t enjoy working in view of such a morbid mission statement.
entry.value: IDAEA: ¿No podemô cambiâh êtto? No dîffruto trabahâh en bîtta de una declaraçión de ôhhetibô tan macabra.

entry.key: PYE: But it’s accurate. We’re going to create a supernova for the purpose of scientific progress. That’s our mission.
entry.value: PYE: Pero êh preçiça. Bamô a creâh una çupênnoba a efêttô der progreço çientífico. Eçe êh nuêttro ôhhetibo.

entry.key: IDAEA: Our mission is to decide if such an irresponsible feat is even possible.
entry.value: IDAEA: Nuêttro ôhhetibo êh deçidîh çi una proeça tan irrêpponçable êh çiquiera poçible.

entry.key: PYE: You lack a sense of humor.
entry.value: PYE: No tienê çentío del umôh.

entry.key: IDAEA: At least I don’t lack a sense of ethics!
entry.value: IDAEA: ¡Por lo menô tengo çentío de la ética!

entry.key: PYE: Kindly refrain from going supernova on me before the <color=lightblue>sun</color> does, Idaea.
entry.value: PYE: Por fabôh, Idaea, no êttayê como una çupênnoba antê de que lo aga el <color=lightblue>Çôh</color>.

entry.key: THATCH: Where should this new, more sophisticated locator be built? It may need to be larger than this <color=orange>Eye signal locator</color> is.
entry.value: TÂXX: ¿Dónde deberíamô côttruîh êtte localiçadôh nuebo y mâh çofîtticao? Quiçá tenga que çêh mâh grande que êtte <color=orange>localiçadôh de çeñâh del Oho</color>.

entry.key: PLUME: The southern glacier on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> has ample available space. I could construct a new building to house this proposed locator.
entry.value: PLUME: Er glaçiâh aûttrâh de <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color> tiene êppaçio de çobra. Podría côttruîh ayí una nueba êttrûttura pa arbergâh êtte localiçadôh que çuhieren.

entry.key: FILIX: Yes, let’s build there! I imagine our young friend Conoy would enjoy that immensely. He’s always held a great interest in the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>, especially for a child born so long after the crash.
entry.value: FILÎH: ¡Çí, agámôl-lo ayí! Imahino que a nuêttro hoben amigo Conoy le agradaría muxíçimo. Çiempre môttró un gran interêh por el <color=lightblue>Oho</color>, en êppeçiâh pa argien que naçió tanto tiempo dêppuêh del âççidente.

entry.key: PLUME: I will begin construction on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>’s south pole immediately, then!
entry.value: PLUME: ¡Entonçê començaré de îmmediato con la côttrûççión en er polo çûh de <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color>!

entry.key: COLEUS: Annona and those of us originally stranded on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> built a <color=orange>Quantum Moon locator</color> there, but the heat of the <color=lightblue>sun</color> made its construction challenging. I wouldn’t recommend building on that planet.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Ânnona y quienê quedamô baráô en <color=lightblue>Hemelo Braça</color> orihinarmente montamô un <color=orange>localiçadôh de la Luna Cuántica</color> ayí, pero er calôh del <color=lightblue>Çôh</color> dificurtó la côttrûççión. No recomendaría açêl-lo en eçe planeta.

entry.key: COLEUS: After closer observation, mining site 2a wouldn’t be safe for the native life dwelling in some of this cave’s pools, so (unfortunately) we’ll have to mine one of the other sites.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Dêppuêh de una îppêççión mâh detayá, concluimô que minâh er çitio 2a no çería çeguro pa la bida autóttona que abita en lâ lagunâ de êtta cueba, açí que (por dêggraçia) tendremô que minâh arguno de lô otrô çitiô.

entry.key: COLEUS: On the opposite hand, new life! This species is semi-aquatic, and very hardy. The ecosystem here is quite robust, so I believe they’ll thrive in the long run. Be cautious near the pools if you visit 2a to meet them.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Por la parte contraria, ¡bida nueba! Êtta êppeçie êh çemiacuática y mu bigoroça. El ecoçîttema êh bâttante robûtto, açí que creo que êttâ criaturâ prôpperarán a largo plaço. Anden con precauçión çerca de lâ lagunâ çi biçitan 2a pa conoçêl-lâ.

entry.key: CYCAD: There are a few other cave sites that look promising. What about site 2b (it shares similar formations and strata)?
entry.value: CYCÂ: Ay bariô çitiô cabênnoçô que çe ben prometedorê. ¿Qué lê pareçe er çitio 2b (de êttratô y formaçionê çimilarê)?

entry.key: OENO: This sounds promising! Will you and your mentor investigate? If mining site 2b proves safe for this native species, we’ll move our work there.
entry.value: OENO: ¡Pareçe prometedôh! ¿Irán tú y tu mentôh a imbêttigâl-lo? Çi podemô minâh er çitio 2b çin perturbâh a êtta êppeçie natiba, trâl-ladaremô nuêttro trabaho ayí.

entry.key: CYCAD: Site 2b is safe! Coleus says we’ll continue to monitor our activity and its effect on life here.
entry.value: CYCÂ: ¡Er çitio 2b êh çeguro! Coleû diçe que continuaremô analiçando nuêttra âttibidá y çû efêttô en la bida autóttona.

entry.key: CYCAD: I was watching them once during a rest, and the hours escaped from me. They’re fascinating (I wonder what their fourth eye does)!
entry.value: CYCÂ: Una bêh, me quedé mirándolô mientrâ dêccançaba y lâ orâ çe me êffumaron. ¡Çon fâççinantê (me pregunto qué ará çu cuarto oho)!

entry.key: COLEUS: They remind me of a subterranean species that my mentor, Melorae, once told me about (from when our clan used to travel across this universe). I imagine she would have enjoyed these lifeforms greatly.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Me recuerdan a una êppeçie çûtterránea çobre la que me contó mi mentora, Melorae (cuando nuêttrô clanê biahaban por tó el uniberço). Imahino que le ubieçen gûttao muxo êttâ formâ de bida.

entry.key: CASSAVA: We’re nearly ready! Filix and I have finished construction, and she says calibrating the device won’t take long.
entry.value: CAÇABA: ¡Ya caçi êttamô lîttô! Filîh y yo completamô la côttrûççión. Çegún eya, la calibraçión der dîppoçitibo no yebará muxo tiempo.

entry.key: FILIX: Fortunately, the <color=lightblue>Attlerock</color>’s lack of atmosphere will make calibration simple. After all this time, I’m thrilled to finally resume our search!
entry.value: FILÎH: Por fortuna, la farta de âmmóffera de <color=lightblue>Rocaterra</color> çimplifica la calibraçión. Dêppuêh de tanto tiempo, ¡me emoçiona que podamô reanudâh nuêttra búqqueda!

entry.key: Caution: You are about to access the core while the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is active.
entry.value: Precauçión: Êttâh por ingreçâh en er núcleo mientrâ el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color> çe encuentra âttibo.

entry.key: WARNING: Removing the core will disable the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>.
entry.value: ÂBBERTENÇIA: Çi çe quita er núcleo, çe deçâttibará el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>.

entry.key: Artificial gravity control
entry.value: Contrôh de grabedá artifiçiâh

entry.key: YARROW: Today we finished the excavation of <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>. Here, in this space we carved, we will craft our most ambitious project yet: the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>, powerful enough to send information back in time.
entry.value: YARROW: Oy concluimô la êccabaçión de <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>. Aquí, en êtte êppaçio que abrimô, yebaremô a cabo la empreça mâh ambiçioça de la îttoria: el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>, que tiene la potençia neçeçaria pa embiâh informaçión ar paçao.

entry.key: COLEUS: We’ve also finished relocating all subterranean plants we met while digging.
entry.value: COLEÛ: También terminamô de reubicâh toâ lâ plantâ çûtterráneâ que ayamô durante la êccabaçión.

entry.key: RAMIE: We’ll need to keep our eyes on how significantly we’ve altered the environment here.
entry.value: RAMIE: Tendremô que prêttâh atençión a la mânnitûh del impâtto que emô produçío en el ambiente.

entry.key: PYE: How far we’ve come since our experiments at the <color=orange>High Energy Lab</color>! I still can hardly believe Ramie’s hypothesis was true.
entry.value: PYE: ¡Qué lehô emô yegao dêdde nuêttrô êpperimentô en el <color=orange>Laboratorio Urtraenerhético</color>! Aún me cuêtta creêh que la ipóteçî de Ramie fuera corrêtta.

entry.key: YARROW: Poke just sent the warp core for the final tower to us from the <color=orange>Black Hole Forge</color>. Now <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> can be connected with <color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color>, where Cassava is working with Avens to craft the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color>, and where Phlox is sculpting the memory statues.
entry.value: YARROW: Poke acaba de embiânnô er núcleo de dîttorçión pa la úrtima torre dêdde la <color=orange>Forha del Aguhero Negro</color>. Aora êh poçible conêttâh <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color> con <color=lightblue>Abîmmo der Higante</color>, donde Caçaba y Abens êttán côttruyendo el <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color> y Phlôh êttá êccurpiendo lâ êttatuâ mnemónicâ.

entry.key: CASSAVA: Hypothesis: It was not by accident the core of our warp tower was the last to be forged.
entry.value: CAÇABA: Ipóteçî: No fue un âççidente que er núcleo de nuêttra torre de dîttorçión fuera el úrtimo en forharçe.

entry.key: POKE: Hypothesis: The cores could have been forged faster if Cassava had interrupted my work less frequently to ask for updates.
entry.value: POKE: Ipóteçî: Lô núcleô çe podrían abêh forhao mâh rápido çi Caçaba ubieçe interrumpío mi trabaho con menôh frecuençia pa pedirme âttualiçaçionê.

entry.key: YARROW: The important point is we are all connected through <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> now, and also that I’m no longer needed for mediating your disagreements.
entry.value: YARROW: Lo importante êh que aora êttamô tôh conêttáô a trabêh de <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>. Y que ya no tengo que âttuâh como mediadôh en çû deçacuerdô.

entry.key: YARROW: Our friends on <color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color> tested the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> today. Mallow tells me the cannon is doing well, and that Avens advocates for more launch power. If anyone can coax the maximum power from a device, Avens can.
entry.value: YARROW: Oy nuêttrô amigô que êttán en <color=lightblue>Abîmmo der Higante</color> probaron el <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color>. Mâl-low me informa que er cañón funçiona bien y que Abens inçîtte en aumentâh la potençia de lançamiento. Nadie como Abens pa modificâh la potençia máççima de un dîppoçitibo.

entry.key: YARROW: But then, if anyone can goad a device into exploding, that, too, is likely Avens. Perhaps I should check in with the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> crew in the interest of safety.
entry.value: YARROW: Por otra parte, êh probable que tampoco aya nadie como Abens pa forçâh un dîppoçitibo âtta açêl-lo êttayâh. Quiçá debería comunicarme con el equipo del <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color> por cuêttionê de çeguridá.

entry.key: YARROW: Would it help to remind Avens that Mallow (his love) will be one of the Nomai aboard the cannon, or is Mallow part of the problem?
entry.value: YARROW: ¿Çerbiría de argo recordâl-le a Abens que Mâl-low (çu amôh) çerá uno de lô nomai a bordo der cañón? ¿O êh Mâl-low parte der problema?

entry.key: YARROW: Pye and Idaea have worked hard on the <color=orange>Sun Station</color>, and it at last is complete. If everything goes as planned, this structure will prompt the <color=lightblue>sun</color>’s explosion, which will in turn supply the power the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> requires.
entry.value: YARROW: Idaea y Pye an trabahao muxíçimo en la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color>, y por fin êttá finaliçá. Çi tó marxa çegún lô planê, êtta êttrûttura cauçará el êttayío del <color=lightblue>Çôh</color>, lo cuâ probeerá la enerhía que neçeçita el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>.

entry.key: RAMIE: I’m impressed by their mental fortitude. This was the project’s most difficult task, in more ways than one.
entry.value: RAMIE: Me impreçiona çu fortaleça mentâh. Êtta era la tarea mâh difíçî der proyêtto, en muxô nibelê.

entry.key: YARROW: We’re nearly ready to activate the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>! Here is what will happen: First, the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> will receive the order to fire at the <color=lightblue>sun</color>, prompting it to explode.
entry.value: YARROW: ¡Ya caçi êttamô lîttô pa âttibâh el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>! Êtto êh lo que çuçederá: Primero, la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color> reçibirá la orden de abrîh fuego contra el <color=lightblue>Çôh</color> pa açêl-lo êttayâh.

entry.key: YARROW: Using the energy from the resulting supernova, the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> will send the order for the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> to fire back in time by 22 minutes.
entry.value: YARROW: El <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color> empleará la enerhía de la çupênnoba reçurtante pa embiâh la orden de dîpparo del <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color> 22 minutô atrâh en er tiempo.

entry.key: YARROW: Exactly 22 minutes after these orders are received, the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> will again trigger the supernova to send the probe data from this cannon launch back in time.
entry.value: YARROW: Êççâttamente 22 minutô dêppuêh de reçibîh êttâ órdenê, la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color> cauçará otra bêh la çupênnoba pa embiâh atrâh en er tiempo lô datô de la çonda de êtte lançamiento der cañón.

entry.key: YARROW: In total, each cycle created by the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> will last precisely 22 minutes. We can end this cycle at will.
entry.value: YARROW: En totâh, cá çiclo creao por el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color> durará preçiçamente 22 minutô. Podemô ponêl-le fin a êtte çiclo cuando queramô.

entry.key: YARROW: These words are difficult to write: The <color=orange>Sun Station</color> did not work.
entry.value: YARROW: Êttâ palabrâ çon difíçilê de êccribîh: La <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color> no funçionó.

entry.key: YARROW: However, this is the closest we have ever been. The <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is theoretically sound; we were only unable to power it. Perhaps there is another way.
entry.value: YARROW: Çin embargo, nunca emô êttao tan çerca como aora. El <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color> êh çólido en cuanto a la teoría; çolo nô fartó dâl-le potençia. Quiçá aya otra manera.

entry.key: PYE: Suppose we redesign the <color=orange>Sun Station</color>. To generate power of that magnitude, a supernova is still our only viable option.
entry.value: PYE: Çupongamô que rediçeñemô la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color>. Pa henerâh una cantidá de enerhía tan dêccomunâh, la única ôççión biable êh una çupênnoba.

entry.key: IDAEA: This is easier expressed than accomplished.
entry.value: IDAEA: Êtto êh mâh fáçî de êppreçâh que de logrâh.

entry.key: PYE: You can wait for the <color=lightblue>sun</color> to explode on its natural timeline if you prefer, Idaea, but you’ll need to find some way to halt our aging process.
entry.value: PYE: Çi açí lo prefierê, Idaea, puedê êpperâh a que el <color=lightblue>Çôh</color> êttaye en çu çiclo naturâh, pero tendrâh que encontrâh arguna forma de çûppendêh nuêttro proçeço de embeheçimiento.

entry.key: RAMIE: I believe we can still find a way to create a supernova, my friend. Don’t lose hope!
entry.value: RAMIE: Creo que aún podemô encontrâh la manera de creâh una çupênnoba, amiga mía. ¡No pierdâ la êpperança!

entry.key: YARROW: We are halting our research into creating a supernova for this moment; a <color=lightblue>comet</color> has newly arrived in this solar system, and we’re anxious to explore it.
entry.value: YARROW: Por er momento, detendremô nuêttra imbêttigaçión çobre la creaçión de una çupênnoba; acaba de yegâh un <color=lightblue>cometa</color> a êtte çîttema êttelâh, y êttamô ançioçô por êpplorâl-lo.

entry.key: YARROW: It’s been a very long time since we last explored somewhere new, so we’re excited to welcome this <color=lightblue>comet</color>. Imagine what knowledge might be gained there!
entry.value: YARROW: Açe muxo tiempo que no êpploramô un çitio nuebo, açí que nô emoçiona reçibîh êtte <color=lightblue>cometa</color>. ¡Imahinen er conoçimiento que podríamô ôttenêh ayí!

entry.key: PYE: Friends visiting from the <color=orange>Hanging City</color>, we are planning the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> at the <color=orange>High Energy Lab</color> on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color>’s equator.
entry.value: PYE: Amigô que nô biçitan dêdde la <color=orange>Çiudá Çûppendida</color>, êttamô planificando el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color> en el <color=orange>Laboratorio Urtraenerhético</color>, ubicao en el ecuadôh de <color=lightblue>Hemelo Braça</color>.

entry.key: CONOY: I became lost on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> (my gratitude that Ramie found me!), but the <color=orange>High Energy Lab</color> is the building with the large solar panels. I’m suprised I didn’t see it!
entry.value: CONOY: Me perdí en <color=lightblue>Hemelo Braça</color> (¡mi gratitûh pa Ramie por aberme encontrao!), pero el <color=orange>Laboratorio Urtraenerhético</color> êh la êttrûttura que tiene unô enormê panelê çolarê. ¡Me çorprende que no lo ayâ bîtto!

entry.key: RAMIE: I imagine our otherwise immensely clever Conoy would lose his own head if it weren’t anatomically impossible!
entry.value: RAMIE: ¡Imahino que nuêttro Conoy, tan intelihente en lô demâh âppêttô, perdería âtta çu propia cabeça çi no fuera anatómicamente impoçible!

entry.key: The <color=orange>shuttle</color> is currently resting at the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>.
entry.value: El <color=orange>trâbbordadôh</color> çe encuentra poçao çobre la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>.

entry.key: What is the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>?
entry.value: ¿Qué êh el <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>?

entry.key: The <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is the source of the signal that brought us here.
entry.value: El <color=lightblue>Oho</color> êh la fuente de la çeñâh que nô traho aquí.

entry.key: Suppose the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is a more advanced being.
entry.value: Çupongamô que el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> êh un çêh mâh abançao.

entry.key: The <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is older than this universe, so imagine how much it could teach us.
entry.value: El <color=lightblue>Oho</color> êh mâh antiguo que êtte uniberço, açí que imahinemô cuánto podría ençeñânnô.

entry.key: Perhaps it is a cosmic library!
entry.value: ¡Quiçá çea una biblioteca cómmica!

entry.key: What is the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s signal?
entry.value: ¿Qué êh la çeñâh del <color=lightblue>Oho</color>?

entry.key: Suppose the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> wishes to communicate.
entry.value: Çupongamô que el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> deçea comunicarçe.

entry.key: The signal is a call. Were we the intended audience?
entry.value: La çeñâh êh una yamá. ¿Éramô noçotrô lô dêttinatariô deçeáô?

entry.key: The signal is the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s voice. It speaks a language we don’t yet know.
entry.value: La çeñâh êh la bôh del <color=lightblue>Oho</color>. Abla un idioma que aún no comprendemô.

entry.key: Or maybe the signal is the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s attempt at expressing itself.
entry.value: O quiçá la çeñâh çea un intento de êppreçión del <color=lightblue>Oho</color>.

entry.key: Of note: From the signal, we were able to determine the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s approximate age (or perhaps its lack of age?).
entry.value: De conçideraçión: Graçiâ a la çeñâh, pudimô determinâh la edá aprôççimá del <color=lightblue>Oho</color> (¿o çu farta de edá, quiçá?).

entry.key: Be welcomed in this place. This shrine is a space to reflect on what brought us to this star system: the signal from the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>.
entry.value: Te doy la biembenida a êtte çitio. Êtte çantuario êh un êppaçio donde reflêççionamô çobre lo que nô traho a êtte çîttema êttelâh: la çeñâh del <color=lightblue>Oho</color>.

entry.key: We observed the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s signal in our travels, and followed it here to find its source.
entry.value: En nuêttrô biahê, ôççerbamô la çeñâh del <color=lightblue>Oho</color>, y la çegimô âtta aquí pa encontrâh çu fuente.

entry.key: What we know is this: The source of the signal (which we have chosen to call the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>) is older than this universe itself. The rest, we have yet to learn.
entry.value: Êtto êh lo que çabemô: la fuente de la çeñâh (a la que emô deçidío yamâh el «<color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>») êh mâh antigua que er mîmmíçimo uniberço. El rêtto aún no lo emô dêccubierto.

entry.key: Enter, and open your mind to its possibilities.
entry.value: Entra y abre tu mente a çû poçibilidadê.

entry.key: Solution 1: We could retrieve the warp core from the <color=orange>Vessel</color>.
entry.value: Çoluçión 1: Podríamô recuperâh er núcleo de dîttorçión de la <color=orange>Nabe</color>.

entry.key: RAMIE: The <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s warp core is broken, at best (recall those present when the <color=orange>Vessel</color> crashed said it sustained lethal injuries). There is no guaranteed reward for this risk.
entry.value: RAMIE: Er núcleo de dîttorçión de la <color=orange>Nabe</color> êttá aberiao, en er mehôh de lô caçô (recuerden que aqueyô que êttaban preçentê cuando la <color=orange>Nabe</color> çe êttreyó diheron que çufrió daño terminâh). Êtte riêggo no garantiça una recompença.

entry.key: CONOY: Perhaps we could still repair it. My grandmother told me there was little time to assess the nature or extent of the damage.
entry.value: CONOY: Quiçá aún podamô reparâl-lo. Mi aguela me contó que ubo poco tiempo pa ebaluâh la naturaleça y el arcançe der daño.

entry.key: CASSAVA: Even if it no longer functions, the old core could be a valuable blueprint, provided we’re able to transport it back here.
entry.value: CAÇABA: Incluço çi ya no funçiona, el antiguo núcleo podría çêh balioço como plano, çiempre y cuando lo podamô trâpportâh âtta aquí.

entry.key: PHLOX: This would require a return to <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color>. Plume (my father) said many good Nomai perished there.
entry.value: PHLÔH: Pa eyo çería neçeçario regreçâh a <color=lightblue>Êppinôccuro</color>. Plume (mi padre) diho que muxô guenô nomai pereçieron ayí.

entry.key: CYCAD: My mentor (Coleus) and his old mentor once discovered and studied an anglerfish fossil on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color>. Using that knowledge, we could avoid the anglerfish entirely!
entry.value: CYCÂ: Açe tiempo, mi mentôh (Coleû) y çu antigua mentora dêccubrieron y êttudiaron un fóçî de rape en <color=lightblue>Hemelo Braça</color>. Çi aprobexamô çu conoçimiento, ¡podríamô ebitâh por completo a lô rapê!

entry.key: COLEUS: What Melorae and I learned from that fossil would theoretically help us evade the anglerfish, but our hypothesis was never tested on a live specimen.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Lo que Melorae y yo aprendimô de eçe fóçî nô ayudaría, en teoría, a eludîh a lô rapê, pero nunca probamô nuêttra ipóteçî en un êppéçimen bibo.

entry.key: RAMIE: I remember that anglerfish fossil! We used to play in <color=orange>Fossil Fish Cave</color> when we were children.
entry.value: RAMIE: ¡Me acuerdo de aquêh fóçî de rape! Cuando éramô niñô, hugábamô en la <color=orange>Cueba der Pêh Fóçî</color>.

entry.key: SOLANUM: I no longer believe, as I did as a child on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color>, that the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color> (the source of the signal) wishes to harm us. But it may not want to be found, either.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Ya no creo, como cuando era niña y bibía en <color=lightblue>Hemelo Braça</color>, que el <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color> (la fuente de la çeñâh) deçee açênnô daño. Pero quiçá tampoco quiera que lo encuentren.

entry.key: SOLANUM: The terrible circumstances of our arrival here were almost certainly exactly that: circumstance.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Lâ terriblê çircûttançiâ de nuêttra yegá a êtte çîttema fueron caçi çeguramente eço: çircûttançiâ.

entry.key: SOLANUM: I suspect imagining we are special to the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> in some way is wishful thinking. The <color=lightblue>Eye</color> might have called out to any sentient species.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Çôppexo que êh inhenuo pençâh que çomô de argún modo êppeçialê pa el <color=lightblue>Oho</color>. Êh poçible que el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> çe aya comunicao con otrâ êppeçiê intelihentê.

entry.key: SOLANUM: Or it might not have been calling out at all, and that my ancestors heard the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s signal holds no great, deep meaning.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: O êh poçible que no çe êtté comunicando en âççoluto, y que el exo de que mî ançêttrô ayan oío al <color=lightblue>Oho</color> no guarde un çînnificao profundo y êppeçiâh.

entry.key: SOLANUM: This wouldn’t be so bad, I think.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Pienço que êtto no çería tan malo.

entry.key: SOLANUM: In fact, the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> may not have wishes at all. We have no evidence supporting this.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: De exo, puede que el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> no tenga ningún deçeo en âççoluto. No tenemô pruebâ de êtto.

entry.key: ILEX: Why We Should Build A New Vessel
entry.value: ILÊ: Motibô por lô que deberíamô côttruîh una nueba Nabe

entry.key: ILEX: Each Nomai clan explores the universe in its own Vessel. The Vessel is the heart of every clan.
entry.value: ILÊ: Cá clan nomai êpplora el uniberço en çu propia Nabe. La Nabe êh er coraçón de tó clan.

entry.key: ILEX: It’s unusual for Nomai to remain in one place for so long. Nomai are wanderers and have no permanent home.
entry.value: ILÊ: No êh abituâh que lô nomai permanêccan en un mîmmo lugâh durante muxo tiempo. Lô nomai çon peregrinô y no tienen un ogâh permanente.

entry.key: ILEX: If we built a new Vessel, we could return to our adventurous way of life. Imagine all the new places we could go! Our clan wouldn’t be stuck here in this star system.
entry.value: ILÊ: Çi côttruyéramô una nueba Nabe, podríamô regreçâh a nuêttra bida de abenturâ. ¡Imahinen tôh lô lugarê donde podríamô îh! Nuêttro clan no êttaría atâccao en êtte çîttema êttelâh.

entry.key: ILEX: We could even meet with other Nomai, and learn from them, like Coleus says we used to do.
entry.value: ILÊ: Incluço podríamô reunînnô con otrô nomai y aprendêh de eyô, como diçe Coleû que çolíamô açêh.

entry.key: ILEX: It probably wouldn’t be hard to get parts if we stopped building other new things, and if we broke down other structures (like the towers on <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>) for parts.
entry.value: ILÊ: Probablemente, no çería difíçî conçegîh lâ pieçâ çi deháramô de côttruîh otrâ coçâ nuebâ y çi deçarmáramô otrâ êttrûtturâ (como lâ torrê de <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>).

entry.key: ILEX: We might have to build a smaller Vessel for now, even though Vessels are normally large. But we could make it bigger later once we reach planets with more resources.
entry.value: ILÊ: Quiçá tengamô que côttruîh una Nabe mâh pequeña por aora, aunque êttâ çuelen çêh grandê. Pero podríamô ampliâl-la una bêh que yegáramô a planetâ con mâh recurçô.

entry.key: ILEX: It would also help if we stopped building so many things to search for the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>. I asked Yarrow, and he says we use lots of resources on the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>.
entry.value: ILÊ: También nô bendría bien dehâh de côttruîh tantô artefâttô pa bûccâh el <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>. Ablé con Yarrow, y me contó que utiliçamô muxô recurçô pa el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>.

entry.key: ILEX: We could even have a warp core for jumping long distances like Vessels have. Poke tells me she plans to make a very advanced warp core for a different project. I’m sure she could connect it to the Vessel for travel (because Poke is smart).
entry.value: ILÊ: Incluço podríamô tenêh un núcleo de dîttorçión pa çartâh entre grandê dîttançiâ, como tienen lâ Nabê. Poke diçe que planea côttruîh un núcleo de dîttorçión mu abançao pa otro proyêtto. Êttoy çeguro de que eya podría conêttâl-lo a la Nabe pa biahâh (porque Poke êh intelihente).

entry.key: THATCH: Is everyone unharmed?
entry.value: TÂXX: ¿Êttán tôh ileçô?

entry.key: PLUME: No one was badly injured from the <color=orange>escape pod’s</color> impact. We’re incredibly fortunate.
entry.value: PLUME: Nadie reçurtó erío de grabedá por el impâtto de la <color=orange>cáççula de êccape</color>. Tenemô una fortuna increíble.

entry.key: THATCH: This is good news, at least. Have we heard from <color=orange>Escape Pod 2</color> or <color=orange>Escape Pod 3</color>?
entry.value: TÂXX: Eça êh una guena notiçia, ar menô. ¿Çabemô argo de la <color=orange>cáççula de êccape 2</color> o la <color=orange>cáççula de êccape 3</color>?

entry.key: FILIX: No, I... I’m unable to make contact. My equipment can hear the other two escape pods’ distress signals, however. If it’s any comfort, both pods must be structurally intact.
entry.value: FILÎH: No, no pue... No puedo êttableçêh contâtto. Çin embargo, mi equipo reçibe lâ çeñalê de aûççilio de lâ otrâ dôh cáççulâ de êccape. Çi çirbe de conçuelo, ambâ cáççulâ deben êttâh êttrûtturarmente intâttâ.

entry.key: FILIX: I’ll continue calling for them.
entry.value: FILÎH: Continuaré tratando de comunicarme con eyâ.

entry.key: THATCH: My gratitude. If we can —
entry.value: TÂXX: Mi gratitûh. Çi podemô...

entry.key: PLUME: Thatch, the moon is approaching again!
entry.value: PLUME: Tâxx, ¡la luna çe açerca otra bêh!

entry.key: THATCH: Everyone brace yourselves, swiftly! The <color=lightblue>volcanic moon</color> has returned!
entry.value: TÂXX: ¡Prepárençe de îmmediato! ¡La <color=lightblue>luna borcánica</color> a regreçao!

entry.key: THATCH: Be cautious of falling ash and debris!
entry.value: TÂXX: ¡Tengan cuidao con lô êccombrô y lâ çeniçâ que caen!

entry.key: PLUME: ...I believe the moon has passed.
entry.value: PLUME: ... Creo que la luna a paçao.

entry.key: FILIX: This planet doesn’t appear eager to have guests. We are certainly unwelcome on its surface.
entry.value: FILÎH: Êtte planeta no pareçe entuçiâmmao con lâ biçitâ. No çomô pa ná biembeníô en çu çuperfiçie.

entry.key: THATCH: We need to find shelter, and quickly. The <color=lightblue>volcanic moon</color> won’t be gone for long.
entry.value: TÂXX: Tenemô que encontrâh un refuhio, y rápido. La <color=lightblue>luna borcánica</color> borberá pronto.

entry.key: PLUME: I observed several promising sites below the surface, but we’ll need to construct a way for everyone to climb safely down this cliff. Perhaps we could build platforms?
entry.value: PLUME: Ôççerbé bariô çitiô prometedorê debaho de la çuperfiçie, pero tendremô que elaborâh un camino pa que tôh puedan dêççendêh a çarbo por êtte acantilao. ¿Quiçá podamô côttruîh plataformâ?

entry.key: CONOY: What have we learned thus far in our search for the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>?
entry.value: CONOY: ¿Qué emô dêccubierto âtta aora en nuêttra búqqueda del <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>?

entry.key: PLUME: Those of us on the <color=orange>Vessel</color> originally followed the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s signal to this star system, but we were unable to warp to the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> itself.
entry.value: PLUME: Quienê biahábamô en la <color=orange>Nabe</color> çegimô la çeñâh del <color=lightblue>Oho</color> âtta êtte çîttema êttelâh, pero no pudimô impurçânnô mediante dîttorçión âtta el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> propiamente dixo.

entry.key: PRIVET: The locator we built on the <color=lightblue>Attlerock</color> and the new, more sensitive locator we built here were both unable to detect any trace of the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s signal.
entry.value: PRIBÊ: Ni er localiçadôh que côttruimô en <color=lightblue>Rocaterra</color> ni er localiçadôh nuebo y mâh çençible que îttalamô aquí pudieron detêttâh argún râttro de la çeñâh del <color=lightblue>Oho</color>.

entry.key: AVENS: Hypothesis: The <color=lightblue>Eye</color> has stopped emitting its signal.
entry.value: ABENS: Ipóteçî: El <color=lightblue>Oho</color> a dehao de emitîh çu çeñâh.

entry.key: CASSAVA: Suppose the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> doesn’t wish to be found.
entry.value: CAÇABA: Çupongamô que el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> no deçea que lo encontremô.

entry.key: PLUME: Cassava, how can you suggest that? The <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s signal called out to summon us to this star system!
entry.value: PLUME: Caçaba, ¿cómo puedê çuherîh eço? ¡La çeñâh del <color=lightblue>Oho</color> nô combocó a êtte çîttema êttelâh!

entry.key: CASSAVA: I’m aware; I grew up hearing the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s story. Yet we’re no closer to finding it than you were when you first arrived here.
entry.value: CAÇABA: Çoy côççiente de eyo; creçí êccuxando la îttoria del <color=lightblue>Oho</color>. Aun açí, çegimô tan lehô de encontrâl-lo como cuando ûttedê yegaron aquí.

entry.key: MALLOW: Based on our knowledge of the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>, we believe the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is in orbit around this star system’s <color=lightblue>sun</color>. This would mean the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is located within a finite (albeit enormous) range.
entry.value: MÂL-LOW: Çegún nuêttrô conoçimientô çobre la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>, creemô que el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> çe encuentra en órbita arrededôh del <color=lightblue>Çôh</color> de êtte çîttema êttelâh. Êtto çînnificaría que el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> çe encuentra dentro de un rango finito (aunque enorme).

entry.key: CONOY: How should our methods change as we continue our search for the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>?
entry.value: CONOY: ¿Qué cambiô deberíamô aplicâh a nuêttro método pa continuâh con la búqqueda del <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>?

entry.key: PRIVET: As we couldn’t find the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s signal using two different devices built for this exact purpose, we should discontinue this search method.
entry.value: PRIBÊ: Ya que no pudimô encontrâh la çeñâh del <color=lightblue>Oho</color> utiliçando dôh dîppoçitibô côttruíô con eçe fin êppeçífico, deberíamô çûppendêh êtte método de búqqueda.

entry.key: MALLOW: We know what the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> looks like thanks to the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>, so what if we try to find the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> visually, instead? Let’s send out a probe!
entry.value: MÂL-LOW: Çabemô qué âppêtto tiene el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> graçiâ a la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>, açí que ¿por qué no bûccamô al <color=lightblue>Oho</color> de manera biçuâh? ¡Embiemô una çonda!

entry.key: CASSAVA: Mallow’s idea is clever, but we have no idea where the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is in relation to here. The probability of launching a probe in the correct direction would be absurdly small.
entry.value: CAÇABA: La idea de Mâl-low êh âttuta, pero no tenemô idea de dónde çe encuentra el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> con relaçión a nuêttra ubicaçión. Lâ probabilidadê de lançâh una çonda en la dirêççión corrêtta çerían âççurdamente bahâ.

entry.key: CONOY: I believe I have a solution for that problem! Have you spoken with Ramie and Pye about the technology they’re developing?
entry.value: CONOY: ¡Creo que tengo una çoluçión pa eçe problema! ¿Ablaron con Ramie y Pye açerca de la tênnolohía que êttán deçarroyando?

entry.key: AVENS: We’d need to build a probe-launching mechanism to cover those long distances quickly. A cannon in orbit around a celestial body would circumvent the need to escape gravity’s pull.
entry.value: ABENS: Tendríamô que côttruîh un mecanîmmo de lançamiento de çondâ capâh de cubrîh eçâ grandê dîttançiâ en poco tiempo. Un cañón en órbita arrededôh de un cuerpo çelêttiâh eliminaría la neçeçidá de êccapâh de la atrâççión grabitaçionâh.

entry.key: CASSAVA: <color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color> would be a good choice. It’s furthest from the <color=lightblue>sun</color>, so it would provide the best angles for launch. And it’s moonless (except when the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> is visiting).
entry.value: CAÇABA:<color=lightblue>Abîmmo der Higante</color> çería una guena artênnatiba. Êh er planeta mâh alehao del <color=lightblue>Çôh</color>, açí que ofreçería lô mehorê ángulô pa lô lançamientô. Y no tiene luna (êççêtto cuando reçibe la biçita de la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>).

entry.key: AVENS: Yes, let’s build the cannon in orbit around <color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color>!
entry.value: ABENS: Çí, ¡côttruyamô er cañón en la órbita de <color=lightblue>Abîmmo der Higante</color>!

entry.key: PLUME: The pain of your absence is sharp and haunting, and I would give anything not to know it; anything but never knowing you at all (which would be worse).
entry.value: PLUME: Er dolôh por tu auçençia êh punçante y atormentadôh. Daría lo que fuera por no conoçêl-lo; cuarquiêh coça, êççêtto nunca aberte conoçío (lo cuâ çería aún peôh).

entry.key: PLUME: I can only hope that you are safe, Keek, wherever you are.
entry.value: PLUME: Çolo puedo êpperâh que te encuentrê a çarbo, Keek, donde çea que êttêh.

entry.key: KOUSA: We can hear the other escape pods’ distress signals, which gives me hope. Foli, are you still here? I am unsure how to survive in this place without you.
entry.value: KOUÇA: Podemô oîh lâ çeñalê de aûççilio de lâ otrâ cáççulâ de êccape, lo cuâ me da êpperançâ. Foli, ¿çigê aquí? No çé cómo çobrebibîh en êtte çitio çin ti.

entry.key: KOUSA: (I am unsure how to be me without you.)
entry.value: KOUÇA: (No çé cómo çêh yo çin ti).

entry.key: PLUME: My brother wasn’t in <color=orange>Escape Pod 1</color> with us. Was he in <color=orange>Pod 2</color>, or <color=orange>Pod 3</color>? Was he able to board an escape pod at all?
entry.value: PLUME: Mi ermano no êttaba en la <color=orange>cáççula de êccape 1</color> con noçotrô. ¿Acaço êttaba en la <color=orange>cáççula 2</color> o en la <color=orange>cáççula 3</color>? ¿Pudo çiquiera abordâh una cáççula de êccape?

entry.key: PLUME: We sacrificed too much arriving here. I cannot (I will not) allow our clan’s greatest loss to be in vain.
entry.value: PLUME: Çacrificamô demaçiao pa yegâh aquí. No puedo permitîh (no permitiré) que la pérdida mâh grande de nuêttro clan çea en bano.

entry.key: THATCH: Is the hardest part of this tragedy not knowing who we may have lost? Or will the hardest part come later, when we learn? (Be well, Aunt Melorae...)
entry.value: TÂXX: ¿Acaço lo mâh difíçî de êtta trahedia êh no çabêh a quién podemô abêh perdío? ¿O bendrá la parte mâh difíçî dêppuêh, cuando lo dêccubramô? (Êppero que êttêh bien, tía Melorae...).

entry.key: PLUME: Given concerns about our settlement’s stability, where should we construct a new, less temporary shelter?
entry.value: PLUME: Dâh lâ reçerbâ çobre la êttabilidá de nuêttro açentamiento, ¿dónde deberíamô côttruîh un refuhio menô probiçorio?

entry.key: THATCH: We need to stay close to the <color=orange>escape pod</color> so Filix can monitor incoming messages. We can’t be rescued if we aren’t present to respond.
entry.value: TÂXX: Debemô permaneçêh çerca de la <color=orange>cáççula de êccape</color> pa que Filîh pueda êttâh atenta a lô mençahê entrantê. No nô podrán rêccatâh çi no êttamô aquí pa rêppondêh.

entry.key: FILIX: I don’t believe anyone is coming to save us, Thatch. Now we must save ourselves.
entry.value: FILÎH: No creo que nadie benga a çarbânnô, Tâxx. Aora debemô çarbânnô a noçotrô mîmmô.

entry.key: PLUME: I agree. We’re here because the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s signal called to us and we followed. If we’re to find it, we need to not merely survive, but thrive.
entry.value: PLUME: Êttoy de acuerdo. Êttamô aquí porque la çeñâh del <color=lightblue>Oho</color> nô yamó y noçotrô rêppondimô. Çi queremô encontrâl-la, no nô bâttará con çobrebibîh. Debemô prôpperâh.

entry.key: PLUME: I believe we should migrate to the northern glacier.
entry.value: PLUME: Creo que deberíamô migrâh ar glaçiâh çêttentrionâh.

entry.key: FILIX: What if we use gravity crystals to craft a stable path?
entry.value: FILÎH: ¿Y çi utiliçamô crîttalê grabitatoriô pa creâh un camino êttable?

entry.key: THATCH: Building beneath the crust again would shelter us from the <color=lightblue>volcanic moon</color>’s eruptions.
entry.value: TÂXX: Çi côttruimô debaho de la corteça, êttaremô a çarbo de lâ erûççionê de la <color=lightblue>luna borcánica</color>.

entry.key: THATCH: This is a wise point, Plume, and eloquently made. If moving to the northern glacier will keep us safer, then that is what we should do.
entry.value: TÂXX: Eça êh una idea prudente, Plume, y preçentá con elocuençia. Çi êttaremô mâh a çarbo en er glaçiâh çêttentrionâh, deberíamô îh ayí.

entry.key: FILIX: Has anyone observed the <color=lightblue>phantom moon</color> that sometimes greets us in the night sky? Your thoughts interest me.
entry.value: FILÎH: ¿Argien notó la <color=lightblue>luna fantâmma</color> que a beçê nô çaluda dêdde er çielo nôttûnno? Me intereçan çû pençamientô.

entry.key: THATCH: I compliment your eyes! How do you imagine it disappears? Hypothesis: Could it be a shift in the light spectrum?
entry.value: TÂXX: ¡Elohio tu biçión! ¿Cómo imahinâ que deçapareçe? Ipóteçî: ¿Podría tratarçe de un cambio en el êppêttro luminoço?

entry.key: PLUME: Suppose this moon is too shy to show us its face.
entry.value: PLUME: Çupongamô que la luna êh demaçiao tímida como pa môttrânnô çu cara.

entry.key: PLUME: I’m interested in your playful moon. Is it much like its violent friend (<color=lightblue>Hollow’s Lantern</color>)?
entry.value: PLUME: Me intereça tu luna trabieça. ¿Çe pareçe a çu amiga biolenta (<color=lightblue>Farôh de la Ondoná</color>)?

entry.key: THATCH: Imagine if there were two volcanic moons.
entry.value: TÂXX: Imahinen çi ubieçe dôh lunâ borcánicâ.

entry.key: PLUME: Then I imagine there’d be none of us left!
entry.value: PLUME: ¡Imahino que no quedaría ninguno de noçotrô!

entry.key: FILIX: Hypothesis: There can exist too much lava.
entry.value: FILÎH: Ipóteçî: Puede êççîttîh demaçiá laba.

entry.key: THATCH: I’d strongly prefer we test the null hypothesis.
entry.value: TÂXX: Preferiría que probáramô la ipóteçî nula.

entry.key: FILIX: This moon isn’t volcanic (to my unaided eyes). Sometimes it leaves its friend <color=lightblue>Hollow’s Lantern</color> for nights at a time.
entry.value: FILÎH: Êtta luna no êh borcánica (a çimple bîtta). A beçê abandona a çu amiga, <color=lightblue>Farôh de la Ondoná</color>, durante bariâ noxê.

entry.key: PLUME: The nights the moon circles this planet appear random. It seems to travel as it likes.
entry.value: PLUME: La cantidá de noxê en que la luna hira arrededôh de êtte planeta pareçe çêh aleatoria. Da la impreçión de que çe trâl-lá a çu antoho.

entry.key: If the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> called to us, why won’t it reveal itself? Why is it so difficult to locate it?
entry.value: Çi el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> nô yamó, ¿por qué no çe muêttra? ¿Por qué êh tan difíçî de localiçâh?

entry.key: Did something happen to it?
entry.value: ¿Le çuçedió argo?

entry.key: Did the signal stop? Does the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> no longer desire to be found?
entry.value: ¿Dehó de emitirçe la çeñâh? ¿Acaço el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> ya no deçea que lo encontremô?

entry.key: Perhaps this isn’t the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s choice. The <color=lightblue>Eye</color> may not be able to communicate with us more than it already has.
entry.value: Quiçá êtta no çea una deçiçión del <color=lightblue>Oho</color>. Quiçá el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> ya aya êttableçío toa la comunicaçión poçible con noçotrô.

entry.key: Did the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> deliberately call out to us by sending the signal, or did we hear the signal by coincidence?
entry.value: ¿El <color=lightblue>Oho</color> embió la çeñâh pa comunicarçe con noçotrô deliberadamente o la oímô por caçualidá?

entry.key: We could be seeing meaning where there is none. Suppose the signal was produced incidentally.
entry.value: Quiçá êttemô biendo un çînnificao donde no lo ay. Çupongamô que la çeñâh çe produho por âççidente.

entry.key: Does that mean the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is any less important, though?
entry.value: ¿Acaço eço çînnifica que el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> tiene menô importançia?

entry.key: Perhaps the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> wanted to be found (could it be sentient?). Maybe it chose us.
entry.value: Quiçá el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> quería que lo encontraran (¿podría çêh intelihente?). Tar bêh nô elihió.

entry.key: Does the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> desire something from us? Could it need us in some way?
entry.value: ¿Deçea el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> argo de noçotrô? ¿Podría neçeçitânnô pa argo?

entry.key: Maybe it doesn’t have to be us.
entry.value: Tar bêh no açe farta que çeamô noçotrô.

entry.key: Is the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> natural, or artificial?
entry.value: ¿Êh el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> naturâh o artifiçiâh?

entry.key: Maybe someone built it.
entry.value: Tar bêh argien lo côttruyó.

entry.key: The <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is older than the universe itself. How could something exist before its creator?
entry.value: El <color=lightblue>Oho</color> êh mâh antiguo que er mîmmíçimo uniberço. ¿Cómo podría argo êççîttîh antê que çu creadôh?

entry.key: It could be naturally occurring, though this doesn’t answer how the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> could be as old as it is.
entry.value: Podría çêh una ocurrençia naturâh, aunque êtto no êpplica cómo puede el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> çêh tan antiguo.

entry.key: Be welcomed in this place. This shrine is a space to reflect on what brought us to this star system: the signal from the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>. test
entry.value: Te doy la biembenida a êtte çitio. Êtte çantuario êh un êppaçio donde reflêççionamô çobre lo que nô traho a êtte çîttema êttelâh: la çeñâh del <color=lightblue>Oho</color>.

entry.key: We observed the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s signal in our travels, and followed it here to find its source. test
entry.value: En nuêttrô biahê, ôççerbamô la çeñâh del <color=lightblue>Oho</color>, y la çegimô âtta aquí pa encontrâh çu fuente.

entry.key: What we know is this: The source of the signal (which we have chosen to call the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>) is older than this universe itself. The rest, we have yet to learn. test
entry.value: Êtto êh lo que çabemô: La fuente de la çeñâh (a la que emô deçidío yamâh el «<color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>») êh mâh antigua que er mîmmíçimo uniberço. El rêtto aún no lo emô dêccubierto.

entry.key: Enter, and open your mind to its possibilities. test
entry.value: Entra y abre tu mente a çû poçibilidadê.

entry.key: SOLANUM: I don’t know why everyone says the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is important.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: No çé por qué tôh diçen que el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> êh importante.

entry.key: SOLANUM: They say it brought us to this solar system, but is that good? Dad told me lots of Nomai died when our clan came here.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Diçen que nô traho a êtte çîttema êttelâh, pero ¿êh eço argo gueno? Papá me contó que muxô nomai murieron cuando nuêttro clan yegó aquí.

entry.key: SOLANUM: What if the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> wanted that to happen?
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: ¿Y çi el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> quería que eço çuçediera?

entry.key: SOLANUM: What if the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> isn’t something good?
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: ¿Y çi el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> no êh argo gueno?

entry.key: 1: <color=orange>High Energy Lab</color> Trailhead
entry.value: 1: Iniçio der çendero der Laboratorio Urtraenerhético

entry.key: 2: <color=orange>Stepping Stone District</color>
entry.value: 2: Dîttrito de lô Perdañô

entry.key: 3: <color=orange>Anglerfish Overlook District</color>
entry.value: 3: Dîttrito der Miradôh del Rape

entry.key: 4: <color=orange>Eye Shrine District</color>
entry.value: 4: Dîttrito der Çantuario del Oho

entry.key: ANNONA: We need status reports for all systems, but initial things first: Is everyone unharmed?
entry.value: ÂNNONA: Neçeçitamô informê çobre el êttao de tôh lô çîttemâ, pero primero lo iniçiâh: ¿êttán tôh ileçô?

entry.key: RHUS: Our color=orange>escape pod</color>’s passengers are afraid, but physically well, Annona; everyone survived the crash.
entry.value: RÛ: Lô paçaherô de nuêttra <color=orange>cáççula de êccape</color> êttán açûttáô, pero fíçicamente bien, Ânnona; tôh çobrebibieron a la coliçión.

entry.key: ANNONA: This is a relief, at least. You have my gratitude. Bur, were you able to find the other escape pods’ distress signals?
entry.value: ÂNNONA: Eço êh un alibio, ar menô. Tienê mi gratitûh. Bûh, ¿pudîtte localiçâh lâ çeñalê de aûççilio de lâ otrâ cáççulâ de êccape?

entry.key: BUR: I can hear both signals somewhere in this star system, but I don’t believe either escape pod crashed on the same planet as us.
entry.value: BÛH: Puedo oîh ambâ çeñalê en argún çitio de êtte çîttema êttelâh, pero creo que ninguna de lâ cáççulâ de êccape çe êttreyó en er mîmmo planeta que noçotrô.

entry.key: BEGIN FLIGHTLOG: <color=orange>Escape Pod 2</color>. <color=orange>Vessel</color> has been mortally injured. Emergency sequence activated. Awaiting departure from <color=orange>Vessel</color>.
entry.value: INIÇIÂH REHÎTTRO DE BUELO:<color=orange>Cáççula de êccape 2</color>. La <color=orange>Nabe</color> a çufrío daño terminâh. Çecuençia de emerhençia âttibá. Êpperando partida de la <color=orange>Nabe</color>.

entry.key: Launching <color=orange>Escape Pod 3</color>... Now launching <color=orange>Escape Pod 2</color>.
entry.value: Lançando <color=orange>cáççula de êccape 3</color>... Lançando <color=orange>cáççula de êccape 2</color>...

entry.key: Scanning external environment... Scan complete. External temperature is prohibitively high. Verdict: INHOSPITABLE. Do not seek shelter on planet surface.
entry.value: Analiçando ambiente êtteriôh... Análiçî completao. Temperatura êttênna proibitibamente elebá. Beredîtto: IMBIABLE. No bûccâh refuhio en la çuperfiçie der planeta.

entry.key: MELORAE: This is amazing (look inside the cave)! How did this come to rest here? We haven’t encountered others in these caves; I think this is a rare find.
entry.value: MELORAE: ¡Êtto êh increíble (mira dentro de la cueba)! ¿Cómo yegó êtto âtta aquí? No emô encontrao otrô en êttâ cuebâ; pienço que êh un ayâggo êççêççionâh.

entry.key: MELORAE: From what we can see, Coleus and I believe the specimen must be very old indeed. Imagine what we might learn if we could examine it!
entry.value: MELORAE: Por lo que çe puede bêh, Coleû y yo creemô que êtte êppéçimen debe çêh rearmente mu antiguo. ¡Imahinen lo que podríamô dêccubrîh çi lo êççamináramô!

entry.key: COLEUS: An update: We need to find a way inside quickly, Melorae, because when I returned here to search for an entrance to the cave, there were children playing on the specimen!
entry.value: COLEÛ: Âttualiçaçión: Debemô encontrâh una entrá rápido, Melorae, porque cuando regreçé aquí pa bûccâh una forma de ingreçâh en la cueba, ¡abía niñô hugando çobre el êppéçimen!

entry.key: COLEUS: We both agree it’s unlikely this dry planet is this horror’s place of origin (especially considering what we observed during the <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s evacuation).
entry.value: COLEÛ: Ambô coinçidimô en que êh poco probable que êtte planeta árido çea er lugâh de orihen de êtte orrôh (êppeçiarmente ar tenêh en cuenta lo que ôççerbamô durante la ebacuaçión de la <color=orange>Nabe</color>).

entry.key: MELORAE: Clearly this hole is too small for it to have fit through. Hypothesis: There is another entrance to this cave. If there is, Coleus and I will find it! We can’t leave valuable information undiscovered!
entry.value: MELORAE: Êtte aguhero êh, çin duda, demaçiao pequeño como pa que aya paçao por aquí. Ipóteçî: Êtta cueba tiene otra entrá. Çi rearmente êççîtte, ¡Coleû y yo la encontraremô! ¡No podemô dehâh informaçión balioça çin dêccubrîh!

entry.key: MELORAE: We have found an enormous cavern at the end of this passage that appears promising! I believe we could construct long-term shelter there.
entry.value: MELORAE: ¡Encontramô una enorme cabênna ar finâh de êtte paço que pareçe prometedora! Creo que podríamô côttruîh un refuhio permanente ayí.

entry.key: ANNONA: The cavern Melorae found is a wise choice for shelter. Could one of you mark directions for the others to follow?
entry.value: ÂNNONA: La cabênna que encontró Melorae êh una guena ôççión pa el refuhio. ¿Podría uno de ûttedê indicâh er camino pa lô demâh?

entry.key: COLEUS: This is the start of the path to the shelter site. I’ve left directions to guide you there.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Êtte êh er comienço der çendero ar çitio del refuhio. Lê dehé indicaçionê que lô giarán âtta er lugâh.

entry.key: MELORAE: Of note: We must hurry, as the pathway there is filling with sand. Do not allow yourself to be buried by sand, and make sure no one is lost!
entry.value: MELORAE: De conçideraçión: Debemô dânnô priça, ya que er çendero çe êttá yenando de arena. No permitan que la arena lô entierre, ¡y açegúrençe de que nadie çe pierda!

entry.key: MELORAE: Anglerfish study
entry.value: MELORAE: Êttudio del rape

entry.key: COLEUS: An update: Melorae, while I was here making sketches of the anglerfish, I observed the children I saw earlier playing here again. They’ve added a rule to their game that incorporates our research (it’s wonderful)!
entry.value: COLEÛ: Âttualiçaçión: Melorae, mientrâ dibuhaba boçetô del rape, borbí a bêh a lô niñô que hugaban aquí antê. ¡Agregaron una regla a çu huego que incorpora datô de nuêttra imbêttigaçión (êh marabiyoço)!

entry.key: MELORAE: I’m entirely delighted! It’s never too early to appreciate biology!
entry.value: MELORAE: ¡Êttoy fâççiná! ¡Nunca êh demaçiao temprano pa reconoçêh er balôh de la biolohía!

entry.key: COLEUS: This anglerfish’s digestive tract suggests death by starvation.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Er trâtto dihêttibo de êtte rape arroha indiçiô de muerte por inaniçión.

entry.key: MELORAE: Visually, the specimen appears to be of the same species as the anglerfish in <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color>. We don’t believe it originated from this planet.
entry.value: MELORAE: Biçuarmente, el ehemplâh pareçe çêh de la mîmma êppeçie que el rape de <color=lightblue>Êppinôccuro</color>. No creemô que çea autóttono de êtte planeta.

entry.key: MELORAE: The long growth protruding from its head is bioluminescent. Perhaps it used this growth to attract prey (a lure?).
entry.value: MELORAE: La larga protuberançia que tiene en la cabeça êh bioluminîççente. Quiçá la utiliçaba pa atraêh preçâ (¿un çeñuelo?).

entry.key: LAEVI: Whoever was it when we ended last time is the anglerfish.
entry.value: LAEBI: ¿Er que era la úrtima bêh que terminamô êh el rape aora?

entry.key: LAEVI: Rule change! The anglerfish now has to wear a blindfold. (And do not peek!)
entry.value: LAEBI: ¡Cambio de reglâ! El rape aora debe tenêh lô ohô bendáô. (¡Y no çe permite êppiâh!).

entry.key: LAEVI: The rest of us (the littlefish) line up against one wall. When the anglerfish says go, the littlefish sneak across to the other side.
entry.value: LAEBI: Lô demâh (lô peçeçitô) nô ponemô en fila contra una paré. Cuando el rape da la orden, lô peçeçitô intentan êccabuyirçe âtta el otro lao.

entry.key: LAEVI: If the anglerfish catches you, you’re eaten.
entry.value: LAEBI: Çi el rape te atrapa, te come.

entry.key: LAEVI: Last littlefish to be caught is the new anglerfish! (The old anglerfish gives the new anglerfish the blindfold and becomes a littlefish.)
entry.value: LAEBI: ¡El úrtimo peçeçito atrapao çe combierte en er nuebo rape! (El rape anteriôh le da la benda ar nuebo rape y çe combierte en un peçeçito).

entry.key: LAMI: Why are we changing it? It’s too hard if you can’t see anything!
entry.value: LAMI: ¿Por qué lo cambiamô? ¡Êh mu difíçî çi no bêh ná!

entry.key: LAEVI: Aunt Pye says real anglerfish are blind, so you have to wear a blindfold! The rule stands!
entry.value: LAEBI: La tía Pye diçe que lô rapê çon çiegô, ¡açí que ay que uçâh una benda! ¡La regla çe mantiene!

entry.key: ILEX: Rule update: It’s okay if younger kids don’t wear the blindfold when they’re it. (The rest of us will still wear it for scientific accuracy and to make the game more even.)
entry.value: ILÊ: Âttualiçaçión de lâ reglâ: Lô niñô mâh pequeñô pueden no uçâh la benda cuando çon el rape. (Lô demâh tendremô que uçâl-la por rigôh çientífico y pa que er huego çea mâh pareho).

entry.key: MELORAE: This planet sometimes (and only sometimes) has a moon! This is also of note: It disappears if no one is watching it! Isn’t that a fascinating orbital characteristic?
entry.value: MELORAE: ¡A beçê (y çolo a beçê) êtte planeta tiene una luna! Êtto también êh de conçideraçión: ¡La luna deçapareçe çi nadie la êttá mirando! ¿No êh una carâtteríttica orbitâh fâççinante?

entry.key: BUR: I found your note, Melorae; kindly count me among this <color=lightblue>moon</color>’s admirers! What is happening when it disappears (I doubt it ceases to exist)? Does it move to another location?
entry.value: BÛH: Encontré tu nota, Melorae; ¡puedê contarme entre lô âmmiradorê de êtta <color=lightblue>luna</color>! ¿Qué çuçede cuando deçapareçe (dudo que dehe de êççîttîh)? ¿Çe muebe a otra ubicaçión?

entry.key: ANNONA: I believe so. Not only does the moon appear around <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>, I can confirm it sometimes orbits <color=lightblue>Timber Hearth</color>, as well.
entry.value: ÂNNONA: Eço creo. La luna no çolo apareçe arrededôh de <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color>; puedo confirmâh que a beçê también çe muebe en la órbita de <color=lightblue>Lumbre</color>.

entry.key: MELORAE: This is my first time encountering a natural satellite with the ability to vanish when not being watched. We should study it! Or, even better, we should travel there!
entry.value: MELORAE: Êh la primera bêh que encuentro un çatélite naturâh con la capaçidá pa dêbbaneçerçe cuando no lo miran. ¡Deberíamô êttudiâl-lo! O, mehôh aún, ¡deberíamô biahâh âtta ayí!

entry.key: BUR: I agree! Our first step would be determining a method to track this <color=lightblue>phantom moon</color> so that we can always know where it is.
entry.value: BÛH: ¡Êttoy de acuerdo! Nuêttro primêh paço çería determinâh un método de çegimiento pa êtta <color=lightblue>luna fantâmma</color>, de modo que çiempre çepamô dónde êttá.

entry.key: ANNONA: Given its reluctance to move while consciously observed, it might be a form of macroscopic quantum mechanics.
entry.value: ÂNNONA: Dá çu retiçençia a moberçe cuando çe la ôççerba de manera côççiente, podría tratarçe de una forma de mecánica cuántica macrôccópica.

entry.key: COLEUS: How curious! This rock took me with it to a new location. I wonder why this happened?
entry.value: COLEÛ: ¡Qué curioço! Êtta roca me yebó conçigo a una nueba ubicaçión. Me pregunto por qué abrá çuçedío êtto.

entry.key: COLEUS: Curious, but also alarming: This new cave appears to lack an entrance or exit. Also, the rock that brought me here disappeared while I wasn’t watching.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Curioço, pero también alarmante: êtta nueba cueba pareçe no tenêh entrá ni çalida. Ademâh, la roca que me traho âtta aquí deçapareçió cuando no la êttaba mirando.

entry.key: COLEUS: The wandering rock has returned! Never before have I been so delighted to see a sedimentary specimen.
entry.value: COLEÛ: ¡La roca errante a regreçao! Hamâh me abía alegrao tanto de bêh un êppéçimen çedimentario.

entry.key: COLEUS: I wonder if I myself became quantum briefly when the rock carried me here! This seems the clearest explanation. Hypothesis: If the rock can bring me here, it can also carry me out.
entry.value: COLEÛ: ¡Me pregunto çi yo mîmmo me borbí cuántico por un momento cuando la roca me traho aquí! Eça pareçe la êpplicaçión mâh clara. Ipóteçî: Çi la roca me puede traêh aquí, también me puede çacâh.

entry.key: COLEUS: My hypothesis was correct! I can travel on this rock, as long as I’m not observing my surroundings (meaning I must be in complete darkness). I’m going to bring my mentor here to see this.
entry.value: COLEÛ: ¡Mi ipóteçî era corrêtta! Puedo biahâh con êtta roca, çiempre y cuando no êtté ôççerbando mi entônno (êh deçîh que debo êttâh en una ôccuridá âççoluta). Traeré a mi mentora pa que lo bea.

entry.key: COLEUS: Melorae is here now, too. We theorize when a conscious being is in contact with a quantum object and ceases to observe his or her surroundings, the being can become entangled with that quantum object, and they move together.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Aora Melorae también êttá aquí. Teoriçamô que cuando un çêh côççiente êttá en contâtto con un ôhheto cuántico y deha de âttuâh como ôççerbadôh (lo cuâ êpplica la neçeçidá de ôccuridá), dixo çêh puede quedâh intrincao con el ôhheto cuántico, y ambô çe mueben como unidá.

entry.key: MELORAE: Friends, Coleus has discovered a new quantum rule! (He has also promised me he’ll never vanish again, even if he does learn something useful from it!)
entry.value: MELORAE: Amigô, ¡Coleû dêccubrió una nueba regla cuántica! (También prometió que nunca mâh çe dêbbaneçerá, ¡aun çi êtto çirbe pa dêccubrîh argo útî!).

entry.key: Melorae: Coleus is missing! He vanished from the <color=orange>Lakebed Cave</color> (the one at the bottom of the dry lakebed at the north pole) several days ago, and we’re unable to find any trace of him. I don’t know how much air he had when he disappeared. I beg any friend reading this, help us recover Coleus!
entry.value: MELORAE: ¡Coleû a deçapareçío! Çe dêbbaneçió de la <color=orange>Cueba Lacûttre</color> (la que êttá en er fondo der lexo der lago çeco, en er polo norte) açe bariô díâ, y no encontramô ningún râttro de él. No çé cuánto aire tenía cuando deçapareçió. Amigô, çi êttán leyendo êtto, ¡lê imploro que nô ayuden a encontrâh a Coleû!

entry.key: MELORAE: Friends, if you find any sign of Coleus, I implore you to tell me! He vanished without a trace during our research trip, and has been missing ever since.
entry.value: MELORAE: Amigô, çi encuentran argún indiçio der paradero de Coleû, ¡lê imploro que me notifiquen! Çe dêbbaneçió çin dehâh râttro durante nuêttro biahe de imbêttigaçión.

entry.key: BUR: Melorae, some of us from the <color=orange>Sunless City</color> are here to help search for Coleus. Can you tell us more about your expedition?
entry.value: BÛH: Melorae, argunô binimô dêdde la <color=orange>Çiudá Çin Çôh</color> pa ayudâh en la búqqueda de Coleû. ¿Puedê contânnô mâh çobre çu êppediçión?

entry.key: MELORAE: You have my gratitude, Bur! Coleus and I were studying the caves’ geology. We hoped to learn more about a unique and wandering rock that visits several different caves in the area.
entry.value: MELORAE: ¡Tienê mi gratitûh, Bûh! Coleû y yo êttábamô êttudiando la heolohía de lâ cuebâ. Queríamô comprendêh mehôh una roca única y errante que biçita diferentê cuebâ de la çona.

entry.key: ANNONA: Where was young Coleus lost, Melorae?
entry.value: ÂNNONA: ¿Dónde çe perdió er hoben Coleû, Melorae?

entry.key: MELORAE: He disappeared in the cave at the bottom of the dry lakebed at the north pole. It happened in an instant, and without warning.
entry.value: MELORAE: Deçapareçió en la cueba que êttá en er fondo der lexo der lago çeco, en er polo norte. Çuçedió en un îttante y çin abiço.

entry.key: MELORAE: I turned away from Coleus to examine a sample, and when I turned back, he simply wasn’t there anymore. He had a limited supply of air, Annona! I’m afraid for him!
entry.value: MELORAE: Me alehé de Coleû pa êççaminâh una muêttra y, cuando me di buerta, çimplemente ya no êttaba ayí. ¡Tenía un çuminîttro de aire limitao, Ânnona! ¡Temo por çu bida!

entry.key: ANNONA: Hypothesis: We will learn more by examining the northern <color=orange>Lakebed Cave</color> where Coleus disappeared. Search quickly, everyone; we have no time to squander!
entry.value: ÂNNONA: Ipóteçî: Ôttendremô mâh informaçión êççaminando la <color=orange>Cueba Lacûttre</color> çêttentrionâh donde deçapareçió Coleû. Bûqquen a toa priça, amigô; ¡no ay tiempo que dêpperdiçiâh!

entry.key: <color=orange>High Energy Lab</color>
entry.value: <color=orange>Laboratorio Urtraenerhético</color>

entry.key: SECCA: To any who come here searching for us: We followed one of the two beacons from the <color=orange>Vessel</color> to this place, but now can go no further.
entry.value: ÇÊCCA: A quien yege aquí en bûcca de noçotrô: Çegimô una de lâ dôh baliçâ de la <color=orange>Nabe</color> âtta êtte çitio, pero ya no podemô çegîh abançando.

entry.key: SECCA: It’s almost too faint to hear now, but the <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s beacon is still faintly emitting from within this thorny seed. Yet the opening is too small for even a single Nomai to fit through it, so our <color=orange>escape pod</color> couldn’t have flown through here.
entry.value: ÇÊCCA: Ya caçi no çe la puede oîh, pero la baliça de la <color=orange>Nabe</color> çige emitiendo una çeñâh tenue dêdde dentro de êtta çemiya êppinoça. Çin embargo, la endidura êh tan pequeña que ni un nomai puede paçâh por eya, açí que êh impoçible que nuêttra <color=orange>cáççula de êccape</color> aya entrao bolando.

entry.key: SECCA: I don’t understand how this could be possible, but this gruesome place seems able to manipulate space itself; maybe this was our undoing.
entry.value: ÇÊCCA: No entiendo cómo êh poçible, pero êtte êppantoço lugâh pareçe capâh de manipulâh el êppaçio propiamente dixo. Quiçá êtta aya çido nuêttra perdiçión.

entry.key: SECCA: To be so close to the location of the <color=orange>Vessel</color> and still so far is... difficult. Worse, the <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s beacon is dying; soon, we will be unable to hear it.
entry.value: ÇÊCCA: Êttâh tan çerca de la ubicaçión de la <color=orange>Nabe</color> y aun açí tan lehô êh... difíçî. Peôh aún, la baliça de la <color=orange>Nabe</color> êttá muriendo; pronto, ya no podremô oíl-la.

entry.key: SECCA: There is nothing we can do now but try to perhaps find a way inside, or at least attempt to comprehend why this happened.
entry.value: ÇÊCCA: Aora no ay ná que podamô açêh, êççêtto quiçá bûccâh una manera de entrâh o ar menô intentâh comprendêh por qué çuçedió êtto.

entry.key: SECCA: My dearest hope is that the other escape pods were able to reach relative safety.
entry.value: ÇÊCCA: Mi mayôh êpperança êh que lâ otrâ cáççulâ de êccape ayan yegao a argún lugâh relatibamente çeguro.

entry.key: DIN: There is a new problem: Our equipment is detecting two distinct beacons from the <color=orange>Vessel</color>.
entry.value: DIN: Tenemô un nuebo problema: Nuêttro equipo detêtta dôh baliçâ dîttintâ probenientê de la <color=orange>Nabe</color>.

entry.key: SECCA: But it isn’t possible for the <color=orange>Vessel</color> to be in two different locations at the same time.
entry.value: ÇÊCCA: Pero no êh poçible que la <color=orange>Nabe</color> êtté en dôh lugarê diferentê ar mîmmo tiempo.

entry.key: DIN: I agree, but the beacons are exactly identical to each other. Perhaps if I had more time —
entry.value: DIN: Êttoy de acuerdo, pero lâ baliçâ çon idénticâ. Quiçá çi tubiera mâh tiempo...

entry.key: SECCA: We’re nearly out of time already, Din; the <color=orange>Vessel</color>’s beacon is quickly fading. Soon, it will be gone, and we will be lost.
entry.value: ÇÊCCA: Ya caçi no nô queda tiempo, Din; la baliça de la <color=orange>Nabe</color> çe êttá dêbbaneçiendo rápidamente. Pronto deçapareçerá y êttaremô perdíô.

entry.key: ESCALL: We will follow the beacon whose source is nearest to us.
entry.value: ÊCCALL: Çegiremô la baliça cuya fuente êtté mâh çerca de noçotrô.

entry.key: DIN: But suppose that beacon is false!
entry.value: DIN: Pero ¡çupongamô que la baliça êh farça!
