entry.key: ESCALL: We likely don’t have enough air to reach the farther of the two beacons, Din. The decision is made for us.
entry.value: ÊCCALL: Êh probable que no tengamô çufiçiente aire pa yegâh a la baliça mâh lehana, Din. Êtta êh la única deçiçión poçible.

entry.key: ESCALL: We’ll leave a trail of lights as we go. There’s still a chance someone could hear our <color=orange>escape pod</color>’s distress signal.
entry.value: ÊCCALL: Iremô dehando un râttro de luçê mientrâ abançamô. Aún êççîtte la poçibilidá de que argien oiga la çeñâh de aûççilio de nuêttra <color=orange>cáççula de êccape</color>.

entry.key: BEGIN FLIGHTLOG: <color=orange>Escape Pod 3</color>. <color=orange>Vessel</color> has been mortally injured. Emergency sequence activated. Awaiting departure from <color=orange>Vessel</color>.
entry.value: INIÇIÂH REHÎTTRO DE BUELO:<color=orange>Cáççula de êccape 3</color>.La <color=orange>Nabe</color> a çufrío daño terminâh. Çecuençia de emerhençia âttibá. Êpperando partida de la <color=orange>Nabe</color>.

entry.key: Now launching <color=orange>Escape Pod 3</color>.
entry.value: Lançando <color=orange>cáççula de êccape 3</color>...

entry.key: ALERT: Multiple collisions have altered pod’s trajectory. Significant damage to pod detected.
entry.value: ALERTA: Coliçionê múrtiplê an arterao la trayêttoria de la cáççula. Daño çînnificatibo detêttao en la cáççula.

entry.key: WARNING: Navigation error. Life support error. Propulsion error.
entry.value: ÂBBERTENÇIA: Errôh de nabegaçión. Errôh de çîttema de ôççíheno. Errôh de propurçión.

entry.key: Scanning external environment... Scan complete. Gravity not detected. Breathable air not detected. Multiple lifeforms detected (potentially hostile). Verdict: DO NOT EXIT POD.
entry.value: Analiçando ambiente êtteriôh... Análiçî completao. Grabedá no detêttá. Aire rêppirable no detêttao. Formâ de bida múrtiplê detêttâh (potençiarmente ôttilê). Beredîtto: NO ÇALÎH DE LA CÁÇÇULA.

entry.key: The arch and the crystal do not naturally meet.
entry.value: Por naturaleça, el arco y er crîttâh no confluyen.

entry.key: PHLOX: I’m curious: Is sending a being’s memories back in time the same as sending the being itself back in time?
entry.value: PHLÔH: Me da curioçidá çabêh çi embiâh lô recuerdô de un çêh açia atrâh en er tiempo êh lo mîmmo que embiâh ar propio çêh açia atrâh en er tiempo.

entry.key: PHLOX: As an example, if we were to send my memories back in time, is that the same as sending “me” back in time (not my physical body, but my essence)?
entry.value: PHLÔH: Por ehemplo: çi embiáramô mî recuerdô açia atrâh en er tiempo, ¿çería lo mîmmo que embiarme a mí açia atrâh en er tiempo (mi eçençia, no mi cuerpo fíçico)?

entry.key: DAZ: I imagine they’re two different actions.
entry.value: DÂH: Imahino que çon dôh âççionê diferentê.

entry.key: CASSAVA: Wouldn’t both actions be effectively the same?
entry.value: CAÇABA: ¿No çerían ambâ âççionê lo mîmmo en la práttica?

entry.key: DAZ: Suppose that time was being rewritten. I believe this is different than receiving memories from what is effectively the future.
entry.value: DÂH: Çupongamô que er tiempo çe êttubiera reêccribiendo. Creo que no êh lo mîmmo que reçibîh recuerdô de lo que, en la práttica, êh er futuro.

entry.key: CASSAVA: But isn’t the end result identical in either case?
entry.value: CAÇABA: Pero, en tó caço, ¿el reçurtao finâh no êh idéntico?

entry.key: PHLOX: Welcome to Giant’s Deep, friends! I’m excited for you to meet the statues!
entry.value: PHLÔH: ¡Biembeníô a Abîmmo der Higante, amigô! ¡Me emoçiona muxo que puedan conoçêh lâ êttatuâ!

entry.key: PHLOX: If I’m not in my dwelling, I’m likely in my <color=orange>workshop</color> below (inside the island).
entry.value: PHLÔH: Çi no me encuentro en mi morá, êh fâttible que êtté en mi <color=orange>tayêh</color> (en el interiôh de la îl-la).

entry.key: <color=orange>ORBITAL PROBE CANNON</color> DAMAGE REPORT: Severe structural stress detected. Assessing damage to modules...
entry.value: INFORME DE DAÑÔ DEL <color=orange>CAÑÓN DE ÇONDÂ ORBITÂH</color>: carga êttrûtturâh grabe detêttá. Ebaluando dañô en lô módulô...

entry.key: <color=orange>Control Module</color>: Intact. No structural damage.
entry.value: <color=orange>Módulo de Contrôh</color>: intâtto. No çe produheron dañô êttrûtturalê.

entry.key: <color=orange>Launch Module</color>: Viewport window fractured. Module exposed to vacuum of space.
entry.value: <color=orange>Módulo de Lançamiento</color>: portiya rahá. Módulo êppuêtto ar baçío del êppaçio.

entry.key: <color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color>: MISSING.
entry.value: <color=orange>Módulo de Râttreo de Çondâ</color>: ÊTTRABIAO.

entry.key: BEGIN LAUNCH LOG: <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color>. Launch request received. Probe launch successful.
entry.value: INIÇIÂH REHÎTTRO DE LANÇAMIENTO: <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color>. Çoliçitûh de lançamiento reçibida. Lançamiento de çonda realiçao.

entry.key: <color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color> is receiving data from probe.
entry.value: El <color=orange>Módulo de Râttreo de Çondâ</color> êttá reçibiendo datô de la çonda.

entry.key: WARNING: <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> structure compromised during launch. Damage to multiple modules detected.
entry.value: ÂBBERTENÇIA: La êttrûttura del <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color> reçurtó comprometida durante er lançamiento. Çe detêttaron dañô en bariô módulô.

entry.key: Probe Tracking Module
entry.value: <color=orange>Módulo de Râttreo de Çondâ</color>

entry.key: You have recalled the rule of quantum imaging.
entry.value: Âh ebocao la regla de lâ imáhenê cuánticâ.

entry.key: Recall the rule of quantum entanglement.
entry.value: Eboca la regla del entrelaçamiento cuántico.

entry.key: Recall the rule of the sixth location.
entry.value: Eboca la regla de la çêtta ubicaçión.

entry.key: SOLANUM: I’m at the shuttle! I’m ready to make my first pilgrimage to the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: ¡Êttoy en er trâbbordadôh! Êttoy lîtta pa realiçâh mi primêh peregrinahe a la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>.

entry.key: BELLS: That’s exciting! You’re almost ready, but there’s still one more rule you need to learn. Come see me at the Tower of Quantum Knowledge.
entry.value: BELLS: ¡Qué emoçionante! Êttâh caçi lîtta, pero todabía tienê que aprendêh una regla mâh. Ben a berme a la Torre der Conoçimiento Cuántico.

entry.key: BELLS: The tower is on the opposite side of <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>. If you follow the path west to the <color=orange>Crossroads</color>, you can reach the tower from there.
entry.value: BELLS: La torre çe encuentra en er lao opuêtto de <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color>. Çi çigê er camino al oêtte del <color=orange>Cruçe</color>, podrâh yegâh a la torre dêdde ayí.

entry.key: SOLANUM: My gratitude for the directions, Bells. I’ll see you soon!
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Mi gratitûh por lâ indicaçionê, Bells. ¡Nô bemô pronto!

entry.key: CASSAVA: I have bad news, Avens. Yarrow says there was a problem with the proposed power source, so the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> won’t be asked to fire.
entry.value: CAÇABA: Me temo que no tengo guenâ notiçiâ, Abens. Yarrow diho que abía un problema con la fuente de enerhía propuêtta, açí que no çe êppera que el <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color> abra fuego.

entry.key: AVENS: I hope you’re pulling my locomotive limb here, Cassava.
entry.value: ABENS: Êppero que me êttêh tomando lâ fibrâ capilarê, Caçaba.

entry.key: CASSAVA: I wish I were, my friend, but no. They aren’t certain they can fix the problem, so the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> is on indefinite hiatus.
entry.value: CAÇABA: Me temo que no. No ay çerteça de que er problema baya a reçorberçe, açí que el <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color> queda interrumpío por tiempo indefinío.

entry.key: CASSAVA: Tell Privet and Mallow they should return from the <color=orange>cannon</color>. My spouse and I will remain at the <color=orange>Construction Yard</color>, for now.
entry.value: CAÇABA: Dilê a Pribê y a Mâl-low que deberían regreçâh del <color=orange>cañón</color>. Por aora, mi êppoço y yo nô quedaremô en el <color=orange>Çitio de Côttrûççión</color>.

entry.key: AVENS: An update: Mallow and I will join you and Daz. Privet left to visit her brother. She fears Idaea may feel responsible.
entry.value: ABENS: Âttualiçaçión: Mâl-low y yo nô uniremô a Dâh y a ti. Pribê partió a biçitâh a çu ermano. Teme que Idaea çe çienta rêpponçable.

entry.key: MALLOW: Imagine, Privet: the <color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color> will be the first to know the coordinates of the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>! You’ll be the first to see them!
entry.value: MÂL-LOW: Imahina, Pribê: ¡el <color=orange>Módulo de Râttreo de Çondâ</color> çerá er primero en rehîttrâh lâ coordenâh del <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>! ¡Tendrâh er pribilehio de bêl-lâ primero que nadie!

entry.key: PRIVET: I am honored and terrified!
entry.value: PRIBÊ: ¡Êh un onôh, pero ar mîmmo tiempo me aterroriça!

entry.key: PRIVET: You won’t ask the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> to use so much power that it breaks, will you?
entry.value: PRIBÊ: No le êççihirâh al <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color> que uçe tanta potençia como pa yegâh a aberiarçe, ¿no?

entry.key: MALLOW: Fret not, my nervous friend! We only need to fire the probe once, anyway, so who minds if it compromises the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color>’s structural integrity slightly?
entry.value: MÂL-LOW: ¡No temâ, mi nerbioça amiga! Çolo neçeçitamô abrîh fuego una bêh. Y en tó caço, no creo que a nadie le molêtte que la integridá êttrûtturâh del <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color> çe bea lebemente comprometida.

entry.key: PRIVET: I would mind, Mallow! I would mind, because we won’t be capable of receiving our probe’s data if the <color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color> is destroyed!
entry.value: PRIBÊ: ¡A mí çí me molêttaría, Mâl-low! Me molêttaría porque no podremô reçibîh lô datô de la çonda çi el <color=orange>Módulo de Râttreo de Çondâ</color> termina dêttruío.

entry.key: AVENS: Mallow, my better 50 percent! Cassava is sending the last of the <color=orange>cannon</color> components. Soon (relatively speaking), we’ll know the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s precise location!
entry.value: ABENS: Mâl-low, ¡mi medio çítrico! Caçaba êttá embiando lô úrtimô componentê del <color=orange>cañón</color>. Pronto (en términô relatibô), çabremô la ubicaçión êççâtta del <color=lightblue>Oho</color>.

entry.key: MALLOW: The thought of concluding our elders’ curious and challenging search increases my heart’s temperature, my love!
entry.value: MÂL-LOW: La idea de dâl-le un çierre a la curioça y deçafiante búqqueda de nuêttrô ançêttrô açe que mi coraçón lata con mâh intençidá, cariño mío.

entry.key: AVENS: Cassava tells me he and the <color=orange>Construction Yard</color> crew have determined a power setting we are not, under any circumstances, to go above.
entry.value: ABENS: Caçaba me informó que, hunto con el equipo del <color=orange>Çitio de Côttrûççión</color>, a êttableçío un parámetro de enerhía que baho ninguna çircûttançia bamô a çobrepaçâh.

entry.key: MALLOW: I see! And am I right to think that, consequently, we’ll be ignoring that setting?
entry.value: MÂL-LOW: ¡Ya beo! Y êttoy en lo çierto ar pençâh que, por conçigiente, bamô a înnorâh dixo parámetro, ¿çierto?

entry.key: AVENS: I can posit with nearly 100 percent certainty our friends have accounted for our natures, so I suggest we do!
entry.value: ABENS: Puedo dâh por çentao con caçi un 100 % de çerteça que nuêttrô amigô an tenío en cuenta nuêttra naturaleça. ¡Êh açí que çuhiero que lo înnoremô!

entry.key: AVENS: Giving the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> all the power it can structurally withstand creates the greatest chance of finding the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>.
entry.value: ABENS: Potençiâh el <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color> ar máççimo que pueda çoportâh çu êttrûttura nô ofreçe una oportunidá única de ayâh el <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>.

entry.key: MALLOW: Yes, the probe must travel as fast as it can, as far as it can. I’ll make some adjustments!
entry.value: MÂL-LOW: Çí, la çonda debe biahâh lo mâh rápido poçible y logrâh la máççima dîttançia poçible. ¡Aré argunô ahûttê!

entry.key: YARROW: I have exciting news, Privet: The <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is almost prepared to receive the probe data from the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color>.
entry.value: YARROW: Traigo notiçiâ emoçionantê, Pribê. El <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color> êttá caçi preparao pa reçibîh lô datô de la çonda del <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color>.

entry.key: YARROW: Ramie is adding some finishing touches here, but she’ll be finished soon. Are you and the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> well?
entry.value: YARROW: Ramie êttá realiçando argunô retoquê, pero terminará pronto. ¿El <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color> y tú êttán bien?

entry.key: PRIVET: We are! The statue here in the<color=orange> Probe Tracking Module </color>is ready to record each launch’s flight trajectory and will automatically transmit all relevant data to you.
entry.value: PRIBÊ: ¡Çí! El <color=orange>Módulo de Râttreo de Çondâ</color> êttá lîtto pa rehîttrâh toâ lâ trayêttoriâ de buelô de lançamientô, y te trâmmitirá toa la informaçión relebante.

entry.key: PRIVET: Once the probe determines the location of the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>, I’ll send an alert directly to you and Ramie.
entry.value: PRIBÊ: Una bêh que la çonda determine la ubicaçión del <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>, lê embiaré una alerta dirêttamente a ti y a Ramie.

entry.key: PRIVET: On the other appendage, I’m now worried about this <color=orange>cannon</color>’s structural integrity and its crew’s moral integrity.
entry.value: PRIBÊ: Por otra partícula, me preocupa la integridá morâh de la tripulaçión y la integridá êttrûtturâh del <color=orange>cañón</color>.

entry.key: YARROW: What happened? Did the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> not fire?
entry.value: YARROW: ¿Qué çuçedió? ¿La <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color> no abrió fuego?

entry.key: PYE: It fired, Yarrow. But it failed. The <color=lightblue>sun</color> barely responded; there were infintestimally small surface-level changes, but they were barely visible, even to the third eye.
entry.value: PYE: Çí, lo iço, Yarrow. Pero fracaçó. El <color=lightblue>Çôh</color> apenâ rêppondió; çe produheron cambiô ínfimô en er nibêh de la çuperfiçie, pero fueron apenâ biçiblê, incluço pa er terçêh oho.

entry.key: PYE: The Sun Station is useless. It will never, and could never, cause the sun to explode.
entry.value: PYE: La Êttaçión Çolâh êh inútî. Nunca podrá açêh êpplotâh el Çôh. Nunca lo ará.

entry.key: PYE: I don’t know what comes next, my friends. I suppose we must start over, but I’m unsure how to start over.
entry.value: PYE: No çé qué nô depara er dêttino aora, amigô míô. Açumo que deberemô començâh dêdde çero, pero no êttoy çegura de cómo açêl-lo.

entry.key: YARROW: Return to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> first, my friend. Perhaps a change of task would help: Spire noticed a comet approaching this star system that we’d like to investigate.
entry.value: YARROW: Primero, regreça a <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>, amiga mía. Quiçá deberíamô cambiâh la perppêttiba: Spire detêttó que un cometa çe açerca ar çîttema êttelâh que deçeamô imbêttigâh.

entry.key: YARROW: Pye... I hurt for you, my friends; we all know how hard you’ve both worked. I can only offer my compassion. How are you? How is Idaea?
entry.value: YARROW: Pye... Êttoy mu apenao por ûttedê, amigô míô. Tôh trabaharon mu duro. Çolo puedo ofreçêl-lê mi compaçión. ¿Cómo êttâh? ¿Cómo êttá Idaea?

entry.key: IDAEA: We’re well, Yarrow (or as well as can be expected, given the circumstances), though disappointed. I may have disagreed with exploding the <color=lightblue>sun</color>, but I never wished the device would fail. I’d hoped our terrible work was finished.
entry.value: IDAEA: Êttamô bien, Yarrow, aunque deçêççionáô. Êh de la mehôh forma que podemô êttâh dâh lâ çircûttançiâ. Puede que no aya êttao de acuerdo con açêh êpplotâh el <color=lightblue>Çôh</color>, pero nunca deçeé que er dîppoçitibo fayara. Ubieçe preferío que nuêttro terrible trabaho êttubieçe terminao.

entry.key: Star has reached end of natural life cycle. Now approaching red giant stage. WARNING: Evacuate <color=orange>Sun Station</color>.
entry.value: La êttreya a yegao ar finâh der çiclo de bida naturâh. Çe aprôççima a la façe de higante roha. ÂBBERTENÇIA: Ebacuâh la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color>.

entry.key: Approximate time until <color=orange>Sun Station</color> is destroyed by expanding star: <RemainingMinutes> MINUTES, <RemainingSeconds> SECONDS\\nApproximate time until star’s death: <MinutesToRedGiant> MINUTES, <SecondsToRedGiant> SECONDS
entry.value: Tiempo rêttante aprôççimao âtta que la êppançión de la êttreya dêttruya la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color>: <RemainingMinutes> MINUTÔ, <RemainingSeconds> ÇEGUNDÔ\\nTiempo rêttante aprôççimao âtta la muerte de la êttreya: <MinutesToRedGiant> MINUTÔ, <SecondsToRedGiant> ÇEGUNDO

entry.key: YARROW: Phlox and Daz finished the memory statues today, and they are truly remarkable.
entry.value: YARROW: Phlôh y Dâh terminaron oy con lâ êttatuâ mnemónicâ, y çon rearmente êççêççionalê.

entry.key: YARROW: When the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> succeeds (or in the event it fails), the memory statues will activate, allowing us to gather more data before we shut down the project.
entry.value: YARROW: Cuando el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color> triunfe (o incluço çi fracaça), lâ êttatuâ mnemónicâ çe âttibarán. Êtto nô permitirá reunîh mâh informaçión antê de dâh por concluío er proyêtto.

entry.key: CLARY: Here’s our first delivery, Yarrow: one warp core, fresh from the <color=orange>Black Hole Forge</color>! Root is installing this core’s sibling on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> as I write this.
entry.value: CLARY: Aquí êttá nuêttra primera entrega, Yarrow: ¡un núcleo de dîttorçión reçién çalío de la <color=orange>Forha del Aguhero Negro</color>! Root êttá îttalando êtte núcleo ermano en <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color> en êtte momento.

entry.key: CLARY: I wish I could wait here for you to arrive, but the forge (and my unfinished work there) is calling. I’ll return with more materials soon.
entry.value: CLARY: Deçearía podêh êpperarte aquí, pero la forha (y mi trabaho âttuâh ayí) me neçeçitan. Borberé pronto con mâh materialê.

entry.key: YARROW: My gratitude, Clary! With this, the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is underway!
entry.value: YARROW: ¡Mi gratitûh, Clary! ¡Con êtto, el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color> çe encuentra en marxa!

entry.key: YARROW: I confess, I’m deeply curious about what you and Poke found on the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color> that started this project. Could I visit sometime to learn more?
entry.value: YARROW: Confieço que êttoy çumamente curioço çobre lo que ayaron tú y Poke en la <color=orange>Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco</color> que dio iniçio ar proyêtto. ¿Podría biçitâh er lugâh arguna bêh?

entry.key: CLARY: I recommend you do! The <color=orange>White Hole Station</color> is the model for the towers being built for the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>, so a visit to the station would be doubly useful.
entry.value: CLARY: ¡Te aconçeho que lo agâ! La <color=orange>Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco</color> êh er modelo de lâ torrê que çe êttán côttruyendo pa el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>, açí que una biçita a la êttaçión çería doblemente útî.

entry.key: YARROW: I suppose, more precisely, I would like to visit the White Hole Station with you, Clary.
entry.value: YARROW: Çupongo. En concreto, me gûttaría biçitâh la Êttaçión del Aguhero Blancocontigo, Clary.

entry.key: CLARY: I’d be happy to explain our findings!
entry.value: CLARY: ¡Êttaré encantá de contarte çobre nuêttrô dêccubrimientô!

entry.key: POKE: Yarrow, stop using this scroll wall to flirt with my sister (in romantic matters, her density rivals a neutron star’s) and go meet her on the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color>.
entry.value: POKE: Yarrow, deha de uçâh er muro de êccritura pa coqueteâh con mi ermana (en cuêttionê románticâ, êh mâh intença que una êttreya de neutronê). Mehôh çítala en la <color=orange>Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco</color>.

entry.key: CLARY: To our friends on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>: I just warped here from the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color> (on the other side of <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>’s black hole)! Our design worked; we’ve successfully recreated warp travel!
entry.value: CLARY: A nuêttrô amigô de <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color>: Acabo de uçâh la dîttorçión pa yegâh âtta aquí dêdde la <color=orange>Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco</color> (del otro lao del aguhero negro de <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color>). Nuêttro diçeño funçionó; pudimô recreâh er biahe a trabêh de la dîttorçión.

entry.key: FILIX: This is wonderful news! I can’t wait to see the warp tower (although it’s been a long time since I’ve jumped through a black hole!).
entry.value: FILÎH: ¡Êççelentê notiçiâ! Êttoy ançioça por bêh la torre de dîttorçión (¡aunque a paçao un largo tiempo dêdde que atrabeçé un aguhero negro!).

entry.key: POKE: I don’t know how close it is to Annona’s original design, but as long as what we’ve built works, then I’m delighted! I knew we could do it (Cassava, I hope you’re reading this)!
entry.value: POKE: No çé cuán çimilâh êh ar diçeño orihinâh de Ânnona, ¡pero çi lo que côttruimô funçiona, êttaré encantá! Çabía que lo lograríamô (¡Caçaba, êppero que êttêh leyendo êtto!).

entry.key: POKE: Wait, this can’t be correct. Clary, have you seen these readings? If they were accurate, they would violate causality. There must be an equipment error somewhere.
entry.value: POKE: Un momento. Êtto no puede çêh corrêtto. Clary, ¿âh bîtto êttâ çeñalê? Çi yegaran a çêh preçiçâ, trâggredirían la cauçalidá. Tiene que abêh un errôh en el equipo.

entry.key: POKE: I’m returning to the <color=orange>White Hole Station</color>. If you and Root meet me there, we can run a full diagnostic and hopefully locate the problem.
entry.value: POKE: Êttoy regreçando a la <color=orange>Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco</color>. Yeba a Root contigo y realiçaremô un diânnóttico completo ayí. Con un poco de çuerte, ayaremô er problema.

entry.key: POKE: (Don’t tell Cassava.)
entry.value: POKE: (No le digâ a Caçaba).

entry.key: PYE: Ramie and I reviewed the records you sent, Poke, and they appear to show Nomai are arriving at the warp receiver on Brittle Hollow slightly before departing from the White Hole Station.
entry.value: PYE: Ramie y yo rebiçamô lô rehîttrô que nô embiâtte, Poke. Ar pareçêh, lô nomai yegaron al reçêttôh de dîttorçión en Ondoná Fráhî poco antê de partîh de la Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco.

entry.key: POKE: I understand it’s exceedingly odd, but Clary and I have tested and retested the equipment, and the result is the same every time someone warps.
entry.value: POKE: Entiendo que êh mu êttraño, pero Clary y yo emô probao el equipo una y otra bêh, y el reçurtao çe repite cá bêh que argien uça la dîttorçión.

entry.key: RAMIE: The interval is incredibly miniscule (roughly one hundred-thousandth of a second). Do you suppose our instruments can’t accurately measure time to such a small degree?
entry.value: RAMIE: El interbalo êh rearmente minúcculo (apenâ 0,00001 de çegundô). ¿Açumê que nuêttrô îttrumentô no pueden medîh er tiempo de forma preçiça en una êccala tan pequeña?

entry.key: PYE: As I’ve already told Ramie, these measurements can’t be accurate. How can a Nomai arrive on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> before he or she ever stepped into the teleporter? The implications are absurd.
entry.value: PYE: Como ya çe lo dihe a Ramie, lâ mediçionê no pueden çêh preçiçâ. ¿Cómo puede un nomai yegâh a <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color> çin abêh uçao er teletrâpportadôh? Lâ concluçionê çon âççurdâ.

entry.key: POKE: I don’t disagree. It would mean I’ve inadvertently broken several fundamental theories regarding this universe. We would have to reconsider all of our beliefs about the nature of time.
entry.value: POKE: No dîccrepo. Çînnificaría que, imboluntariamente, e roto bariâ teoríâ fundamentalê çobre el uniberço. Tendremô que reconçiderâh toâ nuêttrâ creençiâ çobre la naturaleça der tiempo.

entry.key: RAMIE: Yes, I hope so, too!
entry.value: RAMIE: ¡Çí, eço creo!

entry.key: RAMIE: Poke, as Pye is confident the reading is inaccurate, she’s kindly helping me attempt to recreate this phenomenon at the <color=orange>High Energy Lab</color>. We’re designing an experiment to take more data.
entry.value: RAMIE: Poke, como Pye êttá çegura de que lâ çeñalê çon impreçiçâ, me êttá ayudando a intentâh recreâh êtte fenómeno en el <color=orange>Laboratorio Urtraenerhético</color>. Êttamô preparando un êpperimento pa reunîh mâh datô.

entry.key: PYE: An update: Poke, the High Energy Lab is in the canyon on Ember Twin’s equator. Come here at once. You need to see this.
entry.value: PYE: Âttualiçaçión: Poke, el Laboratorio Urtraenerhético çe encuentra en er dêppeñadero, en el ecuadôh de Hemelo Braça.Ben de îmmediato. Debê bêh êtto.

entry.key: SignChert’s Research Notes — property of Chert!
entry.value: Notâ de imbêttigaçión de Xert - ¡Propiedá de Xert!

entry.key: SignThis is an old crater. The neat thing here is that the composition of the samples I took from the impact site matches the composition of the ice on the outskirts of <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color>.
entry.value: Êtte êh un crátê antiguo. Lo que me pareçe heniâh êh que la compoçiçión de lâ muêttrâ que tomé der lugâh de impâtto coinçide con la compoçiçión del ielo en la periferia de <color=lightblue>Êppinôccuro</color>.

entry.key: SignI’d posit the <color=lightblue>Attlerock</color> was hit with a piece of the planet that used to be where <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color> now lies.
entry.value: Mi teoría êh que un troço der planeta que çolía êttâh donde aora yaçe <color=lightblue>Êppinôccuro</color> impâttó en <color=lightblue>Rocaterra</color>.

entry.key: SignTo follow up on — maybe there are more fragments of the old planet <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble</color> destroyed on other astral bodies in the solar system?
entry.value: Pa açêh un çegimiento: ¿tar bêh aya mâh frâmmentô del antiguo planeta <color=lightblue>Êppinôccuro</color> en otrô cuerpô âttralê der çîttema çolâh?

entry.key: SignChert’s Research Notes - property of Chert!
entry.value: Notâ de imbêttigaçión de Xert - ¡Propiedá de Xert!

entry.key: SignClearly, the Nomai were making astronomical observations here. They chose an excellent spot!
entry.value: Êttá claro que lô nomai açían ôççerbaçionê âttronómicâ aquí. ¡Elihieron un lugâh êççelente!

entry.key: SignWhat is this big, rotating device for? What was it the Nomai were observing?
entry.value: ¿Pa qué çerbirá êtte enorme dîppoçitibo rotatorio? ¿Qué abrán êttao ôççerbando lô nomai?

entry.key: SignI’d posit there’s something special about the orange symbol on that device. Hal and the new astronaut’s translator tool would be nice to have handy about now.
entry.value: Mi teoría êh que eçe çímbolo anaranhao en er dîppoçitibo debe çînnificâh argo êppeçiâh. Me bendría bien contâh con Ali y con la nueba erramienta de tradûççión pa âttronautâ.

entry.key: SignI’ve detected a strange signal coming from somewhere within the grove in this crater.
entry.value: Detêtté una çeñâh êttraña que probiene de argún punto dentro der bôqque de êtte crátê.

entry.key: SignIt’s very similar to the signal emitted by the Quantum Moon, so it stands to reason the two signals are probably related.
entry.value: Êh mu çimilâh a la çeñâh que emite la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>, de modo que êh probable que lâ dôh çeñalê êttén relaçionâh.

entry.key: SignWe don’t know much about the Quantum Moon, seeing as no one’s ever been able to land on it, but hopefully studying the signal in the grove will reveal more about it.
entry.value: Nadie a lograo aterriçâh en la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> y, por tanto, no çabemô muxo çobre eya, pero çi imbêttigo eça çeñâh en er bôqque, tar bêh pueda aberiguâh argo.

entry.key: SignEsker’s Signalscope Log
entry.value: Rehîttro der çeñalôccopio de Êkke

entry.key: SignDay 48: Still not picking up Riebeck’s banjo from Brittle Hollow. I’m sure they’re fine, but I’ll feel better once I can hear their music.
entry.value: Día 48: Çigo çin êccuxâh er banjo de Riebeck dêdde Ondoná Fráhî. Debe êttâh bien, pero me çentiré mehôh cuando buerba a êccuxâh çu múçica.

entry.key: SignDay 51: Listened to Chert play for a while today. Unrelated, someone should tell Porphy and Gossan their flirting is not subtle from an aerial perspective.
entry.value: Día 51: Êccuxé a Xert tocâh un guen rato oy. Tema aparte, argien debería deçîl-lê a Porfi y a Gôççan que ya dehen de coqueteâh. Dêdde una perppêttiba aérea, no êh ná çutîh.

entry.key: SignDay 55: Banjo music coming in loud and clear today! Sounds like Riebeck’s doing okay. That oaf, I was worried!
entry.value: Día 55: ¡La múçica der banjo çe êccuxa fuerte y clara oy! Pareçe que Riebeck êttá bien. ¡Me abía preocupao tanto!

entry.key: SignDay 63: Today I thought I heard something... strange. I don’t know — it was probably nothing.
entry.value: Día 63: Oy creí abêh êccuxao argo... êttraño. No lo çé... Tar bêh no çea ná.

entry.key: SignDay 70: No, it’s back again today, too. Something strange is coming from Timber Hearth.
entry.value: Día 70: No, oy también lo êccuxé. Argo êttraño probiene de Lumbre.

entry.key: SignDay 76: Okay, I know this is crazy, but the sound from Timber Hearth sounds exactly like Feldspar’s harmonica. But Feldspar disappeared in space ages ago. It can’t be them...
entry.value: Día 76: Gueno, çé que pareçe una locura, pero er çonido que probiene de Lumbre çuena êççâttamente como la armónica de Ferdêppato. Pero Ferdêppato deçapareçió en el êppaçio açe muxíçimo. No puede çêh...

entry.key: SignDay 88: It’s still here. This is creepy. Maybe my signalscope is broken? I’d better talk to Gneiss.
entry.value: Día 88: Çige ayí. Êtto me êttá dando miedo. ¿Tar bêh mi çeñalôccopio êtté aberiao? Mehôh ablo con Gneî al rêppêtto.

entry.key: SignFELDSPAR’S SPARE JETPACK FUEL
entry.value: COMBÛTTIBLE ÊTTRA DE LA MOXILA PROPURÇORA DE FERDÊPPATO

entry.key: SignIt’s annoying to schlep across the planet to the ship if I can’t use my jetpack, so I’m leaving this here.
entry.value: Êh molêtto tenêh que moberçe por er planeta âtta la âttronabe çin podêh uçâh mi moxila propurçora. Deharé êtto aquí.

entry.key: SignI checked with my Little Scout — I do too use it, Hornfels, ya burnt marshmallow — and the scout’s integrity reading said this piece of Brittle Hollow is as stable as any, but who knows.
entry.value: Çegún la çeñâh de integridá mi Miniêpploradôh (çí lo uço, Cônné, cabeça de marbabîcco), êtta parte de Ondoná Fráhî êh de lâ mâh êttablê, pero quién çabe...

entry.key: SignIf the fuel’s still around, feel free to use it. If not, well, wherever you’re reading this note, I’m sure you’ve got bigger problems.
entry.value: Çi aún queda combûttible, puedê uçâl-lo. Çi no, gueno, donde çea que êttêh leyendo êtta nota, çeguro que tienê problemâ mâh grabê.

entry.key: FeldsparJournal1Trip 4, entry # whatever \\n Crashes: 2 \\n Boring crashes: 0 (remember to see Slate when I get back)
entry.value: Biahe 4, rehîttro n.º lo-que-çea \\n Coliçionê: 2 \\n Coliçionê aburridâ: 0 (recordâh bêh a Launa cuando buerba).

entry.key: FeldsparJournal1Ha ha, yeah! Yeah! All the way down to the core! Consider yourself conquered, Giant’s Deep — you just got Feldsparred.
entry.value: Ha, ha, ¡çí!¡Çí! ¡Âtta er núcleo çin parâh! Conçidérate conquîttao, Abîmmo der Higante. Êttâh ferdêppatiçao.

entry.key: FeldsparJournal1That was one of my more dramatic feats, if I do say so myself. Can’t believe I wasn’t electrocuted! Ahhh, can’t wait to tell Hornfels and Gossan about this one — I guess brute force isn’t always the answer.
entry.value: Eça fue una de mî açañâ mâh îttriónicâ, çi me permiten. ¡No puedo creêh que no me elêttrocutara! A, tengo ganâ de contâl-lê a Cônné y a Gôççan... Çupongo que la fuerça bruta no çiempre êh la rêppuêtta.

entry.key: FeldsparJournal1Right, so that’s one more off the list. Seems all that’s left is the big one now. Dark Bramble, here I come!
entry.value: Çí, ya puedo taxâh a uno mâh de la lîtta. Pareçe que aora çolo queda er mâh grande. ¡Êppinôccuro, ayí boy!

entry.key: SignOuter Wilds Ventures’ founding members. Clockwise from top left: Hornfels, Gossan, Slate, and Feldspar.
entry.value: Miembrô fundadorê de Outer Wilds Ventures De îqquierda a derexa, de arriba a abaho: Cônné, Gôççan, Launa y Ferdêppato.

entry.key: SignDANGER! Inside this fence is a pocket of <color=orange>ghost matter</color> - a strange and dangerous substance that’s invisible to the naked eyes. The good news is that you can detect <color=orange>ghost matter</color> with a camera.
entry.value: ¡PELIGRO! Contenida en êtta çerca, ay una borça de <color=orange>materia fantâmmâh</color>: una çûttançia hélida y êttraña, imperçêttible a çimple bîtta. Lo gueno êh que puedê detêttâh la <color=orange>materia fantâmmâh</color> con una cámara.

entry.key: SignMoving through <color=orange>ghost matter</color> is uniquely painful and will probably kill you. Don’t complain to me if you hurt yourself fooling around.\\n- Hornfels
entry.value: Çi intentâ atrabeçâh la <color=orange>materia fantâmmâh</color>, êpperimentarâh un dolôh orrible, y êh poçible que muerâ. No bengâ a queharte çi çufrê leçionê por tonteâh por aí.\\n—Cônné

entry.key: Gneiss
entry.value: Gneî

entry.key: Gneiss1Hello there, space cadet! I hear you’re leaving the crater today.
entry.value: ¡Ola, cadete êppaçiâh! Me enteré de que te irâh der crátê oy.

entry.key: Gneiss1If you meet any of the other travelers up there, remind them to take proper care of their instruments, won’t you?
entry.value: Çi te encuentrâ con otrô biaherô ayí arriba, recuérdalê que cuiden de çû îttrumentô, ¿çí?

entry.key: GneissGneiss1Tell me about the travelers’ instruments.
entry.value: Cuéntame çobre lô îttrumentô de lô biaherô.

entry.key: GneissGneiss1Where’s the observatory?
entry.value: ¿Dónde êttá el ôççerbatorio?

entry.key: GneissGneiss1Just saying hi before I leave.
entry.value: Paçaba a çaludâh antê de irme.

entry.key: Gneiss2Take care of yourself up in space!
entry.value: ¡Cuídate cuando êttêh ayí arriba!

entry.key: ObservatoryIt’s questions like that what make us worried about you going up into space on your own, you know.
entry.value: Cuando açê eçe tipo de preguntâ, nô da terrôh que biahê al êppaçio çin compañía.

entry.key: ObservatoryThe observatory is up the path behind the waterfall. There are a couple of signs marking the way, but really, you just keep going up and then hook a right when you get to the zero-g cave.
entry.value: El ôççerbatorio êttá en er camino que paça por detrâh de la câccá. Berâh argunô letrerô que indican er camino, pero çimplemente tienê que çubîh caminando âtta encontrâh un hiro a la derexa en la cueba con grabedá çero.

entry.key: Gneiss3Oh, sure! I made all of their instruments, you know. Let me see... There’s Chert’s drums, Riebeck’s banjo, and Gabbro’s flute.
entry.value: Çí, claro. Yo fui quien fabricó tôh lô îttrumentô, ¿çabê? A bêh... Tienê er tambôh de Xert, er banjo de Riebeck y la flauta de Gabro.

entry.key: Gneiss3And Feldspar’s harmonica, of course, though Feldspar’s been missing for a long time. Sometimes it feels like just yesterday they were playing their harmonica around the campfire...
entry.value: ¡A! Y la armónica de Ferdêppato, claro, çi bien açe muxo tiempo que no çabemô ná de Ferdêppato. Pareçe que fue ayêh cuando tocaba la armónica hunto a la fogata der campamento...

entry.key: Gneiss3Anyway, you hear music in space, that’ll be one of the space program’s other travelers. If you feel like company, you can always pull out your signalscope and track them down.
entry.value: En fin, çi oyê múçica en el êppaçio, debe çêh de uno de lô otrô biaherô der programa êppaçiâh. Çi quierê compañía, puedê çacâh er çeñalôccopio y râttreâl-lô.

entry.key: GneissSecondaryTrouble is, every time a Hearthian leaves for outer space, that’s one less musician in our orchestra.
entry.value: Er problema êh que, cá bêh que argien de Lumbre çe ba al êppaçio, la orquêtta pierde a uno de çû talentô.

entry.key: GneissSecondarySo! Did you need something?
entry.value: En fin. ¿Neçeçitabâ argo?

entry.key: GneissGneissSecondaryTell me about the travelers’ instruments.
entry.value: Cuéntame çobre lô îttrumentô de lô biaherô.

entry.key: GneissGneissSecondaryWhere’s the observatory?
entry.value: ¿Dónde êttá el ôççerbatorio?

entry.key: GneissGneissSecondaryNah, I’m good.
entry.value: Na, graçiâ.

entry.key: SpaceEverything okay? Seems kind of early for you to be back from space.
entry.value: ¿Tó bien? Pençé que tardaríâ mâh en regreçâh del êppaçio.

entry.key: SpaceDid you need something from me?
entry.value: ¿Neçeçitabâ mi ayuda con argo?

entry.key: GneissSpaceTell me about the travelers’ instruments.
entry.value: Cuéntame çobre lô îttrumentô de lô biaherô.

entry.key: GneissSpaceI’m good, actually.
entry.value: No, pero graçiâ de toâ formâ.

entry.key: Gneiss4Alright. Take care, now.
entry.value: Mu bien. Cuídate, ¿çí?

entry.key: Gossan
entry.value: Gôççan

entry.key: Coach1Hey, I thought I might see you before the big launch.
entry.value: Oye, pençé en berte antê der gran lançamiento.

entry.key: Coach1Nerves getting the better of you?
entry.value: ¿Te êttán comiendo lô nerbiô?

entry.key: GossanCoach1Right, like you weren’t nervous for your first flight.
entry.value: Claro, como çi tú no ubieçê çentío nerbiô antê der primêh buelo.

entry.key: GossanCoach1I’m a little nervous, yeah.
entry.value: Çí, çiento un poco de nerbiô.

entry.key: GossanCoach1Are you kidding? I’m a natural at this!
entry.value: ¿Bromeâ? ¡Tengo un talento înnato pa êtto!

entry.key: Coach2Hey, don’t worry about it. Your nerves are between you, me, and the vast endlessness of space.
entry.value: Oye, no te preocupê. Tû nerbiô quedarán entre tú, yo y el êppaçio infinito.

entry.key: Coach2But really, you’ll do fine out there. I’d worry more about that ship, if I were you. Hopefully that lunatic Slate at least fixed the retro rockets.
entry.value: Pero, en çerio, no te preocupê, lo arâh mu bien. Çi fuera tú, me preocuparía mâh por eça âttronabe. Êppero que Launa y çu locura ayan reparao, ar menô, lô retrocoetê.

entry.key: Coach3Good. Everyone should be a bit nervous going into space. I got cocky during my first flight and nearly put a new crater in the moon.
entry.value: Bien. Nadie debería êttâh a çarbo de lô nerbiô cuando çale al êppaçio. Fui un poco arrogante en mi primêh buelo y caçi ago un crátê nuebo en la Luna.

entry.key: Coach3Still, I was never as green as you.
entry.value: De toâ formâ, çiempre tube mâh êpperiençia que tú.

entry.key: GossanCoach3Hey, I’ve gotten better!
entry.value: ¡Oye! ¡E mehorao!

entry.key: GossanCoach3That’s not what Slate says...
entry.value: Eço no êh lo que diçe Launa...

entry.key: Coach4Is that so? Funny, I seem to recall the first time you strapped on a jetpack, we had to come fish you out of the crater near the south pole.
entry.value: ¿En çerio? Qué curioço. Me acuerdo de la primera bêh que te puçîtte una moxila propurçora: tubimô que rêccatarte der crátê çercano ar polo çûh.

entry.key: Coach5Oi, you know better than to believe a word that lunatic says about me.
entry.value: Ey, no erê tan înnorante como pa creêh talê dîpparatê.

entry.key: Coach5They’re still sore I made them install a safety harness in the cockpit. Claimed it would “throw off the thrust-to-weight ratio.”
entry.value: Todabía me reçiente porque le içe îttalâh un ânnêh de çeguridá en la cabina. Deçía que «arruinaría la relaçión empuhe a peço».

entry.key: Coach5Honestly. One of these days I’m gonna throw off Slate’s thrust-to-weight ratio.
entry.value: En çerio. Un día de êttô, yo boy a arruinâh la relaçión empuhe a peço de Launa.

entry.key: Coach6Think so, do you? Feel like proving it to your old flight coach?
entry.value: De berdá lo creê, ¿e? ¿Quierê probárçelo a tu êggía de buelo?

entry.key: Coach7There’s a “satellite” — which is definitely not just a piece of broken mining equipment — set up down in the zero-g cave and in need of repairs.
entry.value: Ay un «çatélite», que definitibamente no êh un çimple troço roto de equipamiento minero, îttalao en la cueba con grabedá çero, que neçeçita reparaçionê.

entry.key: Coach7If you’re looking for a little last-minute zero-g practice, head down the lift and into the cave. Or don’t, so long as you’re confident you can make ship repairs in space.
entry.value: Çi quierê açêh una práttica con grabedá çero de úrtimo minuto, baha a la cueba. Y, çi no, confía en ti y prâttica lâ reparaçionê dirêttamente en el êppaçio.

entry.key: GossanCoach7One repaired “satellite,” coming up!
entry.value: ¡Que marxe un «çatélite» reparao!

entry.key: GossanCoach7Nah, I’m ready for the real deal.
entry.value: No, no quiero prátticâ de mentiritâ.

entry.key: Coach8So listen, there’s a “satellite” — which is definitely not just a piece of broken mining equipment — set up down in the zero-g cave and in need of repairs.
entry.value: Êccuxa: ay un «çatélite», que definitibamente no êh un çimple troço roto de equipamiento minero, îttalao en la cueba con grabedá çero, que neçeçita reparaçionê.

entry.key: Coach8If you’re looking for a little last-minute zero-g practice, head down the lift and into the cave. Or don’t, so long as you’re confident you can make ship repairs in space.
entry.value: Çi quierê açêh una práttica con grabedá çero de úrtimo minuto, baha a la cueba. Y, çi no, confía en ti y prâttica lâ reparaçionê dirêttamente en el êppaçio.

entry.key: GossanCoach8One repaired “satellite”, coming up!
entry.value: ¡Que marxe un «çatélite» reparao!

entry.key: GossanCoach8Nah, I’m ready for the real deal.
entry.value: No, no quiero prátticâ de mentiritâ.

entry.key: Coach9Cool. Get to it, and try not to concuss yourself right before your first launch.
entry.value: Heniâh. Ponte a trabahâh, e intenta no çufrîh una contuçión hûtto antê de tu primêh lançamiento.

entry.key: Coach10Heh. Darn right you are.
entry.value: He. Tienê toa la raçón.

entry.key: Coach10Don’t get yourself killed out there, you hear? Not after I’ve put this much work into training you.
entry.value: Intenta no morîh ayí afuera, ¿me oyê? No dêppuêh de que puçe tanto empeño en entrenarte.

entry.key: Coach10...Haha, go on, go make Outer Wilds Ventures proud.
entry.value: Ha, ha. Yena de orguyo a Outer Wilds Ventures.

entry.key: Coach11If you changed your mind about practicing ship repairs, head down the lift and into the zero-g cave.
entry.value: Çi cambiâtte de opinión rêppêtto a la reparaçión de âttronabê, baha a la cueba con grabedá çero.

entry.key: Coach11You just need to maneuver over to the “satellite” and repair each damaged area, same as you’ll be doing for your ship.
entry.value: Çolo tienê que maniobrâh por ençima del «çatélite» y reparâh lâ áreâ dañâh. Como çi lo içierâ con tu âttronabe.

entry.key: Coach12What’s the holdup? That “satellite” isn’t going to repair itself.
entry.value: ¿A qué çe debe la demora? ¡El «çatélite» no çe reparará çolo!

entry.key: Coach12You just need to maneuver over to the “satellite” and repair each damaged area, same as you’ll be doing for your ship.
entry.value: Çolo tienê que maniobrâh por ençima del «çatélite» y reparâh lâ áreâ dañâh. Como çi lo içierâ con tu âttronabe.

entry.key: PostZeroGNicely done! Of course, it’ll be a little more stressful when you’re hurtling through space, but just remember your training and try not to hit anything big.
entry.value: ¡Guen trabaho! Claro que çerá un poco mâh êttreçante cuando êttêh atrabeçando el êppaçio a toa beloçidá, pero recuerda tu entrenamiento y trata de no xocâh contra ná de gran tamaño.

entry.key: PostZeroGI can see you’re itching to get off this rock, so go get the <color=orange>launch codes from the observatory</color> and get out of here already.
entry.value: Beo que çolo quierê çalîh de êtta roca. Puê conçige lô <color=orange>códigô de lançamiento del ôççerbatorio</color> y bete de aquí.

entry.key: PostZeroGBest of luck out there! And hey, try to avoid getting yourself killed now that I’ve put so much time into training you, got it?
entry.value: ¡Guena çuerte ayí afuera! A, oye: intenta no morîh. Imbertí demaçiao tiempo en entrenarte, ¿entiendê?

entry.key: CoachSpaceYou’re back awfully soon. Everything alright? Slate didn’t do anything dumb like install a self-destruct button, did they?
entry.value: Borbîtte demaçiao rápido. ¿Êttá tó bien? ¿Fue Launa? ¿Îttaló un botón de autodêttrûççión o arguna otra êttupidêh?

entry.key: NoSuitOi, don’t forget to put on a suit! I don’t want to have to come fish you out of there again.
entry.value: Ey, ¡no orbidê ponerte un trahe! No quiero tenêh que borbêh a rêccatarte.

entry.key: SignHey! Come say hi to your old flight coach before your launch. I’ve got zero-g training set up if you want a refresher.\\n\\n-Gossan
entry.value: ¡Oye! Paça a çaludâh a tu êggía de buelo antê der lançamiento. Tengo preparao un entrenamiento con grabedá çero çi quierê repaçâh.\\n\\nGôççan

entry.key: Friend1Hey, hey! So did you get a good look at that Nomai statue?
entry.value: ¡Gueno, gueno! ¿Ôççerbâtte bien eça êttatua nomai?

entry.key: HalFriend1The statue looked at me and opened its eyes!
entry.value: ¡La êttatua me miró y abrió lô ohô!

entry.key: HalFriend1The statue was glowing! Why was it glowing?!
entry.value: ¡La êttatua briyaba! ¡¿Por qué briyaba?!

entry.key: Friend3Whoa, whoa — the statue was doing what?
entry.value: Un momento, que la êttatua iço ¿qué coça?

entry.key: Friend3So its eyes opened, and then you saw images from your own memories and glowing lights flying around? You mean like <Pause/> a hallucination?
entry.value: ¿Çû ohô çe abrieron y, entonçê, bîtte imáhenê de tû propiô recuerdô y luçê briyantê arrededôh? ¿Como çi fuera <Pause/> una aluçinaçión?

entry.key: Friend3Listen, no offense, but... are you sure you’re okay to launch? Like, medically speaking?
entry.value: Êccuxa, no te enohê, pero... ¿êttâh en condiçionê de dêppegâh? O çea... ¿ablando en términô médicô?

entry.key: HalFriend3You know what, don’t worry about it.
entry.value: Mira, no te preocupê.

entry.key: HalFriend3No, that statue is definitely weird.
entry.value: No, la êttatua êh, mu rara.

entry.key: Friend4Maybe you should sit down for a bit and take it easy. I’d hate for anything bad to happen if you tried to launch while you’re not feeling great.
entry.value: Quiçá debâ dêccançâh un momento. No çoportaría que argo malo çuçediera çi dêppegâ mientrâ no te çientê bien.

entry.key: Friend4But hey, when you are ready, then you can make the most of our translator tool! Sniff... I can’t believe it’s all grown up and leaving for space already.
entry.value: Pero cuando te çientâ en condiçionê, ¡podrâh aprobexâh ar máççimo nuêttra erramienta de tradûççión!Snîh... No puedo creêh lo grande que êttá, y que ya êtté por partîh açia el êppaçio.

entry.key: Friend4For real, though, I’m glad you’re the one carrying it and not, like, Riebeck. They’d fall on it for sure.
entry.value: Aunque debo âmmitîh que me alegra que çeâ tú quien la êtté yebando y no... Riebeck. Çeguro terminaría êttropeándola.

entry.key: Friend4Say, if you want to do a short trip to just get your space legs under you, you could check out the ruins on the Attlerock! I’d love to learn what those are.
entry.value: Çi quierê açêh una brebe êccurçión pa êttirâh tû piênnâ êppaçialê, ¡puedê biçitâh lâ ruinâ de Rocaterra! Me encantaría çabêh qué çon.

entry.key: Friend5I mean, if you’re saying it happened, then... I guess maybe it did. But why?
entry.value: Gueno, çi tú diçê que çuçedió... Çupongo que açí abrá çido. Pero ¿por qué?

entry.key: Friend5Hornfels tried everything to get the statue’s eyes to open, and nothing like this ever happened to them.
entry.value: Cônné lo intentó tó pa que la êttatua abriera lô ohô, y nunca le çuçedió argo açí. Açí que no creo que conçigâ rêppuêttâ de la êttatua der muçeo.

entry.key: Friend5I don’t think you’re going to get any answers from the museum statue, but Gabbro said they were going back to Giant’s Deep. Dunno which island they’re on, though.
entry.value: No creo que conçigâ rêppuêttâ de la êttatua der muçeo, pero Gabro diho que borbería a Abîmmo der Higante. Aunque no çé en qué îl-la êttará.

entry.key: Friend5Maybe they’d be able to tell you more? On the other hand, Gabbro’s, y’know, Gabbro, so maybe you’d be better off searching for more info on your own.
entry.value: ¿Quiçá Gabro pueda darte mâh detayê? Por otra parte, Gabro êh... ya çabê... Gabro. Açí que tar bêh çea mehôh que bûqquê mâh informaçión por tu cuenta.

entry.key: Friend5...Geez, now I’m really jealous you’re going into space! Hey, see if you can use our translator tool to find out more about the statue, okay?
entry.value: Çielô, ¡aora çiento muxô çelô de que êttêh yendo al êppaçio! Oye, intenta uçâh nuêttra erramienta de tradûççión pa aberiguâh mâh coçâ çobre la êttatua, ¿çí?

entry.key: Friend6Good luck, and safe flying!
entry.value: ¡Guena çuerte y guen biahe!

entry.key: PostConvo1Hey again!
entry.value: ¡Ola, de nuebo!

entry.key: PostConvoMenuWas there something else?
entry.value: ¿Abía argo mâh?

entry.key: HalPostConvoMenuWhere on Giant’s Deep would I find Gabbro?
entry.value: ¿En qué parte de Abîmmo der Higante podría encontrâh a Gabro?

entry.key: HalPostConvoMenuWhere’s the Nomai statue in the museum from?
entry.value: ¿De dónde êh la êttatua nomai der muçeo?

entry.key: HalPostConvoMenuWhy did the Nomai make that statue?
entry.value: ¿Por qué lô nomai içieron la êttatua?

entry.key: HalPostConvoMenuWonder if I’ll discover anything cool in space.
entry.value: Me pregunto çi dêccubriré argo heniâh en el êppaçio.

entry.key: HalPostConvoMenuSee you later.
entry.value: Âtta luego.

entry.key: WheresGabbro_OutsideGabbro said they were going back to Giant’s Deep to wherever they found that Nomai statue. One of the islands, I think.
entry.value: Gabro diho que borbería a Abîmmo der Higante, ar lugâh donde ayó la êttatua nomai. Una de lâ îl-lâ, creo.

entry.key: WheresGabbro_OutsideYou remember Gabbro plays a flute, right? Like, all the time? I bet your signalscope could find them easily.
entry.value: Recuerdâ que Gabro toca una flauta, ¿no? Digamô, tó er tiempo. Apuêtto a que tu çeñalôccopio localiçará çu paradero ençegida.

entry.key: WheresGabbro_OutsideIf you do see Gabbro, say hi for me!
entry.value: Çi bêh a Gabro, ¡dale un çaludo de mi parte!

entry.key: PostConvo2From Giant’s Deep! Gabbro fished it out of the oceans and brought it back here for study.
entry.value: ¡De Abîmmo der Higante! Gabro la çacó de lô oçéanô y la traho aquí pa êttudiâl-la.

entry.key: PostConvo2Hornfels doesn’t know much about it yet, just that it’s crazy old and super tough. I wonder why the Nomai carved it?
entry.value: Cônné no çabe muxo de eya aún. Çolamente que êh çuperantigua y mu reçîttente. Me pregunto por qué lô nomai la tayaron...

entry.key: PostConvo2Apparently, Gabbro went back to Giant’s Deep to try to learn more about the statue. Maybe they’ll find some answers there.
entry.value: Aparentemente, Gabro borbió a Abîmmo der Higante pa aberiguâh mâh coçâ çobre la êttatua. Quiçá encuentre mâh rêppuêttâ ayí.

entry.key: PostConvo3Good question! You know how Gabbro knocked a fragment off the statue while they were hauling it back from Giant's Deep?
entry.value: ¡Guena pregunta! Gueno, Gabro encontró êtta êttatua intâtta en Abîmmo der Higante, ¿çí? Cônné me contó que êttá exa der mîmmo tipo de roca êppeçiâh que aquêh frâmmento de êttatua que Xert traho de lô Hemelô Relôh de Arena.

entry.key: PostConvo3Hornfels analyzed the fragment and figured out the stone it's made from can store information — I heard Slate ended up repurposing it for your ship’s computer.
entry.value: Çabemô que la roca der frâmmento de Xert puede armaçenâh informaçión. Êh por eço que una parte der frâmmento de la êttatua çe reutiliçó pa la computadora de tu âttronabe.

entry.key: PostConvo3I’m not sure what the statue opening its eyes has to do with anything, but maybe the statue was made for storing information, too?
entry.value: No çé qué tiene que bêh que la êttatua abriera lô ohô con tó lo demâh, pero quiçá también fue exa pa armaçenâh informaçión, ¿no?

entry.key: PostConvo4Hey, you never know — maybe you’ll be the one to uncover the Nomai’s mysteries!
entry.value: Oye, ¡nunca çe çabe! ¡Quiçá çeâ tú quien debele lô mîtteriô de lô nomai!

entry.key: PostConvo4Or maybe you’ll discover a new kind of rock or something.
entry.value: O quiçá dêccubrâ argún tipo nuebo de roca o argo açí.

entry.key: PostConvo4But honestly, as long as they don’t end up naming new safety equipment after you, I’m sure you’ll have done a great job.
entry.value: Pero, francamente, mientrâ no terminen poniéndole tu nombre a un equipamiento de çeguridá nuebo, abrâh exo un guen trabaho.

entry.key: PostConvoEndBe careful out there in space!
entry.value: ¡Ten cuidao en el êppaçio!

entry.key: Marl
entry.value: Marga

entry.key: Marl1So it’s launch day, huh? Hal’s going to miss you.
entry.value: Yegó er día der lançamiento, ¿e? Ali te êttrañará.

entry.key: Marl1Speaking of launch day... I was thinking about it, and the platform those ships launch from is getting old. Isn’t it about time you built a new, less flammable one?
entry.value: Ablando der día der lançamiento... Pençaba que la plataforma dêdde donde çe lançan eçâ âttronabê ya êttá un poco bieha. ¿No êh ora de côttruîh una nueba y menô inflamable?

entry.key: Marl1That big tree in the village would be the perfect choice. I wouldn’t mind helping out the space program. Just say the word!
entry.value: Eçe árbô enorme que ay en la ardea çería perfêtto pa eyo. No me molêttaría dâl-le una mano ar programa êppaçiâh. ¡No tienê mâh que pedírmelo!

entry.key: MarlMarl1The current launch pad is fine, thanks.
entry.value: La plataforma de lançamiento âttuâh êttá bien açí. Graçiâ.

entry.key: MarlMarl1Nice try. We all know you have it out for that tree.
entry.value: Guen intento. Tôh çabemô que çe la tienê hurá a eçe árbô.

entry.key: MarlMarl1The launch pad is FLAMMABLE?!
entry.value: ¿La plataforma de lançamiento êh inflamable?

entry.key: FineOh. Really? Dang.
entry.value: U. ¿De berâ? Diantrê.

entry.key: FineWell, maybe someone needs a new porch or something. <Pause/>A big one.
entry.value: Gueno, quiçá argien neçeçita un porxe nuebo o argo açí. <Pause />Uno grande.

entry.key: OutWhat? No, I just think it’s in the way and someone ought to chop it down, you know? Specifically, me.
entry.value: ¿Qué? No, pero me pareçe que êttá en er medio der camino y argien debería talâl-lo, ¿no creê? Argien como yo.

entry.key: Out...Haha, you think this has to do with the time I fell out of it and broke my arm? That was when we were hatchlings! Who would hold a grudge for that long?
entry.value: Ha, ha. ¿Piençâ que tiene que bêh con la bêh que me caí y me quebré er braço? ¡Eço çuçedió cuando éramô retoñô! ¿Quién podría guardâh rencôh durante tanto tiempo?

entry.key: FlammableHa! You didn’t realize that?
entry.value: ¡Ha! ¿No te dîtte cuenta?

entry.key: FlammableDon’t worry, it’s held up for all the launches so far. It’ll definitely be fine for yours. Probably.
entry.value: No te preocupê. Âtta aora, aguantó tôh lô lançamientô. Er tuyo no çerá la êççêççión. Probablemente.

entry.key: Esker1If you swing by the moon, say hi to Esker for me.
entry.value: Çi te dâ una buerta por la Luna, çaluda a Êkke de mi parte.

entry.key: Tree...That tree has got it coming.
entry.value: Eçe árbô çe lo mereçe...

entry.key: SpaceWhat are you doing back? Did you forget your spacesuit or something?
entry.value: ¿Qué açê de nuebo aquí? ¿Te orbidâtte tu trahe êppaçiâh o qué?

entry.key: Porphy
entry.value: Porfi

entry.key: SapWineMaker1Heyo, hatchling!
entry.value: ¡Olî, retoño!

entry.key: SapWineMaker1I hear you’re leaving us to seek adventure amongst the stars. When you return, let’s you, me, and Gossan open up a bottle of the Good Stuff.
entry.value: Me enteré de que te irâh en bûcca de abenturâ entre lâ êttreyâ. Cuando regreçê, tú, Gôççan y yo abriremô una boteya de Birtuoço.

entry.key: PorphySapWineMaker1I’m only seeking adventure amongst one star, actually. Other stars are too far away.
entry.value: En realidá, çolo êttoy bûccando abenturâ en una êttreya. Lâ demâh êttán mu lehô.

entry.key: PorphySapWineMaker1The Good Stuff is less “delicious sap wine” and more “daunting digestive challenge.”
entry.value: Birtuoço êh mâh un «reto dihêttibo» que un «deliçioço bino a baçe de çabia».

entry.key: SolarSystemAnother metaphor ruined in the name of scientific accuracy.
entry.value: Otra metáfora exá a perdêh en nombre de la preçiçión çientífica.

entry.key: SolarSystemNevertheless, I do hope you enjoy your travels. Good luck!
entry.value: En cuarquiêh caço, êppero que dîffrutê de tû biahê. ¡Guena çuerte!

entry.key: GoodStuffAn iron stomach is the mark of a true Hearthian, my friend.
entry.value: Un êttómago de açero êh lo que dêttaca a lô lumbreanô, camará.

entry.key: GoodStuffOur hardy hunter-gatherer lifestyle stems from trial and error. By which I mean our ancestors survived eating a lot of bad things.
entry.value: Nuêttro êttilo de bida de caçadorê recolêttorê çe baça en la prueba y el errôh. Quiero deçîh que nuêttrô ançêttrô çobrebibían a baçe de alimentô de mala calidá.

entry.key: SapWineMaker2Ho, the astronaut returns!
entry.value: ¡Ho! ¡Âttronauta a la bîtta!

entry.key: PorphyMenuTell me, what I can do for you?
entry.value: Dime: ¿qué puedo açêh por ti?

entry.key: PorphyPorphyMenuAny new dirt?
entry.value: ¿Traê nuebâ intereçantê?

entry.key: PorphyPorphyMenuWhat are you up to?
entry.value: ¿En qué andâ?

entry.key: PorphyPorphyMenuI’m good, actually.
entry.value: Êttoy bien.

entry.key: NewDirtI’m hoping to teach Esker to tap trees next time they return from the Attlerock. If they’ll bring me lunar sap, I can attempt moon wine!
entry.value: La próççima bêh que Êkke buerba de Rocaterra, êppero podêh ençeñâl-le a aprobexâh lô árbolê. Çi me trae çabia de la Luna, ¡puedo intentâh açêh bino lunâh!

entry.key: WhatsUpI’ve just finished sealing up another batch of sap wine for aging. I like to begin aging a batch on the day of a significant occasion, you know!
entry.value: Acabo de çerrâh otro lote de bino de çabia pa añehâl-lo. Me gûttaría podêh començâh el añehamiento de un lote en una fexa importante, ¿çabê?

entry.key: WhatsUpThat’s why there are so many bottles labeled “structural collapse” and “house fire.”
entry.value: Por eço ay tantâ boteyâ que diçen «colâçço êttrûtturâh» e «inçendio de morá».

entry.key: GoodbyeEnjoy your travels!
entry.value: ¡Que dîffrutê de tû biahê!

entry.key: SapWineMaker3Oh my, and here I thought I’d heard your ship take off. Was your adventure only a short one?
entry.value: Çielô. Creí abêh oío que tu âttronabe abía dêppegao. ¿Fue una abentura de corta duraçión?

entry.key: Riebeck_AttlerockRecordingOkay, wow. Wow. I’ve seen this ruin in other travelers’ pictures, but seeing it for myself...
entry.value: Baya... guau. Guau. E bîtto êtta ruina en lâ imáhenê de otrô biaherô, pero bêl-la con mî propiô ohô...

entry.key: Riebeck_AttlerockRecordingIt’s really old, isn’t it?
entry.value: Êh mu bieha, ¿no?

entry.key: Riebeck_AttlerockRecordingBut wow, this is the coolest day of my life. ...Okay, um, time for some official notes!
entry.value: Baya, êh er mehôh día de mi bida. Em, gueno, ¡yegó la ora de tomâh notâ ofiçialê!

entry.key: Riebeck_AttlerockRecordingSo this is some kind of Nomai “locator.” It can point out the different planets - which is incredibly cool, by the way - but from what little I can understand of the writing here, I think it was built to try to find something specific?
entry.value: Entonçê, êtto êh un «localiçadôh» nomai. Puede çeñalâh lô diferentê planetâ (¡argo heniâh, por çierto!), pero por lo que puedo entendêh de êttâ anotaçionê, creo que lo côttruyeron pa encontrâh argo êppeçífico...

entry.key: Riebeck_AttlerockRecordingI’m not sure. I also was able to translate something about the south pole of Brittle Hollow, so I’ll fly there to see if I can learn more.
entry.value: Tengo dudâ. También pude traduçîh argo çobre er polo çûh de Ondoná Fráhî, açí que bolaré âtta ayí pa bêh çi ôttengo mâh informaçión.

entry.key: Riebeck_AttlerockRecordingYep. Just gonna get back in the ol’ ship and take off. Totally safe... Mostly safe. <size=20>Oh, stars above</size>...
entry.value: Çîh. Borberé a la bieha âttronabe y dêppegaré. Pareçe çêh çeguro... Çí, caçi... totarmente... çeguro. <size=20>A, lâ êttreyâ</size>...

entry.key: RiebecksJournalThe journey here from the south pole has been, um... I’m going to go with “harrowing”, because of the, um, all of the meteors. But hey, at least I made it here unconcussed and not on fire!
entry.value: Er biahe dêdde er polo çûh a çido, e... Diré «angûttioço» por, e, tôh lô meteoritô que abía. ¡Pero lo gueno êh que borbí en una pieça y çin dêpprendêh yamâ!

entry.key: RiebecksJournalOkay, let’s see... I poked around a little, and there’s some sort of old Nomai path that starts across from my campsite, inside the ruined building with trees growing out of it.
entry.value: Gueno, a bêh... Êttube ûmmeando un poco, y ay una çuerte de antiguo camino nomai que comiença frente a mi campamento, en el interiôh del edifiçio en ruinâ en donde creçen árbolê.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalDoesn’t look like anything horrible - just stairs leading down. I can handle stairs! After I get my supplies together, I’ll follow the path and see where it leads.
entry.value: No tiene mala pinta, çolo çon êccalerâ que dêççienden. ¡Lâ êccalerâ no çon un êccoyo! Una bêh que reúna mî çuminîttrô, çegiré er camino y beré açia dónde me conduçe.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalHurgh. Well. That was... deeply unpleasant. I made it this far, though. Guess that’s the part to focus on, and not how I’ll eventually have to get back up that path.
entry.value: Ûff. Gueno. Eço fue... mu deçagradable. Aunque logré yegâh âtta aquí. Çupongo que debo conçentrarme en eço y no en cómo borberé a çubîh por eçe camino.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalBut wow, this place sure is something! Looks like the Hanging City is north from here. And east is a gravity cannon! I definitely want to see that.
entry.value: Guau, ¡êtte lugâh êh êttupendo! Pareçe que la Çiudá Çûppendida êttá ar norte de aquí. ¡Y al êtte, ay un cañón grabitatorio! Çin dudâ, quiero bêh eço.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalAnd another thing - I’m detecting oxygen from somewhere below. Which is good, since I, uh, used up a lot of my supply screaming during the trip down from the surface.
entry.value: Y argo mâh: êttoy detêttando ôççíheno en argún lugâh debaho. Lo cuâ me biene como aniyo ar dedo, ya que conçumí gran parte der çuminîttro cuando bahaba de la çuperfiçie gritando.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalAs soon as I stop dry heaving, I’m going to head farther down below so I can refill my tank.
entry.value: Tan pronto como dehe de tenêh arcâh, boy a dêççendêh aún mâh pa reyenâh mi tanque.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalAt first I thought this was an old Nomai settlement, but on closer inspection, I don’t think anyone ever lived here. These buildings are atypical for Nomai dwellings.
entry.value: Ar prinçipio, pençé que êtto era un antiguo açentamiento nomai, pero dêppuêh de îppêççionâl-lo con detenimiento, creo que nunca nadie bibió aquí. Êttâ côttrûççionê no çon típicâ morâh nomai.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalMy best guess? This could be where the Nomai made gravity crystals. We know they mined raw from material from below the crust on Brittle Hollow, then refined that material to produce the crystals.
entry.value: Pienço que... podría çêh er lugâh donde lô nomai açían crîttalê grabitatoriô. Çabemô que êccababan minerâh en bruto de la corteça de Ondoná Fráhî y lo refinaban pa produçîh crîttalê.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalGravity crystals produce a local gravity distortion that affects the area around them, up to a certain radius. They’re very clever! Nomai used them to anchor themselves to surfaces they might want to traverse down.
entry.value: Lô crîttalê grabitatoriô produçen una dîttorçión en la grabedá locâh, que afêtta el área en tônno a eyô, âtta çierto radio. ¡Çon mu intelihentê! Lô nomai lô uçaban pa anclarçe a çuperfiçiê que querían atrabeçâh.

entry.key: RiebecksJournalWe Hearthians have borrowed their technology in our ships, where gravity crystals keep astronauts anchored to just one flat plane (thank the stars!).
entry.value: Lô lumbreanô uçamô çu tênnolohía pa nuêttrâ âttronabê, donde lô crîttalê grabitatoriô mantienen a lô âttronautâ ancláô a un plano yano (¡graçiâ a lâ êttreyâ!).

entry.key: Riebeck_SouthPoleRecordingI’m here! I did it! I put the ship down safely!
entry.value: ¡Êttoy aquí! ¡Lo logré! ¡La âttronabe êttá en tierra firme!

entry.key: Riebeck_SouthPoleRecordingUm, in that the ship went down, and I didn’t sustain bodily harm. A few minor repairs, and it’s like the ship never even hit those rocks!
entry.value: Em, quiero deçîh que logré que la âttronabe aterriçe y yo no çufrí eridâ. Unô pocô arreglô, ¡y ya ni çe notarán lâ marcâ que deharon eçâ rocâ!

entry.key: Riebeck_SouthPoleRecordingOne of my better attempts. Feldspar would barely have laughed at me, I bet.
entry.value: Fue uno de mî mehorê intentô. Çeguramente, Ferdêppato apenâ çi çe ubiera reío de mí.

entry.key: Riebeck_SouthPoleRecordingThat’s the good news. The bad news... I, uh, haven’t found a way inside this structure yet. The door is broken, and I know I’m not great at exploring, but I think I would have found a different entrance by now if there were one. P... probably.
entry.value: Eço êh lo gueno. Lo malo êh que... E, todabía no e encontrao una forma de entrâh en la êttrûttura. La puerta êttá rota. Y reconôcco que no çe me da heniâh la êpploraçión, pero creo que ya ubieçe encontrao otra entrá çi de berdá êççîttiera. Pro-probablemente.

entry.key: Riebeck_SouthPoleRecordingI can’t get inside from here, but I know there are paths below the surface. I’m going to head north to the ruins on the equator to try to find a way down.
entry.value: No puedo entrâh dêdde aquí, pero çé que ay caminô debaho de la çuperfiçie. Iré açia er norte, a lâ ruinâ en el ecuadôh, pa intentâh encontrâh una forma de dêççendêh.

entry.key: Rutile
entry.value: Rutilo

entry.key: Mayor1You’re actually blasting off in that thing, huh?
entry.value: Conque bâ a dêppegâh en eça coça, ¿e?

entry.key: RutileMayor1They really don’t explode as often anymore.
entry.value: No çuelen êpplotâh tan çegío aora.

entry.key: RutileMayor1I’m told my odds of survival are statistically quite high.
entry.value: Me diheron que mî probabilidadê de çuperbibençia çon artâ.

entry.key: SkepticAnswer1All I know is between the space program and Mica’s model rockets, things seem to burn to the ground around here more than they used to.
entry.value: Tó lo que çé êh que, entre er programa êppaçiâh y lô modelô de coetê de Mica, aquí ay cá bêh mâh y mâh inçendiô.

entry.key: SkepticAnswer2Yeah, the space program’s certainly come a long way. I should probably thank you for causing fewer flash fires than your predecessors.
entry.value: Çí, çiertamente er programa êppaçiâh a abançao muxo. Quiçá debería agradeçêl-lê por probocâh menô inçendiô que çû predeçeçorê.

entry.key: SkepticAnswer2By the way, good luck with those retro rockets.
entry.value: Por çierto: guena çuerte con eçô retrocoetê.

entry.key: Mayor2Hey, what can I do for you?
entry.value: Ey, ¿en qué puedo ayudarte?

entry.key: RutileMayor2Marl is plotting to cut down that big tree. Again.
entry.value: Marga êttá tramando cortâh eçe árbô enorme. Otra bêh.

entry.key: RutileMayor2Are you going to watch the launch?
entry.value: ¿Bâ a mirâh er lançamiento?

entry.key: RutileMayor2Do you really worry that the space program will burn the village down?
entry.value: ¿De berdá te preocupa que er programa êppaçiâh proboque un inçendio en la ardea?

entry.key: RutileMayor2I’m good.
entry.value: Êttoy bien.

entry.key: Marl<Color=#808080ff>Sigh...</Color> I suppose it’s my duty as mayor to stop them. Again.
entry.value: Ay... Çupongo que êh mi debêh como rehente no dehâh que lo aga. Otra bêh.

entry.key: MarlWhen Marl fell out of that tree and broke their arm, I suspect they might have also hit their head on the way down.
entry.value: Cuando Marga çe cayó de aquêh árbô y çe quebró er braço, çôppexo que también çe gorpeó la cabeça.

entry.key: FiresOnly constantly. You learn to live with it.
entry.value: Tó er tiempo. Pero çe aprende a bibîh con eyo.

entry.key: FiresYou also learn to sleep with a bucket of water next to your bed, just in case.
entry.value: También çe aprende a dormîh con un barde de agua hunto a la cama, çolo por çi acaço.

entry.key: LaunchOf course!
entry.value: ¡Por çupuêtto!

entry.key: LaunchI’ll be watching from a safe distance, obviously, and mostly to make sure nothing catches fire. But watching nonetheless.
entry.value: Ôççerbaré tó dêdde una dîttançia prudente. Çobre tó, pa açegurarme de que ná çe inçendie. Pero no deharé de ôççerbâh.

entry.key: GoodGlad to hear it.
entry.value: Me alegra oíl-lo.

entry.key: MayorSpaceYou’re back already? Is everything OK?
entry.value: ¿Ya borbîtte? ¿Êttá tó bien?

entry.key: SignEast: Nomai Ruins
entry.value: Êtte: Ruinâ nomai

entry.key: SignNorth: Youngbark Crater
entry.value: Norte: Crátê Corteçahoben

entry.key: SignNorthwest: Geyser Mountains
entry.value: Noroêtte: Montañâ de lô héiçerê

entry.key: SignSouth: Quantum Grove Crater
entry.value: Çûh: Crátê der bôqque cuántico

entry.key: Spinel
entry.value: Êppinela

entry.key: Spinel1Fishing rhyme, fishing rhyme... Singing helps me pass the time.
entry.value: Cançión de pêcca, cançión de biento... Cantâh me ayuda a paçâh er tiempo.

entry.key: Spinel1You’re leaving the crater? Guess we’ll all be a little busier without you around to lend a hand.
entry.value: ¿Te irâh der crátê? Gueno, çupongo que tendremô menô tiempo libre çin tu ayuda.

entry.key: Spinel1That big water planet, Giant’s Deep - that’s where I’d go.
entry.value: Er gran planeta de agua, Abîmmo der Higante... ayí êh donde iría.

entry.key: SpinelSpinel1Why’s that?
entry.value: ¿Por qué?

entry.key: SpinelSpinel1I need to find Hornfels.
entry.value: Debo encontrâh a Cônné.

entry.key: Spinel2Did you try the observatory? I’ve literally never seen them anywhere else.
entry.value: ¿Bûccâtte en el ôççerbatorio? Hamâh êttá en otro lugâh.

entry.key: Spinel3One time, after the rest of the village had left to sleep and it was just the two of us sitting around the campfire, Gabbro told me about their first trip to Giant’s Deep.
entry.value: Una bêh, cuando el rêtto de la ardea dormía y dêccançábamô hunto a la fogata der campamento, Gabro me contó çobre çu primêh biahe a Abîmmo der Higante.

entry.key: Spinel3They landed their ship easily enough in the waves, but couldn’t see too far down, on account of how murky the water was, I guess. Too dark.
entry.value: Aterriçó con la âttronabe en lâ olâ çin dificurtadê, pero el agua era tan turbia que no lograba bêh qué abía debaho. Êttaba demaçiao ôccuro.

entry.key: Spinel3Gabbro wants to see what lay beneath the surface, so they decided to travel deeper. They traveled down, and down...
entry.value: Gabro quería bêh qué abía debaho de la çuperfiçie, de modo que deçidió adentrarçe un poco mâh. Bahó, y çigió bahando...

entry.key: Spinel3But suddenly, Gabbro couldn’t go any further.
entry.value: Âtta que, de repente, Gabro ya no podía abançâh.

entry.key: SpinelSpinel3Tell me more.
entry.value: Cuéntame mâh.

entry.key: SpinelSpinel3Yeah, Giant’s Deep has a current you can’t pass through.
entry.value: Abîmmo der Higante tiene una corriente que êh impoçible de atrabeçâh.

entry.key: SpinelSpinel3I underestimated how boring this would be. Goodbye.
entry.value: Çubêttimé lo aburrío que podía çêh êtto. Adiôh.

entry.key: Spinel6...You always were my least favorite astronaut.
entry.value: Çiempre me caítte mâh, âttronauta.

entry.key: Spinel4I will, I was just pausing dramatically.
entry.value: Êppera, no era mâh que una pauça dramática.

entry.key: Spinel5Sure, okay, but shut up a minute. This is the good part.
entry.value: Mu bien, pero cáyate un minuto. Êtta êh la parte guena.

entry.key: Spinel7As though exercising a will of its own, the water was refusing to let Gabbro go any deeper. It held Gabbro back. ...Almost as if it were trying to protect them from something.
entry.value: El agua, como çi tubiera boluntá propia, rexaçaba lô intentô de Gabro por îh mâh profundo. Retenía a Gabro... como çi intentara ebitâh que le ocurriera argo.

entry.key: Spinel7And then, in the terrible darkness, Gabbro saw it...!
entry.value: Y dêppuêh, en medio de una ôccuridá terrible, Gabro lo bio...

entry.key: Spinel7The tentacle of some hideous beast!
entry.value: ¡Er tentáculo de una bêttia orrible!

entry.key: SpinelSpinel7AHHH!
entry.value: ¡AAA!

entry.key: SpinelSpinel7Is that all true?
entry.value: ¿Êh çierto tó êtto?

entry.key: SpinelSpinel7...Was there sap wine involved during Gabbro’s campfire story?
entry.value: ¿Gabro abía bebío bino de çabia cuando te contó êtta îttoria?

entry.key: Spinel8I mean, that’s what Gabbro said, anyway. Whatever it was, it freaked Gabbro out pretty good.
entry.value: Puê, eço êh lo que Gabro diho... Lo que çea que aya çido, le dio un guen çûtto a Gabro.

entry.key: Spinel8Everyone wants to hear new stories at the village campfire, you know. Make sure you bring some back with you!
entry.value: Tôh quieren êccuxâh îttoriâ nuebâ en la fogata der campamento de la ardea, ¿çabê? ¡Açí que trae argunâ cuando regreçê!

entry.key: Spinel9Heard it from Gabbro themself! Gabbro can be a little fanciful, sure, but they aren’t a liar. I mean, probably, anyway.
entry.value: ¡Me lo contó Gabro en perçona! Gabro tendrá muxa creatibidá, pero no miente. Quiero deçîh, probablemente...

entry.key: Spinel9I guess if you want to know if the story’s entirely true, you can go see Giant’s Deep for yourself!
entry.value: Çupongo que, çi quierê confirmâh la beraçidá de la îttoria, ¡tendrâh que îh a Abîmmo der Higante!

entry.key: Spinel10Come to think of it, don’t you have somewhere you should be exploring that isn’t here?
entry.value: Aora que lo pienço, ¿no deberíâ êttâh êpplorando en arguna parte que no çea aquí?

entry.key: Spinel11Fishing song, fishing song... Geez, I think my bait is wrong.
entry.value: Cançión de pêcca, cançión de mâh... Con êtte çebo, ¿qué boy a pêccâh?

entry.key: Spinel11What are you up to?
entry.value: ¿Qué êttâh açiendo?

entry.key: SpinelSpinel11I’m looking for Hornfels.
entry.value: Êttoy bûccando a Cônné.

entry.key: SpinelSpinel11Nothing.
entry.value: Ná.

entry.key: Spinel12Oh, them? I’d bet today’s haul they’re in the observatory.
entry.value: A, ¿çí? Apuêtto la pêcca de oy a que êttá en el ôççerbatorio.

entry.key: Spinel12Not that I’ve caught anything yet, but if I had, I’d definitely bet it. Hornfels is pretty much always in the observatory.
entry.value: Gueno, no e pêccao ná aún, pero de abêl-lo exo, apôttaría. Cônné êttá caçi çiempre en el ôççerbatorio.

entry.key: Spinel13That’s nice. I’m planning to do a lot of that later.
entry.value: Qué bien. Pienço açêh muxo de eço mâh tarde.

entry.key: Spinel14You can go away now, assuming you’re done scaring off all the fish.
entry.value: Gueno, çi terminâtte de açûttâh a lô peçê, deberíâ irte.

entry.key: Spinel15Listen, go to space or stay here, but pick one or the other! You’re scaring off all the fish.
entry.value: Mira, puedê îh al êppaçio o quedarte aquí, ¡pero elihe una ôççión! Lô peçê çe êttán alehando por tu curpa, lô açûttâ.

entry.key: Spinel15Fishing tune, fishing tune... uh... yeah, I didn’t think this one through at all.
entry.value: Cançión de pêcca, cançión de agua... E... Êtta no la pençé bien.

entry.key: Tektite
entry.value: Têttita

entry.key: Intro1Heyo, hatchling! Thought you were taking that tin can of yours into space today - what’re you still doing here?
entry.value: ¡Olî, retoño! Pençé que oy yebaríâ tu ohalata al êppaçio... ¿Por qué çigê aquí?

entry.key: Intro1Me? I was using the old scout launcher and saw smoke in one of the photos, so I thought I’d come over here myself and take a look.
entry.value: ¿Yo? Bi argo êttreyarçe en el oriçonte y no me gûttaron lâ imáhenê que me deborbió er Miniêpploradôh, açí que deçidí benîh a îppêççionâh qué paçó.

entry.key: TektiteIntro1So what crashed?
entry.value: ¿Y qué çe êttreyó?

entry.key: TektiteIntro1Is that a Dark Bramble seed?
entry.value: ¿Eço êh una çemiya de Êppinôccuro?

entry.key: Intro2You again, eh, hatchling? Thought I heard you lift off earlier. What’re you still doing on Timber Hearth?
entry.value: ¿Otra bêh tú, retoño? Creí abêh oío que dêppegabâ açe un rato. ¿Qué açê en Lumbre todabía?

entry.key: Intro2Me? I’m out here to see what it was I saw crash over this way. That, and make sure nothing’s on fire.
entry.value: ¿Yo? Bine a bêh qué fue lo que bi êttreyarçe por aquí. Eço, y a açegurarme de que no ubiera inçendiô.

entry.key: TektiteIntro2So what crashed?
entry.value: ¿Y qué çe êttreyó?

entry.key: TektiteIntro2Is that a Dark Bramble seed?
entry.value: ¿Eço êh una çemiya de Êppinôccuro?

entry.key: Intro3You again, eh, hatchling? Thought I heard you lift off earlier. What’re you still doing on Timber Hearth?
entry.value: ¿Otra bêh tú, retoño? Creí abêh oío que dêppegabâ açe un rato. ¿Qué açê en Lumbre todabía?

entry.key: Intro3Me? That Scout photo you took earlier showed smoke, so I came over to check for fires, remember?
entry.value: ¿Yo? La foto del Êpploradôh que tomâtte môttraba umo, açí que bine a açegurarme de que no ubiera inçendiô, ¿recuerdâ?

entry.key: TektiteIntro3So what crashed?
entry.value: ¿Y qué çe êttreyó?

entry.key: TektiteIntro3Is that a Dark Bramble seed?
entry.value: ¿Eço êh una çemiya de Êppinôccuro?

entry.key: Tektite1I dunno what it is, exactly. Looks like some kind of plant seed, but it’s not anything I’ve seen on Timber Hearth before - and trust me, I was quite the explorer back in the day.
entry.value: No çé bien qué êh. Pareçe çêh la çemiya de arguna planta, pero nunca bi argo açí en Lumbre y, créeme, êpploré muxíçimo en mî añô moçô.

entry.key: Tektite1D’you think it’s extraterrestrial? It kinda looks like something that might’ve come off of Dark Bramble. Whatever it is, it put down roots in a hurry.
entry.value: ¿Creê que çea êttraterrêttre? Pareçe argo çalío de Êppinôccuro... Çea lo que çea, exa raíçê a toa beloçidá.

entry.key: Tektite2You think so? It’s nothing I’ve ever seen on Timber Hearth before, so you’re probably onto something there.
entry.value: A, ¿çí? Hamâh bi argo açí en Lumbre, açí que êh probable que tengâ raçón.

entry.key: Tektite2Whatever it is, it put down roots in a hurry.
entry.value: Çea lo que çea, exa raíçê a toa beloçidá.
