entry.key: Tektite3I don’t like the look of this thing, hatchling, and that’s a fact. Think I’ll set Marl and Hal loose on it. Best get rid of this mess sooner rather than later, and no one can remove an unwanted plant faster than a tree keeper can.
entry.value: No me gûtta el âppêtto de êtta coça, retoño, y eço êh un exo. Creo que traeré a Marga y Ali pa que çe encargen. Mehôh nô deçaçemô de êtte deçâttre lo antê poçible, y no çe me ocurre nadie mehôh pa quitâh una planta indeçeable que dôh cuidadorê de árbolê.

entry.key: Tektite3I’ll have to get a look at what’s inside the seed, first, though. Don’t want to set anybody to hacking up a potentially dangerous plant without a better idea of what’s lurking inside there.
entry.value: Pero primero tendré que bêh qué ay dentro de la çemiya. No querría que arrancaran una planta que podría çêh dañina çin çabêh bien lo que podría êttâh açexando en çu interiôh.

entry.key: Tektite3Tuff can help me haul the old <color=orange>scout launcher</color> over here. Obviously the opening is too small for someone to fit inside, and anyway, I’m not gonna blindly stick my hands into anything that looks as unpleasant as that seed does.
entry.value: Toba puede ayudarme a traêh er bieho <color=orange>lançaêpploradorê</color> âtta aquí. La apertura êh demaçiao pequeña como pa que argien entre, y, de cuarquiêh modo, no pienço metêh lâ manô a çiegâ en argo tan deçagradable como êtta çemiya.

entry.key: Tektite3That’s a good way to lose an arm or two.
entry.value: Çería una guena forma de perdêh un braço o lô dôh.

entry.key: Tektite4Blasted seed did a lot of damage when it crashed. I liked this crater.
entry.value: La mardita çemiya cauçó êttragô cuando çe êttreyó. Me gûttaba êtte crátê.

entry.key: Tektite4Need something from me, hatchling?
entry.value: ¿Neçeçitâ mi ayuda con argo, retoño?

entry.key: TektiteTektite4I threw a Little Scout into the seed.
entry.value: Lançé un Miniêpploradôh adentro de la çemiya.

entry.key: TektiteTektite4My signalscope is picking up a harmonica inside the seed.
entry.value: Mi çeñalôccopio detêtta er çonido de una armónica dentro de la çemiya.

entry.key: TektiteTektite4You’re sure this seed isn’t from Timber Hearth?
entry.value: ¿Tienê la çerteça de que êtta çemiya no êh de Lumbre?

entry.key: TektiteTektite4Nope, I’m good.
entry.value: Nôh, tó bien.

entry.key: Tektite5You did, did you? And you’re telling me it’s bigger on the inside than on the outside?
entry.value: A, ¿çí? ¿Y me diçê que êh mâh grande por dentro que por fuera?

entry.key: Tektite5Hmph. This is going to be a chore to chop up, and no mistake. Can we even remove a seed that doesn’t have the decency to stay the same size all the way through?
entry.value: Pf. Cortâh êtto ba a çêh una tarea ardua, créeme. ¿Êh poçible çiquiera quitâh una çemiya que no tiene la deçençia de mantenêh er mîmmo tamaño de prinçipio a fin?

entry.key: Tektite5Maybe I’d better grab an extra axe or three, just in case.
entry.value: Tar bêh bûqque unô parê mâh de axâ, por lâ dudâ.

entry.key: Tektite6Inside the seed? Huh. Dunno what to tell you there - the only harmonica player I know is Feldspar, and they disappeared ages ago.
entry.value: ¿Dentro de la çemiya? Mmm. No çé qué deçirte. Ferdêppato tocaba la armónica, pero deçapareçió açe muxo tiempo.

entry.key: Tektite6Listen here, don’t go telling Gneiss about the harmonica music, okay? They’ll never let me get rid of this darn seed if they suspect it has any musical talent.
entry.value: Oye, no le bayâ a deçîh lo de la armónica a Gneî, ¿çí? No me dehará deçaçerme de êtta mardita çemiya çi cree que tiene talento pa la múçica.

entry.key: Tektite7Back in my younger days, I explored everywhere there is to go on Timber Hearth and saw everything there is to see, and then some. Trust me, we don’t have anything like this.
entry.value: Cuando era hoben, êpploré Lumbre de pe a pa. Bi tó lo que tiene pa môttrâh, y mâh. Créeme, no ay ná como êtto aquí.

entry.key: Tektite7Nah, I reckon this thing’s from Dark Bramble if it’s from anywhere, hatchling.
entry.value: Na, creo que êtta coça tiene que abêh benío de Êppinôccuro, retoño.

entry.key: Tektite8Alright then, see you around.
entry.value: Mu bien, nô bemô.

entry.key: Tephra
entry.value: Tefra

entry.key: HideAndSeek1Hullo, astronaut!
entry.value: ¡Aló, âttronauta!

entry.key: TephraHideAndSeek1If it isn’t my favorite troublemaker.
entry.value: Pero çi êh mi perçona faborita en tó er mundo.

entry.key: TephraHideAndSeek1What’s with the radio?
entry.value: ¿Qué paça con la radio?

entry.key: HideAndSeek2We wanted to play hide and seek, but Moraine won’t let us borrow their signalscope because it’s “really delicate” and “not supposed to be thrown around like that.”
entry.value: Queríamô hugâh al êccondite, pero Morrena no nô prêtta er çeñalôccopio. Diçe que êh «mu delicao» y «que no çe puede martratâh».

entry.key: HideAndSeek2Hey, hey, can we use your signalscope? Can we? Can we, please? We’ll even let you be “it”!
entry.value: Oye, oye, ¿podemô uçâh tu çeñalôccopio? ¿Podemô? ¿Çí? ¿Por fabôh? ¡Âtta te deharemô contâh!

entry.key: TephraHideAndSeek2Sure, let’s play!
entry.value: ¡Claro! ¡Hugemô!

entry.key: TephraHideAndSeek2Sorry, can’t today.
entry.value: Lo çiento, oy no puedo.

entry.key: AgreeToPlayWoohoo! Okay, here are the rules. Galena and me will hide with these radios, and you’ll use your signalscope to find us.
entry.value: ¡Iuhuu! Êttâ çon lâ reglâ. Galena y yo nô ocurtaremô con êttâ radiô, y tú uçarâh tu çeñalôccopio pa encontrânnô.

entry.key: AgreeToPlayLast one to be found wins! Okay, close your eyes and start counting!
entry.value: ¡Quien logre ocurtarçe mâh tiempo, ganará! Bien. ¡Çierra lô ohô y empieça a contâh!

entry.key: RefuseToPlayAwww, really? But we can’t play without a signalscope... Play with us later, okay?
entry.value: Aa, ¿de berâ? Pero no podemô hugâh çin un çeñalôccopio... Huega con noçotrô luego, ¿çí?

entry.key: FoundYouAwww, you found me? But my hiding spot was super good!
entry.value: Aa, ¡¿me encontrâtte?! ¡Pero mi êccondite era heniâh!

entry.key: FoundYouDon’t forget, you have to find both of us, okay?
entry.value: No lo orbidê: tienê que encontrânnô a ambô, ¿çí?

entry.key: LastKidFoundYou got me, but I’m the last one. I win!
entry.value: Me encontrâtte, pero duré mâh que nadie. ¡Açí que gané!

entry.key: LastKidFoundPromise you’ll play again when you get back from space, okay? You gotta!
entry.value: Prométeme que borberâh a hugâh cuando buerbâ del êppaçio, ¿çí? ¡Por fabôh!

entry.key: AlreadyFoundYouI wanted to hide in the observatory, but Hornfels said I was “making a nuisance of myself.”
entry.value: Quería êcconderme en el ôççerbatorio, pero Cônné diho que «me êttaba combirtiendo en una molêttia».

entry.key: PlayedTheGameHullo, astronaut!
entry.value: ¡Aló, âttronauta!

entry.key: PlayedTheGameWe’re all going to watch your launch later. I hope space is nice!
entry.value: Bamô a bêh tu lançamiento mâh tarde. ¡Êppero que el êppaçio çea bonito!

entry.key: ShyKidB1Hullo, astronaut! Are you going into space today?
entry.value: ¡Aló, âttronauta! ¿Irâh al êppaçio oy?

entry.key: ShyKidB1Are you going into space and never coming back like Feldspar did?
entry.value: ¿Irâh al êppaçio y nunca borberâh, como Ferdêppato?

entry.key: TephraShyKidB1...What?
TephraShyKidB1Don’t worry, I’ll come back.
entry.value: No te preocupê, borberé.

entry.key: TephraShyKidB1That’s pretty disturbing.
entry.value: Eço êh bâttante perturbadôh.

entry.key: WhatYeah, um, Hornfels says Feldspar went away into space and didn’t come back. Hornfels says Feldspar was the best pilot ever, but no one knows what happened to them.
entry.value: Çí, e, Cônné diçe que Ferdêppato çe fue al êppaçio y nunca regreçó. Cônné diçe que Ferdêppato pilotaba la âttronabe mehôh que nadie, pero deçapareçió çin mâh.

entry.key: TephraWhatHornfels probably shouldn’t be telling you stuff like this.
entry.value: Cônné no debería contarte eçâ coçâ.

entry.key: TephraWhatThat’s not something I want to think about right now.
entry.value: No êh argo en lo que quiera pençâh aora.

entry.key: HornfelsHornfels says that, too.
entry.value: Cônné también diçe eço.

entry.key: NotThinkAboutThatBut if Feldspar disappeared, you might disappear, too, right?
entry.value: Pero çi Ferdêppato deçapareçió, también podría paçarte a ti, ¿o no?

entry.key: NotThinkAboutThatYou’re not as good as Feldspar, so you should be really careful not to get lost.
entry.value: Piença que no erê tan ábî como Ferdêppato, açí que ten muxo cuidao de no perderte.

entry.key: ComebackThat’s what Feldspar said, too, but they never did.
entry.value: Eço êh lo que diho Ferdêppato también, pero nunca regreçó.

entry.key: ComebackHornfels will be really sad if you don’t come back, like how sad it makes them to talk about Feldspar. So you should make sure you don’t get lost in space, too.
entry.value: Cônné çe pondrá mu trîtte çi no regreçâ, de la mîmma forma que çe pone trîtte al ablâh de Ferdêppato. Açí que debê açegurarte de no perderte en el êppaçio tú también.

entry.key: DisturbingBut Hornfels says no one knows what happened to Feldspar. Hornfels says they got lost in space even though they were the best pilot ever.
entry.value: Cônné diçe que nadie çabe qué le çuçedió a Ferdêppato. Cônné diçe que çe perdió en el êppaçio, a peçâh de que pilotaba la âttronabe como nadie.

entry.key: DisturbingYou’re not as good as Feldspar, so you should be really careful not to get lost.
entry.value: Piença que no erê tan ábî como Ferdêppato, açí que ten muxo cuidao de no perderte.

entry.key: MallowTalkHullo, astronaut!
entry.value: ¡Aló, âttronauta!

entry.key: MallowTalkAre you bringing lots of mallows with you to roast on your trip? Mallows are my favorite!
entry.value: ¿Yebâ montonê de nubeçitâ pa açâh en er biahe? ¡Lâ nubeçitâ çon mî faboritâ!

entry.key: Tuff
entry.value: Toba

entry.key: ScaredMiner1Hey, hey. Nice of you to drop down.
entry.value: Ola, ola. Me alegra que ayâ benío.

entry.key: TuffScaredMiner1I’m getting some zero-g time in.
entry.value: Êttoy prâtticando con grabedá çero.

entry.key: TuffScaredMiner1Give me the dirt.
entry.value: Cuéntame lâ nuebâ.

entry.key: TuffScaredMiner1Guess where I’m going today.
entry.value: Adibina dónde iré oy.

entry.key: ScaredMiner2Hey, you’re back. You need something?
entry.value: Ey, regreçâtte. ¿Neçeçitâ argo?

entry.key: TuffScaredMiner2Just getting in some zero-g time.
entry.value: Êttoy prâtticando con grabedá çero.

entry.key: TuffScaredMiner2Give me the dirt.
entry.value: Cuéntame lâ nuebâ.

entry.key: TuffScaredMiner2Guess where I’m going today.
entry.value: Adibina dónde iré oy.

entry.key: ZeroSo you’re going in there? In the cave? Hnnngh...
entry.value: ¿Diçê que piençâ entrâh ayí? ¿A la cueba? Ûfff...

entry.key: ZeroWhat? No, I’m fine. Great. Great and fine.
entry.value: ¿Qué? No, êttoy bien. Heniâh. Heniâh y bien.

entry.key: TuffZeroYou don’t look fine...
entry.value: No çe te be bien...

entry.key: TuffZeroYeah, I’m going to drift around down there for a while.
entry.value: Çí, pençaba dâh unâ buertâ por ayí abaho un tiempo.

entry.key: FineWell you know I hate that cave so I don’t know why you’re making me talk about it.
entry.value: Puê ya çabê que odio eça cueba, no entiendo por qué me açê ablâh de eya.

entry.key: FineFweh... Now I’ve got hand sweats.
entry.value: Fiu... Aora me çudan lâ manô.

entry.key: Sick1Eurgh...
entry.value: Puâh...

entry.key: TuffSick1Just going to float upside down and whatnot.
entry.value: Çolo flotaré cabeça abaho y eçâ coçâ.

entry.key: TuffSick1...Sorry. I’ll stop.
entry.value: Lo çiento. Deharé de açêl-lo.

entry.key: MotionlessI’m going to sit here and think about flat, motionless rocks for a while.
entry.value: Boy a çentarme aquí a pençâh en piedrâ xatâ e îmmóbilê por un rato.

entry.key: Sick2H-hurk...
entry.value: A-ay...

entry.key: TuffSick2Just, y’know, ricochet off the walls. Spin around a lot. That kind of thing.
entry.value: Ya çabê, rebotâh contra lâ paredê. Dâh muxâ buertâ... Eçe tipo de coçâ.

entry.key: TuffSick2That was too far, wasn’t it.
entry.value: Lo yebé mu lehô, ¿e?

entry.key: Worst1You’re... <color=grey>Urp...</color><Pause/> You’re the worst.
entry.value: Erê...<color=grey>Aj...</color><Pause/> Erê de lo peôh.

entry.key: TuffWorst1Sorry.
entry.value: Lo çiento.

entry.key: TuffWorst1I know.
entry.value: Lo çé.

entry.key: Worst2You’re... <color=grey>Urp...</color><Pause/> You’re the worst.
entry.value: Erê...<color=grey>Aj...</color><Pause/> Erê de lo peôh.

entry.key: TuffWorst2I know.
entry.value: Lo çé...

entry.key: GuessOh, no. Nooooo, no no no.<Pause/> No way.
entry.value: A, no. Nooooo, no, no, no.<Pause/> De ningún modo.

entry.key: GuessYou want to run off into space, that’s your business, but don’t make me, you know, think about it.
entry.value: Çi quierê êccaparte al êppaçio, eço êh problema tuyo, pero no me agâ, ya çabê, pençâh en eço.

entry.key: GuessBad enough we got this weird cave down here...
entry.value: Ya êh malo que tengamô êtta cueba êttraña aí abaho...

entry.key: DirtSome fresh dirt? Not much happening down here lately. Let me think...
entry.value: ¿Tienê arguna nueba hugoça? Tó a êttao demaçiao tranquilo por aquí. A bêh...

entry.key: DirtCome to think of it, Tektite saw something crash outside of the village crater earlier. That’s new and different.
entry.value: Aora que lo pienço, Têttita bio una coliçión en lâ afuerâ der crátê de la ardea açe un rato. Êh argo nuebo y diferente.

entry.key: TuffDirtOh, hey. How ’bout that.
entry.value: A, oye... ¿Y eço?

entry.key: TuffDirtIs anything on fire?
entry.value: ¿Argo çe prendió fuego?

entry.key: Probe1Yeah, they were on firewatch with the old scout launcher and saw smoke, so they went to check it out. “Safety first,” right?
entry.value: Çí, êttaba de tûnno en la guardia de inçendiô con er bieho lançaêpploradorê y bio fuego, açí que fue a bêh qué paçaba. «La çeguridá êh lo primero», ¿berdá?

entry.key: Probe1...No, I’m kidding. I said that to Tektite once. Pretty rude how long they laughed for, if you ask me.
entry.value: ... No, êttoy bromeando. Çe lo dihe a Têttita una bêh. Çe rio tanto que lo tomé como una ofença, debo deçîh.

entry.key: Probe2Probably only a little. Tektite checked out the crash site with the old firewatch scout launcher and saw smoke, so they headed over to stamp out any leftover fires.
entry.value: Tar bêh çolo un poquito. Têttita îppêççionó er çitio de la coliçión con er bieho lançaêpploradorê de la guardia de inçendiô y bio umo, açí que fue a apagâh lô inçendiô que pudieran quedâh.

entry.key: Probe2Well, I better get back to work. This ore’s not going to mine itself, you know.
entry.value: Gueno, creo que êh ora de borbêh a trabahâh. Êtte minerâh no ba a êttraerçe çolo, ¿çabê?

entry.key: TooSickHurgh...
entry.value: Ûfff...

entry.key: SpaceOh, I thought I heard you lift off. Change your mind?
entry.value: A, creí abêh êccuxao que dêppegabâ. ¿Cambiâtte de opinión?

entry.key: TuffSpaceI needed a little more zero-g time.
entry.value: Neçeçitaba un poco mâh de grabedá çero.

entry.key: TuffSpaceGive me the dirt.
entry.value: Cuéntame lâ nuebâ.

entry.key: Arkose
entry.value: Arcoça

entry.key: Arkose1Hi, astronaut!
entry.value: ¡Ola, âttronauta!

entry.key: Arkose1You know the patch of ghost matter inside this fence? Gossan said it used to be bigger when they were a hatchling. ’Cause ghost matter evaporates.
entry.value: Çobre eçe troço de materia fantâmmâh contenío en êtta çerca... Gôççan diho que çolía çêh mâh grande cuando era un retoño. Porque la materia fantâmmâh çe ebapora.

entry.key: Arkose1It just takes a su-<Pause=1>u-<Pause=1>u-<Pause=1>per long time to go away.
entry.value: Çolo que tarda un lâh-<Pause=1>gííí-<Pause=1>çi-<Pause=1>mo tiempo en deçapareçêh.

entry.key: Arkose1I hope there’s still ghost matter in the village when I’m a grown-up. Ghost matter is awesome!
entry.value: Êppero que todabía quede materia fantâmmâh en la ardea cuando crêcca. ¡La materia fantâmmâh êh increíble!

entry.key: ArkoseArkose1Ghost matter is super cool. It’ll burn the heck out of you!
entry.value: ¡La materia fantâmmâh êh aluçinante! ¡Te puede rôttiçâh!

entry.key: ArkoseArkose1You shouldn’t be throwing rocks in there — ghost matter is dangerous.
entry.value: No deberíâ arrohâh piedrâ aí: la materia fantâmmâh êh peligroça.

entry.key: ArkoseArkose1You know ghost matter is how Tektite lost their foot, right?
entry.value: Çabê que Têttita perdió çu pie por la materia fantâmmâh, ¿no?

entry.key: Arkose2Yeah! I heard touching it hurts so bad it feels like your whole hand’s on fire!
entry.value: ¡Çí! ¡Oí que çi la tocâ, la mano te arde tanto como çi êttubiera prendida fuego!

entry.key: Arkose2Try not to walk into any in space, okay? That sounds bad and painful.
entry.value: Intenta no piçâh materia fantâmmâh en el êppaçio, ¿çí? Çuena terrible y doloroço.

entry.key: Arkose3Uhhh, obviously? That’s what makes it so awesome? Geez, I’m not dumb enough to touch it.
entry.value: Eh, ¿claramente? Por eço êh tan açombroça, ¿no? Çielô, no tengo tan poco çerebro como pa tocâl-la.

entry.key: Arkose3Ugh, you’re such a grown-up.
entry.value: Ay, no me bengâ con coçâ de adurtô.

entry.key: Arkose4Whoa, really?! ...That is so cool!
entry.value: Guau, ¿de berâ? Puê... ¡êh heniâh!

entry.key: Arkose5It’s cool that Little Scouts can detect ghost matter and all, but what would be really cool is if the Little Scout could, like, shoot ghost matter at stuff. All pew pew pew!
entry.value: Êh heniâh que lô Miniêpploradorê puedan detêttâh materia fantâmmâh y tó eço, pero çería muxo mâh heniâh çi, ademâh, pudieran dîpparâh materia fantâmmâh. ¡Pim, pum, pam!

entry.key: SignThis anglerfish specimen was found attached to the landing gear of one of our ships that flew close to Dark Bramble. It appears well-suited to living in dark places with minimal atmosphere.
entry.value: Êtte ehemplâh de rape fue ayao en er tren de aterriçahe de una de lâ âttronabê que boló çerca de Êppinôccuro. Pareçe podêh adâttarçe bien a lugarê ôccurô con un nibêh mínimo de ôççíheno.

entry.key: SignOf all the lifeforms who will perish in the oncoming death of the universe, we will miss the anglerfish the least.
entry.value: De toâ lâ formâ de bida que pereçerán en la futura êttinçión del uniberço, a la que menô êttrañaremô çerá el rape.

entry.key: SignOuter Wilds Ventures, Timber Hearth’s first and only space program, was founded to explore the farthest reaches of our solar system.
entry.value: Outer Wilds Ventures, er primêh y único programa êppaçiâh de Lumbre, çe fundó con el ôhhetibo de êpplorâh lâ áreâ mâh remotâ de nuêttro çîttema çolâh.

entry.key: SignFeldspar was the first Hearthian to be intentionally launched into space. They completed the first orbit around Timber Hearth and later made the first of what would be many landings on our moon, the Attlerock.
entry.value: Ferdêppato fue la primera perçona lumbreana que biçitó el êppaçio êtteriôh intençionarmente. Completó la primera órbita en tônno a Lumbre y, dêppuêh, realiçó er primero de muxô aterriçahê en nuêttra Luna: Rocaterra.

entry.key: SignOuter Wilds Ventures was founded by Feldspar, Gossan, Slate, and Hornfels to explore a solar system at the end of the universe.
entry.value: Outer Wilds Ventures fue fundao por Ferdêppato, Gôççan, Launa y Cônné con er fin de êpplorâh er çîttema çolâh, en lô confinê del uniberço.

entry.key: Galena
entry.value: Galena

entry.key: ShyKid1<size=20>...</size>
entry.value: <size=20>...</size>

entry.key: ShyKid2<size=20>...</size>
entry.value: <size=20>...</size>

entry.key: ShyKid2<size=20>Good luck in space.</size>
entry.value: <size=20>Guena çuerte en el êppaçio.</size>

entry.key: ShyKid3<size=20>...</size>
entry.value: <size=20>...</size>

entry.key: FoundYou<size=20>...</size>
entry.value: <size=20>...</size>

entry.key: FoundYou<size=20>You found me...</size>
entry.value: <size=20>Me encontrâtte...</size>

entry.key: LastKidFound<size=20>...I won? I’m happy...</size>
entry.value: <size=20>¿Gané? Me alegro...</size>

entry.key: LastKidFound<size=20>Thanks... for playing with us.</size>
entry.value: <size=20>Graçiâ por hugâh con noçotrô.</size>

entry.key: AlreadyFoundYou<size=20>...</size>
entry.value: <size=20>...</size>

entry.key: SignThis crystal was taken from a Nomai ruin on Brittle Hollow.
entry.value: Êtte crîttâh fue tomao de una ruina nomai en Ondoná Fráhî.

entry.key: SignIt seems to create a local gravity distortion, and was most likely used to traverse steep surfaces. Try it out!
entry.value: Ar pareçêh, crea una dîttorçión en la grabedá locâh, y êh poçible que çe aya utiliçao pa atrabeçâh çuperfiçiê empinâh. ¡Pruébalo!

entry.key: Mica
entry.value: Mica

entry.key: ModelRocketKid1Hey, it’s you!
entry.value: ¡Ola! ¡Pero çi erê tú!

entry.key: ModelRocketKid1Slate said you’re blasting off in your ship today. I’m really excited to see the launch!
entry.value: Launa mençionó que oy dêppegaríâ. ¡Tengo muxâ ganâ de bêh er lançamiento!

entry.key: ModelRocketKid1Aren’t you gonna go into space? Aren’t you? You better not have changed your mind!
entry.value: Irâh al êppaçio, ¿no? ¿Irâh? ¡Êppero que no ayâ cambiao de pareçêh!

entry.key: MicaModelRocketKid1Hey, I’m still going!
entry.value: ¡Oye, boy a îh!

entry.key: MicaModelRocketKid1I want to practice with a pro before I leave.
entry.value: Quiero prâtticâh con argien profeçionâh antê de partîh.

entry.key: MicaModelRocketKid1I hear you and Slate beefed up the model ship. Can I see it?
entry.value: Oí que tú y Launa puçieron a punto er modelo de âttronabe. ¿Puedo bêl-lo?

entry.key: ModelRocketKid5You better be! It’s been forever since anyone launched into space. I really, really want to see it.
entry.value: ¡Mâh te bale! An paçao çiglô dêdde la úrtima bêh que argien fue al êppaçio. Tengo muxâ, pero muxâ ganâ de bêl-lo.

entry.key: ModelRocketKid5Really bad.
entry.value: Muxíçimâ.

entry.key: ModelRocketKid5Hey, you want to try out my model ship? Slate says it’s just like the real thing, only less likely to start a fire.
entry.value: Oye, ¿quierê probâh mi modelo de âttronabe? Launa diçe que çe pareçe muxo a la reâh, çolo que êh menô probable que cauçe un inçendio.

entry.key: ModelRocketKid2Aww, you’re just saying that. ...But if you really want to practice with me, I guess I could help you out a little.
entry.value: Ah, lo diçê por deçîh. Pero çi de berdá quierê prâtticâh cômmigo, çupongo que puedo ayudarte un poco.

entry.key: ModelRocketKid3Yeah, we recalibrated the controls and installed better thrusters. Want to give it a test drive? Slate says it’s just like the real thing, only less likely to start a fire.
entry.value: Çí, recalibramô lô controlê y colocamô propurçorê de mehôh calidá. ¿Quierê açêh una prueba de maneho? Launa diçe que çe pareçe muxo a la reâh, çolo que êh menô probable que cauçe un inçendio.

entry.key: ModelRocketKid4Try to land on one of the <color=orange>geyser pools</color>. Show me what you’ve got!
entry.value: Intenta aterriçâh en uno de lô <color=orange>héiçerê</color>. ¡Muéttrame lo que erê capâh de açêh!

entry.key: FailureWow, that was just like the time the external fuel tanks exploded on reentry!
entry.value: ¡Guau! ¡Fue cuando êpplotaron lô tanquê de combûttible êttênnô en la reentrá!

entry.key: FailureYou’ll... you’ll be okay flying the big one, right?
entry.value: Tó... çardrá bien en la grande, ¿çí?

entry.key: SuccessWhat a landing! I guess that’s why Slate lets you fly the real thing, huh?
entry.value: ¡Êççelente aterriçahe! Aora beo por qué Launa te deha conduçîh la âttronabe de berdá, ¿e?

entry.key: ModelRocketKidSecondarySomeday, I want to design a ship that goes even faster than the ones Slate makes!
entry.value: ¡Argún día, quiero diçeñâh una âttronabe que buele aún mâh rápido que la que côttruyó Launa!

entry.key: ModelRocketKidSecondarySlate says they think I can do it. And Gossan says I should ask Slate to be my first test pilot.
entry.value: Launa diçe que me conçidera capâh. Y Gôççan diçe que debería pedîl-le a Launa que çea quien pilote la âttronabe por primera bêh, a modo de prueba.

entry.key: SignThis remarkably intact statue was carved by the Nomai, an ancient species who dwelled in our solar system thousands of years ago.
entry.value: Êtta êttatua notablemente intâtta fue tayá por lô nomai, una êppeçie ançêttrâh que moraba en nuêttro çîttema çolâh açe milê de añô.

entry.key: SignThe statue provides us with our most detailed look yet at the Nomai, who appear to have been covered with a layer of fur. Note the decorative jewelry that has been carved as part of the antlers.
entry.value: La êttatua nô ofreçe el âppêtto mâh detayao que âtta aora emô conçegío de lô nomai, quienê, ar pareçêh, tenían una capa de pelo que lô protehía. Êh yamatiba la hoyería decoratiba que çe a tayao hunto a lâ âttâ.

entry.key: SignAlthough their artifacts and structures have been found on almost every planet in this solar system, we still have no idea where this species came from or what happened to them.
entry.value: Aunque çû artefâttô y êttrûtturâ çe an encontrao en caçi tôh lô planetâ der çîttema çolâh, todabía dêcconoçemô el orihen de êtta êppeçie y la cauça de çu deçapariçión.

entry.key: SignThis pilot seat, used by pioneering astronaut Feldspar, is all that remains of our inaugural flight into space.
entry.value: Êtte açiento de piloto, que utiliçó Ferdêppato como âttronauta banguardîtta, êh tó lo que nô queda de nuêttro buelo inaugurâh al êppaçio.

entry.key: SignAlthough it’s been argued such a distinction requires a breathtakingly liberal definition of flight, that day will nevertheless always be remembered as landmark achievement in Hearthian history.
entry.value: Aunque çe a dixo que pa otorgâh eça dîttinçión çe neçeçita una definiçión mu flêççible de lo que êh un buelo, eçe día quedará, çin dudâ, en nuêttrâ memoriâ como un logro trâççendentâh en la îttoria lumbreana.

entry.key: SignAside from the dwellings and structures they built, the Nomai also made art. This decorated pottery was discovered on Brittle Hollow.
entry.value: Ademâh de lâ morâh y êttrûtturâ que côttruyeron, lô nomai también açían obrâ de arte. Êtta pieça de arfarería decorá fue ayá en Ondoná Fráhî.

entry.key: SignSome ancient Nomai art depicts strange animals, foreign celestial objects, and other subjects that can’t be found in our solar system, which makes us wonder whether the Nomai originated elsewhere in the universe or simply had vibrant imaginations.
entry.value: Argunâ obrâ de arte nomai ançêttralê tienen figurâ de animalê êttrañô, ôhhetô çelêttialê dêcconoçíô y otrô çuhetô êttrañô a nuêttro çîttema çolâh. Tó êtto açe que nô preguntemô çi lô nomai eran oriundô de otro lugâh del uniberço o, çimplemente, tenían una gran imahinaçión.

entry.key: SignWere the Nomai born in our solar system? Or were they born among other stars and planets - and if they were, how and why did they come here?
entry.value: ¿Lô nomai naçieron en nuêttro çîttema çolâh? ¿O naçieron en medio de otrâ êttreyâ y planetâ? En eçe caço, ¿cuándo y por qué yegaron aquí?

entry.key: SignThese are just some of the questions we hope to answer through further xenoarchaeological expeditions.
entry.value: Êttâ çon argunâ de lâ preguntâ que êpperamô rêppondêh con la ayuda de mâh êppediçionê çenoarqueolóhicâ.

entry.key: SignThe Nomai technology brought back from space by our astronauts has been a great boon to Outer Wilds Ventures, allowing us to modify expedition gear in exciting and useful ways.
entry.value: La tênnolohía nomai que lô âttronautâ traheron del êppaçio a çido de gran ayuda pa Outer Wilds Ventures, ya nô a permitío mehorâh nuêttro equipo de êppediçión.

entry.key: SignFor example, the Little Scout now boasts a warp retrieval capability that allows astronauts to recall their scouts almost instantly. This has dramatically reduced the number of scouts lost to the depths of space.
entry.value: Por ehemplo, er Miniêpploradôh aora cuenta con una funçión de êttrâççión mediante dîttorçión, graçiâ a la cuâ lô âttronautâ pueden recuperâh çû êpploradorê caçi al îttante. Açí, çe a reduçío radicarmente la cantidá de êpploradorê perdíô en lâ profundidadê del êppaçio.

entry.key: SignThe Nomai never got to see it for themselves, but thanks to their efforts and technology, a Hearthian was able to reach the Eye of the universe.
entry.value: Lô nomai nunca pudieron bêl-lo en perçona, pero graçiâ a çû êffuerçô y tênnolohía, lô lumbreanô fueron capaçê de yegâh al Oho del uniberço.

entry.key: SignThe strange rock moving around in this grotto appears to react to conscious observation.
entry.value: La êttraña roca que çe muebe en tônno a êtta gruta pareçe reâççionâh a la ôççerbaçión côççiente.

entry.key: SignThe level-headed among us realize there must be some sort of optical illusion at play, but Gabbro claims the rock “exists in all possible states until it is observed” (whatever that means).
entry.value: Nuêttro raçioçinio nô diçe que debe abêh argún tipo de iluçión óttica en huego, pero Gabro afirma que la roca «êççîtte en tôh lô êttáô poçiblê âtta que argien la ôççerba» (lo que çea que êtto quiera deçîh).

entry.key: SignWhatever is actually happening, both sides of this debate agree the effect is extremely creepy.
entry.value: Ar marhen de lo que êtté çuçediendo en realidá, ambâ partê êttán de acuerdo en que el efêtto êh êppelûnnante.

entry.key: Riebeck
entry.value: Riebeck

entry.key: Riebeck0Oh, you launched! That’s great. Great job, you.
entry.value: ¡A! ¡Ya içîtte er lançamiento! Heniâh. Guen trabaho.

entry.key: Riebeck0Wow, I guess that means I’ve been out here a while, huh. Well, um, this is Brittle Hollow. But you probably knew that.
entry.value: Guau, pareçe que yebo aquí un guen rato, ¿e? Gueno, e... êttâh en Ondoná Fráhî. Probablemente, ya lo çabíâ.

entry.key: Riebeck0Lot of history here. ...It’s great.
entry.value: Er lugâh arberga muxa îttoria... Êh heniâh.

entry.key: RiebeckRiebeck0What are you doing here?
entry.value: ¿Qué êttâh açiendo aquí?

entry.key: RiebeckRiebeck0I’m in a hurry — can I ask you something?
entry.value: Êttoy con argo de priça... ¿Puedo preguntarte argo?

entry.key: RiebeckIntroI’m here to see the Hanging City. It’s always been my dream to see it with my own four eyes, ever since I was a hatchling.
entry.value: Bine a bêh la Çiudá Çûppendida. Çiempre fue mi çueño podêh bêl-la con mî cuatro ohô, dêdde que era un retoño.

entry.key: RiebeckIntroAn alien race lived in this solar system long before our species even existed! How could I not want to see what their civilization was like?
entry.value: ¡Una raça alieníhena bibió en er çîttema çolâh muxo antê de que nuêttra êppeçie êççîttiera! ¡Çería êttraño que no me importara bêh cómo era çu çibiliçaçión!

entry.key: RiebeckIntroOnly...
entry.value: Êh çolo que...

entry.key: RiebeckIntroYou’ve... probably heard the others say it, right? I’m afraid of space. Seriously, I’m more surprised than anybody that I’m out here.
entry.value: Çeguramente êccuxâtte lo que diçen lô demâh, ¿no? Le tengo miedo al êppaçio. Créeme: el exo de êttâh aquí me çorprende caçi mâh a mí que a lô demâh.

entry.key: RiebeckIntroDo you want to know how I even got this far? I fell. Tripped over a gravity crystal. It’s dumb luck I landed somewhere my Little Scout says is halfway stable, instead of being sucked into... what’s below.
entry.value: ¿Quierê çabêh cómo içe pa yegâh tan lehô? Me caí. Me tropeçé con un crîttâh grabitatorio. Digamô que tube argo de çuerte, ya que aterriçé en un lugâh que, çegún mi Miniêpploradôh, êh medianamente êttable... Y lo que ay debaho no lo çûççiona.

entry.key: RiebeckIntroI’ve been gauging the stability of the ground around me using my Little Scout, and this seems to be the place with the best surface integrity, so I’m just going to stay here until I’m ready to move on.
entry.value: E êttao midiendo la êttabilidá der çuelo del entônno con er Miniêpploradôh, y êtte pareçe çêh er lugâh con la çuperfiçie mâh íntegra, açí que me quedaré aquí âtta podêh moberme.

entry.key: RiebeckIntro...But that’s enough about me and my problems. You didn’t come all this way to listen to me blather, did you! Heh, that’d be... yeah.
entry.value: Ya deho de ablâh de mí y de mî problemâ. ¡No creo que ayâ benío âtta aquí çolo pa êccuxarme pâl-loteâh! He, eço çería... Çí.

entry.key: Riebeck1Hi! ...What’s up?
entry.value: ¡Ola! ¿Qué tal?

entry.key: RiebeckHurryToQuestionsUm, sure — of course! Anything you want.
entry.value: Em, claro. ¡Por çupuêtto! Lo que quierâ.

entry.key: Questions
RiebeckQuestionsI learned something!
entry.value: ¡Dêccubrí argo!

entry.key: RiebeckQuestionsWhere should I explore here?
entry.value: ¿Dónde debería êpplorâh por aquí?

entry.key: RiebeckQuestionsWhat are you doing out here?
entry.value: ¿Qué êttâh açiendo aquí?

entry.key: RiebeckQuestionsSee you later.
entry.value: Âtta luego.

entry.key: RiebeckArcheologistMe? I’m an archeologist, remember?
entry.value: ¿Yo? Me dedico a la arqueolohía, ¿recuerdâ?

entry.key: RiebeckArcheologistOr, um, the archeologist, I guess. Seeing as I’m all Timber Hearth’s got right now.
entry.value: E, um... Çupongo que çoy la eminençia en arqueolohía. Ya que no tengo colegâ en Lumbre.

entry.key: RiebeckArcheologistBrittle Hollow is rich with Nomai history. That’s why I’m here. This planet is an absolute treasure trove of culture, history, and science.
entry.value: Ondoná Fráhî êttá repleta de îttoria nomai. Êh por eço que êttoy aquí. Êtte planeta êh un teçoro curturâh, îttórico y çientífico.

entry.key: RiebeckArcheologistIf you have any questions about the Brittle Hollow Nomai, I’m your Hearthian! Or, um... I have some knowledge of them, I mean. So. <size=20>Maybe I can help?</size>
entry.value: Çi tienê preguntâ çobre lô nomai que abitaron Ondoná Fráhî, ¡mi conoçimiento êh tuyo! O, e... Lo que quiero deçîh êh que çé bâttante çobre eyô. En fin. <size=20>¿Quiçá pueda ayudâh?</size>

entry.key: RiebeckExploreOh wow, where shouldn’t you explore here? Um, not the black hole, actually. That’s... very no.
entry.value: Guau, ¿dónde no deberíâ êpplorâh? Puê, el aguhero negro no êh un guen lugâh pa eyo. Êh un «no» rotundo.

entry.key: RiebeckExploreWhich is unfortunate, because uh, the most exciting stuff is all below the crust. Including the <color=orange>Hanging City</color> — that’s just to the north. You can kinda see it from here.
entry.value: Êh una gran pena, ya que lâ coçâ, e, mâh emoçionantê êttán debaho de la corteça. Incluço la <color=orange>Çiudá Çûppendida</color>, que êttá hûtto ar norte. Dêdde aquí çe puede bêh.

entry.key: RiebeckExploreThere’s also this big dome on the south pole called the <color=orange>Southern Observatory</color>. You can’t get inside from the surface — trust me, I tried — but if it’s like the rest of the Nomai structures here, there’s probably a path to it beneath the crust somewhere.
entry.value: También ay un gran domo en er polo çûh yamao <color=orange>Ôççerbatorio Çûh</color>. No puedê entrâh dêdde la çuperfiçie, ya lo e intentao, pero, como el rêtto de lâ êttrûtturâ nomai, êh poçible que aya una entrá debaho de la corteça.

entry.key: RiebeckExploreGood luck with exploring. Um, if you learn anything about the Nomai, I’d love to hear it, <size=20>if it’s not too much trouble?</size>
entry.value: Que tengâ çuerte en tu trabeçía. A, y çi aberiguâ argo çobre lô nomai, me encantaría que me lo contarâ, <size=20>çi no êh muxa molêttia...</size>

entry.key: RiebeckLearnedOh, cool! <Pause/>Um, what is it?
entry.value: ¡A, heniâh! <Pause />Em, ¿de qué çe trata?

entry.key: RiebeckRiebeckLearnedI found the Nomai escape pod on Brittle Hollow.
entry.value: Encontré la cáççula de êccape de lô nomai en Ondoná Fráhî.

entry.key: RiebeckRiebeckLearnedI found the Vessel!
entry.value: ¡Encontré la Nabe!

entry.key: RiebeckRiebeckLearnedI saw the old settlement.
entry.value: Bi el antiguo açentamiento.

entry.key: RiebeckRiebeckLearnedI saw the Hanging City on Brittle Hollow.
entry.value: Bi la Çiudá Çûppendida en Ondoná Fráhî.

entry.key: RiebeckRiebeckLearnedI saw the Sunless City on Ember Twin.
entry.value: Bi la Çiudá Çin Çôh en Hemelo Braça.

entry.key: RiebeckRiebeckLearnedI found Nomai writing about a quantum pilgrimage.
entry.value: Ayé têttô nomai çobre un peregrinahe cuántico.

entry.key: RiebeckRiebeckLearnedI went to the comet, and...
entry.value: Fui ar cometa y...

entry.key: RiebeckRiebeckLearnedI TALKED TO A LIVING NOMAI!
entry.value: ¡ABLÉ CON UNA NOMAI BIBA!

entry.key: RiebeckRiebeckLearnedActually, nevermind.
entry.value: En realidá, no importa.

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_ExitOh, okay. If you do learn something new about the Nomai, though, I’d love to hear it! Um, if you don’t mind, I mean.
entry.value: A, gueno. Çi yegâ a dêccubrîh argo nuebo çobre lô nomai, ¡me encantaría que me lo contarâ! Çi no te molêtta, claro.

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_1Wow! So then, the Nomai probably came here from somewhere outside the solar system. And they must have been in trouble when they launched their escape pod... but what kind of trouble?
entry.value: ¡Guau! Entonçê, êh probable que lô nomai ayan yegao aquí dêdde fuera der çîttema çolâh. Y deben abêh êttao en problemâ cuando lançaron çu cáççula de êccape... pero ¿qué tipo de dificurtá abrán tenío?

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_1And where did the escape pod launch from? I’m so curious!
entry.value: ¿Y dêdde dónde lançaron la cáççula de êccape? ¡Me da muxa curioçidá!

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_1This is an amazing discovery. I hope we can find out more about how and why the Nomai arrived here!
entry.value: Êh un dêccubrimiento increíble. Êppero que podamô aberiguâh mâh çobre cómo y por qué yegaron âtta aquí lô nomai.

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_2You did?! That, that’s incredible, congratulations!
entry.value: ¡¿En çerio?! ¡Êh... increíble! ¡Feliçitaçionê!

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_2That means they really were from far outside our solar system. Haha, yes! I knew it!
entry.value: Eço çînnifica que rearmente eran oriundô de un lugâh mu alehao de nuêttro çîttema çolâh. Ha, ha, ¡çí! ¡Lo çabía!

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_2But that creates so many new questions! If they didn’t come from our solar system, where did they come from? Are they from our galaxy, or somewhere even farther? What were their lives like before they came here? And why did they come here?
entry.value: ¡Pero eço abre muxô mâh interrogantê! Çi no probienen de nuêttro çîttema çolâh, ¿cuâh êh çu orihen? ¿Çon de nuêttra galâççia o de argún lugâh aún mâh remoto? ¿Cómo eran çû bidâ antê de que binieran aquí? ¿Y por qué binieron aquí?

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_2Hey, I... I might not be much of an astronaut, but I’m really glad I came out here to see the Nomai’s artifacts for myself. And, um, thanks for telling me. <Pause/>About the Vessel, I mean.
entry.value: Oye, e... Puede que lô biahê por el êppaçio no çean lo mío, pero me alegra abêh benío âtta aquí a bêh lô artefâttô nomai con mî propiô ohô. Y, e, graçiâ por contarme. <Pause/>Çobre la Nabe, çí.

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_3Isn’t it amazing? Hard to believe the settlement is still standing, but there it is.
entry.value: ¿No êh increíble? Êh difíçî creêh que el açentamiento todabía êtté en pie, pero açí êh.

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_3It really makes you appreciate living somewhere like Timber Hearth. You know, somewhere that isn’t being constantly bombarded with meteors and rocks and stuff.
entry.value: Açe que apreçiemô mâh la bida en un lugâh como Lumbre, donde no êttamô bombardeáô côttantemente por meteorô, rocâ y coçâ del êttilo.

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_4You visited the Hanging City? Oh gosh, how was it? Was it amazing? Was it beautiful? ...Was it scary?
entry.value: ¿Biçitâtte la Çiudá Çûppendida? ¡Çielô! ¿Qué tar te fue? Êh increíble, ¿no? ¿Era ermoça? ¿Aterradora?

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_4The Hanging City is where the Nomai settled permanently on Brittle Hollow. It was their most advanced settlement here!
entry.value: La Çiudá Çûppendida êh donde êttaba el açentamiento permanente de lô nomai en Ondoná Fráhî. ¡Era el açentamiento mâh abançao que tenían aquí!

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_4Why they chose to build their most advanced settlement so close to a you-know-what is beyond me. Maybe that kind of thing makes sense to a Nomai, though. ...Maybe they needed the black hole for something?
entry.value: Nunca podré entendêh por qué deçidieron côttruîh çu açentamiento mâh abançao tan çerca de un... ya çabê qué. Aunque quiçá eço tenga çentío pa un nomai. ¿Puede que neçeçitaran el aguhero negro pa argo?

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_5You mean there’s another Nomai city inside of Ember Twin? That’s incredible! A whole city, and I had no idea it existed! This is great!
entry.value: ¿Diçê que ay otra çiudá nomai en el interiôh de Hemelo Braça? ¡Êh increíble! ¡Una çiudá entera y ni çabía que êççîttía! ¡Êh heniâh!

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_5How did they keep the sand out? If it were me, I’d be nervous about getting buried in the caves by that awful river of sand. Gosh, the Nomai sure were ingenius, building an entire settlement underground. The Sunless City! ...Wow!
entry.value: ¿Cómo mantubieron a la arena alehá? Çi yo ubieçe êttao en çu lugâh, me abría aterrao la idea de que eçe orrible río de arena me atrapara en lâ cuebâ. Çielô, lô nomai çí que tenían inhenio: côttruyeron un açentamiento completo baho tierra. ¡La Çiudá Çin Çôh! ¡Guau!

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_5That means there were two groups of Nomai — one that lived on Ember Twin, and one that lived here on Brittle Hollow. But they must have traveled around the solar system, since Nomai writing can be found on other planets, too.
entry.value: Lo que quiere deçîh que abía dôh grupô de nomai: uno que bibía en Hemelo Braça y otro que bibía aquí, en Ondoná Fráhî. Pero deben abêh biahao por tó er çîttema çolâh, ya que también ay êccritô nomai en otrô planetâ.

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_6A pilgrimage to the Quantum Moon? The Nomai mentioned the Quantum Moon in a lot of their writing, so it was clearly special to them. And um, special enough to make a trip there by themselves!
entry.value: ¿Un peregrinahe a la Luna Cuántica? Lô nomai mençionaron la Luna Cuántica en cantidadê de êccritô. Êh ebidente que era un çitio êppeçiâh pa eyô. ¡Tan êppeçiâh como pa biçitâl-la por çu propia cuenta!

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_6It sounds like a coming-of-age ritual, like how hatchlings stay hatchlings until their stomachs are strong enough to drink sap wine.
entry.value: Çuena a rituâh der paço a la adurtêh, como el exo de que lô retoñô permaneçen como talê âtta que çû êttómagô pueden çoportâh un trago de bino de çabia.

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_6Maybe once a Nomai journeyed to the Quantum Moon, they were considered an adult?
entry.value: Quiçá, cuando un nomai biahaba a la Luna Cuántica, çînnificaba que abía entrao en la adurtêh, ¿no?

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_7Oh, wow. Wow. So that’s how the Nomai died?
entry.value: A, baya. Guau. Entonçê, ¿açí murieron lô nomai?

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_7That’s... really sad, isn’t it? I know it was a long time ago, but still...
entry.value: Êh mu... trîtte, ¿no? Çé que çuçedió açe muxo tiempo, pero aun açí...

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_7Stars above, it’s lucky we hadn’t evolved to live on land yet.
entry.value: Por lâ êttreyâ, menô mâh que aún no abíamô eboluçionao pa bibîh en la tierra.

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_7To think, if the comet hadn’t killed them, our species might have coexisted in this solar system. That would have been amazing.
entry.value: No puedo dehâh de pençâh que, çi er cometa no lô ubiera aniquilao, oy nuêttrâ êppeçiê coêççîttirían en er çîttema çolâh. Ubieçe çido increíble.

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_7But...
entry.value: Pero...

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_7I guess if I hadn’t wanted to learn why the Nomai disappeared, I’d never have left Timber Hearth and come out here, or had any of these adventures.
entry.value: Çupongo que çi no ubieçe querío çabêh cómo deçapareçieron lô nomai, nunca ubiera abandonao Lumbre pa benîh âtta aquí, ni tampoco ubiera bibío tamañâ abenturâ.

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_7...Don’t get me wrong, space is terrifying! But, you know, it has its moments.
entry.value: No me malinterpretê: ¡el êppaçio êh aterradôh! Pero, ya çabê, tiene coçâ guenâ.

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_8AHHH! That doesn’t make any sense! I don’t understand! I am very excited for you, though! P-please stop yelling!
entry.value: ¡AAA! ¡No tiene ningún çentío! ¡No entiendo! ¡Me entuçiâmma muxo por ti! ¡P-por fabôh deha de gritâh!

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_8...What? On the Quantum Moon, you said?<Pause> There’s a sort of-living Nomai on the Quantum Moon?!
entry.value: ¿Qué...? ¿Dihîtte en la Luna Cuántica?<Pause> ¡¿Ay una çuerte de nomai con bida en la Luna Cuántica?!

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_8WELL, WHY DIDN’T YOU SAY SO?!
entry.value: ¡¿POR QUÉ NO LO DIHÎTTE ANTÊ?!

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_8Oh wow! Wow! This is the best thing that’s ever happened in the history of Outer Wilds Ventures! I can’t believe you talked to an actual Nomai!
entry.value: ¡Ay, çielô! ¡Guau! ¡Êtto êh lo mâh marabiyoço que aya çuçedío en la îttoria de Outer Wilds Ventures! ¡No puedo creêh que ayâ ablao con una nomai de berdá!

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_8Great! So I just have to go back into space, fly to the Quantum Moon with zero visibility, find a spooky ruin, and travel through a few different types of dangerous terrain to get there.
entry.value: ¡Heniâh! Entonçê, tengo que borbêh al êppaçio, bolâh a la Luna Cuántica con biçibilidá nula, encontrâh una ruina terrorífica y biahâh a trabêh de bariô tipô de terrenô peligroçô pa yegâh ayí.

entry.key: RiebeckLearned_8Okay, yeah, that’s... that’s not so bad. <Pause><size=20>That’s probably doable...</size>
entry.value: Çí, gueno, claro... No êh tan terrible. <Pause><size=20>Êh poçiblemente realiçable...</size>

entry.key: SignThis piece of Nomai writing was essential to deciphering their unique language.
entry.value: Êtte êccrito nomai fue clabe pa dêççifrâh çu tan particulâh lenguahe.

entry.key: SignAlthough this text is linear, Nomai text often branches off from a central point. Interestingly, each branch tends to be written by a different author.
entry.value: Aunque êtte têtto êh lineâh, la êccritura nomai çuele partîh de un punto çentrâh y ramificarçe a partîh de ayí. Un âppêtto mu intereçante êh que cá rama çuele êttâh êccrita por un autôh diferente.

entry.key: SignWhat you see here are parts of the Nomai skeleton. We can tell from their skulls that they possessed antlers and, quite unusually, only three eyes.
entry.value: Lo que bêh aquí çon partê del êqqueleto nomai. A hûggâh por lô cráneô, podemô afirmâh que tenían âttâ y, curioçamente, çolo trêh ohô.

entry.key: SignThe Nomai body was most likely adapted for living exclusively on land. The differences in the Nomai’s anatomy, such as their shockingly fragile bone structure, show us that Hearthians couldn’t have descended from Nomaian ancestors.
entry.value: Poçiblemente, er cuerpo de lô nomai êttaba adâttao pa bibîh çolo en la tierra. Lâ diferençiâ anatómicâ, como una êttrûttura óçea yamatibamente fráhî, demuêttran que lô lumbreanô no çomô dêççendientê de ançêttrô nomai.

entry.key: SignIt’s not clear where the Nomai originated from, or why they disappeared. We hope to find more clues to this puzzle as we explore our solar system.
entry.value: No queda claro de dónde çon orihinariamente lô nomai, ni por qué deçapareçieron. Êpperamô podêh encontrâh mâh pieçâ de êtte rompecabeçâ a medida que êpploremô nuêttro çîttema çolâh.

entry.key: SignThe Nomai who came to our solar system were following a signal from the Eye of the universe.
entry.value: Lô nomai que yegaron a nuêttro çîttema çolâh êttaban çigiendo una çeñâh del Oho del uniberço.

entry.key: SignThey perished when the Interloper arrived, bringing with it the deadly substance we called ghost matter that flooded the entire solar system almost instantly and without warning.
entry.value: Murieron cuando yegó el Intruço con la çûttançia mortífera que yamamô materia fantâmmâh. Tó er çîttema çolâh quedó imprênnao por eya de forma îttantánea y çin prebio abiço.

entry.key: SignWe never figured out how they died.
entry.value: Nunca çupimô cómo murieron.

entry.key: SignStars like our sun generate light and heat by fusing hydrogen into helium.
entry.value: Lâ êttreyâ como nuêttro Çôh heneran lûh y calôh mediante fuçión, por la que el idróheno çe trâfforma en elio.

entry.key: SignAs it grows older, the star runs out of hydrogen and starts to contract.
entry.value: A medida que paça er tiempo, la êttreya çe queda çin idróheno y comiença a contraerçe.

entry.key: SignAs the star’s core contracts, it gets hotter, causing the outer layers to expand. The star has become a red giant.
entry.value: A medida que er núcleo de la êttreya çe contrae, çe calienta mâh y mâh, y lâ capâ êttênnâ çe êppanden. La êttreya çe a combertío en una higante roha.

entry.key: SignWhen the core is hot enough, it starts to fuse helium into carbon.
entry.value: Cuando er núcleo êttá lo çufiçientemente caliente, el elio comiença a trâfformarçe en carbono.

entry.key: SignIf a star is massive enough, it will continue to fuse carbon into even heavier elements like iron.
entry.value: Çi una êttreya êh lo çufiçientemente grande, çegirá produçiendo fuçión de carbono y trâfformándolo en elementô mâh peçáô, como el ierro.

entry.key: SignUltimately, the star will collapse under its own gravity and then explode in a violent event called a supernova.
entry.value: Finarmente, la êttreya colâççará por er peço de çu propia grabedá y êttayará en una biolenta çupênnoba.

entry.key: SignBased on Chert’s observations, this will one day be the fate of our own sun.
entry.value: Çegún lâ ôççerbaçionê de Xert, êtte también çerá er dêttino de nuêttro Çôh argún día.

entry.key: SignAt the end of its lifespan, our sun collapsed under its own gravity and then exploded in a violent supernova.
entry.value: Ar finâh de çu çiclo de bida, nuêttro Çôh colâççó por er peço de çu propia grabedá y êttayó en una brutâh çupênnoba.

entry.key: SignWatch closely... these balls move on their own!
entry.value: Mira con detenimiento: ¡êttâ bolâ çe mueben çolâ!

entry.key: SignThe ground is perfectly level, so what do you think causes this spooky motion?
entry.value: Er terreno êttá perfêttamente nibelao... ¿Qué creê que êtté cauçando êtte mobimiento tan aterradôh?

entry.key: SignThe answer is the moon! As it orbits our planet, the Attlerock’s gravity pulls on objects from different directions. In fact, it’s pulling on you right now!
entry.value: ¡La rêppuêtta êh la Luna! Cuando orbita arrededôh de nuêttro planeta, la grabedá de Rocaterra açe que lô ôhhetô çe mueban en diferentê dirêççionê. De exo, ¡aora te êttá mobiendo a ti!

entry.key: ROOT: I was hoping to deliver new ore data to Poke in her <color=orange>Black Hole Forge</color>, but the warp tower on the <color=orange>Twilight Twin</color> sent me to the wrong part of <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>.
entry.value: ROOT: Tenía la intençión de embiâl-le nuebô datô çobre mineralê a Poke en çu <color=orange>Forha del Aguhero Negro</color>, pero la torre de dîttorçión del <color=orange>Hemelo Relôh de Arena</color> me embió ar lugâh equibocao de <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color>.

entry.key: ROOT: Could someone kindly remind me if there’s a way to warp directly to the forge or if I imagined this?
entry.value: ROOT: ¿Podría argien recordarme çi ay arguna manera de trâl-ladarçe mediante dîttorçión dirêttamente a la forha? ¿O me lo imahiné?

entry.key: CLARY: There is! The <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> warp tower that stands on the <color=orange>Twilight Twin</color> will take you to two different places, including the forge. Just make sure you start at the correct place within the tower.
entry.value: CLARY: ¡Çí la ay! La torre de dîttorçión de <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color> que êttá en el <color=orange>Hemelo Relôh de Arena</color> puede yebarte a dôh lugarê; uno de eyô êh la forha. Çolo tienê que començâh en er lugâh corrêtto dentro de la torre.

entry.key: ROOT: Of personal note: Remember to give Clary my gratitude when next I visit the <color=orange>Black Hole Forge</color>.
entry.value: ROOT: De conçideraçión perçonâh: No orbidâh dâl-le mi gratitûh a Clary la próççima bêh que biçite la <color=orange>Forha del Aguhero Negro</color>.

entry.key: Black Hole Forge controls
entry.value: <color=orange>Controlê de la Forha del Aguhero Negro</color>

entry.key: POKE: Clary and Root, kindly tune the alignments on each black hole core as I finish them. The schematic on the floor shows which warp tower aligns with which astral body.
entry.value: POKE: Clary y Root, agan er fabôh de ahûttâh la alineaçión de cá núcleo de aguhero negro a medida que lô finaliço. Er diagrama der çuelo muêttra qué torre de dîttorçión çe alinea con qué cuerpo âttrâh.

entry.key: CLARY: To speed future deliveries to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>, I’ve tuned the first black hole core to activate when its warp tower aligns with <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color>.
entry.value: CLARY: Pa açelerâh lâ próççimâ entregâ açia <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>, ahûtté er primêh núcleo de aguhero negro pa âttibâl-lo cuando çu torre de dîttorçión çe alinee con <color=lightblue>Ondoná Fráhî</color>.

entry.key: CLARY: And before anyone comments, yes, I am aware this reduces the distance between Yarrow and me.
entry.value: CLARY: Y antê de que argien emita argún comentario; çí, çoy côççiente de que êtto reduçirá la dîttançia entre Yarrow y yo.

entry.key: ROOT: The schematic shows the six towers on <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> are being tuned to only five alignments. Is that a mistake?
entry.value: ROOT: Er diagrama indica que lâ çeî torrê de <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color> çe êttán ahûttando a tan çolo çinco alineaçionê. ¿Ay argún errôh?

entry.key: POKE: No, that’s correct. For these alignments we've decided to treat the <color=lightblue>Hourglass Twins</color> as a single astral body.
entry.value: POKE: No, êh corrêtto. En cuanto a lâ alineaçionê, deçidimô tratâh a lô <color=lightblue>Hemelô Relôh de Arena</color> como un cuerpo âttrâh único.

entry.key: POKE: Have you seen Phlox’s tower designs in the <color=orange>High Energy Lab</color> on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color>? They clarify each tower’s warp destination.
entry.value: POKE: ¿Âh bîtto lô diagramâ de Phlôh çobre lâ torrê en el <color=orange>Laboratorio Urtraenerhético</color> de <color=lightblue>Hemelo Braça</color>? Graçiâ a eyô, queda claro er dêttino de la dîttorçión de cá torre.

entry.key: POKE: If it helps, you can imagine the <color=lightblue>Hourglass Twins</color> as aligning with themselves.
entry.value: POKE: Çi êh de ayuda, imahina a lô <color=lightblue>Hemelô Relôh de Arena</color> como çi çe alinearan entre eyô.

entry.key: THATCH: This knowledge is too dear to lose: Here is everything we can recall about the signal we encountered while aboard the <color=orange>Vessel</color>.
entry.value: TÂXX: Êtte conoçimiento êh demaçiao balioço como pa perdêl-lo. Êtto êh tó lo que recordamô çobre la çeñâh que nô encontramô cuando êttábamô a bordo de la <color=orange>Nabe</color>.

entry.key: FILIX: The signal looked like an eye: round, with a circle at the center much like a pupil. (Suppose the signal was looking for something.)
entry.value: FILÎH: La çeñâh çe pareçía a un oho: redonda, con un çírculo en er çentro que bien podría çêh una pupila. (Çupongamô que la çeñâh êttaba bûccando argo).

entry.key: FILIX: The signal was older than the universe itself! This is the most significant detail.
entry.value: FILÎH: ¡La çeñâh era mâh antigua que er mîmmíçimo uniberço! Êtte êh er detaye mâh çînnificatibo.

entry.key: PLUME: No Nomai clan has ever encountered anything like it! How can anything in this universe be older than the universe itself?
entry.value: PLUME: ¡Ningún clan nomai encontró argo açí antê! ¿Cómo puede çêh que argo que perteneçe al uniberço çea mâh antiguo que er mîmmo uniberço?

entry.key: THATCH: Imagine what rare and profound knowledge it might offer. We must find this Eye of the universe.
entry.value: TÂXX: Imahinen lô conoçimientô êttrañô y profundô que podría ofreçêh. Tenemô que encontrâh êtte Oho del uniberço.

entry.value: <color=orange>Dîttrito de la Forha del Aguhero Negro</color>

entry.value: <color=orange>Cañón grabitatorio</color>\\n(400 m al êtte)

entry.value: La <color=orange>Torre der Conoçimiento Cuántico</color>\\n(190 m al oêtte)

entry.value: <color=orange>Cruçe inferiôh</color>\\n(56 m açia abaho)

entry.key: The <color=orange>Hanging City</color>\\n(below 50m)
entry.value: La <color=orange>Çiudá Çûppendida</color>\\n(50 m açia abaho)

entry.value: <color=orange>Dîttrito der Çantuario del Oho</color>

entry.key: <color=orange>Meltwater District</color>
entry.value: <color=orange>Dîttrito Aguaniebe</color>

entry.value: <color=orange>Forha del Aguhero Negro</color>\\n(30 m a la îqquierda)

entry.key: The <color=orange>Crossroads</color>\\n(east 190m)
entry.value: El <color=orange>Cruçe</color>\\n(190 m al êtte)

entry.key: <color=orange>School District</color>
entry.value: <color=orange>Dîttrito Êccolâh</color>

entry.key: <color=orange>Gravity Cannon</color> Controls\\n(90m)
entry.value: Controlê del <color=orange>cañón grabitatorio</color>\\n(90 m)

entry.key: Entrance to the <color=orange>Tower of Quantum Knowledge</color>\\n(below 90m)
entry.value: Entrá a la <color=orange>Torre der Conoçimiento Cuántico</color>\\n(90 m açia abaho)

entry.key: The <color=orange>shuttle</color> is currently resting at the <color=lightblue>comet</color>.
entry.value: El <color=orange>trâbbordadôh</color> çe encuentra poçao çobre el <color=lightblue>cometa</color>.

entry.key: Who’s been computing shuttle trajectories to the <color=orange>Sun Station</color>? Don’t worry; the station is in such a low stellar orbit, we’ve constructed a different, safer way to travel there from <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>.
entry.value: ¿Quién a êttao carculando lâ trayêttoriâ der trâbbordadôh a la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color>? No ay por qué preocuparçe; la êttaçión êttá en una órbita êttelâh mu baha, açí que diçeñamô una forma mâh çegura de biahâh âtta ayí dêdde <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>.

entry.key: IDAEA: That would be Pye. I told her we wouldn’t be traveling there by <color=orange>shuttle</color>, and that the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> doesn’t even have a landing pad, but she said she knew.
entry.value: IDAEA: Çe trata de Pye. Le dihe que no biaharíamô por <color=orange>trâbbordadôh</color> y que la Êttaçión Çolâh ni çiquiera tiene una çona de aterriçahe, pero me rêppondió que ya lo çabía.

entry.key: PYE: It’s a purely theoretical exercise on my part, Yarrow. Who doesn’t love computing a good low stellar orbit shuttle trajectory!
entry.value: PYE: Êh un eherçiçio puramente teórico, Yarrow. ¿A quién no le gûtta carculâh una guena trayêttoria de órbita êttelâh baha?

entry.key: IDAEA: Pye, I look forward to working with you, but I’m also relieved it will be easy to return to <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color> regularly.
entry.value: IDAEA: Pye, me entuçiâmma trabahâh contigo, pero también me alibia çabêh que çerá fáçî regreçâh a <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color> regularmente.

entry.key: MELORAE: This rock is very familiar! Did you travel here, my sedimentary friend? Because your unique color and texture appears identical to a rock I met earlier.
entry.value: MELORAE: ¡Êtta roca me reçurta mu familiâh! ¿Biahâtte âtta aquí, amigita çedimentaria? Porque tu colôh y têttura únicô çon idénticô a lô de una roca que conôcco.

entry.key: MELORAE: Wasn’t this same rock fragment in the cave we found at the bottom of the dry lakebed (at the north pole)?
entry.value: MELORAE: ¿Acaço no êh er mîmmo frâmmento de roca de la cueba que encontramô en er fondo der lexo der lago çeco (en er polo norte)?

entry.key: COLEUS: An update: Melorae and I went back to the <color=orange>Lakebed Cave</color> and observed this rock again. Sometimes it’s there, and sometimes it isn’t.
entry.value: COLEÛ: Âttualiçaçión: Melorae y yo regreçamô a la <color=orange>Cueba Lacûttre</color> y borbimô a ôççerbâh êtta roca. A beçê êttá ayí, y a beçê no.

entry.key: MELORAE: That means this rock wanders like the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> does. How curious!
entry.value: MELORAE: Êtto implica que êtta roca deambula der mîmmo modo que la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>. ¡Qué curioço!

entry.key: COLEUS: We plan to reexamine the northern <color=orange>Lakebed Cave</color>. (Maybe our friendly rock will meet us down there!)
entry.value: COLEÛ: Planeamô borbêh a êççaminâh la <color=orange>Cueba Lacûttre</color> ar norte. (¡Tar bêh ayí nô encontremô con nuêttra amiga la roca!).

entry.key: The <color=orange>Sunless City</color>\\n(110m)
entry.value: La <color=orange>Çiudá Çin Çôh</color>\\n(120 m)

entry.value: <color=orange>Cañón grabitatorio</color>\\n(120 m)

entry.key: <color=orange>Stepping Stone Cave</color>\\n(20m)
entry.value: <color=orange>Cueba de lô Perdañô</color>\\n(20 m)

entry.key: The <color=orange>Sunless City</color>\\n(120m)
entry.value: La <color=orange>Çiudá Çin Çôh</color>\\n(120 m)

entry.value: <color=orange>Cuebâ de la Coliçión</color>\\n(60 m)

entry.key: The <color=orange>High Energy Lab</color>\\n(300m)
entry.value: El <color=orange>Laboratorio Urtraenerhético</color>\\n(300 m)

entry.key: The <color=orange>Sunless City</color>\\n(300m)
entry.value: La <color=orange>Çiudá Çin Çôh</color>\\n(300 m)

entry.key: <TimeMinutes> MINUTES, <TimeSeconds> SECONDS AGO: Long-range probe successfully launched from the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color>.
entry.value: AÇE <TimeMinutes> MINUTÔ Y <TimeSeconds> ÇEGUNDÔ: La çonda de largo arcançe dêppegó con éççito dêdde el <color=orange>Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh</color>.

entry.key: We offer our congratulations! You’ve learned the rule of quantum imaging. Take this knowledge with you on the remainder of your quantum pilgrimage.
entry.value: ¡Te damô nuêttrâ feliçitaçionê! Âh aprendío la regla de lâ imáhenê cuánticâ. Yeba êtte conoçimiento contigo durante el rêtto de tu peregrinahe cuántico.

entry.key: Remember, the other quantum shards have other lessons to teach.
entry.value: Recuerda: lô demâh frâmmentô cuánticô tienen otrâ lêççionê que ençeñâh.

entry.key: Our curiosity goes with you on your journey. You walk in the footsteps of those who came before you, and your path guides those who will follow later.
entry.value: Nuêttra curioçidá biaha contigo. Êttâh caminando trâ lô paçô de quienê te preçedieron; y tu andâh gía a quienê bendrán dêppuêh de ti.

entry.key: PHLOX: Yarrow, would you kindly step back so Daz is closest to the statue? When pairing, the statue will choose whoever is in closest proximity.
entry.value: PHLÔH: Yarrow, ¿podríâ correrte pa que Dâh êtté mâh çerca de la êttatua? Cuando çea er momento de bincularçe, la êttatua elehirá a quien êtté mâh çerca de eya.

entry.key: PHLOX: ...See how its eyes have opened? That tells us the statue has paired with Daz. Now, no matter where he is in this star system, Daz’s statue will record his memories and send them to the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>.
entry.value: PHLÔH: ¿Ben cómo abrió lô ohô? Eço nô diçe que la êttatua çe binculó con Dâh. Aora, çin importâh dónde êtté Dâh en er çîttema êttelâh, la êttatua armaçenará çû recuerdô y lô embiará al <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>.

entry.key: YARROW: This is extraordinary sculpting work, Phlox!
entry.value: YARROW: ¡Âh exo un trabaho de êccurtura êççelente, Phlôh!

entry.key: DAZ: He has outdone himself again, hasn’t he? And now that we have our first successful pairing, we can test my memory storage prototype.
entry.value: DÂH: Borbió a çuperarçe a çí mîmmo, ¿no êh açí? Y, aora que tenemô la primera binculaçión êççitoça, podemô probâh mi prototipo de armaçenamiento de memoria.

entry.key: DAZ: Each statue will send a single Nomai’s memories to his or her own storage unit within <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>.
entry.value: DÂH: Cá êttatua embiará lô recuerdô der nomai con er que êtté binculá a çu propia unidá de armaçenamiento en <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>.

entry.key: PHLOX: Each storage unit will be equipped with a mask, the statue’s counterpart, which will be able to send those stored memories back to the corresponding Nomai.
entry.value: PHLÔH: Cá unidá de armaçenamiento êttará equipá con una máccara, er complemento de la êttatua, la cuâ tendrá la capaçidá de reembiâl-le lô recuerdô ar nomai corrêppondiente.

entry.key: <TimeMinutes> MINUTES, <TimeSeconds> SECONDS AGO: Request to launch probe received from <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>.
entry.value: AÇE <TimeMinutes> MINUTÔ Y <TimeSeconds> ÇEGUNDÔ: Çoliçitûh pa lançâh çonda reçibida dêdde el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>.

entry.key: Cannon aligned with randomly selected probe trajectory. Gravity field activated.
entry.value: Cañón alineao con la trayêttoria de çonda çelêççioná al açâh. Campo grabitatorio âttibao.

entry.key: Control Module
entry.value: <color=orange>Módulo de Contrôh</color>

entry.key: Launch Module
entry.value: <color=orange>Módulo de Lançamiento</color>

entry.key: Receiving data from probe <NbTimeloops>.
entry.value: Reçibiendo datô de la çonda <NbTimeloops>.

entry.key: Visualizing current trajectory of probe <NbTimeloops>.
entry.value: Biçualiçando la trayêttoria âttuâh de la çonda <NbTimeloops>.

entry.key: SOLANUM: There is fundamental uncertainty throughout the universe. Normally, this uncertainty is only observable on a very small scale. As one approaches the Eye, however, that uncertainty grows enormously.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: El uniberço preçenta una inçertidumbre fundamentâh. Normarmente, êtta inçertidumbre çe ôççerba çolo en una êccala mu pequeña. Pero, a medida que nô açercamô al Oho, la inçertidumbre creçe enormemente.

entry.key: SOLANUM: The <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> probably exhibits macroscopic quantum behavior because of its proximity to the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>. Shards that broke off from the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> have a similar effect, as I imagine you’ve seen elsewhere in this star system.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Êh probable que la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> êççiba condûttâ cuánticâ macrôccópicâ debío a çu prôççimidá al <color=lightblue>Oho</color>. Lô frâmmentô que çe dêpprendieron de la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> tienen un efêtto çemehante, como imahino abrâh bîtto en tó êtte çîttema êttelâh.

entry.key: SOLANUM: Conscious observation forces a quantum object to collapse to a single possibility. But what would happen if a conscious observer somehow entered the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> itself?
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: La ôççerbaçión côççiente obliga a lô ôhhetô cuánticô a colâççâh en una poçibilidá única. ¿Qué çuçedería çi un ôççerbadôh côççiente lograra entrâh en el <color=lightblue>Oho</color>?

entry.key: SOLANUM: Over time, this has become my clan’s greatest question.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Con er corrêh der tiempo, êtta pregunta çe combirtió en el interrogante prinçipâh de mi clan.

entry.key: SOLANUM: I imagine your purpose here is the same as mine: to learn about and to find the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Imahino tenemô er mîmmo propóçito en êtte lugâh: encontrâh el <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color> y aprendêh çobre él.

entry.key: SOLANUM: I’m unsure how you arrived here, however. Perhaps you came from another star system, as my clan originally did?
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Çin embargo, no entiendo cómo yegâtte âtta aquí. ¿Tar bêh bienê dêdde otro çîttema êttelâh, como mi clan en er comienço?

entry.key: SOLANUM: Have you encountered a quantum shard on another planet? The shards look the same as the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>’s surface does now, while at the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: ¿Encontrâtte un frâmmento cuántico en otro planeta? Lô frâmmentô çe ben como la çuperfiçie de la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> en êtte momento, en el <color=lightblue>Oho</color>.

entry.key: SOLANUM: From this, we can reasonably infer the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>’s natural state is as we see it now, and that the Eye is its primary location.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: A raîh de êtto, la concluçión raçionâh êh que el êttao naturâh de la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> êh er que bemô aora, y que el Oho êh çu ubicaçión prinçipâh.

entry.key: SOLANUM: Given the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> is the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>’s moon, it’s likely that any characteristics the moon exhibits are also exhibited by the Eye itself. The <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> and its shards, for instance, are quantum; thus, the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is likely also quantum.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Dao que la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> êh er çatélite del <color=lightblue>Oho</color>, êh probable que cuarquiêh carâtteríttica que êççiba êtta luna también la êççiba el Oho. La <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> y çû frâmmentô, por ehemplo, çon cuánticô, de modo que êh probable que el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> también çea cuántico.

entry.key: SOLANUM: In fact, this moon is probably quantum because its proximity to the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> made it quantum, the same way the areas surrounding quantum shards that landed on other planets eventually became quantum, too.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: De exo, êh probable que êtta luna çea cuántica a cauça de çu prôççimidá al <color=lightblue>Oho</color>, der mîmmo modo que lâ áreâ çercanâ a lô frâmmentô cuánticô que aterriçaron en otrô planetâ también çe combirtieron en lugarê cuánticô.

entry.key: SOLANUM: I am on my first pilgrimage to the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>. All Nomai in my clan make this journey when we come of age.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Êtte êh mi primêh peregrinahe a la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>. Tôh lô nomai de mi clan açen êtte biahe al arcançâh la mayoría de edá.

entry.key: SOLANUM: Even though the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> cannot be reached from here, the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> remains special to us, as it carries us nearer to the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> than any other place we know.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Aunque no podemô arcançâh el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> dêdde aquí, la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> êh mu êppeçiâh pa noçotrô, dao que nô açerca al <color=lightblue>Oho</color> mâh que cuarquiêh otro lugâh que conôccamô.

entry.key: SOLANUM: I’ve journeyed here to be close to the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>. While the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is obscured from our sight, we can see the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>’s reflection of the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> in the sky above us.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: E biahao âtta aquí pa êttâh çerca del <color=lightblue>Oho</color>. Çi bien no çomô capaçê de bêh el <color=lightblue>Oho</color>, podemô ôççerbâh cómo la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> refleha el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> en er çielo.

entry.key: SOLANUM: Suppose you could reach the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>: Would you try to enter it?
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Çupongamô que pudierâ yegâh al <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>: ¿intentaríâ entrâh en él?

entry.key: SOLANUM: What do you imagine the effects of a conscious observer might be?
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: ¿Qué efêttô creê que tendría la mirá de un ôççerbadôh côççiente?

entry.key: SOLANUM: I imagine you’ve noticed the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> changes in appearance depending on which location it is currently orbiting (for instance, the moon looks quite different when orbiting <color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color> than it does when orbiting the <color=lightblue>Hourglass Twins</color>).
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Imahino que abrâh notao lô cambiô en la apariençia de la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> çegún la ubicaçión de çu órbita âttuâh (por ehemplo, la luna çe be mu diferente cuando orbita arrededôh de <color=lightblue>Abîmmo der Higante</color> que cuando orbita arrededôh de lô <color=lightblue>Hemelô Relôh de Arena</color>).

entry.key: SOLANUM: Because the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> clearly changes in its different forms, the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> (being this moon’s primary location) must be similarly malleable.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Dao que la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> cambia y toma formâ diferentê, el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> (la ubicaçión prinçipâh de êtte çatélite) debe çêh iguâh de maleable.

entry.key: SOLANUM: From this, we can hypothesize that the Eye represents extreme changeability.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Con êtto, podemô planteâh la ipóteçî de que el Oho repreçenta una mutabilidá êttrema.

entry.key: SOLANUM: That said, despite its malleable nature, the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> becomes locked to one specific version of itself when it is consciously observed.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Çin embargo, a peçâh de çu naturaleça maleable, la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> permaneçe en una berçión êppeçífica de çí mîmma cuando çe la ôççerba côççientemente.

entry.key: SOLANUM: But what would happen if a conscious observer were to enter the Eye?
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: ¿Qué çuçedería çi un ôççerbadôh côççiente entrara en el Oho?

entry.key: SOLANUM: Many in my clan have believed the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> called to us for a particular purpose.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Muxô miembrô de mi clan creían que el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> nô yamaba con un propóçito en particulâh.

entry.key: SOLANUM: When I was a child, I used to believe the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> was malevolent, to have lured my clan to this star system only to then vanish from them so completely.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: En mi infançia, çolía creêh que el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> era malébolo, que abía atraío a mi clan a êtte çîttema êttelâh çolo pa açêl-lo deçapareçêh por çiempre.

entry.key: SOLANUM: But I don’t fear the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>, anymore. In fact, it became my fondest hope to see the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> itself, someday, but I fear this may be beyond my reach.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Pero ya no le temo al <color=lightblue>Oho</color>. De exo, aora tengo la profunda êpperança de bêh el <color=lightblue>Oho</color> argún día, çi bien me temo que êttá fuera de mi arcançe.

entry.key: SOLANUM: You may think I’m strange, but I have a hypothesis that I may not be entirely alive. Perhaps my journey has reached its end.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Tar bêh te parêcca êttraño, pero tengo la ipóteçî de que no êttoy der tó biba. Quiçá mi biahe aya yegao a çu fin.

entry.key: SOLANUM: These are the two tenets of Nomai philosophy; to seek out and to understand is our way of living.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Êttô çon lô dôh pilarê de la filoçofía nomai: bûccâh y comprendêh êh nuêttra forma de bida.

entry.key: SOLANUM: We are orbiting the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color> now, although we cannot see it (only the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>’s reflection of it). The <color=lightblue>Eye</color> is older than the universe itself, and my clan believes it dwells in an extremely distant orbit around this star system.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: En êtte momento, êttamô orbitando arrededôh del <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>, aunque no podamô bêl-lo (çolo bemô çu refleho en la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>). El <color=lightblue>Oho</color> êh mâh antiguo que er mîmmíçimo uniberço, y mi clan cree que çe encuentra en una órbita êttremadamente dîttante arrededôh de êtte çîttema êttelâh.

entry.key: SOLANUM: I’ve never met one of your kind before. It’s an honor to speak with you! I particularly admire your four eyes.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Nunca conoçí a un ehemplâh de tu êppeçie. ¡Êh un onôh ablâh contigo! Tû cuatro ohô çon particularmente âmmirablê.

entry.key: SOLANUM: There are many questions I would ask, if I could comprehend your language. You have my gratitude for understanding mine.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Te aría muxâ preguntâ çi pudiera comprendêh tu idioma. Tienê mi gratitûh por entendêh er mío.

entry.key: SOLANUM: This is the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>, where we both are standing.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Nuêttrô piê çe encuentran çobre la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>.

entry.key: SOLANUM: Despite also orbiting other celestial bodies, the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> is the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>’s moon.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Çi bien también orbita arrededôh de otrô cuerpô çelêttê, la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color> êh er çatélite del <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>.

entry.key: SOLANUM: I am Solanum, a Nomai. My clan arrived in this star system before my birth, and we now call it home.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Çoy Çolanum, una nomai. Mi clan yegó a êtte çîttema êttelâh antê de que yo naçiera, y aora êtte êh nuêttro ogâh.

entry.key: SOLANUM: Is this your first time on the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>? It’s my first time here.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: ¿Abíâ biçitao antê la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>? Êh la primera bêh que êttoy aquí.

entry.key: SOLANUM: If you’ve come here looking for answers, I hope you find them.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Çi âh benío en bûcca de rêppuêttâ, êppero que lâ encuentrê.

entry.key: SOLANUM: Like many of my clan before me, I journeyed here to see the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color>’s reflection of the <color=lightblue>Eye</color>. This is the closest any of us have come to seeing the <color=lightblue>Eye</color> itself.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Como tantô otrô miembrô de mi clan que me preçedieron, biahé âtta aquí pa bêh el refleho del <color=lightblue>Oho</color> que ay en la <color=lightblue>Luna Cuántica</color>. Êtto êh lo mâh çerca que uno de noçotrô aya êttao de bêh el <color=lightblue>Oho</color>.

entry.key: SOLANUM: We do not have much connection, you and I.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Tú y yo no tenemô muxa conêççión.

entry.key: SOLANUM: Still, this encounter feels special. I hope you won’t mind if I think of you as a friend.
entry.value: ÇOLANUM: Çin embargo, êtte encuentro çe çiente êppeçiâh. Pençaré en nuêttra relaçión como una amîttá. Êppero que no te molêtte.

entry.key: RAMIE: I’ve installed the masks inside the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>, Phlox. They look beautiful (although I do feel as though I’m being observed!).
entry.value: RAMIE: Phlôh, îttalé lâ máccarâ dentro del <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>. Çe ben ermoçâ (çi bien pareçe que me ôççerbaran).

entry.key: RAMIE: It’s comforting to know the statues will not pair until the project succeeds. Otherwise, I imagine the experience would be hard to endure!
entry.value: RAMIE: Êh reconfortante çabêh que lâ êttatuâ no ban a bincularçe âtta que er proyêtto prôppere. ¡De otro modo, imahino que la êpperiençia çería difíçî de çoportâh!

entry.key: PHLOX: Ideally, they’ll only need to activate once the project succeeds; as a safety measure, however, the statues will also activate in the event of equipment failure.
entry.value: PHLÔH: En un êççenario ideâh, çolo çe âttibarán cuando er proyêtto prôppere; pero, como medida de çeguridá, lâ êttatuâ también çe âttibarán ante una faya de lô equipô.

entry.key: RAMIE: They will? Why is that?
entry.value: RAMIE: A, ¿çí? ¿Por qué?

entry.key: PHLOX: If anything goes wrong with the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>, the statues (and their masks) will make us aware of the situation and enable us to fix it. Otherwise, it would be possible for us to remain permanently unaware of the problem.
