entry.value: PHLÔH: Çi argo çale mâh durante el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>, lâ êttatuâ (y çû máccarâ) nô abiçarán y nô permitirán çoluçionâh la çituaçión. De otro modo, podríamô dêcconoçêh er problema de manera permanente.

entry.key: RAMIE: I hadn’t thought of that! What a profoundly horrific fate that would be.
entry.value: RAMIE: ¡No çe me abía ocurrío! Çería un dêttino profundamente orroroço.

entry.key: ROOT: Friends in the <color=orange>Timber Hearth Mines</color>, the last type of ore you sent us survives the longest in direct heat.
entry.value: ROOT: Amigô de lâ <color=orange>minâ de Lumbre</color>, el úrtimo tipo de minerâh que nô embiaron êh er que mâh tiempo reçîtte la êppoçiçión ar calôh.

entry.key: ROOT: Can you send us more of the same for additional testing? We’re attempting to improve its durability, and our forge has already burned through everything you sent!
entry.value: ROOT: ¿Podrían embiânnô mâh ehemplarê pa çegîh êpperimentando? ¡Êttamô tratando de aumentâh çu durabilidá y nuêttra forha ya conçumió tó lo que mandaron!

entry.key: OENO: We’ll deliver more ore to <color=lightblue>Hollow’s Lantern</color> immediately. You must be fired up about crafting the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>’s protective shell!
entry.value: OENO: Embiaremô mâh minerâh al <color=lightblue>Faro de la Ondoná</color> de îmmediato. ¡Debê tenêh muxâ ganâ de fabricâh la carcaça protêttora del <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>!

entry.key: ROOT: Yes, the idea of an encasement that’s supernova-proof, however briefly, has kindled my curiosity!
entry.value: ROOT: Çí, la idea de creâh un contenedôh que çea reçîttente a una çupênnoba, ar menô por un momento, ¡a ençendío mi curioçidá!

entry.key: ROOT: My gratitude! I imagine we’ll also have an updated estimate soon of how much ore is needed to seal off the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color>.
entry.value: ROOT: ¡Mi gratitûh! Imahino que pronto también tendremô una êttimaçión âttualiçá de cuánto minerâh çe neçeçita pa çeyâh el <color=orange>Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»</color>.

entry.key: OENO: Will it be more than we initially thought?
entry.value: OENO: ¿Çerá mâh de lo que creímô iniçiarmente?

entry.key: ROOT: It will be significantly more. The smallest crack or opening in the protective shell would destroy everything.
entry.value: ROOT: Çerá muxíçimo mâh. Cuarquiêh grieta o apertura en la carcaça, por pequeña que çea, yebaría a la dêttrûççión de tó.

entry.key: Solanum
entry.value: Çolanum

entry.key: SolanumNomai1Who are you?
entry.value: ¿Quién erê?

entry.key: SolanumNomai1Where are we?
entry.value: ¿Dónde êttamô?

entry.key: 281,042 YEARS AGO: No user commands received for 10 minutes. All systems entering sleep.
entry.value: AÇE 281 042 AÑÔ: No çe reçibieron comandô de uçuario durante 10 minutô. Çîttemâ entrando en modo de çûppençión.

entry.key: <TimeMinutes> MINUTES, <TimeSeconds> SECONDS AGO: Increased solar activity detected. <color=orange>Sun Station</color> hull integrity approaching critical levels. Closing emergency doors.
entry.value: AÇE <TimeMinutes> MINUTÔ Y <TimeSeconds> ÇEGUNDÔ: Aumento de âttibidá çolâh detêttao. La integridá der fuçelahe de la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color> çe açerca a nibelê críticô. Çerrando lâ puertâ de emerhençia.

entry.key: <TimeMinutes> MINUTES, <TimeSeconds> SECONDS AGO: Received data from previous cycles.
entry.value: AÇE <TimeMinutes> MINUTÔ Y <TimeSeconds> ÇEGUNDÔ: Datô reçibíô de çiclô prebiô.

entry.key: MASKS RECEIVING DATA FROM:\\n<color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color>\\n<color=lightblue>Giant’s Deep</color> memory statue\\n<color=lightblue>Timber Hearth</color> memory statue
entry.value: MÁCCARÂ REÇIBIENDO DATÔ DE:\\n<color=orange>Módulo de Râttreo de Çondâ</color>\\nÊttatua mnemónica de <color=lightblue>Abîmmo der Higante</color>\\nÊttatua mnemónica de <color=lightblue>Lumbre</color>

entry.key: <TimeMinutesRemaining> MINUTES UNTIL END-OF-CYCLE TRANSMISSION
entry.value: <TimeMinutesRemaining> MINUTÔ ÂTTA LA TRÂMMIÇIÓN DER FIN DER ÇICLO

entry.key: YARROW: Some time has passed since I checked in with you, Pye. How are you and Idaea progressing with the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> plans?
entry.value: YARROW: A paçao un tiempo dêdde la úrtima bêh que ablamô, Pye. ¿Cómo êttán abançando tú y Idaea con lô planê de la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color>?

entry.key: PYE: Presently, my assessment is that our plan will either fail explosively or succeed explosively.
entry.value: PYE: Çegún mi ebaluaçión, nuêttro plan fayará épicamente o çerá un éççito increíble.

entry.key: IDAEA: Pye, you know I don’t find that funny.
entry.value: IDAEA: Pye, no me dibierte lo que diçê.

entry.key: PYE: How curious; Ramie thinks I’m a gas. And I don’t recall requesting that you monitor this conversation, Idaea.
entry.value: PYE: Qué raro; Ramie piença que çoy graçioça. Y no recuerdo aberte pedío que controlê êtta comberçaçión, Idaea.

entry.key: IDAEA: I don’t see what state of matter you are has to do with this. And I don’t recall supporting the <color=orange>Sun Station</color>’s construction, but here we are.
entry.value: IDAEA: No entiendo qué materia tienê en la cabeça y qué tiene que bêh lo que diçê con êtto. Por otra parte, yo no recuerdo abêh apoyao la côttrûççión de la <color=orange>Êttaçión Çolâh</color>, y míranô: aquí êttamô.

entry.key: YARROW: Hypothesis: Time spent away from the station would be beneficial to you both.
entry.value: YARROW: Ipóteçî: Un tiempo lehô de la êttaçión lê ará bien a ambô.

entry.key: PYE: I’m immensely interested in testing your hypothesis, Yarrow.
entry.value: PYE: Êttoy enormemente intereçá en comprobâh tu ipóteçî, Yarrow.

entry.key: IDAEA: That, at least, we can agree on.
entry.value: IDAEA: Ar menô en eço, coinçidimô.

entry.key: Chert
entry.value: Xert

entry.key: ChertIntro1Goodness, it’s you! Hello! I take it your first launch went well, then? Welcome to the Hourglass Twins. <Pause=2>Mind the sand, now.
entry.value: ¡Çielô, erê tú! ¡Ola! Açumo que tu primêh lançamiento çalió bien, ¿no? Te doy la biembenida a lô Hemelô Relôh de Arena. <Pause=2>Cuidao con la arena.

entry.key: ChertChertIntro1I have a question for you.
entry.value: Tengo una pregunta pa ti.

entry.key: ChertChertIntro1What are you up to?
entry.value: ¿En qué andâ?

entry.key: ChertIntroExplanationHornfels asked me to update our star charts, so I’m out here observing. This is one of the best places in the solar system to spot astronomical events, you know.
entry.value: Cônné me pidió que âttualiçara lâ cartâ êttelarê, açí que aquí me encuentro ôççerbando... Êtte êh uno de lô mehorê lugarê der çîttema çolâh pa dêccubrîh ebentô âttronómicô, ¿çabê?

entry.key: ChertIntroExplanationWhat’s weird is I’ve actually seen a couple of supernovae today. Usually, I’d be fortunate to see just one. Keep an eye or four on the stars, and maybe you’ll spot one yourself!
entry.value: Êh curioço, pero oy e bîtto un pâh de çupênnobâ. Por lo henerâh, tengo çuerte çi çolo beo una. ¡No pierdâ de bîtta er çielo y quiçâh tú también tengâ la çuerte de abîttâh una!

entry.key: QuestionsTell me, what can I do for you?
entry.value: Dime: ¿en qué puedo ayudarte?

entry.key: ChertQuestionsI found something!
entry.value: ¡Dêccubrí argo!

entry.key: ChertQuestionsHow do I know if I've spotted a supernova?
entry.value: ¿Cómo çabré çi beo una çupênnoba?

entry.key: ChertQuestionsWhat are you doing out here?
entry.value: ¿Qué êttâh açiendo aquí?

entry.key: ChertQuestionsWhere should I explore here?
entry.value: ¿Dónde debería êpplorâh por aquí?

entry.key: ChertQuestionsHow dangerous is that big column of falling sand?
entry.value: ¿Çerá mu peligroça eça gran câccá de arena?

entry.key: ChertQuestionsJust saying hi.
entry.value: Çolo paçaba a çaludâh.

entry.key: Chert1Right now I’m documenting stars. Hornfels noticed our star charts are out of date, so they asked me to update them.
entry.value: En êtte momento, êttoy documentando er mobimiento de lâ êttreyâ. Cônné çe dio cuenta de que nuêttrâ cartâ êttelarê êttaban un poco ôççoletâ, por eço me pidió que lâ âttualiçara.

entry.key: Chert1Please don’t tell the others I said this, but sometimes I think I’m the only traveler out here interested in doing any science at all.
entry.value: Por fabôh, no lê cuentê a lô demâh que dihe êtto, pero a beçê pienço que çolo a mí me intereça la âttibidá çientífica.

entry.key: Chert1...Er, maybe don’t tell Hornfels, either. I think they’re pretty deep in denial.
entry.value: E, quiçâh, tampoco deberíâ contárçelo a Cônné. Creo que bibe en un êttao de negaçión côttante.

entry.key: Chert2To be honest, I haven’t left this lakebed. I don’t mean to brag, but I’m really quite good with the Little Scout, so I’ve been taking pictures of everything from right here in my campsite.
entry.value: Onêttamente, no me e mobío der lexo der lago. No êh por preçumîh, pero çé uçâh mu bien er Miniêpploradôh; içe baçe en mi campamento y, dêdde aquí, tomé fotô de tó.

entry.key: Chert2Have you seen the old shipwreck site on Ember Twin’s southern hemisphere, the one shooting a bright beam of light into the sky? It’s not one of our own crashes, surprisingly enough - this one’s a Nomai ship.
entry.value: ¿Âh bîtto la bieha âttronabe en ruinâ en el emîfferio çûh de Hemelo Braça? Êh la que dêppide un âh de lûh briyante açia er çielo. Pa mi çorpreça, no êh una de lâ nuêttrâ... Êh una âttronabe nomai.

entry.key: Chert2You’ll find Nomai ruins across the Twins, but, strangely, not a single settlement! Believe me, if there was one to see, I’d have seen it with my Little Scout.
entry.value: Êh poçible encontrâh ruinâ nomai en lô Hemelô, pero, curioçamente, ¡no ay ni un çolo açentamiento! Créeme: çi ubiera uno, ya lo ubieçe bîtto con mi Miniêpploradôh.

entry.key: Chert2So where did they live? Not on the surface, clearly. Ember Twin is full of cave systems, though - maybe the answer lies underground?
entry.value: ¿Dónde bibían, entonçê? Claramente, en la çuperfiçie no. Er Hemelo Braça êttá yeno de çîttemâ de cuebâ, açí que... ¿quiçâh la rêppuêtta yaçe baho tierra?

entry.key: Chert3On a scale of one to dead, I’d give it a seven or eight. Awfully pretty, though.
entry.value: En una êccala de 1 a letâh, le daría çiete u oxo. Aunque êh terriblemente ermoça.

entry.key: Chert3Right now sand is flowing from Ash Twin to Ember Twin, but did you know the process eventually reverses? We're not completely sure why the sand flows back and forth between the Twins, but it seems to be a natural phenomena.
entry.value: En êtte momento, la arena êttá fluyendo dêdde Hemelo Çeniça açia Hemelo Braça, pero ¿çabíâ que er proçeço çe rebierte? No tenemô çerteça de por qué la arena fluye de un lao pa otro entre lô Hemelô, pero pareçe çêh un fenómeno naturâh.

entry.key: Chert3Oh, if you’d like to see something interesting, check out the other Twin once a little more of its sand drains off. I promise you won’t be disappointed.
entry.value: A, çi quierê bêh argo intereçante, comprueba el otro Hemelo cuando la arena aya drenao un poco mâh. Te prometo que no te deçêççionará.

entry.key: Chert4Supernovae look like extra bright stars to the naked eye, but if you zoom in with your signalscope you can tell that they're actually enormous explosions.
entry.value: Lâ çupênnobâ pareçen êttreyâ mâh briyantê a çimple bîtta, pero çi te açercâ con er çeñalôccopio, te darâh cuenta de que çon êpploçionê higantêccâ.

entry.key: Chert4Massive stars go supernova at the very end of their life spans, which is why it's so unusual to see two in a single day.
entry.value: Argunâ êttreyâ coloçalê çe combierten en çupênnobâ ar finâh de çu çiclo de bida; por eço êh tan inuçuâh bêh dôh ar mîmmo tiempo.

entry.key: Chert4I wonder if some of these stars are older than we realized?
entry.value: Quiçâh argunâ de êttâ êttreyâ çean mâh antiguâ de lo que pençamô...

entry.key: Chert5Watch out for falling sand, okay? I’ve had to dig myself out once or twice, and that’s not half as fun as it sounds.
entry.value: Ten cuidao con la câccá de arena, ¿çí? Tube que deçenterrarme un pâh de beçê y no êh pa ná dibertío, aunque lo parêcca.

entry.key: ChertSecondaryHello again!
entry.value: ¡Ola de nuebo!

entry.key: FoundSomethingMenuPlease, do tell!
entry.value: ¡Por fabôh, cuéntame!

entry.key: ChertFoundSomethingMenuI found out the sun is about to go supernova.
entry.value: Me enteré de que er Çôh êttá por êttayâh en una çupênnoba.

entry.key: ChertFoundSomethingMenuI found your notes about the Attlerock’s main crater.
entry.value: Encontré tû notâ çobre er crátê prinçipâh de Rocaterra.

entry.key: ChertFoundSomethingMenuI found Nomai writing about a hidden planet.
entry.value: Encontré têttô nomai çobre un planeta ocurto.

entry.key: ChertFoundSomethingMenuI found Nomai writing about the Quantum Moon.
entry.value: Encontré têttô nomai çobre la Luna Cuántica.

entry.key: ChertFoundSomethingMenuI found Nomai writing about the Sun Station.
entry.value: Encontré têttô nomai çobre la Êttaçión Çolâh.

entry.key: ChertFoundSomethingMenuI found modern Nomai transmissions saying the universe is dying.
entry.value: Encontré trâmmiçionê nomai modênnâ que diçen que el uniberço êttá muriendo.

entry.key: ChertFoundSomethingMenuActually, nevermind.
entry.value: En realidá, no importa.

entry.key: FoundSomething1What? What makes you think that?
entry.value: ¿Qué? ¿Qué te açe pençâh que argo açí podría çuçedêh?

entry.key: FoundSomething1It’s true the sun has... changed, lately, but I’ve not seen any evidence suggesting the approaching death of our sun! Stars above, no!
entry.value: Êh çierto que er Çôh a... cambiao úrtimamente, ¡pero no e bîtto ninguna prueba que çuhiera que êttá por yegâh a çu fin! ¡Por toâ lâ êttreyâ! ¡No!

entry.key: FoundSomething1I’ll tell you what, though - I’ll keep my eyes on the sun, and if I find any suggestion the its core is collapsing, you shall be the first to know.
entry.value: Te diré argo: no le quitaré lô ohô de ençima ar Çôh, y çi beo argún indiçio de que çu núcleo podría colâççâh, te abiçaré ençegida.

entry.key: FoundSomething1I hope that puts your mind at ease.
entry.value: Êppero que açí puedâ tranquiliçarte un poco.

entry.key: FoundSomething2Did you! I hope they were useful?
entry.value: ¡¿En çerio?! ¡Êppero que te ayan çido útilê!

entry.key: FoundSomething2The planet I mentioned may have been frozen solid, or just partially made of ice, like a much colder Giant’s Deep - it’s hard to say. It used to be the fifth planet in our solar system.
entry.value: Puede que er planeta que mençioné aya êttao elao, o parçiarmente compuêtto de ielo, como un Abîmmo der Higante mâh hélido, aunque êh mu difíçî çabêl-lo a çiençia çierta. Çolía çêh er quinto planeta de nuêttro çîttema çolâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething2You’ll notice, of course, that there’s no such planet now. In its place is Dark Bramble, which - how to put this - grew into the space the fifth planet used to occupy.
entry.value: Por çupuêtto, te darâh cuenta de que tar planeta ya no êççîtte. En çu lugâh, êttá Êppinôccuro, que... a bêh cómo lo digo... creçió en er lugâh que er quinto planeta çolía ocupâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething2That is, Dark Bramble quite literally appeared at the center of the fifth planet and began destroying it from the inside-out. Eventually, the planet shattered completely, and its shards were flung across space.
entry.value: Êh deçîh, Êppinôccuro apareçió literarmente en er çentro der quinto planeta y començó a dêttruîl-lo dêdde çu interiôh. En un momento, er planeta çe iço triçâ por completo y lô frâmmentô bolaron por el êppaçio.

entry.key: FoundSomething2Some of these shards collided with the celestial bodies in our solar system, such as the Attlerock, which I believe is how its biggest crater was formed.
entry.value: Argunô de eyô xocaron contra cuerpô çelêttialê de nuêttro çîttema çolâh, como Rocaterra. Creo que açí êh como çe formó çu crátê mâh grande.

entry.key: FoundSomething3How fascinating! It might interest you to know the existence of an additional planet is entirely plausible, if you look at the physics of our solar system. It would just have to be incredibly far out there - farther than Hearthian ships would be able to travel.
entry.value: ¡Fâççinante! Quiçâh te intereçe çabêh que la êççîttençia de otro planeta êh totarmente plauçible; te darâh cuenta çi ôççerbâ la fíçica de nuêttro çîttema çolâh. Pero, çeguramente, êttaría mu lehô, en un lugâh donde lâ âttronabê lumbreanâ no podrían yegâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething3And honestly, we don’t know all that much about what’s out there. The farther you go, the less we know! As such, it’s well within the realm of possibility such a planet exists.
entry.value: Y, con çinçeridá, no çabemô muxo çobre lâ rehionê mâh remotâ del êppaçio êtteriôh. ¡Cuanto mâh lehô, menô informaçión tenemô! Y por êtto, la êççîttençia de tar planeta êh totarmente poçible.

entry.key: FoundSomething4Oh yes, everyone loves a good mystery, don’t they? Who wouldn’t wonder about a moon that’s sometimes there and sometimes not!
entry.value: A, çí, ¿a quién no le gûtta una guena doçî de mîtterio? ¡Êh normâh que tôh çe agan preguntâ çobre una luna que a beçê êttá y a beçê no êttá!

entry.key: FoundSomething4I’ve observed the Quantum Moon orbiting each of the five planets, but sometimes, it quite simply disappears from the sky altogether. Maybe there’s another place it travels to!
entry.value: Yo e bîtto a la Luna Cuántica orbitâh arrededôh de lô çinco planetâ, pero, a beçê, çimplemente deçapareçe der çielo. ¡Quiçâh biaha açia otro lugâh!

entry.key: FoundSomething4Unfortunately, if there is, I’ve never seen it. Perhaps if I take a closer look at these star charts...
entry.value: Lamentablemente, çi eço êh lo que çuçede, nunca e bîtto eçe lugâh. Quiçâh deba mirâh con mâh detenimiento êttâ cartâ êttelarê...

entry.key: FoundSomething5Is that what’s in orbit around the sun, then, do you think? This... Sun Station?
entry.value: ¿Creê que, entonçê, eço êh lo que orbita arrededôh der Çôh? ¿Êtta... Êttaçión Çolâh?

entry.key: FoundSomething5Quite clever of the Nomai to devise a way to study the sun up close and personal! It must have been tremendously difficult to construct. ...And hot inside. I can only imagine!
entry.value: ¡Lô nomai fueron mu intelihentê ar conçebîh una forma de êttudiâh er Çôh tan de çerca! Debe abêh çido terriblemente difíçî de côttruîh... y mu caliente en çu interiôh. ¡Me cuêtta imahinâl-lo!

entry.key: FoundSomething5I wonder how were they able to travel back and forth from the Sun Station and the Hourglass Twins, when the slightest slip up would have meant a fiery death.
entry.value: Me pregunto cómo abrán çido capaçê de biahâh dêdde la Êttaçión Çolâh âtta lô Hemelô Relôh de Arena, y biçeberça, cuando er mâh mínimo errôh podía çînnificâh una muerte abraçadora.

entry.key: FoundSomething6You - what? I don’t... um. What?
entry.value: ¿Que encontrâtte qué...? Yo no... e... ¿Qué?

entry.key: FoundSomething6You mean to say there are modern Nomai out in other parts of space? And they believe the universe - all of it, the whole thing - is dying? <Pause/>Currently? <Pause/>...Right now?
entry.value: ¿Quierê deçîh que ay unô nomai modênnô en otrâ partê del êppaçio? ¿Y que piençan que el uniberço, o çea tó entero, êttá muriendo? <Pause/>Êh deçîh, ¿aora? <Pause/>¿En êtte preçiço momento?

entry.key: FoundSomething6If... if that’s true, how could I have missed so many signs? The supernovae were there, but I, but, I’ve been studying the stars for... well, what does it matter if... oh...
entry.value: Çi eço êh... çierto, ¿cómo çe me pueden abêh êccapao tantâ çeñalê? Lâ çupênnobâ êttaban aí, pero yo, pero... e êttao êttudiando lâ êttreyâ durante... Pff, da iguâh, çi ar finâh tó ba a... Ay...

entry.key: FoundSomething6I’m very sorry, b-but I have to look over my charts. I h-h-hope you don’t m-mind...
entry.value: Lo çiento muxíçimo, pero tengo que repaçâh mî cartâ. E-êppero que no te imp-porte...

entry.key: ChertBreakdownNomaiB-b-but surely, I would have seen some kind of other sign than the supernovae, so p-perhaps...?
entry.value: P-p-pero tendría que abêh bîtto arguna otra çeñâh ademâh de lâ çupênnobâ, açí que quiçâh...

entry.key: FoundSomething7Nothing you’d like to discuss at the moment? That’s no trouble! If you do discover anything you want to talk about, I’d be happy to help!
entry.value: ¿No tienê ná pa comentâh aora? ¡No ay problema! Çi dêccubrê argo de lo que quierâ ablâh, ¡çolo dímelo y con gûtto te ayudaré!

entry.key: ChertIntro1Hm? Oh, it’s you! I take it your first launch went well, then? Welcome to the Hourglass Twins. <Pause=2>Mind the sand, now.
entry.value: ¿Mm? ¡A, erê tú! Açumo que tu primêh lançamiento çalió bien, ¿no? Te doy la biembenida a lô Hemelô Relôh de Arena. <Pause=2>Cuidao con la arena.

entry.key: ChertIntroExplanationHornfels noticed our star charts are out of date, so I came out here to update them. But something seems... <Pause=0.5>how to put this... <Pause=0.5>off.
entry.value: Cônné çe dio cuenta de que nuêttrâ cartâ êttelarê êttaban un poco ôççoletâ, por eço bine a âttualiçâl-lâ. Pero argo tiene... <Pause=0.5>a bêh cómo puedo deçîh êtto... <Pause=0.5>mu mala pinta.

entry.key: ChertIntroExplanationI’ve seen, what, ten supernovae by now? Twelve? They’re in the double digits now, and that’s, you know, not normal. Not normal at all...
entry.value: Ya e bîtto unâ... diêh çupênnobâ. No, unâ doçe. Ya paçamô de uno a dôh díhitô y, como çabê, no êh normâh. Pa ná normâh.

entry.key: ChertIntro2Hm? Oh, you’re back.
entry.value: ¿Mm? Ey, borbîtte.

entry.key: ChertIntro2Say, have you noticed anything unusual about the stars lately? Something seems...<Pause=0.5> how to put this... <Pause=0.5>off.
entry.value: ¿Notâtte argo raro en lâ êttreyâ úrtimamente? Argo tiene...<Pause=0.5> a bêh cómo puedo deçîh êtto... <Pause=0.5>mu mala pinta.

entry.key: ChertIntro2I’ve seen, what, ten supernovae already? Twelve? They’re in the double digits now, and that’s, you know, not normal. Not normal at all...
entry.value: Ya e bîtto unâ diêh çupênnobâ. No, unâ doçe. Ya paçamô de uno a dôh díhitô y, como çabê, no êh normâh. Pa ná normâh.

entry.key: ChertSecondaryHello again.
entry.value: Ola de nuebo.

entry.key: QuestionsWas there something you needed?
entry.value: ¿Neçeçitabâ argo?

entry.key: ChertQuestionsWhy are so many stars going supernovae?
entry.value: ¿Por qué tantâ êttreyâ êttán êttayando como çupênnobâ?

entry.key: Chert1Well, I was - that is, I originally came out here to update our star charts. Now, though, I’m trying to figure out what’s going on with the stars. There are so many - too many supernovae.
entry.value: Gueno, yo... En un prinçipio, bine a âttualiçâh nuêttrâ cartâ êttelarê. Pero aora, êttoy intentando entendêh qué êh lo que paça con lâ êttreyâ. Ay muxâ... demaçiâh... çupênnobâ.

entry.key: Chert1Why are so many stars dying out? I’ve never seen anything like this.
entry.value: ¿Por qué tantâ êttreyâ êttán muriendo? Nunca antê bi ná iguâh.

entry.key: Chert1Frankly, I’m worried. And a little scared.
entry.value: Me preocupa lo que êttá çuçediendo. Y también me açûtta un poco.

entry.key: Chert2bTo be honest, I haven’t left this lakebed. I don’t mean to brag, but I’m really quite good with the Little Scout, so I’ve been taking pictures of everything from right here in my campsite.
entry.value: Onêttamente, no me e mobío der lexo der lago. No êh por preçumîh, pero çé uçâh mu bien er Miniêpploradôh; içe baçe en mi campamento y, dêdde aquí, tomé fotô de tó.

entry.key: Chert2bHave you seen the old shipwreck site on Ember Twin’s southern hemisphere, the one shooting a bright beam of light into the sky? It’s not one of our own crashes, surprisingly enough - this one’s a Nomai ship.
entry.value: ¿Âh bîtto la bieha âttronabe en ruinâ en el emîfferio çûh de Hemelo Braça? Êh la que dêppide un âh de lûh briyante açia er çielo. Pa mi çorpreça, no êh una de lâ nuêttrâ... Êh una âttronabe nomai.

entry.key: Chert2bYou’ll find Nomai ruins across the Twins, but, strangely, not a single settlement! Believe me, if there was one to see, I’d have seen it with my Little Scout.
entry.value: Êh poçible encontrâh ruinâ nomai en lô Hemelô, pero, curioçamente, ¡no ay ni un çolo açentamiento! Créeme: çi ubiera uno, ya lo ubieçe bîtto con mi Miniêpploradôh.

entry.key: Chert2bSo where did they live? Not on the surface, clearly. Ember Twin is full of cave systems, though - maybe the answer lies underground?
entry.value: ¿Dónde bibían, entonçê? Claramente, en la çuperfiçie no. Er Hemelo Braça êttá yeno de çîttemâ de cuebâ, açí que... ¿quiçâh la rêppuêtta yaçe baho tierra?

entry.key: Chert3bOn a scale of one to dead, I’d give it a seven or eight. Awfully pretty, though.
entry.value: En una êccala de 1 a letâh, le daría çiete u oxo. Aunque êh terriblemente ermoça.

entry.key: Chert3bRight now sand is flowing from Ash Twin to Ember Twin, but did you know the process eventually reverses? We're not completely sure why the sand flows back and forth between the Twins, but it seems to be a natural phenomena.
entry.value: En êtte momento, la arena êttá fluyendo dêdde Hemelo Çeniça açia Hemelo Braça, pero ¿çabíâ que er proçeço çe rebierte? No tenemô çerteça de por qué la arena fluye de un lao pa otro entre lô Hemelô, pero pareçe çêh un fenómeno naturâh.

entry.key: Chert3bOh, if you’d like to see something interesting, check out the other Twin once a little more of its sand drains off. I promise you won’t be disappointed.
entry.value: A, çi quierê bêh argo intereçante, comprueba el otro Hemelo cuando la arena aya drenao un poco mâh. Te prometo que no te deçêççionará.

entry.key: Chert4I have no idea! Massive stars go supernova when they reach the end of their life spans, so it's possible that the stars are older than we realized. Or maybe our models are wrong and they don't live as long as we expected.
entry.value: ¡No lo çé! Lâ grandê êttreyâ êttayan en çupênnobâ cuando yegan ar finâh de çu çiclo de bida, açí que êh poçible que çean mâh antiguâ de lo que pençábamô. O quiçâh nuêttrô modelô çon incorrêttô y no biben tanto tiempo como êpperábamô.

entry.key: Chert4Honestly, I'm not fond of either option! If our charts are wrong, what else is wrong? And our sun...
entry.value: ¡No me gûtta ninguna de lâ dôh ôççionê! Çi nuêttrâ cartâ çon incorrêttâ, ¿qué mâh podría çêh incorrêtto? Y nuêttro Çôh...

entry.key: Chert4No, I shouldn't jump to conclusions. I- I'm probably overlooking something. That's it, I just need to collect more data.
entry.value: No, mehôh no çaco concluçionê. E-êh poçible que êtté paçando argo por arto. Eço. Tengo que reunîh mâh informaçión.

entry.key: Chert5Watch out for the stars. I mean, sand.
entry.value: No pierdâ de bîtta lâ êttreyâ. Digo, la arena.

entry.key: FoundSomething1bWhat? What makes you think that?
entry.value: ¿Qué? ¿Qué te açe pençâh que argo açí podría çuçedêh?

entry.key: FoundSomething1bIt’s true the sun has... changed, lately, but I’ve not seen any evidence suggesting the approaching death of our sun! Stars above, no!
entry.value: Êh çierto que er Çôh a... cambiao úrtimamente, ¡pero no e bîtto ninguna prueba que çuhiera que êttá por yegâh a çu fin! ¡Por toâ lâ êttreyâ! ¡No!

entry.key: FoundSomething1bI’ll tell you what, though - I’ll keep my eyes on the sun, and if I find any suggestion the its core is collapsing, you shall be the first to know.
entry.value: Te diré argo: no le quitaré lô ohô de ençima ar Çôh, y çi beo argún indiçio de que çu núcleo podría colâççâh, te abiçaré ençegida.

entry.key: FoundSomething1bI hope that puts your mind at ease.
entry.value: Êppero que açí puedâ tranquiliçarte un poco.

entry.key: FoundSomething2bDid you! I hope they were useful?
entry.value: ¡¿En çerio?! ¡Êppero que te ayan çido útilê!

entry.key: FoundSomething2bThe planet I mentioned may have been frozen solid, or just partially made of ice, like a much colder Giant’s Deep - it’s hard to say. It used to be the fifth planet in our solar system.
entry.value: Puede que er planeta que mençioné aya êttao elao, o parçiarmente compuêtto de ielo, como un Abîmmo der Higante mâh hélido, aunque êh mu difíçî çabêl-lo a çiençia çierta. Çolía çêh er quinto planeta de nuêttro çîttema çolâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething2bYou’ll notice, of course, that there’s no such planet now. In its place is Dark Bramble, which - how to put this - grew into the space the fifth planet used to occupy.
entry.value: Por çupuêtto, te darâh cuenta de que tar planeta ya no êççîtte. En çu lugâh, êttá Êppinôccuro, que... a bêh cómo lo digo... creçió en er lugâh que er quinto planeta çolía ocupâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething2bThat is, Dark Bramble quite literally appeared at the center of the fifth planet and began destroying it from the inside-out. Eventually, the planet shattered completely, and its shards were flung across space.
entry.value: Êh deçîh, Êppinôccuro apareçió literarmente en er çentro der quinto planeta y començó a dêttruîl-lo dêdde çu interiôh. En un momento, er planeta çe iço triçâ por completo y lô frâmmentô bolaron por el êppaçio.

entry.key: FoundSomething2bSome of these shards collided with the celestial bodies in our solar system, such as the Attlerock, which I believe is how its biggest crater was formed.
entry.value: Argunô de eyô xocaron contra cuerpô çelêttialê de nuêttro çîttema çolâh, como Rocaterra. Creo que açí êh como çe formó çu crátê mâh grande.

entry.key: FoundSomething3bHow fascinating! It might interest you to know the existence of an additional planet is entirely plausible, if you look at the physics of our solar system. It would just have to be incredibly far out there - farther than Hearthian ships would be able to travel.
entry.value: ¡Fâççinante! Quiçâh te intereçe çabêh que la êççîttençia de otro planeta êh totarmente plauçible; te darâh cuenta çi ôççerbâ la fíçica de nuêttro çîttema çolâh. Pero, çeguramente, êttaría mu lehô, en un lugâh donde lâ âttronabê lumbreanâ no podrían yegâh.

entry.key: FoundSomething3bAnd honestly, we don’t know all that much about what’s all out there. The farther you go, the less we know! As such, it’s well within the realm of possibility such a planet exists.
entry.value: Y, con çinçeridá, no çabemô muxo çobre lâ rehionê mâh remotâ del êppaçio êtteriôh. ¡Cuanto mâh lehô, menô informaçión tenemô! Y por êtto, la êççîttençia de tar planeta êh totarmente poçible.

entry.key: FoundSomething4bOh yes, everyone loves a good mystery, don’t they? Who wouldn’t wonder about a moon that’s sometimes there and sometimes not!
entry.value: A, çí, ¿a quién no le gûtta una guena doçî de mîtterio? ¡Êh normâh que tôh çe agan preguntâ çobre una luna que a beçê êttá y a beçê no êttá!

entry.key: FoundSomething4bI’ve observed the Quantum Moon orbiting each of the five planets, but sometimes, it quite simply disappears from the sky altogether. Maybe there’s another place it travels to!
entry.value: Yo e bîtto a la Luna Cuántica orbitâh arrededôh de lô çinco planetâ, pero, a beçê, çimplemente deçapareçe der çielo. ¡Quiçâh biaha açia otro lugâh!

entry.key: FoundSomething4bUnfortunately, if there is, I’ve never seen it. Perhaps if I take a closer look at these star charts...
entry.value: Lamentablemente, çi eço êh lo que çuçede, nunca e bîtto eçe lugâh. Quiçâh deba mirâh con mâh detenimiento êttâ cartâ êttelarê...

entry.key: FoundSomething5bIs that what’s in orbit around the sun, then, do you think? This... Sun Station?
entry.value: ¿Creê que, entonçê, eço êh lo que orbita arrededôh der Çôh? ¿Êtta... Êttaçión Çolâh?

entry.key: FoundSomething5bQuite clever of the Nomai to devise a way to study the sun up close and personal! It must have been tremendously difficult to construct. ...And hot inside. I can only imagine!
entry.value: ¡Lô nomai fueron mu intelihentê ar conçebîh una forma de êttudiâh er Çôh tan de çerca! Debe abêh çido terriblemente difíçî de côttruîh... y mu caliente en çu interiôh. ¡Me cuêtta imahinâl-lo!

entry.key: FoundSomething5bI wonder how were they able to travel back and forth from the Sun Station and the Hourglass Twins, when the slightest slip up would have meant a fiery death.
entry.value: Me pregunto cómo abrán çido capaçê de biahâh dêdde la Êttaçión Çolâh âtta lô Hemelô Relôh de Arena, y biçeberça, cuando er mâh mínimo errôh podía çînnificâh una muerte abraçadora.

entry.key: FoundSomething6bYou - what? I don’t... um. What?
entry.value: ¿Que encontrâtte qué...? Yo no... e... ¿Qué?

entry.key: FoundSomething6bYou mean to say there are modern Nomai out in other parts of space? And they believe the universe - all of it, the whole thing - is dying? <Pause/>Currently? <Pause/>...Right now?
entry.value: ¿Quierê deçîh que ay unô nomai modênnô en otrâ partê del êppaçio? ¿Y que piençan que el uniberço, o çea tó entero, êttá muriendo? <Pause/>Êh deçîh, ¿aora? <Pause/>¿En êtte preçiço momento?

entry.key: FoundSomething6bIf... if that’s true, how could I have missed so many signs? The supernovae were there, but I, but, I’ve been studying the stars for... well, what does it matter if... oh...
entry.value: Çi eço êh... çierto, ¿cómo çe me pueden abêh êccapao tantâ çeñalê? Lâ çupênnobâ êttaban aí, pero yo, pero... e êttao êttudiando lâ êttreyâ durante... Pff, da iguâh, çi ar finâh tó ba a... Ay...

entry.key: FoundSomething6bI’m very sorry, b-but I have to look over my charts. I h-h-hope you don’t m-mind...
entry.value: Lo çiento muxíçimo, pero tengo que repaçâh mî cartâ. E-êppero que no te imp-porte...

entry.key: ChertBreakdownNomaibB-b-but surely, I would have seen some kind of other sign than the supernovae, so p-perhaps...?
entry.value: P-p-pero tendría que abêh bîtto arguna otra çeñâh ademâh de lâ çupênnobâ, açí que quiçâh...

entry.key: FoundSomething7bNothing you’d like to discuss at the moment? That’s no trouble! If you do find something you wish to discuss, please, come find me! I’ll be here studying the stars for a while yet.
entry.value: ¿No tienê ná pa comentâh aora? ¡No ay problema! Çi dêccubrê argo y quierê ablâh al rêppêtto, ¡ben a bûccarme! Êttaré aquí êttudiando lâ êttreyâ durante un rato mâh.

entry.key: ChertIntroThe stars! They're all dying! There’ve been too many supernovae for it to be anything else!
entry.value: ¡Lâ êttreyâ! ¡Toâ êttán muriendo! ¡Lâ çupênnobâ çon demaçiâh! ¡No puede çînnificâh otra coça!

entry.key: ChertIntroWe’re next, do you understand?! Our sun! By Hearth’s name, we’re next!
entry.value: ¡Çegimô noçotrô! ¡¿Lo entiendê?! ¡Nuêttro Çôh! ¡Por tôh lô lumbreanô, çegimô noçotrô!

entry.key: ChertSecondaryPlease, just... Leave me alone, won’t you?
entry.value: Por fabôh... bete ya, ¿çí?

entry.key: ChertQuestionsWhat do you mean, "we’re next"?
entry.value: ¿Qué quierê deçîh con eço de «çegimô noçotrô»?

entry.key: ChertQuestionsWhy are the stars dying?
entry.value: ¿Por qué lâ êttreyâ êttán muriendo?

entry.key: ChertNextIt’s the stars, you see. All the other stars are dying out. Oh, why did we have to be born at the end of the universe? And our sun, it...
entry.value: Berâh, çe trata de lâ êttreyâ. Toâ lâ demâh êttán muriendo. Çielô, ¿por qué tubimô que naçêh hûtto ar finâh del uniberço? Y nuêttro Çôh...

entry.key: ChertNextThe star charts! Why? Why did I want to update them so badly? I didn’t have to know, but no, oh no, I had to update the star charts! I had to go looking for things I shouldn’t have! And now our sun is about to... about to... oh...
entry.value: ¡Lâ cartâ êttelarê! ¿Por qué? ¡¿Por qué tube que âttualiçâl-lâ?! No tenía por qué çabêl-lo, pero, claro, ¡tube que âttualiçâh lâ cartâ êttelarê! Tube que ponerme a bûccâh coçâ ¡y no debería abêl-lo exo! Y aora nuêttro Çôh êttá por... êttá por... Ay...

entry.key: ChertNext...I don’t feel well. I’d like to be alone, please.
entry.value: ... no me çiento bien. Prefiero êttâh çin compañía, por fabôh.

entry.key: FoundSomethingWhy, isn’t that great! Do you know what, I’ve found a few things myself! Most of them have to do with the sun exploding!
entry.value: Baya, ¡¿no êh marabiyoço?! ¿Çabê argo? ¡Yo también dêccubrí argunâ coçâ! ¡La mayoría çe relaçiona con la êpploçión der Çôh!

entry.key: FoundSomethingOh, who cares?! What does it matter?! Nothing matters anymore! The sun is about to go supernova! And me, all my research, my life’s work, wasted!
entry.value: A, ¡¿qué mâh da?! ¡¿Qué importa?! ¡Ya ná importa! ¡Er Çôh êttá por êttayâh en una çupênnoba! Y yo... mi imbêttigaçión... er trabaho de toa mi bida... ¡a la baçura!

entry.key: FoundSomething<size=50>Wasted, you understand?!</size>
entry.value: <size=50>¡A la baçura! ¡¿Lo entiendê?!</size>

entry.key: Chert1The star charts! It’s all the star charts’ fault! I didn’t have to know, but no, oh no, I had to update the star charts! I had to go looking for things I shouldn’t have! And now our sun is about to... about to... oh...
entry.value: ¡Lâ cartâ êttelarê! ¡Tó êh curpa de lâ cartâ êttelarê! No tenía por qué çabêl-lo, pero, claro, ¡tube que âttualiçâh lâ cartâ êttelarê! Tube que ponerme a bûccâh coçâ ¡y no debería abêl-lo exo! Y aora nuêttro Çôh êttá por... êttá por... Ay...

entry.key: Chert1...I don’t feel well. I’d like to be alone, please.
entry.value: ... no me çiento bien. Prefiero êttâh çin compañía, por fabôh.

entry.key: Chert2Where should you go? Where can anyone go? Can’t you see it’s too late now?
entry.value: ¿Que dónde deberíâ îh? ¿Dónde podría îh argien? ¿No te dâ cuenta de que êh demaçiao tarde?

entry.key: Chert2Oh, who cares?! What does it matter?! Nothing matters anymore! The sun will probably blow up before you can even get there! And me, all my research, my life’s work, wasted!
entry.value: A, ¡¿qué mâh da?! ¡¿Qué importa?! ¡Ya ná importa! ¡Er Çôh poçiblemente êpplote antê de que puedâ yegâh a cuarquiêh parte! Y yo... mi imbêttigaçión... er trabaho de toa mi bida... ¡a la baçura!

entry.key: Chert2<size=50>Wasted, you understand?!</size>
entry.value: <size=50>¡A la baçura! ¡¿Lo entiendê?!</size>

entry.key: Chert3Not as dangerous as what’s about to happen to our entire solar system!
entry.value: ¡No tanto como lo que êttá por paçâh con nuêttro çîttema çolâh!

entry.key: Chert3I... I don’t feel well. I’d like to be alone, please. I can’t believe this...
entry.value: Yo... no me çiento bien. Prefiero êttâh çin compañía, por fabôh. No puedo creêh lo que êttá paçando...

entry.key: Chert4I don't know — they're old! Far older than we realized and now all of them are dying!
entry.value: No çé... ¡Porque çon mu antiguâ! ¡Mâh antiguâ de lo que pençábamô, y aora toâ êttán muriendo!

entry.key: Chert4What does it matter?! It doesn’t! It doesn’t matter at all! Nothing matters anymore! All my research, my life’s work, wasted!
entry.value: ¡¿Qué importa?! ¡Da iguâh! ¡Tó da iguâh! ¡Ya ná importa! Toa mi imbêttigaçión, er trabaho de toa mi bida... ¡a la baçura!

entry.key: Chert4<size=50>Wasted, you understand?!</size>
entry.value: <size=50>¡A la baçura! ¡¿Lo entiendê?!</size>

entry.key: Chert5I can’t believe this. I can’t believe this is happening. I can’t... I won’t! I won’t believe it!
entry.value: No puedo creêl-lo. No puedo creêh lo que êttá paçando. No puedo... ¡No lo aré! ¡No lo creeré!

entry.key: ChertIntroOh, hello...
entry.value: A, ola...

entry.key: QuestionsCome, sit with me, my fellow traveler. Let’s sit together and watch the stars die.
entry.value: Ben, çiéntate a mi lao, camará. Beamô cómo mueren lâ êttreyâ.

entry.key: ChertQuestionsSure, why not.
entry.value: Gueno, ¿por qué no?

entry.key: ChertQuestionsIf it helps, we’re in a time loop, so we won’t really die.
entry.value: Çi te çirbe de conçuelo, no bamô a morîh de berdá, porque êttamô en un bucle temporâh.

entry.key: ChertQuestionsNo, thanks.
entry.value: No, graçiâ.

entry.key: Chert1We only get so much time, don’t we? Ah, there was still more I wanted to do...
entry.value: Nuêttro tiempo aquí êh limitao, ¿no? Ay, quería açêh tantâ coçâ...

entry.key: Chert1How unlucky to have been born at the end of the universe.
entry.value: Qué mala çuerte tubimô ar naçêh hûtto ar finâh del uniberço.

entry.key: Chert2Ah, that’s a lovely thought. Is that how you’re coping with this?
entry.value: A, êh un pençamiento mu bonito. ¿Êh açí como çoportâ êtta çituaçión?

entry.key: Chert2Does it help?
entry.value: ¿Te ayuda?

entry.key: Chert3Perhaps you’re right. ...Yes, we should face this alone. That’s the way.
entry.value: Quiçâh tengâ raçón... Çí, deberíamô enfrentâh la çituaçión çin compañía. Açí a de çêh.

entry.key: Chert3We enter this world alone, and we leave it alone...
entry.value: Yegamô a êtte mundo çolô y debemô partîh çolô...

entry.key: ChertSecondary1Any minute now...
entry.value: Paçará en cuarquiêh momento...

entry.key: ChertSecondary2A time loop, you said? I like that idea...
entry.value: ¿Un bucle temporâh, dihîtte? Me gûtta la idea...

entry.key: WaitingForOthersThe stars were beautiful, weren’t they? Even if our star is what ultimately killed us.
entry.value: Lâ êttreyâ eran ermoçâ, ¿no êh çierto? Incluço çi nuêttra êttreya fue la cauça de nuêttra muerte.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersI’ll wait here and remember them while you gather everybody.
entry.value: Êpperaré aquí y lâ recordaré mientrâ reúnê a tôh.

entry.key: ReadyToPlayShall I begin?
entry.value: ¿Empeçamô?

entry.key: ChertReadyToPlayYes.
entry.value: Çí.

entry.key: ChertReadyToPlayNot yet.
entry.value: Todabía no.

entry.key: StartPlayingWell, then, here I go!
entry.value: Gueno, ¡aquí boy!

entry.key: NotYetTake your time! I don’t think there’s anything left to go supernova.
entry.value: ¡Tómate tu tiempo! Creo que ya no queda ná que pueda êttayâh en una çupênnoba.

entry.key: FarewellEven if it’s over now, I had a good time learning.
entry.value: Aunque tó çe aya acabao, la paçé mu bien aprendiendo.

entry.key: FarewellBut I think the rules are about to change.
entry.value: Pero creo que lâ reglâ êttán a punto de cambiâh.

entry.key: SignNEW EXHIBITS COMING SOON!
entry.value: ¡PRÓÇÇIMAMENTE NUEBÂ ÊPPOÇIÇIONÊ!

entry.key: Esker
entry.value: Êkke

entry.key: Esker1Oh, hey, it’s you!
entry.value: ¡E, erê tú!

entry.key: Esker1Ground control didn’t tell me you were launching. Long time no see!
entry.value: Er contrôh lumbreano no me diho que dêppegaríâ. ¡Tanto tiempo çin berte!

entry.key: Esker1Actually. I guess it’s been a long time since I’ve seen anyone.
entry.value: De exo... Creo que açe muxo tiempo que no beo a nadie.

entry.key: EskerEsker1Don’t the other travelers come by?
entry.value: ¿No bienen aquí lô demâh biaherô?

entry.key: EskerEsker1Was that you whistling?
entry.value: ¿Erâ tú quien çirbaba?

entry.key: EskerEsker1Seems lonely up here.
entry.value: Debê yebâh una bida çolitaria aquí arriba.

entry.key: EskerEsker1What is this place?
entry.value: ¿Qué êh êtte lugâh?

entry.key: EskerEsker1Marl says hi.
entry.value: Marga te manda çaludô.

entry.key: EskerEsker1Talk to you later.
entry.value: Ablamô mâh tarde.

entry.key: Esker2Don’t go! Uh, I mean, anything else you wanted to ask?
entry.value: ¡No te bayâ! E, digo, ¿no tienê ná mâh que preguntâh?

entry.key: EskerEsker2Don’t the other travelers come by?
entry.value: ¿No bienen aquí lô demâh biaherô?

entry.key: EskerEsker2Seems lonely up here.
entry.value: Debê yebâh una bida çolitaria aquí arriba.

entry.key: EskerEsker2Was that you whistling?
entry.value: ¿Erâ tú quien çirbaba?

entry.key: EskerEsker2What is this place?
entry.value: ¿Qué êh êtte lugâh?

entry.key: EskerEsker2Marl says hi.
entry.value: Marga te manda çaludô.

entry.key: EskerEsker2Talk to you later.
entry.value: Ablamô mâh tarde.

entry.key: OtherTravelersThe Lunar Outpost saw more traffic back when our ships were less sophisticated and needed more frequent repairs. Nowadays, it’s mostly used to keep a set of eyes on things.
entry.value: Antê abía mâh tráfico en er Puêtto de Abançá Lunâh, cuando lâ âttronabê eran menô çofîtticâh y neçeçitaban reparaçionê con mâh frecuençia. Oy en día, çe uça pa ôççerbâh, mâh que ná.

entry.key: OtherTravelersSometimes Chert comes by to say hi, but Gabbro is Gabbro, and you know how Riebeck feels about “unnecessary spaceflight.”
entry.value: A beçê Xert paça a çaludâh, pero Gabro êh Gabro, y ya çabê lo que opina Riebeck çobre lô «buelô înneçeçariô»...

entry.key: LonelyA little. I’m in touch with ground control – Hornfels and Gossan, mostly – and they radio up to chat now and then.
entry.value: Çí, un poco. Êttoy en contâtto con er contrôh lumbreano (Cônné y Gôççan, mâh que ná) y a beçê ablamô por la radio.

entry.key: LonelyAnd when ground control forgets I’m up here <size=20>and they usually do</size>, I launch my Little Scout at the village.
entry.value: Y, cuando er contrôh lumbreano çe orbida de que êttoy aquí <size=20>(coça que ocurre a menudo)</size>, lanço mi Miniêpploradôh y lo embío a la ardea.

entry.key: EskerLonelyThey forget about you?
entry.value: ¿Çe orbidan de ti?

entry.key: EskerLonelyYou spy on us?
entry.value: ¿Nô êppíâ?

entry.key: ForgetI don’t blame them. For one, I don’t check in as often as the other travelers, since I’m always in one place.
entry.value: No lô curpo. Pa empeçâh, como êttoy çiempre en er mîmmo lugâh, no me pongo en contâtto tanto como lô demâh biaherô.

entry.key: ForgetAnd it’s not so bad up here, really. At least it’s peaceful and quiet. You don’t always get that in our solar system.
entry.value: Y, a deçîh berdá, no êh tan malo êttâh aquí arriba. Êh un lugâh tranquilo y paçífico. Eço no êh común en nuêttro çîttema çolâh.

entry.key: ForgetLet alone in our village.
entry.value: Y muxo menô en la ardea.

entry.key: SpyWhat? No! It’s not spying, it’s...
entry.value: ¿Qué? ¡No! No êh êppiâh, êh...

entry.key: SpyIt’s one-way communication. That none of the villagers know about. <size=20>Because I’ve never told them</size>.
entry.value: Una comunicaçión unilaterâh. Que lô ardeanô dêcconoçen. <size=20>Porque nunca çe lo dihe a nadie</size>.

entry.key: MusicProbably. Or actually, definitely. The other travelers carry instruments, so they don’t bother whistling.
entry.value: Probablemente. Gueno, en realidá, definitibamente. Lô demâh biaherô tienen îttrumentô, açí que no neçeçitan çirbâh.

entry.key: MusicYou can pick up their music with a signalscope, you know. Best spot for that is the <color=orange>north pole</color>. Great reception.
entry.value: Puedê êccuxâh çu múçica con un çeñalôccopio, ¿çabê? Er mehôh lugâh pa açêl-lo êh el <color=orange>polo norte</color>. Tiene una çeñâh êççelente.

entry.key: MusicThe north pole is marked in red on your <color=orange>mini map</color>, but the Attlerock is a pretty small moon, really. Just go north. You can’t miss it.
entry.value: Er polo norte êttá marcao con roho en el <color=orange>minimapa</color>, pero Rocaterra êh un çatélite mu pequeño. Çolo tienê que îh açia er norte. No puedê perderte.

entry.key: PlaceHa ha, very funny. <Pause/>...Oh, stars above, you’re serious, aren’t you? That’s just depressing.
entry.value: Ha, ha, qué xîtte. <Pause/>... Por toâ lâ êttreyâ, ¡êttâh ablando en çerio! Qué deprimente...

entry.key: Place<color=grey>Sigh...</color><Pause/>Welcome to the Lunar Outpost, which apparently the space program doesn’t bother to teach anyone anymore.
entry.value: <color=grey>Pfff... </color><Pause/>Te doy la biembenida ar Puêtto de Abançá Lunâh, er cuâ er programa êppaçiâh ya no çe encarga de ençeñâl-le a nadie, ar pareçêh.

entry.key: PlaceWhen we first started Outer Wilds, travelers used to bring their ships here all the time for repairs. Our spacefaring technology has improved loads since then, but the older ships tended to, uh, fall apart a lot. Like, more than they do now.
entry.value: Cuando començamô con Outer Wilds, lô biaherô traían çû âttronabê aquí tó er tiempo pa que lâ reparáçemô. Nuêttra tênnolohía de êpploraçión êppaçiâh mehoró muxo dêdde entonçê, pero lâ âttronabê antiguâ tendían a, e, deçarmarçe tó er tiempo. Muxo mâh que aora, quiero deçîh.

entry.key: PlaceUsing the outpost cut down on the number of launches and landings taking place in the village and also the number of fires. Nowadays, though, it’s mostly just me up here raising saplings from Timber Hearth and keeping an eye on things.
entry.value: Er puêtto de abançá reduho la cantidá de dêppegê y aterriçahê en er pueblo, y también la cantidá de inçendiô. Oy en día, êttoy çolo yo aquí arriba, plantando árbolê hóbenê de Lumbre y bihilando lâ coçâ.

entry.key: MarlHeh, Marl is probably the only one who remembers I’m up here. I should go see the big lug soon.
entry.value: He, creo que çolo Marga recuerda que êttoy aquí. Creo que pronto debería îh a bêh en qué anda.

entry.key: MarlDon’t tell them about this, but sometimes I throw my Little Scout down to make sure Marl isn’t doing anything stupid. I worry that big tree in the village wouldn’t stand a chance otherwise.
entry.value: No le digâ êtto, pero a beçê lanço mi Miniêpploradôh pa açegurarme de que Marga no êtté açiendo ninguna êttupidêh. Çiento que, de otro modo, el árbô grande de la ardea no çobrebibiría.

entry.key: SecondaryHi again. Can’t get enough of the moon? ...I’m kidding.
entry.value: Ola de nuebo. No te cançâ de la luna, ¿e? Çolo bromeo.

entry.key: FirstConversationDo you hear music?
entry.value: ¿Êccuxâ eça múçica?

entry.key: WaitingForOthersAren’t you forgetting someone?
entry.value: ¿No te êttâh orbidando de argien?

entry.key: ReadyToPlayI can’t wait to play with the whole group again. Can I start?
entry.value: No beo la ora de açêh múçica con tó er grupo otra bêh. ¿Puedo empeçâh?

entry.key: EskerReadyToPlayYes.
entry.value: Çí.

entry.key: EskerReadyToPlayNot yet.
entry.value: Todabía no.

entry.key: StartPlayingOk, I won’t let you down!
entry.value: Bien. ¡No te defraudaré!

entry.key: NotYetOh, ok. I’ll– I’ll get to play soon though, right?
entry.value: Ya, mu bien. Pero... podré tocâh pronto, ¿berdá?

entry.key: FarewellWow... How long has it been since I got to make music with everyone around a campfire?
entry.value: Guau... Açe muxo tiempo que no ago múçica con tôh hunto a una fogata...

entry.key: FarewellI’m really happy we’re all here.
entry.value: Me açe mu felîh que tó er grupo êtté aquí.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersHatchling! You found me!
entry.value: ¡Retoño! ¡Me encontrâtte!

entry.key: WaitingForOthersNice to have company around a campfire, isn’t it? Go on, go get the others. Wouldn’t want ’em to miss out!
entry.value: Êh gueno tenêh compañía hunto a una fogata, ¿e? Be a bûccâh a lô demâh. ¡No me gûttaría que çe lo perdieran!

entry.key: ReadyToPlayWhaddya say, then — should I get out the ol’ harmonica?
entry.value: ¿Qué diçê? ¿Çaco la bieha y querida armónica?

entry.key: FeldsparReadyToPlayYes.
entry.value: Çí.

entry.key: FeldsparReadyToPlayNot yet.
entry.value: Todabía no.

entry.key: StartPlayingHa ha! Here goes nothing!
entry.value: ¡Ha, ha! ¡Gueno, aquí boy!

entry.key: NotYetYou got it hatchling. When you’re ready, just say the word.
entry.value: Entendío, retoño. Cuando êtté tó lîtto, abíçame.

entry.key: FarewellYou cut it a little close, don’t you think?
entry.value: Eço êttubo mu çerca, ¿no creê?

entry.key: FarewellWell, it worked out all right in the end, I suppose.
entry.value: Puê, çupongo que, ar finâh, tó çalió bien.

entry.key: FarewellAhh, I hope there are beasties in the next one.
entry.value: A, êppero que aya bixehô en er próççimo.

entry.key: FeldsparJellyfishJournalTrip 4(?), entry #... I’m gonna say “not 1.” \\n Crashes: 3 \\n Boring crashes: 0 (a personal best!)
entry.value: Biahe 4 (¿?), rehîttro n.º... Çeguro que no êh er primero. \\n Coliçionê: 3 \\n Coliçionê aburridâ: 0 (¡un récord perçonâh!)

entry.key: FeldsparJellyfishJournalWhoa ho! Never thought I’d see one of these beasties outside of Giant’s Deep! They were awfully useful back there — maybe a jellyfish could be useful here, too?
entry.value: ¡Guau, guau! Nunca pençé que bería a uno de êttô bixehô fuera de Abîmmo der Higante. Fueron mu útilê ayí... Quiçá una meduça pueda reçurtâh útî aquí, ¿no?

entry.key: FeldsparJellyfishJournalBLEARGH. This thing tastes terrible! The outside is all rubbery and tough -- maybe that’s because it insulates the jellyfish’s insides from getting zapped by electricity?
entry.value: AJJJ. ¡Qué çabôh orrible tiene êtta coça! El êtteriôh êh gomoço y duro... tar bêh çea porque aíl-la el interiôh de la meduça pa que no le dé corriente eléttrica.

entry.key: FeldsparJellyfishJournalRight, I’m going inside of this jellyfish’s interior cavity to see if what’s in there tastes any better.
entry.value: Gueno, boy a probâh la cabidá interiôh de êtta meduça a bêh çi por caçualidá çabe mehôh.

entry.key: FeldsparJellyfishJournalNote to Feldspar: DO NOT EAT THIS EVEN IF YOU ARE DYING. It would be too sad if this were the last thing you ever ate in this life.
entry.value: Nota a Ferdêppato: NO COMÂ ÊTTO, AUN ÇI ÊTTÂH MURIENDO. Çería mu trîtte que êtta coça fueçe la úrtima comida de tu bida.

entry.key: FeldsparJellyfishJournalI guess these jellyfish are only useful for insulation from electricity. Again, DO NOT EAT. (Love, Feldspar)
entry.value: Çupongo que êttâ meduçâ çolo çirben como aîl-lantê de elêttriçidá. Repito, NO LA COMÂ. (Con cariño, Ferdêppato).

entry.key: MeetGabbroNice, it’s you. Good to see you made it here in one piece. The first solo launch is a doozy, isn’t it?
entry.value: A, heniâh, erê tú. Me alegra que ayâ yegao âtta aquí con bida. Er primêh dêppege çin tripulaçión êh increíble, ¿o no?

entry.key: MeetGabbroSo hey, don’t laugh, but I think I might have had some kind of spiritual experience with a rock shaped like a face.
entry.value: Oye, no te ríâ, ¿çí? Acabo de tenêh una çuerte de êpperiençia relihioça con una roca que tiene forma de rôttro.

entry.key: GabbroMeetGabbro...What?
GabbroMeetGabbroMe too!
entry.value: ¡Yo también!

entry.key: Explanation1One of the islands on Giant’s Deep has a Nomai statue on the beach - ever seen one? I brought one back to Timber Hearth with me. Big stone sculpture of a Nomai’s head, three eyes and everything. Beautifully carved, too.
entry.value: Una de lâ îl-lâ de Abîmmo der Higante tiene una êttatua nomai en la playa. ¿Arguna bêh bîtte una? Yebé una a Lumbre. Êh una êccurtura enorme de una cabeça nomai, con lô trêh ohô y tó. Er tayao êh ermoço, ademâh.

entry.key: Explanation1So one minute I’m standing on an island looking at a Nomai sculpture on the beach, and the next thing I know, it’s looking back at me, glowing.
entry.value: Y reçurta que êttoy en una îl-la mirando la êccurtura nomai en la playa y, de repente, la coça me êttá mirando y comiença a briyâh.

entry.key: Explanation1The sculpture replays everything I’ve just done, like it’s been watching me through my own eyes, you know? And then suddenly it stops and everything’s normal again.
entry.value: La êccurtura reproduçe tó lo que acabo de açêh. Êh como çi me miraçe con mî propiô ohô, ¿çabê? Y de repente çe detiene y tó buerbe a la normalidá.

entry.key: GabbroExplanation1That happened to me at the observatory.
entry.value: Eço mîmmo me çuçedió en el ôççerbatorio.

entry.key: YouTooHuhYou too, huh?
entry.value: A ti también, ¿e?

entry.key: Explanation2You’re saying the statue I brought to the museum started glowing at you? Yeah, sounds about right.
entry.value: ¿Diçê que la êttatua que yebé ar muçeo también començó a briyâh? Çîh. Eço fue lo que paçó.

entry.key: Explanation2One minute I’m standing on an island looking at a Nomai sculpture on the beach, and the next thing I know, it’s looking back at me, glowing.
entry.value: Êttoy en una îl-la mirando la êccurtura nomai en la playa, y de repente, la coça me êttá mirando y comiença a briyâh.

entry.key: Explanation2It replays everything I’ve just done, like it’s been watching me through my own eyes, you know? And then suddenly it stops and everything’s normal again.
entry.value: Reproduçe tó lo que acabo de açêh. Êh como çi me miraçe con mî propiô ohô, ¿çabê? Y de repente çe detiene y tó buerbe a la normalidá.

entry.key: ExplanationMergeIt didn’t seem bad, just... weird? Were we the only ones who saw that happen?
entry.value: No me pareçió argo malo, çolo un poco... ¿êttraño? ¿Argien mâh abrá bîtto lo que bimô?

entry.key: ExplanationMergeI tried radioing Hornfels and asking them about it, but they told me I must have just nodded off out here and gotten confused.
entry.value: Intenté preguntâl-le a Cônné por la radio, pero me diho que çeguro dormité un poco y me confundí.

entry.key: ExplanationMergeThen we talked about dreams until Hornfels told me to go refill my oxygen tank before I talked myself to death.
entry.value: Dêppuêh ablamô çobre çueñô âtta que Cônné me mandó a reyenâh mi tanque de ôççíheno antê de que muriera por êççeço de pâl-loteo.

entry.key: ExplanationMergeSo that’s what’s new with me. But hey, this is your first solo voyage! Let’s talk about you, you know?
entry.value: Açí que eçâ çon mî nobedadê. Pero, ¡ey! ¡Êh tu primêh biahe çin tripulaçión! Mehôh ablamô de ti, ¿no creê?

entry.key: Gabbro1_saidhiHave you ever stared at a cyclone for so long, it started to hypnotize you? I’m telling you, they’ll pull you into a trance if you look at ’em long enough.
entry.value: ¿Arguna bêh te quedâtte mirando un çiclón durante tanto tiempo que terminó por înnotiçarte? Te huro que, çi lô mirâ lo çufiçiente, quedâ en trançe.

entry.key: GabbroGabbroMenuI found a photo of you inside the old radio tower.
entry.value: Encontré una foto tuya dentro de la bieha torre de radio.

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoingWell, what are any of us doing here, really?
entry.value: Gueno, ¿qué êttamô açiendo tôh aquí, en realidá?

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing...Nah, I’m just kidding. I’m out here exploring our solar system, same as you.
entry.value: Na, êh broma. Êttoy êpplorando nuêttro çîttema çolâh, iguâh que tú.

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoingBut I tell you what, outer space really gives you room to think. It’s quiet and peaceful out here.
entry.value: Pero te diré argo: el êppaçio êtteriôh te da lugâh pa pençâh. Aquí fuera ay tanta pâh y tranquilidá...

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoingI mean, it’s usually quiet and peaceful. Sometimes a cyclone comes by and lifts my little island paradise clean out of the water. Then: less peaceful.
entry.value: Gueno, caçi çiempre ay pâh y tranquilidá. A beçê paça un çiclón y çe yeba bolando mi pequeño paraíço inçulâh. Y aí ay menô pâh.

entry.key: WhereToExploreHere’s something you might like — I saw a bright flash in the sky not too long ago. Something must have happened up there in orbit around the planet.
entry.value: Ay argo que creo que te gûttará: bi una lûh briyante en er çielo no açe muxo. Argo debe abêh paçao ayí arriba, en la órbita der planeta.

entry.key: WhereToExploreWhat else, what else... Have you been to Statue Island? That’s what I’ve been calling it, seeing as it’s the island where I found the glowing Nomai statue. ...Get it?
entry.value: Qué mâh, qué mâh... ¿Âh êttao en la Îl-la de la Êttatua? Açí la bautiçé, dao que êh la îl-la donde encontré la êttatua nomai briyante. ... ¿Lo entiendê?

entry.key: WhereToExploreI was on the beach on Statue Island when the whole glowy business happened, by the way. It’s a nice beach for that kind of thing. I give it a solid 7 out of 10 on the Gabbro Relaxation Scale.
entry.value: Êttaba en la playa de la Îl-la de la Êttatua cuando çuçedió tó eço der briyo. Êh una guena playa pa que ocurra argo açí. Le doy 7 de 10 puntô en la êccala de relahaçión de Gabro.

entry.key: WhereToExploreIf you feel like checking out Statue Island, it’s the one with two islands connected by a natural rock arch. Well... mostly connected, anyway. You’ll see.
entry.value: Çi quierê îh a bêh la Îl-la de la Êttatua, êh una de lâ dôh îl-lâ conêttâh por un arco rocoço naturâh. Gueno, conêttâh caçi der tó. Ya lo berâh.

entry.key: ThisPlanetHaha, I know, right?
entry.value: Ha, ha, çí, lo çé, ¿no?

entry.key: ThisPlanet...Oh, you meant, like, tell you more about it? I gotcha. Well, Giant’s Deep is massive, and mostly water. No surprises there.
entry.value: A... ¿quierê que te cuente mâh? De acuerdo. Puê, Abîmmo der Higante êh enorme, y êttá compuêtto mayormente de agua. Aí no ay çorpreçâ.

entry.key: ThisPlanetThere’s a strong current a ways beneath the surface that prevents anything from sinking below it. Seriously, I tried everything I could think of to get past that current, and neither idea worked.
entry.value: Tiene una fuerte corriente que paça por debaho de la çuperfiçie y no deha que ná çe unda. De berâ, intenté tó lo que çe me ocurrió pa paçâh eça corriente, y ninguna de mî ideâ tubo éççito.

entry.key: ThisPlanetAs for land masses, I’ve counted four islands, including this one. There’s also the one with that Nomai statue I saw on the beach.
entry.value: En cuando a lâ maçâ terrêttrê, conté cuatro îl-lâ, incluida êtta. También êttá la que tiene la êttatua nomai que bi en la playa.

entry.key: ThisPlanetYou’ve seen the cyclones? Yeah, they’re hard to miss. They’ll toss up everything in their path, islands included. Little tip — if you get picked up, try to land in water. Less likely to kill you.
entry.value: ¿Âh bîtto lô çiclonê? Çí, êh difíçî no bêl-lô. Çe yeban tó lo que encuentran en er camino, y eço incluye a lâ îl-lâ. Un conçeho: çi te yeba uno, intenta aterriçâh çobre agua. Açí tienê menô probabilidadê de morîh.

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_1Nice, it’s you. Good to see you made it here in one piece. The first solo launch is a doozy, isn’t it?
entry.value: A, heniâh, erê tú. Me alegra que ayâ yegao âtta aquí con bida. Er primêh dêppege çin tripulaçión êh increíble, ¿o no?

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_1So hey, don’t laugh, but I think I might have just, like, died? Somehow?
entry.value: No te ríâ, ¿çí? Pero creo que acabo de... morîh... De argún modo.

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_1Do you remember, y’know, dying a few minutes ago? Maybe?
entry.value: ¿Recuerdâ, e... abêh muerto açe argunô minutô? ¿Quiçá?

entry.key: GabbroMeetGabbro2F_1Oh yeah, we definitely died.
entry.value: A, çí, definitibamente nô morimô.

entry.key: GabbroMeetGabbro2F_1I think we’re the only ones who know.
entry.value: Creo que nadie mâh çabe êtto.

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_2Okay, cool, that’s what I thought. It was all way too vivid to be a dream.
entry.value: A, heniâh, eço pençaba. Era tó demaçiao bíbido como pa çêh un çueño.

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_2I tried radioing Hornfels and asking them if they had died, too, but they thought I was being metaphorical.
entry.value: Yamé a Cônné por la radio y le pregunté çi también abía muerto, pero pençó que êttaba uçando una metáfora.

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_3Yeah, I tried radioing Hornfels and asking them if they had died, too, but they thought I was being metaphorical or something.
entry.value: Çí, yamé a Cônné por la radio y le pregunté çi también abía muerto, pero pençó que êttaba uçando una metáfora o argo açí.

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_4Well, if you remember dying, then I guess I didn’t just fall asleep and have a bad dream or something. I dunno what’s going on, though. Today’s been weird.
entry.value: Gueno, çi tú recuerdâ abêh muerto, entonçê çupongo que no me dormí y tube una peçadiya ni ná de eço. Pero no çé qué êttá çuçediendo. Oy a çido un día êttraño.

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_4Like, I was on a different island earlier, right? I was on the beach looking at one of those big stone statues of a Nomai head, and the next thing I know, it’s looking back at me, glowing.
entry.value: Antê êttaba en otra îl-la, ¿çabê? Êttaba en la playa mirando una de eçâ êttatuâ higantê de una cabeça nomai y, de un momento a otro, la coça me êttá mirando y briya.

entry.key: MeetGabbro2F_4The statue replays everything I’ve just done, like it’s been watching me through my own eyes, you know? And then suddenly it stops and everything’s normal again.
entry.value: La êttatua reproduçe tó lo que acabo de açêh. Êh como çi me miraçe con mî propiô ohô, ¿çabê? Y de repente çe detiene y tó buerbe a la normalidá.

entry.key: GabbroMeetGabbro2F_4That happened to me at the observatory.
entry.value: Eço mîmmo me çuçedió en el ôççerbatorio.

entry.key: YouTooHuhCome to think of it, when I died, I saw what I’m pretty sure were my memories going backward, just like that time with the statue. Do you think the Nomai statues are related to us dying somehow?
entry.value: Aora que lo pienço, cuando morí, bi lo que creo que eran mî recuerdô yendo açia atrâh, al iguâh que me paçó eça bêh con la êttatua. ¿Creê que lâ êttatuâ nomai êttén relaçionâh con nuêttra muerte de argún modo?

entry.key: YouTooHuhAnd another thing - we died, but we aren’t dead? That’s pretty unusual for Hearthians.
entry.value: Y otra coça... Çi nô morimô, ¿por qué çegimô con bida? Eço êh bâttante anormâh pa lô lumbreanô.

entry.key: YouTooHuhWell, that’s what’s new with me. But hey, this is your first solo voyage! Let’s talk about you, you know?
entry.value: Gueno, eçâ çon mî nobedadê. Pero, ¡ey! ¡Êh tu primêh biahe çin tripulaçión! Mehôh ablamô de ti, ¿no creê?

entry.key: Gabbro2F_saidhiHave you ever stared at a cyclone for so long, it started to hypnotize you? I’m telling you, they’ll put you in a trance if you look at ’em long enough.
entry.value: ¿Arguna bêh te quedâtte mirando un çiclón durante tanto tiempo que terminó por înnotiçarte? Te huro que, çi lô mirâ lo çufiçiente, quedâ en trançe.

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_2FWell, what are any of us doing here, really?
entry.value: Gueno, ¿qué êttamô açiendo tôh aquí, en realidá?

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_2F...Nah, I’m just kidding. I’m out here exploring our solar system, same as you.
entry.value: Na, êh broma. Êttoy êpplorando nuêttro çîttema çolâh, iguâh que tú.

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_2FBut I tell you what, outer space really gives you room to think. It’s quiet and peaceful out here.
entry.value: Pero te diré argo: el êppaçio êtteriôh te da lugâh pa pençâh. Aquí fuera ay tanta pâh y tranquilidá...

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_2FI mean, it’s usually quiet and peaceful. Sometimes a cyclone comes by and lifts my little island paradise clean out of the water. Then: less peaceful.
entry.value: Gueno, caçi çiempre ay pâh y tranquilidá. A beçê paça un çiclón y çe yeba bolando mi pequeño paraíço inçulâh. Y aí ay menô pâh.

entry.key: WhereToExplore_2FWell actually, after waking up from, you know, dying, I saw the same bright flash in the sky. Something must be happening up there in orbit around the planet.
entry.value: Gueno, de exo, cuando me dêpperté dêppuêh de... morîh, bi la mîmma lûh briyante en er çielo. Argo debe êttâh paçando ayí arriba, en la órbita der planeta.

entry.key: WhereToExplore_2FWhat else, what else... Have you been to Statue Island? That’s what I’ve been calling it, seeing as it’s the island where I found the glowing Nomai statue. ...Get it?
entry.value: Qué mâh, qué mâh... ¿Âh êttao en la Îl-la de la Êttatua? Açí la bautiçé, dao que êh la îl-la donde encontré la êttatua nomai briyante. ... ¿Lo entiendê?

entry.key: Gabbro2T_1Okay, here’s a weird one for you — I think I might have just, like, died? Somehow?
entry.value: Gueno, tengo argo êttraño pa contarte. Creo que acabo de... morîh... De argún modo.

entry.key: Gabbro2T_1I radioed Hornfels at the observatory to ask them about it, but they’re convinced I fell asleep out here and had a nightmare something.
entry.value: Yamé a Cônné por la radio al ôççerbatorio, pero diçe que çeguro me dormí y tube una peçadiya o argo açí.

entry.key: Gabbro2T_1Do you remember, y’know, dying a few minutes ago? Maybe?
entry.value: ¿Recuerdâ, e... abêh muerto açe argunô minutô? ¿Quiçá?

entry.key: GabbroGabbro2T_1Oh yeah, we definitely died.
entry.value: A, çí, definitibamente nô morimô.

entry.key: GabbroGabbro2T_1I think we’re the only ones who know.
entry.value: Creo que nadie mâh çabe êtto.

entry.key: Gabbro2T_2Okay, cool, that’s what I thought. It was all way too vivid to be a dream.
entry.value: A, heniâh, eço pençaba. Era tó demaçiao bíbido como pa çêh un çueño.

entry.key: Gabbro2T_2I radioed Hornfels again to ask if they had died, too, but I’m pretty sure they thought I was being metaphorical.
entry.value: Yamé a Cônné por la radio y le pregunté çi también abía muerto, pero creo que pençó que êttaba uçando una metáfora.

entry.key: Gabbro2T_3Yeah, I radioed Hornfels again to ask if they had died, too, but I’m pretty sure they thought I was being metaphorical.
entry.value: Çí, yamé a Cônné por la radio y le pregunté çi también abía muerto, pero creo que pençó que êttaba uçando una metáfora.

entry.key: Gabbro2T_4Well, if you remember dying, then I guess I didn’t just fall asleep and have a weird dream or something. But stars above, what’s going on, then? And then there was that thing with the Nomai statue earlier...
entry.value: Gueno, çi tú recuerdâ abêh muerto, entonçê no me dormí y tube un çueño êttraño ni ná de eço. Pero, por lâ êttreyâ, ¿qué çuçede, entonçê? Y no nô orbidemô del açunto de antê con la êttatua nomai...

entry.key: Gabbro2T_4Come to think of it, when I died, I saw what I’m pretty sure were my memories going backward, just like the time with that statue. Do you think the Nomai statues are related to us dying somehow?
entry.value: Aora que lo pienço, cuando morí, bi lo que creo que eran mî recuerdô yendo açia atrâh, al iguâh que me paçó eça bêh con la êttatua. ¿Creê que lâ êttatuâ nomai êttén relaçionâh con nuêttra muerte de argún modo?

entry.key: Gabbro2T_4So... we died, but we aren’t dead? That’s pretty unusual for Hearthians.
entry.value: Entonçê... nô morimô, pero ¿çegimô con bida? Eço êh bâttante anormâh pa lô lumbreanô.

entry.key: Gabbro2T_4I am going to need to do some serious thinking before I come up with any theories. Maybe I’ll have figured something out by the next time you come by.
entry.value: Tendré que pençâh muxo antê de que çe me ocurra arguna ipóteçî. Tar bêh ya tenga arguna idea pa la próççima bêh que bengâ.

entry.key: Gabbro2T_saidhiHey again. If you feel like roasting a mallow, feel free to use my campfire. It’s just up the path a little ways.
entry.value: Ola de nuebo. Çi quierê tôttâh un marbabîcco, puedê uçâh mi fogata. Çolo debê çubîh un poco por er camino.

entry.key: GabbroMenuSo what’s up?
entry.value: ¿Qué tal?

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_2TWell, what are any of us doing here, really?
entry.value: Gueno, ¿qué êttamô açiendo tôh aquí, en realidá?

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_2T...Nah, I’m just kidding. I’m out here exploring our solar system, same as you.
entry.value: Na, êh broma. Êttoy êpplorando nuêttro çîttema çolâh, iguâh que tú.

entry.key: WhatAreYouDoing_2TBut I tell you what, outer space really gives you room to think. It’s quiet and peaceful out here.
