entry.value: ¿Âh bîtto lô çiclonê? Çí, êh difíçî no bêl-lô. Çe yeban tó lo que encuentran en er camino, y eço incluye a lâ îl-lâ. Un conçeho: çi te yeba uno, intenta aterriçâh çobre agua. Açí tienê menô probabilidadê de morîh.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersHey, time pal. So you’re getting the band back together, huh?
entry.value: Ola, camará der tiempo. ¿Açí que êttâh reuniendo a la banda?

entry.key: WaitingForOthersGo on, go find the others. I’ll be here. You don’t need me yet, but you will.
entry.value: Be a bûccâh al rêtto. Yo êttaré aquí. Todabía no me neçeçitâ, pero ya yegará er momento.

entry.key: ReadyToPlayWhat do you say, time buddy? Ready to start the music?
entry.value: ¿Qué diçê, camará der tiempo? ¿Ya podemô empeçâh a tocâh?

entry.key: GabbroReadyToPlayYes.
entry.value: Çí.

entry.key: GabbroReadyToPlayNot yet.
entry.value: Todabía no.

entry.key: StartPlayingHeh, this should be cool.
entry.value: He, êtto ba a çêh heniâh.

entry.key: NotYetNo rush, I’m not going anywhere.
entry.value: No ay priça; no me iré a ningún lao.

entry.key: FarewellI tell you what, this has been really fun. And I got to help make something pretty cool, so I’ve got no complaints.
entry.value: ¿Çabê qué? Me e dibertío a lo grande. Y ayudé a açêh argo heniâh, açí que no tengo quehâ.

entry.key: FarewellI mean, not me, exactly, but close enough.
entry.value: Gueno, no yo êççâttamente, pero caçi.

entry.key: FarewellIt’s the kind of thing that makes you glad you stopped and smelled the pine trees along the way, you know?
entry.value: Êh eçe tipo de ebento que te açe dâh lâ graçiâ por aberte detenío a olêh lô pinô en er camino, ¿çabê?

entry.key: Hornfels
entry.value: Cônné

entry.key: Curator1There you are! I just finished pre-flight observations, and local conditions are good. Time to get our newest astronaut off the ground!
entry.value: ¡Aí êttâh! Reçién terminé lâ ôççerbaçionê prebiâ ar buelo, y lâ condiçionê localê çon guenâ. ¡Êh ora de tu dêppege, âttronauta nobêh!

entry.key: Curator1And you’ll be our first astronaut ever equipped with a Nomai translator tool! I confess, I’ve been giddy all day just thinking about it.
entry.value: ¡Y tú inaugurarâh nuêttra erramienta de tradûççión nomai! Debo deçîh que me muero de ganâ de que la pongamô en práttica.

entry.key: Curator1We’re better equipped than ever to unravel the mysteries of the Nomai. You and Hal should be very proud of your work!
entry.value: Nunca en nuêttra îttoria contamô con erramientâ tan guenâ pa deçentrañâh lô mîtteriô de lô nomai. ¡Ali y tú deberían çentîh muxo orguyo por çu trabaho!

entry.key: Curator1Tell me, what’s your plan once you’re in space?
entry.value: Dime, ¿qué planeâ açêh una bêh que êttêh en el êppaçio?

entry.key: HornfelsCurator1I’m going to learn more about the Nomai.
entry.value: Quiero aprendêh mâh çobre lô nomai.

entry.key: HornfelsCurator1I’ll meet up with the other travelers.
entry.value: Me encontraré con lô demâh biaherô.

entry.key: HornfelsCurator1I want to go somewhere no one’s gone before.
entry.value: Quiero îh a un lugâh donde nadie aya ido antê.

entry.key: HornfelsCurator1I think I’ll start with something small.
entry.value: Creo que començaré por argo pequeño.

entry.key: HornfelsCurator1I don’t know.
entry.value: No lo çé.

entry.key: HornfelsCurator1I’m gonna wing it!
entry.value: ¡Lo deçidiré en er camino!

entry.key: Curator2I might have guessed as much! No sense in making a translator tool if you’re not going to use it to translate anything.
entry.value: ¡Debí abêl-lo imahinao! No tiene çentío creâh una erramienta de tradûççión çi no bâ a uçâl-la pa traduçîh ná.

entry.key: Curator2We’ve barely scratched the surface of the Nomai writing in our solar system, so we still know very little about them. We’ve no idea if they originated here or traveled here, or why they disappeared.
entry.value: Apenâ êttamô empeçando a dêççifrâh la êccritura de lô nomai en nuêttro çîttema çolâh, açí que çabemô mu poco çobre eyô. No çabemô çi çe orihinaron aquí o çi yegaron dêdde otra parte, ni por qué deçapareçieron.

entry.key: Curator2That tool of yours should prove indispensible in solving the mystery of this ancient species!
entry.value: ¡Tu erramienta podría çêh indîppençable pa reçorbêh er mîtterio de êtta êppeçie antigua!

entry.key: Curator3You’re going to check in with them, are you? Not a bad plan - no one knows the solar system better than our astronauts.
entry.value: Bâ a biçitâl-lô, ¿berdá? Êh un guen plan. Lô âttronautâ conoçen er çîttema çolâh mehôh que nadie.

entry.key: Curator3Let’s see... Chert is on the Hourglass Twins, Riebeck is on Brittle Hollow, and Gabbro is on Giant’s Deep, last I checked.
entry.value: Beamô... Xert êttá en lô Hemelô Relôh de Arena, Riebeck êttá en Ondoná Fráhî y Gabro êttá en Abîmmo der Higante, çegún mi úrtima informaçión.

entry.key: Curator3And... Well, there’s Feldspar, obviously, but of course we don’t know where they are, or if they’re even alive.
entry.value: Y... Gueno, claro, también tenemô a Ferdêppato, pero nadie çabe dónde êttá o çi çige con bida.

entry.key: Curator3Feldspar has been lost for a very long time, I’m afraid.
entry.value: Me temo que açe muxo tiempo que no çabemô ná de Ferdêppato...

entry.key: Curator3...On a more cheerful note, you’ll find Esker stationed on the Attlerock. They’re not a traveler so much as a lunar local, but I’m sure they’d appreciate a visit nevertheless.
entry.value: Ablando de argo mâh alegre, también encontrarâh a Êkke en Rocaterra. No forma parte der programa de biaherô, pero yeba tanto tiempo en la Luna que çeguro le gûttará reçibîh una biçita.

entry.key: Curator4I like it! You’ll have plenty of options to choose from.
entry.value: ¡Me gûtta! Tendrâh muxâ ôççionê pa elehîh.

entry.key: Curator4No one’s ever landed on the Interloper before, you know. Perhaps you’ll be the first?
entry.value: Nadie a aterriçao hamâh en el Intruço, ¿çabê? Tar bêh puedâ açêl-lo por primera bêh.

entry.key: Curator4I must say... Should you choose to go to Dark Bramble, be very careful. No one’s explored there before, either, for what you’ll find are excellent reasons.
entry.value: Debo âbbertirte... Çi deçidê îh a Êppinôccuro, debê tenêh muxo cuidao. Nadie a êpplorao eçe planeta, y dêccubrirâh que ay motibô de çobra pa no açêl-lo.

entry.key: Curator5You’d prefer to ease into things? That’s a sensible plan! More sensible than most of our astronauts tend to be, and that’s a fact.
entry.value: ¿Prefierê empeçâh con argo fáçî? ¡Êh un plan mu raçonable! Erê mâh raçonable que la mayoría de nuêttrô âttronautâ, eço êh un exo.

entry.key: Curator5Do you think you’ll go to the Attlerock, then? Our moon would be a safe place to travel to and get your bearings in space, and I’m sure Esker would appreciate the visit.
entry.value: ¿Creê que irâh a Rocaterra, entonçê? Nuêttro çatélite êh un lugâh çeguro pa biahâh y acôttumbrarte al êppaçio, y çé que Êkke çe alegrará de la biçita.

entry.key: Curator5Plus, we don’t know what the ancient Nomai ruins on the moon are, or why they were built. You could put your new translator tool through its paces!
entry.value: Ademâh, no çabemô qué çon lâ antiguâ ruinâ nomai que ay en la Luna ni por qué lâ côttruyeron. ¡Ayí podríâ probâh la nueba erramienta de tradûççión!

entry.key: Curator6Haha! Overwhelmed by the options, perhaps? I don’t blame you.
entry.value: ¡Ha, ha! ¿Te abrumaron lâ ôççionê, tar bêh? Êh entendible.

entry.key: Curator6If you need help getting started, you could go visit Esker on the moon. They’re alone on the Attlerock most of the time, so I’m sure they’d appreciate it.
entry.value: Çi neçeçitâ ayuda pa empeçâh, puedê biçitâh a Êkke en la Luna. No çuele reçibîh biçitâ en Rocaterra, açí que le alegrará berte.

entry.key: Curator6Plus, we don’t know what the ancient Nomai ruins on the moon are, or why they were built. You could put your new translator tool through its paces!
entry.value: Ademâh, no çabemô qué çon lâ antiguâ ruinâ nomai que ay en la Luna ni por qué lâ côttruyeron. ¡Ayí podríâ probâh la nueba erramienta de tradûççión!

entry.key: Curator7Planning to follow in the footsteps of Feldspar and the great Outer Wilds Ventures tradition, are you? I might have guessed.
entry.value: Planeâ çegîh lô paçô de Ferdêppato y la tradiçión de Outer Wilds Ventures, ¿e? Debí abêl-lo imahinao.

entry.key: Curator7Well, see if you can’t put that translator tool of yours to good use while you’re out there!
entry.value: Gueno, cuando êttêh ayí afuera, ¡intenta dâl-le un guen uço a la erramienta de tradûççión!

entry.key: Curator8Well then, looks like all that’s left is to send you off! All in all, it’s a fine day for a launch!
entry.value: Mu bien, ¡çupongo que çolo te rêtta dêppegâh! ¡Êh un guen día pa bolâh!

entry.key: HornfelsCurator8I’m ready to get off this rock!
entry.value: ¡No beo la ora de irme de êtta roca!

entry.key: HornfelsCurator8I’m ready to die in space.
entry.value: Me preparé pa morîh en el êppaçio.

entry.key: Curator9Excellent! You’ll be needing the <color=orange>launch codes</color>, then.
entry.value: ¡Êççelente! Entonçê, neçeçitarâh lô <color=orange>códigô de lançamiento</color>.

entry.key: Curator9Here they are. Best get off the ground before Slate makes any more modifications to your ship, eh?
entry.value: Aquí êttán. Mehôh dêppegâ de una bêh antê de que Launa quiera çegîh açiéndole modificaçionê a tu âttronabe.

entry.key: Curator9Good luck out there! Let me know if I can help you with anything.
entry.value: ¡Guena çuerte ayí afuera! Dime çi puedo ayudarte con argo.

entry.key: Curator10I’m not one for superstition, but isn’t that kind of unlucky to say before a launch?
entry.value: No me gûttan lâ çuperttiçionê, pero ¿no trae mala çuerte deçîh argo açí antê de un lançamiento?

entry.key: Curator10At any rate, here are the <color=orange>launch codes</color>. Try not to worry too much - our ships are every bit as safe as Slate could be persuaded to make them.
entry.value: De cuarquiêh modo, aquí tienê lô <color=orange>códigô de lançamiento</color>. No te preocupê demaçiao: nuêttrâ âttronabê çon tan çegurâ como çe puede êpperâh... de argo diçeñao por Launa.

entry.key: Curator10Best of luck out there! Let me know if I can help you with anything.
entry.value: ¡Guena çuerte ayí afuera! Dime çi puedo ayudarte con argo.

entry.key: Curator11Hello again!
entry.value: ¡Ola de nuebo!

entry.key: Curator12Back so soon?
entry.value: ¿Ya regreçâtte?

entry.key: Curator13Was there something you needed?
entry.value: ¿Neçeçitabâ argo?

entry.key: HornfelsCurator13I found Feldspar!
entry.value: ¡Encontré a Ferdêppato!

entry.key: HornfelsCurator13The Nomai statue opened its eyes!
entry.value: ¡La êttatua nomai abrió lô ohô!

entry.key: HornfelsCurator13Where are the other travelers?
entry.value: ¿Dónde êttán lô demâh biaherô?

entry.key: HornfelsCurator13Tell me more about Feldspar.
entry.value: Cuéntame mâh çobre Ferdêppato.

entry.key: HornfelsCurator13No thanks, I’m good.
entry.value: No, graçiâ.

entry.key: CuratorOtherTravelersWell, let’s see... Chert is on the Hourglass Twins, Riebeck is on Brittle Hollow, and Gabbro is on Giant’s Deep.
entry.value: Mu bien, beamô... Xert êttá en lô Hemelô Relôh de Arena, Riebeck êttá en Ondoná Fráhî y Gabro êttá en Abîmmo der Higante.

entry.key: CuratorOtherTravelersAnd... there’s Feldspar, obviously, but of course we don’t know where they are, or if they’re even still alive.
entry.value: Y... claro, también tenemô a Ferdêppato, pero nadie çabe dónde êttá o çi çige con bida.

entry.key: CuratorOtherTravelersFeldspar has been lost for a very long time, I’m afraid.
entry.value: Me temo que açe muxo tiempo que no çabemô ná de Ferdêppato...

entry.key: CuratorMoreAboutFeldsparFeldspar was one of the four founding members of Outer Wilds, along with our flight coach Gossan, Slate the engineer, and me.
entry.value: Ferdêppato êttubo entre lô fundadorê de Outer Wilds, al iguâh que yo. También êttaban Gôççan, a cargo de la îttrûççión de buelo, y Launa, lídê de inheniería.

entry.key: CuratorMoreAboutFeldsparAs ground control and later the museum curator, I didn’t work with Feldspar as closely as Slate and Gossan did. I can tell you Feldspar was absolutely fearless, though. Nothing scared them.
entry.value: Yo me encargaba der contrôh lumbreano y mâh adelante me ocupé der muçeo, açí que no trabahé con Ferdêppato tanto como Launa y Gôççan. Pero puedo deçirte que a Ferdêppato le çobraba corahe. Ná le daba miedo.

entry.key: CuratorMoreAboutFeldsparTest-piloted everything Slate ever built! It’s a wonder Feldspar lived to see space, frankly, but they did. Flew all sorts of dangerous stunts and explored everything they could find.
entry.value: ¡Iço lô buelô de prueba de cá una de lâ âttronabê que côttruyó Launa! Êh un milagro que Ferdêppato aya bibío lo çufiçiente pa bêh el êppaçio, pero açí fue. Iço tó tipo de proeçâ peligroçâ y êpploró tó lo que pudo encontrâh.

entry.key: CuratorMoreAboutFeldsparAnd then one day, they just... didn’t come back. We don’t know what happened, or where Feldspar went, or even whether they’re still alive.
entry.value: Y un día... çimplemente no regreçó. No çabemô qué le paçó, adónde fue o çi çige con bida.

entry.key: CuratorMoreAboutFeldsparIt’s been a long time since they left.
entry.value: Açe muxo tiempo que çe marxó.

entry.key: CuratorEyesOpenWhat? You say the statue opened its eyes and looked at you?!
entry.value: ¿Qué? ¡¿Diçê que la êttatua abrió lô ohô y te miró?!

entry.key: CuratorEyesOpen...How wonderful for you.
entry.value: ... Debe abêh çido marabiyoço.

entry.key: CuratorEyesOpenNo, truly, that’s wonderful! It really is. ...Even if I have been pouring over it every night for weeks. It’s stupendous you were able to get a reaction from the statue just by glancing at it a few times.
entry.value: ¡Ablo en çerio, êh marabiyoço! De berâ. ... Aun çi fui yo quien çe paçó cá noxe de la úrtima çemana analiçándola. Êh fantáttico que ayâ conçegío henerâh una reâççión de la êttatua con tan çolo mirâl-la un pâh de beçê.

entry.key: CuratorEyesOpenErgh, sorry, that’s not a very scientific thing to say, is it? I am glad. I’m just also insufferably, profoundly jealous. You’ll have to forgive me.
entry.value: E... dîccurpa, eço no çonó mu çientífico, ¿no? Rearmente me alegro. También me da una cantidá incômmençurable de çelô. Tendrâh que dîccurparme.

entry.key: CuratorEyesOpenThat aside - I have research to do! I wonder why the statue opened its eyes. Surely this means they aren’t mere decorative ornaments...?
entry.value: Mâh ayá de eço, ¡tengo muxo que imbêttigâh! Me pregunto por qué la êttatua abrá abierto lô ohô. Êtto confirma que no çon merô artículô decoratibô...

entry.key: CuratorFeldsparFoundYou found Feldspar?! And they’re in Dark Bramble?! Stars above, this is wonderful news! Thank you! Thank you for finding them!
entry.value: ¡¿Encontrâtte a Ferdêppato?! ¡¿Y êttá en Êppinôccuro?! ¡Por lâ êttreyâ, qué notiçia marabiyoça! ¡Graçiâ! ¡Graçiâ por encontrâh a Ferdêppato!

entry.key: CuratorFeldsparFoundThat Feldspar didn’t immediately join you on your ship and return here is incredibly Feldspar of them. We were never entirely sure what Feldspar was thinking back then, either.
entry.value: Que no çe aya çubío a tu âttronabe de îmmediato pa regreçâh a Lumbre êh una condûtta típica de Ferdêppato. Nunca tubimô la çerteça de qué pençaba Ferdêppato, ni çiquiera antê.

entry.key: CuratorFeldsparFoundStill, we ought to fish them out of that dreadful place with all haste! I’ll radio Gossan and have them prepare a ship. It really should be Gossan who brings Feldspar home.
entry.value: Aun açí, ¡tenemô que organiçâh el rêccate aora mîmmo! ¡No puede quedarçe en eçe lugâh orrible! Yamaré a Gôççan por la radio pa que prepare una âttronabe. Debería çêh Gôççan quien çe encarge de traêh a Ferdêppato a caça.

entry.key: CuratorFeldsparFoundAgain, thank you. You can hardly imagine how profoundly happy I am to hear they’re alive and unharmed.
entry.value: De nuebo, muxâ graçiâ. No te imahinâ la alegría que me da çabêh que êttá bien y con bida.

entry.key: Curator14Take care!
entry.value: ¡Cuídate!

entry.key: CuratorEyesOpenLoop2Hey, look at this - the statue opened its eyes! Bet you wish you’d seen that happen, huh?<Pause/><color=grey> Sigh...</color> Me, too.
entry.value: ¡Ey, mira êtto! ¡La êttatua abrió lô ohô! Imahino que deçearíâ abêl-lo bîtto, ¿e?<Pause/><color=grey>Ay...</color> Yo también.

entry.key: CuratorEyesOpenLoop2I’m not even a little closer to understanding what’s going on with this statue.
entry.value: No êttoy ni un paçito mâh çerca de entendêh qué çe trae êtta êttatua.

entry.key: SignHornfel’s Observations
entry.value: Ôççerbaçionê de Cônné

entry.key: SignThis is incredible! At first I thought the points of light in this image were stars, but they’re not... they’re galaxies!
entry.value: ¡Êtto êh increíble! Ar prinçipio, pençé que lô puntô luminoçô de êtta imahen eran êttreyâ, pero no êh açí... ¡Çon galâççiâ!

entry.key: SignAnd this image covers just a tiny patch of the whole sky, which means the universe contains at least a thousand times more galaxies than we previously imagined.
entry.value: Y êtta imahen cubre çolo una pequeña porçión der çielo, lo que implica que el uniberço contiene ar menô mîh beçê mâh galâççiâ de lo que imahinábamô.

entry.key: SignI... I think I need to sit down.
entry.value: Creo que... Creo que debo çentarme.

entry.key: SignHmmm, this is odd. According to my redshift calculations, every single galaxy in this image is moving away from us.
entry.value: Mmm, êtto êh êttraño. Çegún mî cárculô de corrimiento al roho, cá una de lâ galâççiâ de êtta imahen çe êttá alehando de noçotrô.

entry.key: SignIn fact, the farther away a galaxy is, the faster it appears to be moving away.
entry.value: De exo, lâ galâççiâ mâh lehanâ pareçen êttâh alehándoçe con mayôh rapidêh.

entry.key: SignIt’s almost as if the entire universe is expanding.
entry.value: Êh caçi como çi tó el uniberço çe êttubiera êppandiendo.

entry.key: SignBut if that’s true, was everything closer together in the past? And how far back can we extrapolate? Did the universe have a beginning?
entry.value: Pero de çêh çierto, ¿acaço tó êttaba mâh çerca en er paçao? ¿Y cuánto podemô êttrapolâh açia atrâh? ¿Acaço el uniberço tubo un comienço?

entry.key: Moraine
entry.value: Morrena

entry.key: SignalscopeKid1Hm? Oh, hello, astronaut.
entry.value: ¿Mm? A, ola, âttronauta.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid1This is good weather for your launch, right? That’s lucky!
entry.value: Tenemô un clima ideâh pa tu lançamiento, ¿no creê? ¡Qué çuerte!

entry.key: MoraineSignalscopeKid1What are you up to?
entry.value: ¿Qué êttâh açiendo?

entry.key: MoraineSignalscopeKid1Any good sounds from space today?
entry.value: ¿Êccuxâtte argún çonido intereçante del êppaçio oy?

entry.key: SignalscopeKid5Hello, again.
entry.value: Ola de nuebo.

entry.key: MoraineSignalscopeKid5Haven’t you been up in this tree a while?
entry.value: ¿No yebâ demaçiao tiempo en êtte árbô?

entry.key: MoraineSignalscopeKid5Any good sounds from space today?
entry.value: ¿Êccuxâtte argún çonido intereçante del êppaçio oy?

entry.key: SignalscopeKid2I’m using my signalscope to pick up sounds from distant planets.
entry.value: Êttoy uçando er çeñalôccopio pa câttâh çoníô de planetâ dîttantê.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid2It’s set to the Outer Wilds Ventures frequency so I can pick up the travelers’ music.
entry.value: Êttá configurao en la frecuençia de Outer Wilds Ventures pa podêh êccuxâh la múçica de lô biaherô.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid3There are! My signalscope is set to the Outer Wilds Ventures frequency, so I’m listening to the travelers’ music.
entry.value: ¡Çí! Mi çeñalôccopio êttá configurao en la frecuençia de Outer Wilds Ventures, açí que êttoy êccuxando la múçica de lô biaherô.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid4Last night I heard Riebeck’s banjo coming from Brittle Hollow. I hope that means they’re safe.
entry.value: Anoxe êccuxé er banjo de Riebeck, que probenía de Ondoná Fráhî. Êppero que eço çînnifique que êttá bien.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid4I can hear different planets, too! It depends on what time of day or night it is, since different planets are in the sky at different times.
entry.value: ¡También puedo êccuxâh otrô planetâ! Depende de la ora der día o la noxe, porque lô planetâ êttán en er çielo en momentô dîttintô.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid4Signalscopes are cool.
entry.value: Lô çeñalôccopiô çon henialê.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid6I’m concerned Marl will cut down this tree if there’s no one in it, so I don’t want to leave it for too long.
entry.value: Me preocupa que Marga tale êtte árbô çi no ay nadie ençima, açí que no quiero dehâl-lo durante muxo tiempo.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid6Mayor Rutile says Marl isn’t supposed to cut it down, but I don’t think they see eyes-to-eyes on this one.
entry.value: Rutilo diçe que Marga no debe talâl-lo, pero creo que no çe ponen de acuerdo en êtte açunto.

entry.key: SignalscopeKid6Um, I’ll still watch your launch, though! I’ll have a good view from up here.
entry.value: ¡Pero miraré tu lançamiento, eço çí! Tengo una bîtta êççelente dêdde aquí.

entry.key: Retrieving stored coordinates from <color=lightblue>Ash Twin</color>.
entry.value: Ôtteniendo lâ coordenâh armaçenâh de <color=lightblue>Hemelo Çeniça</color>.

entry.key: Displaying coordinates for the <color=lightblue>Eye of the universe</color>.
entry.value: Môttrando lâ coordenâh del <color=lightblue>Oho del uniberço</color>.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersIt’s, um, it’s not quite time yet.
entry.value: E... todabía no êh la ora.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersI’m pretty sure we’ll need the others for this next part. We’ll need, you know... everyone.
entry.value: Çin dudâ neçeçitaremô a lô demâh pa la próççima parte. Neçeçitaremô a... ya çabê, a tôh.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersNo rush! Take your time. <size=20>It might not even exist here...</size>
entry.value: ¡No ay priça! Tómate er tiempo que neçeçitê. (Çi çiquiera êççîtte eço aquí...).

entry.key: ReadyToPlayShould I begin?
entry.value: ¿Començamô?

entry.key: RiebeckReadyToPlayYes.
entry.value: Çí.

entry.key: RiebeckReadyToPlayNot yet.
entry.value: Todabía no.

entry.key: StartPlayingYou g-got it. I’ll do my best!
entry.value: E-entendío. ¡Daré lo mehôh de mí!

entry.key: NotYetOk, I'll wait until you're ready.
entry.value: Mu bien, êpperaré a que te preparê.

entry.key: FarewellI learned a lot, by the end of everything.
entry.value: Aprendí muxo ar finâh de tó.

entry.key: FarewellThe past is past, now, but that’s... you know, that’s okay! It’s never really gone completely. The future is always built on the past, even if we won't get to see it.
entry.value: Er paçao êh er paçao aora, pero... ya çabê, ¡êttá bien! Nunca çe ba por completo. Er futuro çiempre çe côttruye çobre er paçao, aun çi no yegamô a bêl-lo.

entry.key: FarewellStill, it’s, um, time for something new, now.
entry.value: Pero creo que, e... ya êh ora de argo nuebo.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersHypothesis: Everyone must be here before we can begin.
entry.value: Ipóteçî: Tôh deben êttâh aquí pa que podamô començâh.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersOnce they arrive, I believe we’ll be ready for the next step.
entry.value: Una bêh que yegen, creo que podremô adentrânnô en er próççimo paço.

entry.key: WaitingForOthersI’m glad you remembered me.
entry.value: Me alegra que me recuerdê.

entry.key: ReadyToPlayA conscious observer has entered the Eye. I wonder what happens now.
entry.value: Un ôççerbadôh côççiente a entrao en el Oho. Me pregunto qué çuçede aora.

entry.key: ReadyToPlayIs it time to find out?
entry.value: ¿Êh ora de aberiguâl-lo?

entry.key: SolanumReadyToPlayYes.
entry.value: Çí.

entry.key: SolanumReadyToPlayNot yet.
entry.value: Todabía no.

entry.key: StartPlayingThis song is new to me, but I am honored to be a part of it.
entry.value: Êtta cançión êh nueba pa mí, pero me onra formâh parte de eya.

entry.key: NotYetThen I will wait until you are ready to know the answer.
entry.value: Entonçê, êpperaré âtta que te çientâ en condiçionê de conoçêh la rêppuêtta.

entry.key: FarewellI believe we’ve reached the end of our journey.
entry.value: Creo que yegamô ar finâh de nuêttro recorrío.

entry.key: FarewellAll that remains is to collapse the innumerable possibilites before us.
entry.value: Tó lo que rêtta êh colâççâh lâ incontablê poçibilidadê que tenemô frente a noçotrô.

entry.key: FarewellAre you ready to learn what comes next?
entry.value: ¿Quierê çabêh qué bendrá a continuaçión?

entry.key: SolanumFarewellYes.
entry.value: Çí.

entry.key: SolanumFarewellNot yet.
entry.value: Todabía no.

entry.key: Farewell2I admire your curiosity, friend. Let’s find out together.
entry.value: Âmmiro tu curioçidá, camará. Bûqquemô la rêppuêtta en compañía.

entry.key: Farewell3It’s tempting to linger in this moment, while every possibility still exists.
entry.value: Êh tentadôh aferrarçe a êtte momento, mientrâ todabía êççîttan toâ lâ poçibilidadê.

entry.key: Farewell3But unless they are collapsed by an observer, they will never be more than possibilities.
entry.value: Pero, a menô que un ôççerbadôh lâ colâççe, nunca çerán mâh que eço: poçibilidadê.

entry.key: SignI saw smoke coming from Youngbark Crater up north and figured I should go check it out. You can use the scout launcher, just please don’t break it while I’m gone – Tektite
entry.value: Bi umo çalîh der Crátê Corteçahoben ar norte, açí que fui a bêh qué paça. Pueden uçâh er lançaêpploradorê, pero no lo rompan mientrâ no êttoy, por fabôh. —Têttita

entry.key: SignBig thanks to these additional founding members of Outer Wilds Ventures, without whom we would never have gotten off the ground:
entry.value: Bîh tanks to teçe âdditionâh founding members of Outer Wilds Ventures, witoûh wom we wourd nebêh abe gôtten off te ground:

entry.key: SignMatthew Steinhauer
entry.value: Mâttew Steinauêh

entry.key: SignBen Etherington
entry.value: Ben Eterington

entry.key: SignQwertyuiopThePie
entry.value: QwertyuiôTTePie

entry.value: Hordan Frîh

entry.value: Tom Cûmmings

entry.value: Çean "çarktemplâh" Farrey

entry.key: SignHere lies Isrever
entry.value: Ere liê Îrrebêh

entry.key: SignHere lies BinarySemaphore
entry.value: Ere liê BinaryÇemapore

entry.key: SignHere lies Sean 'Ariamaki' Riedinger
entry.value: Ere liê Çean 'Ariamaki' Riedinhêh

TranslationTableEntry.key: Village
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ardea

TranslationTableEntry.key: VillageThe one and only Hearthian village, as well as the main source of explosions on this planet.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La única y êccluçiba ardea lumbreana, que también êh la prinçipâh fuente de êpploçionê en êtte planeta.

TranslationTableEntry.key: VillageThe Nomai statue in the observatory opened its eyes and looked at me! I saw strange glowing lights and my own memories flashed before my eyes.
TranslationTableEntry.value: ¡La êttatua nomai del ôççerbatorio abrió lô ohô y me miró! Bi unâ luçê êttrañâ y briyantê, y mî propiô recuerdô çe me apareçieron ante lô ohô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: VillageHal says the statue has never opened its eyes before (despite Hornfels' best efforts).
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ali diçe que la êttatua nunca abía abierto lô ohô (peçe a tôh lô êffuerçô de Cônné).

TranslationTableEntry.key: Zero-G Cave
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cueba de grabedá çero

TranslationTableEntry.key: Zero-G CaveI hear Gossan has the zero-g cave set up if I want a refresher before I launch.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Oí que Gôççan tiene la cueba de grabedá çero lîtta por çi quiero repaçâh antê der lançamiento.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Zero-G CaveA cave at the very center of Timber Hearth used by Outer Wilds Ventures to train new astronauts.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una cueba que çe encuentra en er mîmmíçimo çentro der Lumbre. Outer Wilds Ventures la uça pa capaçitâh a lô âttronautâ nuebô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Zero-G CaveI successfully repaired another "satellite" for Gossan.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Pude reparâh otro «çatélite» a pedío de Gôççan.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Dark Bramble Seed
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çemiya de Êppinôccuro

TranslationTableEntry.key: Harmonica Signal
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çeñâh de armónica

TranslationTableEntry.key: Dark Bramble SeedEsker's signalscope log reports harmonica music coming from somewhere on Timber Hearth. They claim it sounds just like Feldspar's harmonica, but Feldspar disappeared in space ages ago.
TranslationTableEntry.value: El rehîttro der çeñalôccopio de Êkke indica una múçica de armónica que probiene de arguna parte de Lumbre. Diçe que çuena como la armónica de Ferdêppato, pero Ferdêppato deçapareçió en el êppaçio açe muxíçimo.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Dark Bramble SeedA seed from Dark Bramble crashed here and has already taken root. Tektite wants to use a scout launcher to get a look at what's inside.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una çemiya de Êppinôccuro çe êttreyó aquí y ya exó raíçê. Têttita quiere uçâh un lançaêpploradorê pa bêh qué ay dentro.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Dark Bramble SeedMy signalscope picks up harmonica music when I aim it at the seed.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cuando apunto er çeñalôccopio a la çemiya, detêtto múçica de armónica.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Dark Bramble SeedI launched my Little Scout into the seed. Somehow the seed is much bigger on the inside.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lançé mi Miniêpploradôh adentro de la çemiya. No çé cómo, pero la çemiya êh muxo mâh grande por dentro.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Nomai Mines
TranslationTableEntry.value: Minâ nomai

TranslationTableEntry.key: Nomai MinesThe Nomai were mining ore somewhere on Timber Hearth.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai êttraían mineralê de arguna parte de Lumbre.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Nomai MinesThe Nomai mined ore from this site to craft a protective shell designed to physically seal off the central chamber inside Ash Twin.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai êttraían mineralê de êtte çitio pa fabricâh una carcaça protêttora a finê de çeyâh fíçicamente la cámara çentrâh en el interiôh de Hemelo Çeniça.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Nomai MinesOnce the shell was finished, the Nomai checked to ensure there were no longer any physical entrances or cracks.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una bêh que completaron la carcaça, lô nomai berificaron que no ubiera grietâ ni entrâh fíçicâ.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Nomai MinesThe Nomai discovered a species of four-eyed, semi-aquatic lifeforms in the waterways near the mine.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai dêccubrieron una forma de bida çemiacuática y de cuatro ohô en lô canalê çercanô a la mina.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum Grove
TranslationTableEntry.value: Bôqque cuántico

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum Signal
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çeñâh cuántica

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum GroveChert detected a strange signal coming from the crater at Timber Hearth's south pole. It's very similar to the signal emitted by the Quantum Moon.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Xert detêttó una çeñâh êttraña que probiene der crátê que ay en er polo çûh de Lumbre. Êh mu çimilâh a la çeñâh que emite la Luna Cuántica.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum GroveThe Nomai detected a quantum signal coming from somewhere on Timber Hearth.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai detêttaron una çeñâh cuántica que probenía de arguna parte de Lumbre.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum GroveThere is a strange rock shard in this grove that moves when I’m not watching. It emits a signal on the Quantum Fluctuations frequency.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ay un êttraño frâmmento de roca en êtte bôqque, que çe muebe cuando no lo ôççerbo. Emite una çeñâh en la frecuençia de flûttuaçionê cuánticâ.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum GroveI found a poem written on one of the trees in the grove.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un poema êccrito en uno de lô árbolê der bôqque.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Radio Tower
TranslationTableEntry.value: Torre de Radio

TranslationTableEntry.key: Radio TowerA radio tower designed to receive photos taken by the deep space satellite. There are several photos of the entire solar system hanging on the walls. Hornfels noticed something strange in one of the photos, but concluded equipment malfunction was the only sensible explanation.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una torre de radio que çe diçeñó pa reçibîh fotô tomâh por er çatélite del êppaçio profundo. Ay bariâ fotô der çîttema çolâh entero corgâh en lâ paredê. Cônné çe percató de argo êttraño en lâ fotô, pero concluyó que la única êpplicaçión lóhica era una faya del equipo.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Riebeck’s Camp
TranslationTableEntry.value: Campamento de Riebeck

TranslationTableEntry.key: Riebeck
TranslationTableEntry.value: Riebeck

TranslationTableEntry.key: Riebeck’s CampRiebeck headed to Brittle Hollow to investigate something the Nomai were doing at the south pole.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Riebeck emprendió camino açia Ondoná Fráhî pa imbêttigâh argo que lô nomai êttaban açiendo en er polo çûh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Riebeck’s CampRiebeck landed their ship near the big dome at the south pole. The door leading inside was broken, so they decided to head north to the ruins on the equator in search of a way beneath the surface.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Riebeck aterriçó con çu âttronabe çerca der gran domo en er polo çûh. La puerta que conduçía açia el interiôh êttaba rota, açí que deçidió dirihirçe açia er norte, a lâ ruinâ del ecuadôh, pa intentâh adentrarçe debaho de la çuperfiçie.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Riebeck’s CampRiebeck discovered an old Nomai path near their campsite on the equator. The path starts inside the ruined building with trees growing out of it.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Riebeck dêccubrió un antiguo camino nomai çerca de çu campamento en el ecuadôh. Er camino comiença en el interiôh del edifiçio en ruinâ en donde creçen árbolê.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Riebeck’s CampRiebeck reached the Crossroads and continued downward in search of oxygen.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Riebeck yegó ar Cruçe y continuó dêççendiendo en bûcca de ôççíheno.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Riebeck’s CampRiebeck has set up camp at the bottom of the Crossroads. Their excitement at being surrounded by so much Nomai history is matched only by their terror of the black hole.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Riebeck êttableçió çu campamento en la parte baha der Cruçe. La emoçión que çentía por êttâh en un entônno rodeao de tanta îttoria nomai çolo podía equipararçe con er terrôh que çentía por el aguhero negro.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Riebeck’s CampRiebeck is Timber Hearth's only archaeologist. They overcame their fear of space to explore Brittle Hollow's treasure trove of Nomai culture.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La única perçona encargá de la arqueolohía en Lumbre êh Riebeck. Çuperó er miedo que le produçía abenturarçe al êppaçio êtteriôh pa êpplorâh er teçoro curturâh nomai que arberga Ondoná Fráhî.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Gravity Cannon
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cañón grabitatorio

TranslationTableEntry.key: Gravity CannonA huge cylindrical structure that generates a strong upward gravity field.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una êttrûttura çilíndrica enorme que henera un fuerte campo grabitatorio âççendente.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Gravity CannonI recalled a Nomai shuttle from the Quantum Moon.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Eboqué un trâbbordadôh nomai de la Luna Cuántica.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tower of Quantum Knowledge
TranslationTableEntry.value: Torre der Conoçimiento Cuántico

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tower of Quantum KnowledgeThis tower (located on Brittle Hollow's equator) held useful knowledge for Nomai embarking on their first pilgrimage to the Quantum Moon.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êtta torre (ubicá en el ecuadôh de Ondoná Fráhî) contenía informaçión útî çobre er primêh peregrinahe de lô nomai a la Luna Cuántica.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tower of Quantum KnowledgeA Nomai named Solanum was told to visit the Tower of Quantum Knowledge (on Brittle Hollow's equator) to learn one final rule before embarking on her pilgrimage to the Quantum Moon.
TranslationTableEntry.value: A una nomai yamá Çolanum le diheron que biçitara la Torre der Conoçimiento Cuántico (en el ecuadôh de Ondoná Fráhî) pa que conoçiera una úrtima regla antê de embarcarçe en er peregrinahe a la Luna Cuántica.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tower of Quantum KnowledgeThe Nomai built a shrine on the Quantum Moon to aid in the pilgrimage to its sixth location. "Remember this final rule: To explore the sixth location, the shrine must be on the moon’s north pole."
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai côttruyeron un çantuario en la Luna Cuántica pa brindâh ayuda durante er peregrinahe a çu çêtta ubicaçión. «Recuerda êtta regla finâh: Pa êpplorâh la çêtta ubicaçión, er çantuario debe êttâh en er polo norte de la luna».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tower of Quantum KnowledgeThe pilgrimage to the Quantum Moon was a deeply significant journey for the Nomai.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er peregrinahe a la Luna Cuántica fue un biahe çumamente importante pa lô nomai.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tower of Quantum KnowledgeAfter the two groups of Nomai stranded on Ember Twin and Brittle Hollow were reunited, it became their united goal to find and visit the Quantum Moon.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dêppuêh de que lô dôh grupô de nomai baráô en Hemelo Braça y Ondoná Fráhî çe reunieran, acordaron como ôhhetibo conhunto encontrâh la Luna Cuántica y biçitâl-la.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum Shard
TranslationTableEntry.value: Frâmmento cuántico

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum ShardThe Nomai noticed a strange rock shard that appeared to wander when no one was watching.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai detêttaron un êttraño frâmmento de roca que pareçía deambulâh cuando nadie lo ôççerbaba.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum ShardA strange rock shard that wanders when no one is watching. The Nomai determined this shard is the reason objects in this grove behave in a quantum manner.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un êttraño frâmmento de roca que deambula cuando nadie lo ôççerba. Lô nomai determinaron que er frâmmento êh la raçón por la que lô ôhhetô der bôqque çe comportan de manera cuántica.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum ShardThe Nomai hypothesized that this shard is actually a piece of the Quantum Moon.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çegún la ipóteçî de lô nomai, êtte frâmmento êh, en realidá, un troço de la Luna Cuántica.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum ShardThis shard emits the same signal as the Quantum Moon.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êtte frâmmento emite la mîmma çeñâh que la Luna Cuántica.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Northern Glacier
TranslationTableEntry.value: Glaçiâh çêtten$$trionâh

TranslationTableEntry.key: Northern GlacierThe north pole of Brittle Hollow is covered in snow and ice. There is a uniquely shaped Nomai ruin on the surface.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er polo norte de Ondoná Fráhî êttá cubierto de niebe y ielo. En la çuperfiçie, çe encuentra una ruina nomai con una forma única.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Northern GlacierThe Nomai were able to warp here from the White Hole Station. This is where they first recreated warp technology.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai fueron capaçê de uçâh la dîttorçión pa yegâh âtta aquí dêdde la Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco. Fue ayí donde recrearon por primera bêh la tênnolohía de dîttorçión.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod 1
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cáççula de êccape 1.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod 1One of the three Nomai escape pods landed somewhere on Brittle Hollow.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una de lâ trêh cáççulâ de êccape nomai aterriçó en argún lugâh de Ondoná Fráhî.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod 1One of three Nomai escape pods that crashed in our solar system.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una de lâ trêh cáççulâ de êccape nomai que çe êttreyaron en nuêttro çîttema çolâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod 1All three escape pods were launched from something called the Vessel, which was badly damaged.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lâ trêh cáççulâ de êccape çe lançaron dêdde argo yamao la Nabe, que terminó çeriamente dañá.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Old Settlement
TranslationTableEntry.value: Antiguo açentamiento

TranslationTableEntry.key: Shelter Site
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çitio del refuhio

TranslationTableEntry.key: Old SettlementThe Nomai survivors who crashed on Brittle Hollow climbed down the cliff to a shelter site below the surface.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô çuperbibientê nomai que çe êttreyaron en Ondoná Fráhî baharon del acantilao y yegaron a un refuhio debaho de la çuperfiçie.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Old SettlementThe Nomai constructed a temporary settlement beneath their crashed escape pod.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai côttruyeron un açentamiento temporâh debaho de la cáççula de êccape êttreyá.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Old SettlementThe Nomai worked together to recall an eye-shaped signal they encountered while aboard the Vessel.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai trabaharon huntô pa recordâh la çeñâh con forma de oho con la que çe abían topao mientrâ êttaban en la Nabe.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Old SettlementThe signal was somehow older than the universe itself. The Nomai decided to call it the "Eye of the universe."
TranslationTableEntry.value: La çeñâh era mâh antigua que er mîmmíçimo uniberço. Y lô nomai deçidieron yamâl-la el «Oho del uniberço».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Old SettlementThe Nomai abandoned this settlement over growing concerns about its stability.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai abandonaron çu açentamiento porque temían que no fuera êttable.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Mural (Panel 3)
TranslationTableEntry.value: Murâh (panêh 3)

TranslationTableEntry.key: Mural (Panel 3)A mural of three escape pods evacuating the Nomai vessel.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un murâh de trêh cáççulâ de êccape cuando ebacúan la nabe nomai.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Mural (Panel 2)
TranslationTableEntry.value: Murâh (panêh 2)

TranslationTableEntry.key: Mural (Panel 2)A mural of Dark Bramble ensnaring the Nomai vessel.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un murâh de Êppinôccuro cuando atrapa la nabe nomai.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Mural (Panel 1)
TranslationTableEntry.value: Murâh (panêh 1)

TranslationTableEntry.key: Mural (Panel 1)A mural of a Nomai vessel encountering a signal.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un murâh de una nabe nomai cuando encuentra una çeñâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Hanging City
TranslationTableEntry.value: La Çiudá Çûppendida

TranslationTableEntry.key: Northern Settlement
TranslationTableEntry.value: Açentamiento çêtten$$trionâh

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Hanging CityThe Nomai decided to migrate from the Old Settlement to the northern glacier. They used gravity crystals to craft a stable path beneath the surface.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai deçidieron migrâh del antiguo açentamiento açia er glaçiâh çêttentrionâh. Utiliçaron crîttalê grabitatoriô pa logrâh un camino êttable debaho de la çuperfiçie.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Hanging CityThere's a huge Nomai city just to the north of Riebeck's campsite.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ay una enorme çiudá nomai hûtto ar norte der campamento de Riebeck.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Hanging CityA Nomai city suspended beneath Brittle Hollow's northern glacier. The city is divided vertically into four districts.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una çiudá nomai çûppendida debaho der glaçiâh çêttentrionâh de Ondoná Fráhî. La çiudá çe dibide, en forma berticâh, en cuatro dîttritô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Hanging CityI found a switch in the Meltwater District that raises and lowers the Black Hole Forge.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un interrûttôh en er Dîttrito Aguaniebe con er que çe puede çubîh y bahâh la Forha del Aguhero Negro.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Hanging CityThe Nomai debated how to obtain the powerful, highly advanced warp core required for the Ash Twin Project.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai debatieron cómo podían ôttenêh er potente y mu abançao núcleo de dîttorçión, neçeçario pa er Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça».

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Hanging CityThe Nomai traveled to this solar system in pursuit of a signal from something older than the universe itself. They named the source of this signal the "Eye of the universe."
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai biaharon a êtte çîttema çolâh en bûcca de una çeñâh que tenía çu orihen en argo mâh antiguo que er mîmmíçimo uniberço. A la fuente de êtta çeñâh la yamaron el «Oho del uniberço».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Black Hole Forge
TranslationTableEntry.value: Forha del Aguhero Negro

TranslationTableEntry.key: Black Hole ForgeThe Black Hole Forge is suspended below the Hanging City. I found a switch in the Meltwater District that raises and lowers the forge.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La Forha del Aguhero Negro çe encuentra corgá debaho de la Çiudá Çûppendida. Encontré un interrûttôh en er Dîttrito Aguaniebe con er que çe puede çubîh y bahâh la Forha.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Black Hole ForgeThe Black Hole Forge District is the highest district in the Hanging City.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er Dîttrito Forha del Aguhero Negro êh er mâh arto de la Çiudá Çûppendida.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Black Hole ForgeA Nomai named Poke planned to create a new advanced warp core in the Black Hole Forge.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una nomai yamá Poke planeaba creâh un núcleo de dîttorçión abançao en la Forha del Aguhero Negro.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Black Hole ForgeThe Nomai crafted warp cores at the Black Hole Forge before delivering them to Ash Twin.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai crearon núcleô de dîttorçión en la Forha del Aguhero Negro antê de entregâl-lô en Hemelo Çeniça.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Black Hole ForgeA warp tower's alignment point is not its warp receiver. Rather, a warp tower always aligns with the center of its corresponding astral body.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er punto de alineaçión de una torre de dîttorçión no êh çu reçêttôh de dîttorçión. En realidá, una torre de dîttorçión çiempre êttá alineá con er çentro de çu cuerpo âttrâh corrêppondiente.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Black Hole ForgeThe warp receiver must be located on (or in close orbit around) the relevant astral body.
TranslationTableEntry.value: El reçêttôh de dîttorçión debe êttâh ubicao en er cuerpo âttrâh corrêppondiente o, ar menô, en çu órbita.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Black Hole ForgeThe Hourglass Twins are so close together they function as a single astral body, with a shared alignment point in between them.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô Hemelô Relôh de Arena êttán tan çerca uno del otro que funçionan como un çolo cuerpo âttrâh con un mîmmo punto de alineaçión en medio.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Black Hole ForgeAll of the warp towers were being constructed on Ash Twin, while the six warp receivers were being constructed at different locations.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Toâ lâ torrê de dîttorçión çe êttaban côttruyendo en Hemelo Çeniça, mientrâ que lô çeî reçêttorê de dîttorçión çe êttaban côttruyendo en dîttintâ ubicaçionê.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Black Hole ForgeA Nomai named Poke successfully forged an advanced warp core for the Ash Twin Project.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una nomai yamá Poke forhó con éççito un núcleo de dîttorçión abançao pa er Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Alignment Angle Diagram
TranslationTableEntry.value: Diagrama del ángulo de alineaçión

TranslationTableEntry.key: Alignment Angle DiagramA diagram depicting the alignment angle between a warp tower and its corresponding astral body.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un plano que muêttra el ángulo de alineaçión entre una torre de dîttorçión y çu cuerpo âttrâh corrêppondiente.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Alignment Angle DiagramWarp tower alignment angles are not exact. They only need to be within five degrees of the astral body's center.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô ángulô de alineaçión de lâ torrê de dîttorçión no çon êççâttô. Deben êttâh dentro de lô çinco gráô der çentro der cuerpo âttrâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Alignment Angle DiagramThis results in slightly longer warp windows that last roughly several seconds.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êtto nô da bentanâ de dîttorçión un poco mâh largâ, que deberían durâh unô cuantô çegundô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Alignment Angle DiagramAnyone stepping onto the warp platform during the active window will be immediately warped.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Quien piçe la plataforma de dîttorçión mientrâ la bentana de dîttorçión êtté âttiba çerá trâpportao de îmmediato.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Southern Observatory
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ôççerbatorio Çûh

TranslationTableEntry.key: Southern ObservatoryThe Nomai decided to build a larger, more sophisticated Eye signal locator on Brittle Hollow's south pole.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai deçidieron côttruîh un localiçadôh de çeñâh del Oho mâh çofîtticao en er polo çûh de Ondoná Fráhî.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Southern ObservatoryThere are two paths beneath Brittle Hollow's surface that lead to the observatory. One starts at the gravity cannon, and the other starts at the Tower of Quantum Knowledge.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êççîtten dôh çenderô debaho de la çuperfiçie de Ondoná Fráhî que conduçen al ôççerbatorio. Uno comiença en er cañón grabitatorio, y el otro en la Torre der Conoçimiento Cuántico.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Southern ObservatoryRiebeck says you can't get into the observatory from the surface (they tried), but there's probably a path to it beneath the crust somewhere.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Riebeck diçe que no êh poçible ingreçâh al ôççerbatorio dêdde la çuperfiçie (lo intentó), pero poçiblemente êççîtta una entrá debaho de la corteça.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Southern ObservatoryThere's a door to the observatory on the surface, but it's broken.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ay una puerta al ôççerbatorio en la çuperfiçie, pero êttá rota.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Southern ObservatoryThe new, more sensitive locator the Nomai built in this observatory was unable to detect any trace of the Eye's signal.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er nuebo localiçadôh mâh çençible que lô nomai côttruyeron en êtte ôççerbatorio no fue capâh de detêttâh ningún râttro de la çeñâh del Oho.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Southern ObservatoryBased on their knowledge of the Quantum Moon, the Nomai believed the Eye was in a distant orbit around the sun.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Baçándoçe en er conoçimiento que tenían çobre la Luna Cuántica, lô nomai creían que el Oho orbitaba a gran dîttançia arrededôh der Çôh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Southern ObservatoryThe Nomai decided to stop searching for the Eye's signal and instead look for it visually by sending out a deep space probe.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai deçidieron dehâh de bûccâh la çeñâh del Oho y, en çu lugâh, embiâh una çonda êppaçiâh pa intentâh ubicâl-lo de manera biçuâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Southern ObservatoryThere were concerns that the probability of launching a probe in the correct direction would be absurdly small.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lê preocupaba que lâ probabilidadê de lançâh una çonda en la dirêççión corrêtta fueran âççurdamente bahâ.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tornado Simulation
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çimulaçión de tônnao

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ocean Current Discovery
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dêccubri$$miento de corriente oçeánica

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tornado SimulationThe Nomai at the Southern Observatory constructed a model of Giant's Deep that revealed how an object might sink below the strong ocean current.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai côttruyeron un modelo de Abîmmo der Higante en el Ôççerbatorio Çûh, que demôttró cómo puede undirçe un ôhheto en la fuerte corriente oçeánica.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tornado SimulationMost cyclones on Giant's Deep rotate clockwise. These are the cyclones the Nomai used to send components into orbit.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Caçi tôh lô çiclonê de Abîmmo der Higante hiran en çentío orario. Êttô çon lô çiclonê que lô nomai uçaron pa ponêh componentê en órbita.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tornado SimulationThere also exists a rarer type of cyclone that spins the opposite direction and pushes objects beneath the waters and below the current.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Pero también ay otro tipo de çiclonê, mâh rarô, que hiran en la dirêççión contraria y arrâttran lô ôhhetô debaho de lâ aguâ y de la corriente.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Feldspar’s Camp
TranslationTableEntry.value: Campamento de Ferdêppato

TranslationTableEntry.key: Feldspar
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ferdêppato

TranslationTableEntry.key: Feldspar’s CampFeldspar headed off to Dark Bramble after reaching the core of Giant's Deep.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ferdêppato çe dirihió a Êppinôccuro trâ yegâh ar núcleo de Abîmmo der Higante.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Inside the Seed
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dentro de la çemiya

TranslationTableEntry.key: Feldspar’s CampWhen I launch my scout into the seed that crashed on Timber Hearth, it ends up in a much bigger space filled with fog and thorny vines.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cuando lanço mi êpploradôh açia la çemiya que çe êttreyó en Lumbre, acaba en un êppaçio muxo mâh grande repleto de niebla y iedrâ êppinoçâ.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Feldspar’s CampFeldspar is alive! They crashed their ship and is now camping inside a huge anglerfish skeleton.
TranslationTableEntry.value: ¡Ferdêppato bibe! Çe êttreyó con çu âttronabe y aora êttá acampando dentro del êqqueleto de un rape enorme.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Feldspar’s CampFeldspar doesn't think my scout tracker is wrong when it says my scout is in two places at once. They have a theory that space doesn’t work the same inside Dark Bramble.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çegún Ferdêppato, no êh incorrêtto que el râttreadôh indique que mi êpploradôh êttá en dôh lugarê a la bêh. Tiene la ipóteçî de que el êppaçio no funçiona der mîmmo modo dentro de Êppinôccuro.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Feldspar’s CampFeldspar doesn't sound overly eager to return to civilization. They've been enjoying the (relative) peace and quiet.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ferdêppato no pareçe tenêh muxâ ganâ de regreçâh a la çibiliçaçión. Êttá dîffrutando de la pâh y la tranquilidá (relatibâ) der lugâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Frozen Jellyfish
TranslationTableEntry.value: Meduça conhelá

TranslationTableEntry.key: Hollow Vine
TranslationTableEntry.value: Iedra gueca

TranslationTableEntry.key: Frozen JellyfishFeldspar hinted that a secret to reaching the core of Giant's Deep lies at the end of the hollow vine they crashed their ship into. To find Feldspar's ship, I'll want to go to the tail end of the anglerfish skeleton and look for a flickering light in the fog.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ferdêppato inçinuó que er çecreto pa yegâh ar núcleo de Abîmmo der Higante yaçe ar finâh de la iedra gueca contra la que êttreyó çu âttronabe. Pa encontrâh la âttronabe de Ferdêppato, debo îh al êttremo de la cola del êqqueleto de rape y bûccâh una lûh que parpadee entre la niebla.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Frozen JellyfishFeldspar documented their attempts to eat this enormous jellyfish frozen in the ice. The outside was all rubbery and tough, possibly because it insulates the jellyfish’s insides from getting zapped by electricity.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ferdêppato documentó çû intentô de comerçe una meduça enorme que quedó atrapá entre el ielo. El êtteriôh era gomoço y duro, çin dudâ porque aíl-la lâ entrañâ de la meduça pa que no reçiban elêttriçidá.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Frozen JellyfishFeldspar decided to venture into the jellyfish’s interior cavity to see if it tasted any better on the inside.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ferdêppato deçidió abenturarçe en la cabidá interiôh de la meduça pa bêh çi çabía mehôh dêdde dentro.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Frozen JellyfishAfter tasting the inside of the jellyfish, Feldspar concluded that these jellyfish are only useful for insulation from electricity.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dêppuêh de probâh el interiôh de la meduça, Ferdêppato concluyó que êttô bixehô çolo çirben como aîl-lantê de elêttriçidá.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod 3
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cáççula de êccape

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod 3One of the three Nomai escape pods never made it out of Dark Bramble.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una de lâ trêh cáççulâ de êccape nomai nunca çalió de Êppinôccuro.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod 3One of three Nomai escape pods that crashed in our solar system.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una de lâ trêh cáççulâ de êccape nomai que çe êttreyaron en nuêttro çîttema çolâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod 3All three escape pods were launched from something called the Vessel, which was badly damaged.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lâ trêh cáççulâ de êccape çe lançaron dêdde argo yamao la Nabe, que terminó çeriamente dañá.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod 3The survivors from Escape Pod 3 detected two distinct beacons from the Vessel, as if it was in two locations at once.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô çuperbibientê de la cáççula de êccape 3 detêttaron dôh baliçâ de la Nabe, como çi êttubiera en dôh lugarê a la bêh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Nomai Grave
TranslationTableEntry.value: Tumba nomai

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod 3 Survivors
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çuperbibientê de la cáççula de êccape 3

TranslationTableEntry.key: Nomai GraveThe survivors from Escape Pod 3 abandoned the wreckage and attempted to return to the Vessel.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô çuperbibientê de la cáççula de êccape 3 abandonaron er çitio de la coliçión e intentaron regreçâh a la Nabe.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Nomai GraveThe survivors decided to follow the closer of the two Vessel beacons due to their limited air supply. They planned to leave a trail of lights behind them in case someone heard their distress signal.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô çuperbibientê deçidieron çegîh la baliça mâh çercana de la Nabe porque tenían un çuminîttro de aire limitao. Er plan era dehâh un râttro de luçê en caço de que argien êccuxara la çeñâh de aûççilio.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Nomai GraveThe survivors from Escape Pod 3 followed one of the two Vessel beacons to a small Dark Bramble seed, where they could go no further.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô çuperbibientê de la cáççula de êccape 3 çigieron una de lâ dôh baliçâ de la Nabe âtta una pequeña çemiya de Êppinôccuro, y ya no pudieron continuâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Nomai GraveThe Nomai could faintly hear the Vessel's beacon from within the seed, but the opening was too small for a single Nomai to fit through, much less an escape pod.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai apenâ oían la baliça dêdde dentro de la çemiya, pero la apertura era demaçiao pequeña como pa que paçara un nomai, y muxo menô una cáççula de êccape.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Nomai GraveThe Vessel's beacon was dying, and would soon be gone completely.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La baliça de la Nabe çe êttaba apagando. Pronto deçapareçería por completo.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Nomai GraveIf I launch my scout into the seed, I can take photos of an enormous derelict Nomai ship.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çi lanço mi êpploradôh adentro de la çemiya, puedo fotografiâh una âttronabe nomai enorme y en ruinâ.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Vessel
TranslationTableEntry.value: La Nabe

TranslationTableEntry.key: The VesselThe Nomai warped to this solar system in a spaceship called the Vessel. They were attempting to follow a signal from the Eye of the universe.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai uçaron la dîttorçión pa yegâh a êtte çîttema çolâh en un beículo yamao la Nabe. Intentaban çegîh una çeñâh del Oho del uniberço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The VesselThe Vessel crashed somewhere in Dark Bramble.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La Nabe çe êttreyó en argún lugâh de Êppinôccuro.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The VesselThe Vessel's warp core broke when the ship crashed in Dark Bramble.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er núcleo de dîttorçión de la Nabe çe aberió durante la coliçión en Êppinôccuro.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The VesselI launched my scout into the seed at the Nomai Grave and took photos of an enormous derelict Nomai ship.
TranslationTableEntry.value: En la tumba de lô nomai, lançé mi êpploradôh adentro de la çemiya y fotografié una âttronabe nomai enorme y en ruinâ.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The VesselI found the derelict Nomai Vessel deep within Dark Bramble.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré la Nabe nomai en ruinâ en lâ profundidadê de Êppinôccuro.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The VesselThe Vessel's warp core is long dead.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er núcleo de dîttorçión de la Nabe murió açe muxo tiempo.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The VesselI activated a three-sided pillar on the Vessel's bridge that appears to be some sort of input device.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Âttibé un pilâh de trêh láô en er puente de la Nabe, que pareçe çêh argún tipo de dîppoçitibo de entrá.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The VesselThe Nomai tried to call for help, but the Vessel's outgoing message system broke during the crash.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai intentaron pedîh ayuda, pero er çîttema de mençahê çalientê de la Nabe çe aberió en la coliçión.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The VesselThe Vessel can still hear incoming messages from other Nomai vessels. The remaining Nomai clans are regrouping in response to the impending death of the universe.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La Nabe aún puede êccuxâh mençahê entrantê de otrâ nabê nomai. Lô clanê nomai que quedan çe êttán reagrupando ante la îmminente muerte del uniberço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The VesselI found a recording of the original signal the Nomai encountered from the Eye of the universe. The Nomai were worried the signal might disappear, so they warped before they could tell another clan where they were going.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré una grabaçión de la çeñâh del Oho del uniberço que lô nomai detêttaron orihinarmente. Lô nomai temían que la çeñâh deçapareçiera, açí que uçaron la dîttorçión pa îh trâ eya antê de abiçâl-le a otro clan adónde çe dirihían.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Orbital Probe Cannon
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh

TranslationTableEntry.key: Orbital Probe CannonThe Nomai finished building the final module for the Orbital Probe Cannon and sent it into orbit around Giant’s Deep.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai terminaron de côttruîh el úrtimo módulo der Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh y lo puçieron en órbita arrededôh de Abîmmo der Higante.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Orbital Probe CannonI used a Nomai projection pool and saw the interior of a space station in orbit around Giant's Deep.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Uçé una arberca de proyêççión nomai y pude bêh el interiôh de una êttaçión êppaçiâh en órbita arrededôh de Abîmmo der Higante.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Orbital Probe CannonThe Nomai decided to construct a probe cannon in orbit around Giant’s Deep.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai deçidieron côttruîh un cañón de çondâ en la órbita de Abîmmo der Higante.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Orbital Flash
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dêtteyo orbitâh

TranslationTableEntry.key: Orbital Probe CannonGabbro sees a bright flash in the sky at the start of every loop. Something must be happening in orbit around Giant’s Deep.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Gabro be una lûh briyante en er çielo ar comienço de cá bucle. Argo debe êttâh paçando en la órbita de Abîmmo der Higante.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Orbital Probe CannonThe broken remains of a Nomai space station in orbit around Giant's Deep. There are three accessways branching off from the central hub area.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô rêttô de una êttaçión êppaçiâh nomai en la órbita de Abîmmo der Higante. Ay trêh bíâ de âççeço que çe ramifican dêdde el ehe çentrâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Orbital Probe CannonThe Orbital Probe Cannon was created to find the precise location of the Eye of the universe.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh çe creó pa encontrâh la ubicaçión preçiça del Oho del uniberço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Orbital Probe CannonThe Nomai pushed the Orbital Probe Cannon above its maximum power setting to create the greatest chance of finding the Eye of the universe.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai potençiaron er Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh mâh ayá de çu capaçidá máççima pa creâh la mehôh oportunidá de ayâh el Oho del uniberço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Probe Tracking Module
TranslationTableEntry.value: Módulo de Râttreo de Çondâ

TranslationTableEntry.key: Probe Tracking ModuleOne of the Orbital Probe Cannon’s three modules.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Uno de lô trêh módulô der Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Probe Tracking ModuleThe Probe Tracking Module is receiving data from the launched probe.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er Módulo de Râttreo de Çondâ êttá reçibiendo datô de la çonda lançá.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Probe Tracking ModuleAny Nomai aboard the Probe Tracking Module would be the first to see the coordinates of the Eye of the universe.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çi ay argún nomai a bordo der Módulo de Râttreo de Çondâ, çerá er primero en bêh lâ coordenâh del Oho del uniberço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Probe Tracking ModuleA Nomai computer reports the Probe Tracking Module as "missing."
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una computadora nomai informa que el êttao der Módulo de Râttreo de Çondâ êh «êttrabiao».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Probe Tracking ModuleI saw the Probe Tracking Module through a Nomai projection pool. It looks like the module is underwater. I could see purple electricity outside the viewport.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Bi er Módulo de Râttreo de Çondâ con una arberca de proyêççión nomai. Pareçe que er módulo çe encuentra çumerhío. Pude bêh elêttriçidá púrpura fuera de la portiya.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Probe Tracking ModuleThe Orbital Probe Cannon has launched millions of probes.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh lançó miyonê de çondâ.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Probe Tracking ModuleThe 9,318,054th probe located a deep space anomaly matching all known criteria for the Eye of the universe.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La çonda número 9 318 054 encontró una anomalía en el êppaçio profundo que coinçide con tôh lô criteriô conoçíô del Oho del uniberço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Probe Tracking ModuleThe statue in the Probe Tracking Module automatically records each probe's trajectory and transmits the data to the Ash Twin Project.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La êttatua der Módulo de Râttreo de Çondâ rehîttra de forma automática la trayêttoria de cá çonda y trâmmite la informaçión ar Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Probe Tracking ModuleI found Nomai coordinates marking the location of the Eye of the universe.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré coordenâh nomai que marcan la ubicaçión del Oho del uniberço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Launch Module
TranslationTableEntry.value: Módulo de Lançamiento

TranslationTableEntry.key: Launch ModuleOne of the Orbital Probe Cannon’s three modules.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Uno de lô trêh módulô der Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Launch ModuleThe Launch Module looks heavily damaged. There’s a huge breach in the glass viewport.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er Módulo de Lançamiento çufrió dañô mu importantê. Ay una rahadura enorme en la portiya.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Launch ModuleThe Launch Module's viewport window is fractured, exposing it to the vacuum of space.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Con la portiya frâtturá, er Módulo de Lançamiento queda êppuêtto ar baçío del êppaçio.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Launch ModuleThe Launch Module is badly damaged, but its projection pool is still intact.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er Módulo de Lançamiento çufrió dañô importantê, pero la arberca de proyêççión êttá intâtta.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Launch ModuleA Nomai named Mallow argued that it wouldn't matter if the cannon's structural integrity was compromised, since they only needed to fire the probe once.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una nomai de nombre Mâl-low çôttenía que no importaba çi la integridá êttrûtturâh der cañón êttaba comprometida, ya que la çonda çolo debía lançarçe una bêh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Launch ModuleA Nomai named Privet countered that they wouldn't be capable of receiving the probe's data if the Probe Tracking Module was destroyed.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una nomai de nombre Pribê argumentó que no podrían reçibîh informaçión de la çonda çi çe dêttruía er Módulo de Râttreo de Çondâ.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Control Module
TranslationTableEntry.value: Módulo de Contrôh

TranslationTableEntry.key: Control ModuleOne of the Orbital Probe Cannon’s three modules.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Uno de lô trêh módulô der Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Control ModuleThe Control Module (recently) received a request from the Ash Twin Project to launch the probe. The cannon was aligned with a randomly selected probe trajectory.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er Módulo de Contrôh reçibió una çoliçitûh reçiente der Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça» pa lançâh la çonda. Er cañón çe alineó con una trayêttoria de çonda çelêççioná al açâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Control ModuleThe probe was successfully launched, but the cannon's structural integrity was compromised in the process. Damage is detected in multiple modules.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er lançamiento de la çonda fue êççitoço, pero la integridá êttrûtturâh der cañón no çoportó er proçeço. Çe detêttaron dañô en bariô módulô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Stranger
TranslationTableEntry.value: er Forâttero

TranslationTableEntry.key: The StrangerA massive artificial ring world hidden within some sort of cloaking field. It does not appear to be Hearthian or Nomaian in origin.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un îmmenço mundo aniyo artifiçiâh ocurto en un campo de camuflahe. No pareçe çêh de orihen lumbreano ni nomai.

TranslationTableEntry.key: River Lowlands
TranslationTableEntry.value: Tierrâ Bahâ del Río

TranslationTableEntry.key: River LowlandsA low-lying region near the entrance to the Stranger. There are wooden buildings along the banks of the river.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una rehión baha, çercana a la entrá der Forâttero. A oriyâ del río, ay côttrûççionê de madera.

TranslationTableEntry.key: River LowlandsI found several ornate metal artifacts inside a workshop surrounded by ghost matter.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré bariô artefâttô metálicô decoráô en un tayêh rodeao de materia fantâmmâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Burned Slide Reel
TranslationTableEntry.value: Carrete de diapoçitibâ quemao

TranslationTableEntry.key: Burned Slide ReelA slide reel that shows the origin of the Stranger and its inhabitants.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un carrete de diapoçitibâ que muêttra el orihen der Forâttero y de çû abitantê.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Burned Slide ReelSeveral slides have been burned and cannot be viewed.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Muxâ diapoçitibâ çe an quemao y no çe pueden bêh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Slide Burning Room
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çala de quema de diapoçitibâ

TranslationTableEntry.key: Secret Location
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ubicaçión çecreta

TranslationTableEntry.key: Slide Burning RoomA map I found in the Abandoned Temple reveals a secret location somewhere within the Stranger.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un mapa que encontré en er Templo Abandonao rebela una ubicaçión çecreta en argún lugâh der Forâttero.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Slide Burning RoomA room full of burned slide reels piled next to a strange device.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una abitaçión repleta de carretê de diapoçitibâ quemáô y apiláô hunto a un êttraño dîppoçitibo.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Slide Burning RoomI found a hidden slide reel that shows a container marked with a glowing symbol being handed to a shadowy figure. The figure follows a procession of green lights through a forest to a candlelit building, where they carry the container into a secret passage behind a roaring fireplace.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ ocurto que muêttra un contenedôh marcao con un çímbolo luminoço que êttá çiendo entregao a una çilueta çombría. La çilueta çige una çuçeçión de luçê berdê a trabêh de un bôqque âtta yegâh a una côttrûççión iluminá con belâ. Ayí, yeba er contenedôh a un paçahe çecreto detrâh de una ximenea ardiente.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Cinder Isles
TranslationTableEntry.value: Îl-lâ Çeniça

TranslationTableEntry.key: Cinder IslesA pair of small rocky islands connected by a village of stilt houses.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dôh îl-lâ pequeñâ y rocoçâ conêttâh por una ardea de caçâ flotantê.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Cinder IslesI found a large metal symbol inside a burned-out building that closely resembles the Nomai symbol for the Eye of the universe.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un gran çímbolo metálico dentro de una côttrûççión quemá, que çe pareçe muxo ar çímbolo nomai del Oho del uniberço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Cinder IslesI found a large metal symbol for the Eye of the universe inside a burned-out building.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un gran çímbolo metálico del Oho del uniberço dentro de una côttrûççión quemá.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Burned Slide ReelA slide reel that shows the Stranger's inhabitants analyzing an anomaly that closely resembles the Nomai symbol for the Eye of the universe.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un carrete de diapoçitibâ que muêttra a lô abitantê der Forâttero analiçando una anomalía que çe pareçe muxo ar çímbolo nomai del Oho del uniberço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Burned Slide ReelA slide reel that shows the Stranger's inhabitants analyzing the Eye of the universe.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un carrete de diapoçitibâ que muêttra a lô abitantê der Forâttero analiçando el Oho del uniberço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Slide Burning RoomI found a hidden slide reel that shows a container marked with a glowing symbol being handed to a shadowy figure. The lights are extinguished, and the figure carries the container down into a dark well.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ ocurto que muêttra un contenedôh marcao con un çímbolo luminoço que êttá çiendo entregao a una çilueta çombría. Lâ luçê çe apagan, y la çilueta yeba er contenedôh açia un poço ôccuro.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Island Tower
TranslationTableEntry.value: Torre de la îl-la

TranslationTableEntry.key: Island Cave
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cueba de la îl-la

TranslationTableEntry.key: Island TowerI found a projection that reveals a cave entrance at the base of a rocky island with a tall tower.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré una proyêççión que rebela la entrá de una cueba ubicá en una îl-la rocoça con una gran torre.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Island TowerA tower that sits atop one of the Cinder Isles. The upper floors can only be reached from a second entrance at the back of the tower.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una torre que çe encuentra en la parte mâh arta de una de lâ Îl-lâ Çeniça. Çolo êh poçible âççedêh a lô piçô çuperiorê dêdde una çegunda entrá en la parte traçera de la torre.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Island TowerI found a slide reel that shows the Stranger's inhabitants opening a secret passage in a round room filled with lanterns and murals. The inhabitants are shown filing into three of these rooms throughout the Stranger.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ que muêttra a lô abitantê der Forâttero abriendo un paçahe çecreto en una abitaçión redonda yena de farolê y muralê. Çe be a lô abitantê entrando en fila a trêh de êttâ abitaçionê en tó er Forâttero.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Symbol Room
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çala de çímbolô

TranslationTableEntry.key: Hidden Vault Seals
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çeyô de bóbeda ocurta

TranslationTableEntry.key: Symbol RoomThe light coming out of the vault gave me a vision of climbing a spiral staircase to a room near the top of a tower. One of the Stranger's inhabitants pointed at a mural of an identical tower beneath a ringed planet, then picked up an artifact and carried it downstairs to a room with a green fire. Some time later, two of the lamps in the mural room turned off, plunging the mural into darkness and revealing a secret passage.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Graçiâ a la lûh que probenía de la bóbeda, pude bêh que çubían por una êccalera caracôh açia una abitaçión çercana a la çima de una torre. Uno de lô abitantê der Forâttero çeñaló un murâh de una torre idéntica baho un planeta aniyao, recohió un artefâtto y lo yebó êccalerâ abaho a una abitaçión con un fuego berde. Poco dêppuêh, dôh lámparâ de la abitaçión der murâh çe apagaron y en la ôccuridá rebelaron un paçahe çecreto.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Symbol RoomThe passage lead to three wooden containers, each marked with a glowing vault seal.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er paçahe conduçe a trêh contenedorê de madera, cá uno marcao con un çeyo de bóbeda briyante.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Symbol RoomA secret room filled with wooden containers marked with different symbols.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una abitaçión çecreta yena de contenedorê de madera marcáô con diferentê çímbolô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Symbol RoomThree of the containers are marked with glowing vault seals, but their contents have been burned away.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Trêh de lô contenedorê êttán marcáô con çeyô de bóbeda luminoçô, pero çu contenío çe a quemao.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Symbol RoomI opened the container marked with the symbol of a burning slide reel and found a vertical sequence of symbols inside.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Abrí er contenedôh marcao con er çímbolo de un carrete de diapoçitibâ quemao, y dentro de él encontré una çecuençia berticâh de çímbolô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Hidden Gorge
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dêffiladero Ocurto

TranslationTableEntry.key: Hidden GorgeA narrow gorge along the rightmost branch of the river. There are dwellings built into both cliff faces high above.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un êttrexo dêffiladero a lo largo der braço derexo del río. Ay bibiendâ côttruidâ en lo arto y a ambô láô del acantilao.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Slide Burning RoomI found a hidden slide reel that shows a container marked with a glowing symbol being handed to a shadowy figure. The lights are extinguished, and the figure carries the container into a secret passage behind a mural of a large tree.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ ocurto que muêttra un contenedôh marcao con un çímbolo luminoço que êttá çiendo entregao a una çilueta çombría. Lâ luçê çe apagan, y la çilueta yeba er contenedôh açia un paçahe çecreto detrâh de un murâh con un gran árbô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Burned Slide ReelA slide reel that shows the Stranger's inhabitants congregating around a strange green fire.
