TranslationTableEntry.value: Un carrete de diapoçitibâ que muêttra a lô abitantê der Forâttero congregándoçe arrededôh de un êttraño fuego berde.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Damaged Laboratory
TranslationTableEntry.value: Laboratorio dañao

TranslationTableEntry.key: Hull Breach
TranslationTableEntry.value: Rotura der câcco

TranslationTableEntry.key: Damaged LaboratoryI found a slide reel in the Hidden Gorge that shows an explosion blowing a hole in the side of the Stranger.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ en er Dêffiladero Ocurto que muêttra una êpploçión que abre un aguhero en er laterâh der Forâttero.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Damaged LaboratoryA laboratory with three test chambers. The second chamber is badly damaged and can be entered through a hull breach in the side of the Stranger.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un laboratorio con trêh cámarâ de pruebâ. La çegunda cámara êttá mu dañá, y çe puede ingreçâh ayí a trabêh de un câcco perforao en er laterâh der Forâttero.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Damaged LaboratoryI saw a vision-like recording of someone picking up an artifact and going to sleep in front of a green fire. The rest of the vision was distorted and difficult to make out, but a flame seemed to appear inside the artifact.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Bi una grabaçión de argien que recohía un artefâtto y çe acôttaba a dormîh frente a un fuego berde. El rêtto de la imahen êttaba dîttorçioná y reçurtaba difíçî entendêl-la, pero pareçía que abía una yama dentro del artefâtto.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Damaged LaboratoryI found a slide reel that shows three experiments conducted with three different artifacts. The third experiment appears to have been a success.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ que muêttra trêh êpperimentô realiçáô con trêh artefâttô diferentê. Er terçêh êpperimento pareçe abêh çido êççitoço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Abandoned Temple
TranslationTableEntry.value: Templo Abandonao

TranslationTableEntry.key: Cliffside Building
TranslationTableEntry.value: Côttrûççión del acantilao

TranslationTableEntry.key: Abandoned TempleI saw a building marked with a unique symbol recessed into one of the canyon walls, but the bridge that used to lead to it has rotted away.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Bi una côttrûççión marcá con un çímbolo único empotrao en una de lâ paredê der dêppeñadero, pero er puente que conduçía açia ayí êttá mu deteriorao.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Abandoned TempleAn abandoned temple marked with the symbol of a burning slide reel. It can be accessed from a passage in the Hidden Gorge.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un templo abandonao marcao con er çímbolo de un carrete de diapoçitibâ en yamâ. Çe puede âççedêh a él a trabêh de un paçahe en er Dêffiladero Ocurto.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Abandoned TempleThere is an interface upstairs that can be used to line up symbols in a vertical sequence.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Arriba, ay una interfâh que puede uçarçe pa alineâh çímbolô en una çecuençia berticâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Abandoned TempleEntering the correct sequence opens the path to a secret room beneath the temple.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Al ingreçâh la çecuençia corrêtta, çe abre un camino açia una abitaçión çecreta debaho der templo.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Abandoned TempleI found a slide reel that shows the Stranger's inhabitants removing all of the slide reels from their shelves, scanning each reel with a device, and incinerating specific slides as well as entire reels.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ que muêttra a lô abitantê der Forâttero quitando tôh lô carretê de lô êttantê, êccaneando cá carrete con un dîppoçitibo y quemando çiertâ diapoçitibâ o carretê completô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Map Projection 1
TranslationTableEntry.value: Proyêççión de mapa 1

TranslationTableEntry.key: Map Projection 1A projection that seems to reveal a secret location somewhere within the Stranger.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una proyêççión que pareçe rebelâh una ubicaçión çecreta en argún lugâh der Forâttero.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Map Projection 2
TranslationTableEntry.value: Proyêççión de mapa 2

TranslationTableEntry.key: Map Projection 2A projection that seems to reveal a secret location somewhere within the Stranger.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una proyêççión que pareçe rebelâh una ubicaçión çecreta en argún lugâh der Forâttero.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Map Projection 3
TranslationTableEntry.value: Proyêççión de mapa 3

TranslationTableEntry.key: Map Projection 3A projection that seems to reveal a secret location somewhere within the Stranger.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una proyêççión que pareçe rebelâh una ubicaçión çecreta en argún lugâh der Forâttero.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Reservoir
TranslationTableEntry.value: Repreça

TranslationTableEntry.key: ReservoirAn enormous reservoir with wooden piers and buildings on both shores.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una repreça higante con mueyê de madera y côttrûççionê en ambâ oriyâ.

TranslationTableEntry.key: ReservoirI found a room with a burned control interface and a projection that seems to indicate a broken connection between the Stranger and another craft.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré una abitaçión con una interfâh de contrôh quemá y una proyêççión que pareçe môttrâh una conêççión aberiá entre er Forâttero y otra âttronabe.

TranslationTableEntry.key: ReservoirI found a projection showing the Stranger's current trajectory and the sun's predicted supernova radius.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré una proyêççión que muêttra la trayêttoria âttuâh der Forâttero y el radio êttimao de la çupênnoba der çôh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Burned Slide ReelA slide reel that shows a strange vault being encased in a large metal structure and lowered underwater.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un carrete de diapoçitibâ que muêttra a una êttraña bóbeda dentro de una gran êttrûttura metálica, que çe êttá çumerhiendo en el agua.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Burned Slide ReelNearly all of the slides have been burned and cannot be viewed.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Caçi toâ lâ diapoçitibâ çe an quemao y no çe pueden bêh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Submerged Structure
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êttrûttura çumerhida

TranslationTableEntry.key: Submerged StructureAccording to a slide reel, a strange vault was encased in a large metal structure and lowered underwater.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çegún lo que muêttra un carrete de diapoçitibâ, çe colocó una êttraña bóbeda dentro de una gran êttrûttura metálica y çe çumerhió en el agua.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Hollow Structure
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êttrûttura gueca

TranslationTableEntry.key: Submerged StructureI found a diagram of a hollow metal structure suspended by chains. There is a round hole underneath that appears to be the only entrance.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un diagrama de una êttrûttura metálica gueca corgá con cadenâ. Debaho, çe be un aguhero redondo que pareçe çêh la única entrá.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Submerged StructureA large metal structure suspended by chains. It can be entered by swimming from below.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una gran êttrûttura metálica corgá con cadenâ. Çe puede entrâh nadando dêdde abaho.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Submerged StructureThere is a sealed vault illuminated by a green fire inside the structure.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dentro de la êttrûttura, ay una bóbeda çeyá, iluminá por un fuego berde.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Subterranean Lake
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lago çûtterráneo

TranslationTableEntry.key: Enclosed Fire
TranslationTableEntry.value: Fuego çerrao

TranslationTableEntry.key: Subterranean LakeI looked through a peephole in the side of a large metal structure suspended by chains. Inside is another green fire and a staircase leading farther below.
TranslationTableEntry.value: A trabêh de una miriya en er laterâh de una gran êttrûttura metálica corgá con cadenâ, pude bêh otro gran fuego berde ardiendo en çu interiôh y una êccalera que conduçía mâh abaho.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Subterranean LakeI looked through a peephole in the side of a large metal structure suspended by chains like the one in the Reservoir. Inside is another green fire and a staircase leading farther below.
TranslationTableEntry.value: A trabêh de una miriya en er laterâh de una gran êttrûttura metálica corgá con cadenâ como la de la repreça, pude bêh otro gran fuego berde ardiendo en çu interiôh y una êccalera que conduçía mâh abaho.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Vault Room Fire
TranslationTableEntry.value: Fuego de la abitaçión de la bóbeda

TranslationTableEntry.key: Subterranean LakeI saw a vision-like recording of two figures taking artifacts into a large metal structure suspended by chains and going to sleep at the green fire in front of the sealed vault. Upon waking up with lit artifacts, the two figures picked up the vault and carried it down a staircase to somewhere farther below.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Bi una grabaçión de dôh çiluetâ que yebaron artefâttô a una gran êttrûttura de metâh çûppendida de cadenâ y fueron a dormîh hunto ar fuego berde que êttaba frente a la cámara çeyá. Cuando dêppertaron con artefâttô ençendíô, lâ dôh çiluetâ arçaron la bóbeda y la baharon por unâ êccalerâ.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Subterranean LakeI saw a vision-like recording of two figures taking artifacts into the Reservoir's submerged structure and going to sleep at the green fire in front of the sealed vault. Upon waking up with lit artifacts, the two figures picked up the vault and carried it down a staircase to somewhere farther below.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Bi una grabaçión de dôh çiluetâ que yebaron artefâttô a la êttrûttura çumerhida de la repreça y fueron a dormîh hunto ar fuego berde que êttaba frente a la cámara çeyá. Cuando dêppertaron con artefâttô ençendíô, lâ dôh çiluetâ arçaron la bóbeda y la baharon por unâ êccalerâ.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Subterranean LakeI discovered a vast subterranean lake beneath the submerged structure. The sealed vault is resting on the shore of the lake. There are three interfaces, each marked with one of the three symbols from the vault.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dêccubrí un gran lago çûtterráneo debaho de la êttrûttura çumerhida. La bóbeda çeyá êttá ubicá en la oriya der lago. Ay trêh interfaçê, cá una marcá con uno de lô trêh çímbolô de la bóbeda.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Subterranean LakeI rotated the mechanism in front of the vault, causing it to strain against the chains holding it shut. Moments later rays of green light spilled out of the vault.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Içe hirâh er mecanîmmo en la parte de adelante de la bóbeda, y êtto heneró preçión çobre lâ cadenâ que la mantenían çerrá. Luego de un rato, çalieron rayô de lûh berde de la bóbeda.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sealed Vault
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cámara çeyá

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sealed VaultI found a strange vault wrapped in chains and marked with three glowing symbols.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré una êttraña bóbeda embuerta en cadenâ y marcá con trêh çímbolô luminoçô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sealed VaultA slide reel from the River Lowlands showed a strange vault being closed and sealed with chains and a glowing symbol.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un carrete de diapoçitibâ de lâ Tierrâ Bahâ del Río môttraba una êttraña bóbeda çiendo çerrá y çeyá con cadenâ y un çímbolo luminoço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sealed VaultA slide reel from the Cinder Isles showed a glowing symbol and chains appear around a strange vault.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un carrete de diapoçitibâ de lâ Îl-lâ Çeniça môttraba un çímbolo luminoço y cadenâ que apareçían arrededôh de una êttraña bóbeda.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sealed VaultA slide reel from the Hidden Gorge showed a glowing symbol and chains appear around a strange vault.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un carrete de diapoçitibâ der Dêffiladero Ocurto môttraba un çímbolo luminoço y cadenâ que apareçían arrededôh de una êttraña bóbeda.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sealed VaultI met one of the Stranger's inhabitants who was imprisoned within the vault!
TranslationTableEntry.value: ¡Conoçí a un abitante der Forâttero que êttaba atrapao dentro de la bóbeda!

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sealed VaultThe Prisoner showed me a vision revealing the actions they took that resulted in their eternal confinement.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er Priçionero me môttró una biçión que rebelaba lo que iço que terminara en eçe confinamiento etênno.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sealed VaultI used the vision torch to share my knowledge of the solar system's history with the Prisoner.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Uçé la lintênna proyêttora pa compartîh mi conoçimiento çobre la îttoria der çîttema çolâh con er Priçionero.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sealed VaultThe Prisoner left one final vision for me by the water's edge as a farewell.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er Priçionero me dehó una úrtima biçión a la oriya del agua como dêppedida.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Shrouded Woodlands
TranslationTableEntry.value: Bôqque Belao

TranslationTableEntry.key: Shrouded WoodlandsI rode a raft through a densely wooded stretch of river. I can see buildings along the banks of the river.
TranslationTableEntry.value: En una barça, atrabeçé un tramo arbolao del río. Puedo bêh côttrûççionê en lâ oriyâ del río.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Shrouded WoodlandsA dense forest along the banks of a river.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un bôqque frondoço en lâ oriyâ del río.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Shrouded WoodlandsI heard music coming from a candlelit building across the water.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êccuxé múçica que benía de una côttrûççión iluminá con belâ del otro lao del agua.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Shrouded WoodlandsI found a covered bridge leading into the darkest part of the forest.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un puente cubierto que conduçía a la çona mâh ôccura der bôqque.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden Archive
TranslationTableEntry.value: Arxibo proibío

TranslationTableEntry.key: Secret Fireplace
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ximenea çecreta

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveI found a hidden slide reel that shows a container marked with a glowing symbol being handed to a shadowy figure. The figure follows a procession of lights through a forest to a candlelit building, where they carry the container into a secret passage behind a roaring fireplace.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ ocurto que muêttra un contenedôh marcao con un çímbolo luminoço que êttá çiendo entregao a una çilueta çombría. La çilueta çige una çuçeçión de luçê a trabêh de un bôqque âtta yegâh a una côttrûççión iluminá con belâ. Ayí, yeba er contenedôh a un paçahe çecreto detrâh de una ximenea ardiente.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveA library full of intact slide reels hidden deep underground.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una biblioteca yena de carretê de diapoçitibâ intâttô, êccondida baho la çuperfiçie.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveThere is a container marked with one of the vault seals, but its contents have been destroyed.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ay un contenedôh marcao con uno de lô çeyô de la bóbeda, pero çu contenío çe dêttruyó.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveI found a slide reel that shows the origin of the Stranger and its inhabitants.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ que muêttra el orihen der Forâttero y de çû abitantê.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveIntact slides reveal the sacrifice that was made to build the Stranger.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lâ diapoçitibâ intâttâ rebelan er çacrifiçio que içieron pa côttruîh er Forâttero.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveI found a slide reel that appears to be some sort of error report. It shows one of the Stranger's inhabitants jumping off a raft during a transition between areas and falling below the world.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ que pareçe çêh argún tipo de informe de errorê. Muêttra a uno de lô abitantê der Forâttero çartando dêdde una barça durante una trançiçión entre áreâ y cayendo debaho der mundo.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Starlit Cove
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ençená Êttreyá

TranslationTableEntry.key: Candlelit Tower
TranslationTableEntry.value: Torre iluminá

TranslationTableEntry.key: Starlit CoveI rode a raft past an island with a tall candlelit tower.
TranslationTableEntry.value: En una barça, atrabeçé una îl-la con una gran torre iluminá con belâ.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Starlit CoveA secluded village nestled within a cove. A candlelit tower sits atop a nearby island.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una ardea aîl-lá, rêgguardá en un baye. Ay una torre iluminá con belâ en la parte mâh arta de una îl-la çercana.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Starlit CoveThe well at the bottom of the village is guarded by a statue that activates an alarm bell when it sees me.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er poço en la parte mâh baha de la ardea êttá cûttodiao por una êttatua que âttiba una campana de alarma cuando me be.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Starlit CoveI found the remains of a burned-out building on the outskirts of the village.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré lâ ruinâ de una côttrûççión que çe inçendió en lâ afuerâ de la ardea.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Starlit CoveI reached the tower's upper floors by projecting a path to a second entrance at the back of the tower.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Âççedí a lô piçô çuperiorê de la torre ar proyêttâh una ruta açia una çegunda entrá en la parte traçera de la torre.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Secret Well
TranslationTableEntry.value: Poço çecreto

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveThe reel I found in the slide burning room shows a container marked with a glowing symbol being handed to a shadowy figure. The lights are extinguished, and the figure carries the container down into a dark well.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er carrete que encontré en la çala de quema de diapoçitibâ muêttra un contenedôh marcao con un çímbolo luminoço que êttá çiendo entregao a una çilueta çombría. Lâ luçê çe apagan, y la çilueta yeba er contenedôh açia un poço ôccuro.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveI found a slide reel that shows the Stranger's inhabitants analyzing an anomaly that closely resembles the Nomai symbol for the Eye of the universe.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ que muêttra a lô abitantê der Forâttero analiçando una anomalía que çe pareçe muxo ar çímbolo nomai del Oho del uniberço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveI found a slide reel that shows the Stranger's inhabitants analyzing the Eye of the universe.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ que muêttra a lô abitantê der Forâttero analiçando el Oho del uniberço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveIntact slides reveal the construction and launch of a spacecraft designed to block the Eye's signal.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lâ diapoçitibâ intâttâ muêttran la côttrûççión y er lançamiento de una nabe êppaçiâh diçeñá pa bloqueâh la çeñâh del Oho.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveI found a slide reel that shows two artifacts being lit near a green fire. The first artifact lights after its bearer falls asleep, and the second artifact lights after its bearer dies.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ que rebela que lô artefâttô çe pueden ençendêh de dôh manerâ diferentê.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveI found a slide reel that appears to be some sort of error report. It shows an alarm bell failing to wake up one of the Stranger's inhabitants.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ que pareçe çêh argún tipo de informe de errorê. Muêttra que una campana de alarma no logró dêppertâh a uno de lô abitantê der Forâttero.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Endless Canyon
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dêppeñadero Interminable

TranslationTableEntry.key: Endless CanyonI rode a raft through the bottom of a massive canyon. It looks like there are buildings set into the cliff face high above.
TranslationTableEntry.value: En una barça, atrabeçé er fondo de un dêppeñadero higante. Pareçe que ay côttrûççionê en lo arto de la paré del acantilao.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Endless CanyonA massive canyon that stretches into the distance. A candlelit lodge is built into the far cliff face.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un dêppeñadero higante que çe êttiende en la dîttançia. Una cabaña iluminá con belâ fue côttruida en la paré mâh lehana del acantilao.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Endless CanyonI found a mural of a large tree on the bottom floor of the lodge.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dêccubrí un murâh de un gran árbô en la parte mâh baha de la cabaña.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Secret Mural
TranslationTableEntry.value: Murâh çecreto

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveThe reel I found in the slide burning room shows a container marked with a glowing symbol being handed to a shadowy figure. The lights are extinguished, and the figure carries the container into a secret passage behind a mural of a large tree.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er carrete que encontré en la çala de quema de diapoçitibâ muêttra un contenedôh marcao con un çímbolo luminoço que êttá çiendo entregao a una çilueta çombría. Lâ luçê çe apagan, y la çilueta yeba er contenedôh açia un paçahe çecreto detrâh de un murâh con un gran árbô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveI found a slide reel that shows the Stranger's inhabitants congregating around a strange green fire.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ que muêttra a lô abitantê der Forâttero congregándoçe arrededôh de un êttraño fuego berde.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveIntact slides reveal the creation of a simulated reality modeled after their home moon.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lâ diapoçitibâ intâttâ rebelan la creaçión de una realidá çimulá que crearon tomando a çu tierra natâh como modelo.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Forbidden ArchiveI found a slide reel that appears to be some sort of error report. It shows one of the Stranger's inhabitants dropping their artifact on the ground and walking beyond its projection radius.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un carrete de diapoçitibâ que pareçe çêh argún tipo de informe de errorê. Muêttra a un abitante der Forâttero dehando caêh çu artefâtto ar çuelo y alehándoçe de çu radio de proyêççión.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Chert’s Camp
TranslationTableEntry.value: Campamento de Xert

TranslationTableEntry.key: Chert’s CampChert has set up their astronomy gear on the north pole of Ember Twin.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Xert çe êttableçió con çu equipo de âttronomía en er polo norte de Hemelo Braça.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Chert’s CampChert has spotted an unusually high number of supernovae recently.
TranslationTableEntry.value: No açe muxo, Xert detêttó una cantidá inuçuâh de çupênnobâ.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Chert’s CampAll of the stars in the universe are dying, including our sun.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Toâ lâ êttreyâ de nuêttro uniberço êttán muriendo, incluío nuêttro Çôh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Chert’s CampThe stars are simply dying from old age. Apparently they're much older than we realized.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lâ êttreyâ êttán muriendo porque çon mu antiguâ. Pareçe que muxo mâh de lo que pençábamô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Chert’s CampChert has become catatonic in response to our sun's imminent death.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Xert quedó en êttao catatónico frente a la îmminente muerte de nuêttro Çôh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum Moon Locator
TranslationTableEntry.value: Localiçadôh de la Luna Cuántica

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum Moon LocatorA Nomai device created to track the Quantum Moon's location.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un dîppoçitibo nomai creao pa râttreâh la localiçaçión de la Luna Cuántica.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum Moon LocatorThe Nomai hypothesized that the Quantum Moon might be a form of macroscopic quantum mechanics.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çegún la ipóteçî de lô nomai, la Luna Cuántica podría çêh una forma de mecánica cuántica macrôccópica.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum Moon LocatorThe Quantum Moon travels to at least five locations, but sometimes the locator can't tell where the moon is.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La Luna Cuántica biaha a un totâh de çinco ubicaçionê.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Gravity CannonThe Nomai shuttle that's frozen on the Interloper can be called home to the gravity cannon on Ember Twin.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êh poçible yamâh ar trâbbordadôh nomai que êttá conhelao en el Intruço ar cañón grabitatorio en Hemelo Braça.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Gravity CannonI recalled a Nomai shuttle from the Interloper.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Eboqué un trâbbordadôh nomai del Intruço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod 2
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cáççula de êccape 2.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cáççula de êccape

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod 2One of the three Nomai escape pods landed somewhere on the Hourglass Twins.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una de lâ trêh cáççulâ de êccape nomai aterriçó en argún lugâh de lô Hemelô Relôh de Arena.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Nomai Shipwreck
TranslationTableEntry.value: Nabe en ruinâ nomai

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod 2Chert saw a Nomai shipwreck shooting a beam of light into the sky somewhere on Ember Twin's southern hemisphere.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Xert bio una nabe nomai en ruinâ que dêppedía un âh de lûh açia er çielo, en argún lugâh del emîfferio çûh de Hemelo Braça.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod 2One of three Nomai escape pods that crashed in our solar system.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una de lâ trêh cáççulâ de êccape nomai que çe êttreyaron en nuêttro çîttema çolâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Escape Pod 2All three escape pods were launched from something called the Vessel, which was badly damaged.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lâ trêh cáççulâ de êccape çe lançaron dêdde argo yamao la Nabe, que terminó çeriamente dañá.

TranslationTableEntry.key: High Energy Lab
TranslationTableEntry.value: Laboratorio Urtra$$enerhético

TranslationTableEntry.key: High Energy LabThe negative time interval measured at the White Hole Station was further investigated at the High Energy Lab (in the canyon at Ember Twin’s equator).
TranslationTableEntry.value: El interbalo de tiempo negatibo que çe midió en la Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco fue imbêttigao con mâh detaye en er Laboratorio Urtraenerhético (en er dêppeñadero, en el ecuadôh de Hemelo Braça).

TranslationTableEntry.key: High Energy LabThe Ash Twin Project was planned at the High Energy Lab, a building with large solar panels on Ember Twin’s equator.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er Laboratorio Urtraenerhético, una êttrûttura con enormê panelê çolarê en el ecuadôh de Hemelo Braça, fue er lugâh donde çe conçibió er Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça».

TranslationTableEntry.key: High Energy LabThe High Energy Lab can only be accessed by a path from the Sunless City.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çolo êh poçible âççedêh ar Laboratorio Urtraenerhético a trabêh de un camino dêdde la Çiudá Çin Çôh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: High Energy LabThe Nomai successfully reproduced the temporal anomaly first observed at the White Hole Station (warped objects appear to arrive before they depart).
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai reproduheron con éççito la anomalía temporâh que ôççerbaron por primera bêh en la Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco (lô ôhhetô que uçan la dîttorçión pareçen yegâh antê de partîh).

TranslationTableEntry.key: High Energy LabThe Nomai discovered they could increase the negative time interval between arrival and departure by adding energy to the warp cores.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai dêccubrieron que podían incrementâh el interbalo de tiempo negatibo entre la yegá y la çalida çi agregaban enerhía a lô núcleô de dîttorçión.

TranslationTableEntry.key: High Energy LabThe Nomai wanted to know if a 22-minute negative time interval was possible. They concluded it would require new technology to produce the necessary energy as well an advanced warp core to handle those energies. Ash Twin was proposed as a location for the project.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai querían çabêh çi un interbalo de tiempo negatibo de 22 minutô era poçible. Yegaron a la concluçión de que aría farta tênnolohía nueba pa produçîh la enerhía neçeçaria y un núcleo de dîttorçión abançao pa çoportâl-la. Hemelo Çeniça çe propuço como una ubicaçión poçible pa er proyêtto.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin Tower Designs
TranslationTableEntry.value: Planô de lâ torrê de Hemelo Çeniça

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin Tower DesignsThere are tower designs in the High Energy Lab that reveal each warp receiver's location.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ay planô de lâ torrê en er Laboratorio Urtraenerhético que muêttran la ubicaçión de cá reçêttôh de dîttorçión.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin Tower DesignsDesigns for each of the towers on Ash Twin's equator.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Planô de cá una de lâ torrê en el ecuadôh de Hemelo Çeniça.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin Tower DesignsEach tower warps to a different planet (although many Nomai were quick to note that the sun is not actually a planet).
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cá una de lâ torrê çe conêtta mediante dîttorçión con un planeta dîttinto (aunque lô nomai no tardaron en dêttacâh que er çôh no êh un planeta).

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin Tower DesignsEach tower was designed to visually reflect its warp destination.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cá torre fue diçeñá pa que reflehara de forma biçuâh er dêttino de la dîttorçión.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin Tower DesignsThe towers allowed the Nomai to quickly travel between Ash Twin and all other locations crucial to the Ash Twin Project.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lâ torrê lê permitían a lô nomai biahâh rápidamente entre Hemelo Çeniça y otrâ ubicaçionê cruçialê pa er Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça».

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Sunless City
TranslationTableEntry.value: La Çiudá Çin Çôh

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Sunless CityThe Nomai survivors who crashed on Ember Twin decided to seek shelter in the caves beneath their crashed escape pod.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô çuperbibientê nomai de la coliçión en Hemelo Braça deçidieron bûccâh refuhio en lâ cuebâ debaho de la cáççula de êccape êttreyá.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Sunless CityThe Nomai discovered a promising long-term shelter site at the end of one of the passages beneath the escape pod.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai dêccubrieron un prometedôh refuhio permanente en el êttremo de uno de lô paçahê que çe encontraban debaho de la cáççula de êccape.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Underground Settlement
TranslationTableEntry.value: Açentamiento çûtterráneo

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Sunless CityChert thinks the lack of surface ruins means the Nomai must have lived somewhere underground.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Xert piença que el exo de que no aya ruinâ en la çuperfiçie çînnifica que lô nomai deben abêh bibío baho tierra.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Sunless CityThere is a path leading to the High Energy Lab from the Sunless City.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ay un camino que conduçe ar Laboratorio Urtraenerhético dêdde la Çiudá Çin Çôh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Sunless CityI found a trailmarker for the the Sunless City, but the path is blocked.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un marcaçendâ de la Çiudá Çin Çôh, pero er camino êttá bloqueao.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Sunless CityA Nomai city built into the walls of a huge underground cavern. The city is divided vertically into four districts.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una çiudá nomai côttruida en lô murô de una enorme cabênna çûtterránea. La çiudá çe dibide, en forma berticâh, en cuatro dîttritô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Sunless CityThe Nomai debated building a Sun Station in order to power the Ash Twin Project. Several Nomai opposed its construction, arguing that failure could result in the destruction of the solar system.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai debatieron çi debían côttruîh una Êttaçión Çolâh pa ponêh en marxa er Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça». Muxô nomai çe opuçieron a la côttrûççión. Afirmaban que çu fracaço podría conduçîh a la dêttrûççión der çîttema çolâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: The Sunless CityThe Nomai traveled to this solar system in pursuit of a signal from something older than the universe itself. They named the source of this signal the "Eye of the universe."
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai biaharon a êtte çîttema çolâh en bûcca de una çeñâh que tenía çu orihen en argo mâh antiguo que er mîmmíçimo uniberço. A la fuente de êtta çeñâh la yamaron el «Oho del uniberço».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Anglerfish Fossil
TranslationTableEntry.value: Fóçî del rape

TranslationTableEntry.key: Anglerfish FossilI found a cave with an anglerfish fossil inside, but the opening is only big enough for my scout.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré una cueba con er fóçî de un rape en çu interiôh, pero la apertura apenâ permite que entre mi êpploradôh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Anglerfish FossilThe Nomai learned how to evade anglerfish (theoretically, at least) by studying an anglerfish fossil they found on Ember Twin.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai aprendieron cómo ebadîh al rape (en la teoría, ar menô), ya que êttudiaron er fóçî que encontraron en Hemelo Braça.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Fossil Fish Cave
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cueba der Pêh Fóçî

TranslationTableEntry.key: Anglerfish FossilNomai children used to play a game in Fossil Fish Cave. There is a way to enter Fossil Fish Cave from Stepping Stone Cave.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô niñô nomai çolían hugâh a un huego en la Cueba der Pêh Fóçî. Çe puede âççedêh a la Cueba der Pêh Fóçî dêdde la Cueba de lô Perdañô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Anglerfish FossilThe entrance from Stepping Stone Cave is hard to see unless the anglerfish is fed a light first.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La entrá dêdde la Cueba de lô Perdañô êh difíçî de bêh, a menô que el rape çe trage una lintênna.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Anglerfish FossilNomai children used to play a game here. One player was the anglerfish and wore a blindfold. The rest of the children (the littlefish) lined up against one wall. When the anglerfish said go, the littlefish had to sneak across to the other side.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô niñô nomai çolían hugâh a un huego aquí. Un hugadôh açumía el rôh del rape y uçaba una benda. Lô demâh niñô (lô peçeçitô) çe ponían en fila contra una paré. Cuando el rape deçía «aora», lô peçeçitô tenían que êccabuyirçe y yegâh al otro lao.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Anglerfish FossilThe blindfold rule was added because real anglerfish are blind.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La regla de lô ohô bendáô çe agregó porque lô rapê çon çiegô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Anglerfish FossilThe adult Nomai were delighted to see the children incorporate their research into the game's rules.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai adurtô êttaban feliçê de bêh que lô niñô abían incorporao êtte dêccubrimiento a lâ reglâ der huego.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum Caves
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cuebâ cuánticâ

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum CavesThe Nomai detected a quantum signal coming from somewhere on the Hourglass Twins.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai detêttaron una çeñâh cuántica que probenía de arguna parte de lô Hemelô Relôh de Arena.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum CavesThe Nomai noticed a strange wandering rock that appeared in multiple caves on Ember Twin’s northern hemisphere.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai notaron que abía una êttraña roca errante que abía apareçío en bariâ cuebâ, en el emîfferio norte de Hemelo Braça.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum CavesI found a strange rock shard that moves when I’m not watching. It emits a signal on the Quantum Fluctuations frequency.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un êttraño frâmmento de roca, que çe muebe cuando no lo ôççerbo. Emite una çeñâh en la frecuençia de flûttuaçionê cuánticâ.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lakebed Cave
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cueba Lacûttre

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lakebed CaveThe wandering rock was first spotted in a cave at the bottom of the dry lakebed at Ember Twin’s north pole.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La roca errante çe detêttó por primera bêh en una cueba en er fondo der lexo der lago çeco, en er polo norte de Hemelo Braça.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lakebed CaveA Nomai named Coleus mysteriously vanished from a cave at the bottom of the dry lakebed at Ember Twin’s north pole.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un nomai yamao Coleû deçapareçió mîtterioçamente de una cueba en er fondo der lexo der lago çeco, en er polo norte de Hemelo Braça.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lakebed CaveA Nomai named Coleus was standing on the wandering rock when another Nomai's lantern died. When they relit the lantern, Coleus and the rock were both gone.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un nomai yamao Coleû êttaba de pie çobre la roca errante cuando er farôh de otro nomai çe apagó. Ar borbêh a ençendêh er farôh, çe dio cuenta de que Coleû y la roca abían deçapareçío.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lakebed CaveTo travel with a quantum object, I must stand on the object and cease to observe my surroundings (meaning I must be in complete darkness). Coleus used this quantum rule to escape the cave he was trapped in.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Pa biahâh con un ôhheto cuántico, debo pararme çobre ér y dehâh de ôççerbâh mi entônno. Êh deçîh, que preçiço de una ôccuridá âççoluta. Coleû uçó êtta regla cuántica pa êccapâh de la cueba en la que çe encontraba atrapao.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lakebed CaveColeus and Merolae returned to examine the rock. They theorized that when a conscious being is in contact with a quantum object and ceases to observe his or her surroundings, the being can become entangled with that quantum object, and they both move together.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Coleû y Melorae regreçaron pa êççaminâh la roca. Yegaron a la teoría de que cuando un çêh côççiente êttá en contâtto con un ôhheto cuántico y deha de ôççerbâh çu entônno, puede quedâh intrincao con eçe ôhheto cuántico, y ambô çe mueben como una unidá.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Frozen Nomai Shuttle
TranslationTableEntry.value: Trâbbôh$$dadôh nomai conhelao

TranslationTableEntry.key: Frozen Nomai ShuttleI found a Nomai shuttle almost completely encased in ice.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un trâbbordadôh nomai prátticamente recubierto de ielo.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Frozen Nomai ShuttleThe Nomai landed on the Interloper not long after its arrival in the solar system. The shuttle's equipment heard strange energy readings coming from somewhere beneath the surface.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai aterriçaron en el Intruço poco dêppuêh de abêh yegao ar çîttema çolâh. El equipo der trâbbordadôh câttó êttrañâ çeñalê de enerhía que probenían de debaho de la çuperfiçie.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Frozen Nomai ShuttleThere were three Nomai aboard the shuttle. One of them stayed behind to keep the shuttle warm while the other two explored the Interloper.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Abía trêh nomai a bordo der trâbbordadôh. Una de eyâ çe quedó pa mantenêh lô motorê der trâbbordadôh calientê, mientrâ lâ demâh êpploraban el Intruço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Frozen Nomai ShuttleClary, the Nomai who stayed behind, lost contact with the other two after they descended below the Interloper's surface.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Clary, la nomai que çe quedó, perdió contâtto con lâ otrâ dôh dêppuêh de que dêççendieran de la çuperfiçie del Intruço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ruptured Core
TranslationTableEntry.value: Núcleo roto

TranslationTableEntry.key: Subsurface Energy Readings
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çeñalê@@de enerhía@@baho la çuperfiçie

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ruptured CoreThe shuttle's equipment heard strange energy readings coming from somewhere beneath the surface.
TranslationTableEntry.value: El equipo der trâbbordadôh câttó êttrañâ çeñalê de enerhía que probenían de debaho de la çuperfiçie.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ruptured CoreTwo of the Nomai located a fissure in the ice on the Interloper’s sunward side. They descended inside to investigate.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dôh de lâ nomai detêttaron una fiçura en el ielo, en er lao del Intruço que miraba ar çôh. Y dêççendieron a imbêttigâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ruptured CoreI found the two missing members of the Nomai shuttle crew near a large ruptured stone that looks like it exploded from the inside.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré a lâ dôh miembrô perdidâ de la tripulaçión nomai çerca de una gran piedra rota, que pareçe como çi ubieçe êpplotao dêdde çu interiôh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ruptured CoreThe Nomai traced the strange energy readings to a spherical stone casing filled with some form of exotic matter.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lâ nomai râttrearon lâ êttrañâ çeñalê de enerhía y yegaron a una carcaça êfférica de piedra que contenía una êppeçie de materia êççótica.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ruptured CoreThey determined the exotic matter was both lethal and under extreme pressure. If the stone were to rupture, the exotic matter within would rapidly expand, completely blanketing the solar system almost instantaneously.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Determinaron que la materia êççótica era letâh y çe encontraba baho una êttrema preçión. Çi êtta piedra çe quebraçe, la materia êççótica que contiene çe êppandiría rápidamente y cubriría por completo êtte çîttema çolâh caçi al îttante.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ruptured CoreOne of the Nomai stayed behind to examine the alien matter while the other rushed back to the surface to warn the rest of the Nomai.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una de lâ nomai çe quedó a êççaminâh la materia êttraña mientrâ que la otra corrió a la çuperfiçie pa âbbertîh a lô demâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ocean Depths
TranslationTableEntry.value: Profundi$$dadê del oçéano

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ocean DepthsGabbro says there’s a strong current beneath the surface of the ocean that prevents anything from sinking below it.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Gabro diçe que ay una fuerte corriente que paça por debaho de la çuperfiçie del oçéano y no permite que ná çe unda.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ocean DepthsThe Nomai on the Construction Yard saw something sink beneath the underwater current, which they'd previously thought was impossible.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai que êttaban en er Çitio de Côttrûççión bieron argo undirçe mâh ayá de la corriente çubacuática, coça que âtta entonçê abían conçiderao impoçible.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ocean DepthsFeldspar found a way to reach the core of Giant’s Deep.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ferdêppato encontró la manera de yegâh ar núcleo de Abîmmo der Higante.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ocean DepthsThe ocean is surprisingly calm beneath the current. Some sort of electrical field surrounds the planet's core.
TranslationTableEntry.value: El oçéano êh çorprendentemente tranquilo debaho de la corriente. Er núcleo der planeta êttá rodeao de una êppeçie de campo eléttrico.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ocean DepthsI passed through the electric barrier and reached the coral forest at the planet's core.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Atrabeçé la barrera eléttrica y yegé ar bôqque de corâh que ay en er núcleo der planeta.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Gabbro’s Island
TranslationTableEntry.value: Îl-la de Gabro

TranslationTableEntry.key: Gabbro
TranslationTableEntry.value: Gabro

TranslationTableEntry.key: Gabbro’s IslandHal says Gabbro went back to Giant’s Deep to try to learn more about the Nomai statue in the observatory.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ali diçe que Gabro borbió a Abîmmo der Higante pa aberiguâh mâh informaçión çobre la êttatua nomai del ôççerbatorio.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Gabbro’s IslandGabbro is lounging in a hammock near the island’s shore.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Gabro êttá orgaçaneando en una amaca çerca de la côtta de la îl-la.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Gabbro’s IslandGabbro found a Nomai statue on another island. The statue's eyes started glowing and Gabbro saw their memories flash before their eyes.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Gabro encontró una êttatua nomai en otra îl-la. Lô ohô de la êttatua començaron a briyâh y Gabro bio cómo çû recuerdô çe le apareçían ante lô ohô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Gabbro’s IslandGabbro remembers dying. They saw their memories flash before their eyes, just like the time with the statue.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Gabro recuerda abêh muerto. Bio cómo çû recuerdô çe le apareçían ante lô ohô, iguâh que con la êttatua.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Gabbro’s IslandGabbro and I seem to be the only ones aware that we're in a time loop.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êh poçible que çolo Gabro y yo nô percatemô de que êttamô en un bucle temporâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Construction Yard
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çitio de Côttrûççión

TranslationTableEntry.key: Construction YardThe Nomai built the Orbital Probe Cannon at a Construction Yard on Giant’s Deep.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai côttruyeron er Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh en un Çitio de Côttrûççión de Abîmmo der Higante.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Construction YardThis island is where the Nomai built the Orbital Probe Cannon.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êtta êh la îl-la donde lô nomai côttruyeron er Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Construction YardFor some reason, the Nomai put the Orbital Probe Cannon on indefinite hiatus. The cannon was not asked to fire.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Por argún motibo, lô nomai pauçaron er Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh de manera indefinida. Er cañón no reçibió la orden de dîpparâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Construction YardAccording to a Nomai computer, a long-range probe was recently launched from the Orbital Probe Cannon.
TranslationTableEntry.value: De acuerdo con una computadora nomai, er Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh lançó una çonda de largo arcançe reçientemente.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Bramble Island
TranslationTableEntry.value: Îl-la Êppino

TranslationTableEntry.key: Bramble IslandAn island of thorny vines and what appears to be a frozen jellyfish. It looks like Feldspar camped here before heading off to Dark Bramble.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una îl-la con iedrâ êppinoçâ y lo que pareçe çêh una meduça conhelá. Pareçe que Ferdêppato acampó aquí antê de dirihirçe a Êppinôccuro.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Statue Island
TranslationTableEntry.value: Îl-la de la Êttatua

TranslationTableEntry.key: Statue IslandOne of the islands on Giant’s Deep has a Nomai statue on the beach just like the one Gabbro brought back to Timber Hearth.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una de lâ îl-lâ de Abîmmo der Higante tiene una êttatua nomai en la playa, que êh iguâh a la que Gabro yebó a Lumbre.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Statue IslandStatue Island (as Gabbro calls it) is the one with two islands connected by a natural rock arch.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La Îl-la de la Êttatua (bautiçá por Gabro) êttá conêttá a otra îl-la por un arco rocoço naturâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Statue IslandThis island must be where the Nomai created statues like the one in our observatory.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êtta îl-la debe abêh çido er lugâh donde lô nomai crearon lâ êttatuâ mnemónicâ, como la que êttá en el ôççerbatorio.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Statue IslandI found a Nomai statue lying on the beach. It looks just like the one in our observatory.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré una êttatua nomai tirá en la playa. Êh iguâh a la de nuêttro ôççerbatorio.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Statue Workshop
TranslationTableEntry.value: Tayêh de lâ Êttatuâ

TranslationTableEntry.key: Statue WorkshopI found a sign for a "Statue Workshop" next to a broken door that used to lead inside the island.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré un cartêh de un «Tayêh de lâ Êttatuâ» hunto a una puerta rota que antê conduçía al interiôh de la îl-la.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Statue WorkshopSome Nomai children debated bypassing the Statue Workshop's door and sneaking inside via an alternate (more dangerous) route.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Unô niñô nomai dîccutieron çobre çi deberían ebitâh la puerta der Tayêh de lâ Êttatuâ pa êccabuyirçe por un camino artênnatibo y mâh peligroço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Island Interior
TranslationTableEntry.value: Interiôh de la îl-la

TranslationTableEntry.key: Statue WorkshopI can see into a large cave from one of the ruins on top of the island. The bottom of the cave is filled with water.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Dêdde una de lâ ruinâ, en la çima de la îl-la, puedo bêh açia el interiôh de una enorme cueba. Er fondo de la cueba êttá yeno de agua.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Statue WorkshopNomai statues were designed to pair with a single user, record their memories, and send those memories to a storage unit within the Ash Twin Project.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lâ êttatuâ nomai êttaban diçeñâh pa empareharçe con un uçuario único, grabâh çû recuerdô y embiâh dixô recuerdô a una unidá de armaçenamiento dentro der Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Statue WorkshopEach storage unit inside the Ash Twin Project was equipped with a mask (the statue’s counterpart), which could then send those stored memories back to the corresponding user.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cá unidá de armaçenamiento dentro der Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça» êttaba equipá con una máccara, er complemento de la êttatua, la cuâ podría reembiâh lô recuerdô armaçenáô al uçuario corrêppondiente.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Statue WorkshopThe statues were designed to only activate once the Ash Twin Project succeeded, or in the event that it failed.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lâ êttatuâ êttaban diçeñâh pa âttibarçe únicamente una bêh que er Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça» tubiera éççito, o en er caço de que fracaçara.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tower of Quantum Trials
TranslationTableEntry.value: Torre de lâ Pruebâ Cuánticâ

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tower of Quantum TrialsThe Nomai detected a Quantum signal coming from somewhere on Giant’s Deep.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai detêttaron una çeñâh cuántica que probenía de arguna parte de Abîmmo der Higante.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tower of Quantum TrialsThis tower held knowledge a Nomai needed to make his or her first quantum journey.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êtta torre contenía er conoçimiento que un nomai neçeçitaba pa realiçâh çu primêh biahe cuántico.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tower of Quantum Trials"Observing a quantum object; observing an image of a quantum object. These are the same."
TranslationTableEntry.value: «Ôççerbâh un ôhheto cuántico; ôççerbâh una imahen de un ôhheto cuántico. Ambô çon lo mîmmo».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tower of Quantum TrialsThe Nomai called this the "Rule of Quantum Imaging."
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai denominaban a êtte fenómeno «regla de lâ imáhenê cuánticâ».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Tower of Quantum Trials"Remember, the other quantum shards have other lessons to teach."
TranslationTableEntry.value: «Recuerda: lô demâh frâmmentô cuánticô tienen otrâ lêççionê que ençeñâh».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum Moon
TranslationTableEntry.value: Luna Cuántica

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum MoonThe Nomai on Brittle Hollow observed a phantom moon that would sometimes appear in the sky.
TranslationTableEntry.value: En Ondoná Fráhî, lô nomai ôççerbaban una luna fantâmma que apareçía cá tanto en er çielo.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum MoonThe Nomai on Ember Twin observed a moon that would disappear when no one was watching.
TranslationTableEntry.value: En Hemelo Braça, lô nomai ôççerbaban una luna que deçapareçía cuando nadie la miraba.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum MoonA Nomai named Solanum landed a shuttle on the Quantum Moon.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una nomai yamá Çolanum aterriçó en la Luna Cuántica con un trâbbordadôh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum MoonChert’s research notes mention a Quantum Moon that no Hearthian has been able to land on.
TranslationTableEntry.value: En lâ notâ de imbêttigaçión de Xert, çe mençiona una Luna Cuántica en la que lô lumbreanô hamâh an podío aterriçâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum MoonI was able to land on the surface of the Quantum Moon.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Logré aterriçâh en la çuperfiçie de la Luna Cuántica.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum MoonI found a dead Nomai in a space suit near the south pole.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Encontré a una nomai muerta en çu trahe êppaçiâh çerca der polo çûh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Solanum's Shuttle
TranslationTableEntry.value: Trâbbôh$$dadôh de Çolanum

TranslationTableEntry.key: Solanum's ShuttleA Nomai named Solanum landed her shuttle at the Quantum Moon's south pole and prepared to make the rest of the journey on foot.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una nomai yamá Çolanum aterriçó con çu trâbbordadôh en er polo çûh de la Luna Cuántica y çe preparó pa completâh çu biahe a pie.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Solanum's ShuttleVisitors to the Quantum Moon always arrive at the south pole (for reasons unknown to the Nomai).
TranslationTableEntry.value: Quienê biçitan la Luna Cuántica çiempre yegan ar polo çûh (por motibô que lô nomai dêcconoçían).

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum Shrine
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çantuario cuántico

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum ShrineThe Nomai built a shrine on the Quantum Moon to aid in the pilgrimage to its sixth location.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai côttruyeron un çantuario en la Luna Cuántica pa brindâh ayuda durante er peregrinahe a çu çêtta ubicaçión.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum ShrineA Nomai shrine that wanders about the Quantum Moon.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un çantuario nomai que deambula por la Luna Cuántica.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum Shrine"You have recalled the rule of quantum imaging" is inscribed next to a mural of a tower on an island.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Hunto a un murâh de una torre en una îl-la, çe lee la çigiente îccrîççión: «Âh ebocao la regla de lâ imáhenê cuánticâ».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum Shrine"Recall the rule of quantum entanglement" is inscribed next to a mural of a quantum shard in a cave.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Hunto a un murâh de un frâmmento cuántico en una cueba, çe lee la çigiente îccrîççión: «Eboca la regla del entrelaçamiento cuántico».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Quantum Shrine"Recall the rule of the sixth location" is inscribed next to a mural of a tower hanging above a black hole.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Hunto a un murâh de una torre que cuerga çobre un aguhero negro, çe lee la çigiente îccrîççión: «Eboca la regla de la çêtta ubicaçión».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sixth Location
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çêtta ubicaçión

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sixth LocationThe Quantum Moon sometimes disappears, possibly to an unknown sixth location.
TranslationTableEntry.value: A beçê, la Luna Cuántica deçapareçe. Êh poçible que baya a una çêtta ubicaçión que çe dêcconoçe.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sixth LocationMany Nomai went on a pilgrimage during which the Quantum Moon carried them to its sixth and most secret location.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Muxô nomai realiçaban un peregrinahe durante er cuâ la Luna Cuántica lô yebaba a la çêtta ubicaçión, la mâh çecreta.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sixth LocationTo explore the sixth location, the shrine on the Quantum Moon must be on the moon’s north pole.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Pa êpplorâh la çêtta ubicaçión, er çantuario de la Luna Cuántica debe êttâh en er polo norte de la luna.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sixth LocationI met a living Nomai named Solanum at the south pole!
TranslationTableEntry.value: ¡Me encontré con una nomai biba en er polo çûh! Çe yama Çolanum.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sixth LocationThe Quantum Moon is the Eye of the universe's moon.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La Luna Cuántica êh er çatélite del Oho del uniberço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sixth LocationAt this location, the Quantum Moon becomes a reflection of the Eye itself.
TranslationTableEntry.value: En êtta ubicaçión, la Luna Cuántica çe combierte en un refleho der mîmmíçimo Oho.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sixth LocationThe Eye is likely the source of all macroscopic quantum phenomena in the solar system.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êh probable que el Oho çea la fuente de tôh lô fenómenô cuánticô macrôccópicô que çe produçen en er çîttema çolâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sixth LocationSolanum wonders what would happen if a concious observer were to enter the Eye.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çolanum çe pregunta qué çuçedería çi un ôççerbadôh côççiente entrara en el Oho.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sixth LocationSolanum has a hypothesis that she may not be entirely alive.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çolanum tiene la ipóteçî de que quiçâh no êtté der tó biba.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sun Station
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êttaçión Çolâh

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sun StationThere is a way to safely travel to the Sun Station from Ash Twin.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êççîtte una manera çegura de biahâh a la Êttaçión Çolâh dêdde Hemelo Çeniça.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sun StationThe Nomai debated building a Sun Station in order to power the Ash Twin Project.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai debatieron çi debían côttruîh una Êttaçión Çolâh pa ponêh en marxa er Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sun StationThe Nomai built something called the Sun Station, but not everyone supported its construction.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai côttruyeron argo yamao «Êttaçión Çolâh», pero no tôh apoyaban la idea.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sun StationThe Sun Station was designed to make the sun go supernova.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La Êttaçión Çolâh çe diçeñó pa açêh que er Çôh êttayara en una çupênnoba.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sun StationThe Nomai fired the Sun Station but it had no effect on the sun. They concluded that the Sun Station could never cause the sun to go supernova.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai âttibaron la Êttaçión Çolâh, pero no çurtió efêtto çobre er Çôh. Yegaron a la concluçión de que la Êttaçión Çolâh hamâh podría açêh êpplotâh er Çôh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sun StationAfter the failure of the Sun Station, the Nomai took a break to investigate the newly arrived comet.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Trâ er fracaço de la Êttaçión Çolâh, lô nomai çe dedicaron a imbêttigâh er cometa que acababa de yegâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Sun StationAccording to a Nomai computer, our sun has reached the end of its natural life cycle.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çegún una computadora nomai, nuêttro Çôh a arcançao er fin de çu çiclo de bida naturâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Esker’s Camp
TranslationTableEntry.value: Campamento de Êkke

TranslationTableEntry.key: Esker’s CampSounds like Esker is still stationed on the Attlerock. They’ve been there by themself for a while.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Pareçe que Êkke çige en Rocaterra. Yeba bâttante tiempo ayí çin compañía.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Esker’s CampEsker is growing a crop of trees at their camp. They seemed to be doing ok, but they’ve probably been alone on the moon for too long.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êkke êttá plantando árbolê en çu campamento. Ar pareçêh, êttá bien, pero êh probable que yebe demaçiao tiempo çin compañía en la Luna.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lunar Lookout
TranslationTableEntry.value: Puêtto de ôççerbaçión Lunâh

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lunar LookoutEsker says the Attlerock’s north pole (marked in red on my minimap) is a great spot to listen for the other travelers’ music with a signalscope.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êkke diçe que er polo norte de Rocaterra (marcao con roho en er minimapa) êh un lugâh ideâh pa êccuxâh la múçica de lô demâh biaherô con un çeñalôccopio.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lunar LookoutA lookout platform with a spectacular view of the solar system. Esker uses their signalscope here to keep tabs on the other travelers.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una plataforma de ôççerbaçión con una bîtta êppêttaculâh der çîttema çolâh. Êkke uça çu çeñalôccopio pa aberiguâh cómo êttán lô demâh biaherô.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Eye Signal Locator
TranslationTableEntry.value: Localiçadôh de çeñâh@@del Oho

TranslationTableEntry.key: Lunar Ruins
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ruinâ lunarê

TranslationTableEntry.key: Eye Signal LocatorI hear there are Nomai ruins somewhere on the Attlerock. No one knows what they are or why they were built.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Diçen que ay ruinâ nomai en arguna parte de Rocaterra. Nadie çabe qué çon ni por qué lâ côttruyeron.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Eye Signal LocatorThe Nomai text in the observatory talks about calibrating some sort of device on the Attlerock.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er têtto nomai del ôççerbatorio mençionaba argo çobre la calibraçión de una çuerte de dîppoçitibo en Rocaterra.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Eye Signal LocatorA Nomai device created to pinpoint the sources of distant signals.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Un dîppoçitibo nomai creao pa localiçâh el orihen de çeñalê dîttantê.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Eye Signal LocatorThe Nomai were disappointed by their failure to detect a signal from something called the Eye of the universe.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai êttaban frûttráô por no podêh detêttâh una çeñâh de argo yamao «Oho del uniberço».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin Towers
TranslationTableEntry.value: Torrê de Hemelo Çeniça

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin TowersSeveral large Nomai towers form a ring around Ash Twin's equator.
TranslationTableEntry.value: En el ecuadôh de Hemelo Çeniça, ay un aniyo formao por bariâ torrê nomai de gran tamaño.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin TowersThe White Hole Station was used as a model for these towers, which were built for the Ash Twin Project.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco çe utiliçó como modelo pa êttâ torrê, que çe côttruyeron pa er Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin Project
TranslationTableEntry.value: Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça»

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin ProjectThe central chamber inside Ash Twin was physically sealed off by an immensely thick protective shell.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La cámara çentrâh en el interiôh de Hemelo Çeniça quedó çeyá fíçicamente por una carcaça protêttora de un groçôh îmmenço.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin ProjectThe Nomai planned to construct technology capable of producing a 22-minute negative time interval on Ash Twin.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai planeaban deçarroyâh una tênnolohía capâh de produçîh un interbalo negatibo de 22 minutô en Hemelo Çeniça.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin ProjectEvery memory recorded by a Nomai statue is transmitted to a corresponding storage unit within Ash Twin.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cá recuerdo grabao por una êttatua nomai çe trâmmite a la unidá de armaçenamiento corrêppondiente en Hemelo Çeniça.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin ProjectAn advanced warp core was approved for installation in the central chamber of Ash Twin.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çe aprobó la îttalaçión de un núcleo de dîttorçión abançao en la cámara çentrâh de Hemelo Çeniça.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin ProjectA hollowed-out chamber inside Ash Twin. The energy cables from the surface are plugged into a protective casing at the center of the planet.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Una cámara forhá dentro de Hemelo Çeniça. Lô cablê de enerhía que bienen dêdde la çuperfiçie êttán conêttáô a una carcaça protêttora en er çentro der planeta.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin ProjectThere are eight monoliths with Nomai masks attached. Three of the masks are actively receiving data from the Probe Tracking Module, Giant's Deep, and Timber Hearth respectively.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ay oxo monolitô que cuentan con máccarâ nomai. Trêh de êttâ máccarâ êttán reçibiendo datô dêdde er Módulo de Râttreo de Çondâ, Abîmmo der Higante y Lumbre, rêppêttibamente.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin ProjectThe Ash Twin Project was designed to use the energy from a supernova (triggered by the Sun Station) to send probe data from the Orbital Probe Cannon 22 minutes into the past.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Er Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça» çe diçeñó con er fin de utiliçâh la enerhía de una çupênnoba (probocá por la Êttaçión Çolâh) pa embiâh datô de una çonda dêdde er Cañón de Çondâ Orbitâh 22 minutô açia er paçao.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin ProjectThe Sun Station did not work. Although the Ash Twin Project was theoretically sound, the Nomai were unable to power it.
TranslationTableEntry.value: La Êttaçión Çolâh no funçionó. Er Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça» era çólido en cuanto a la teoría, pero lô nomai no pudieron dâl-le la potençia neçeçaria.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Ash Twin ProjectThere is an advanced warp core inside the protective casing at the center of the planet. Removing the core will disable the Ash Twin Project.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ay un núcleo de dîttorçión abançao dentro de la carcaça protêttora que çe encuentra en er çentro der planeta. Çi çe quita er núcleo, çe deçâttibará er Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Volcanic Testing Site
TranslationTableEntry.value: Çitio de Pruebâ Borcánico

TranslationTableEntry.key: Volcanic Testing SiteOre samples from the Nomai Mines on Timber Hearth were sent to this volcano for durability testing.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai embiaban lâ muêttrâ de mineralê que ôttenían en lâ minâ de Lumbre a êtte borcán pa realiçâh pruebâ de durabilidá.

TranslationTableEntry.key: Volcanic Testing SiteThe Nomai were trying to craft a (briefly) supernova-proof shell to encase the Ash Twin Project.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai intentaban fabricâh una carcaça que fuera (brebemente) reçîttente a una çupênnoba pa recubrîh er Proyêtto «Hemelo Çeniça».

TranslationTableEntry.key: Volcanic Testing SiteEven the smallest crack or opening in the protective shell would destroy everything.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cuarquiêh grieta o apertura en la carcaça protêttora, por pequeña que fuera, dêttruiría tó.

TranslationTableEntry.key: White Hole Station
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êttaçión@@del Aguhero Blanco

TranslationTableEntry.key: White Hole StationThere is a White Hole Station on the other side of Brittle Hollow's black hole.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Ay una Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco al otro lao del aguhero negro de Ondoná Fráhî.

TranslationTableEntry.key: White Hole StationSeveral Nomai returned to the station to investigate an equipment reading that appeared to violate causality.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Bariô nomai regreçaron a la êttaçión pa imbêttigâh una çeñâh del equipo que, ar pareçêh, trâggredía la cauçalidá.

TranslationTableEntry.key: White Hole StationThe experiments at the High Energy Lab were based on extraordinary findings from the White Hole Station.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô êpperimentô realiçáô en er Laboratorio Urtraenerhético çe baçaron en dêccubrimientô êttraordinariô de la Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco.

TranslationTableEntry.key: White Hole StationThe towers on Ash Twin were modeled after the White Hole Station.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lâ torrê de Hemelo Çeniça çe baçaron en la Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco.

TranslationTableEntry.key: White Hole StationEvery Nomai warp tower is tuned to a specific astral body.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Cá torre de dîttorçión nomai êttá conêttá a un cuerpo âttrâh.

TranslationTableEntry.key: White Hole StationTo use a tower, you must be standing on the warp platform during the tower's alignment with its corresponding astral body (the alignment happens when the astral body is directly overhead).
TranslationTableEntry.value: Pa utiliçâh una torre, párate en la plataforma de dîttorçión mientrâ la torre çe alinea con er cuerpo âttrâh corrêppondiente (la alineaçión çe produçe cuando er cuerpo âttrâh êttá dirêttamente ençima).

TranslationTableEntry.key: White Hole StationThe Nomai noticed something strange: Warped objects appeared to arrive at the receiver on Brittle Hollow slightly before they departed the White Hole Station.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Lô nomai notaron argo êttraño: lô ôhhetô trâpportáô mediante dîttorçión pareçían yegâh al reçêttôh en Ondoná Fráhî momentô antê de partîh de la Êttaçión del Aguhero Blanco.

TranslationTableEntry.key: White Hole StationThis negative time interval between an object arriving and departing was incredibly miniscule (roughly one hundred-thousandth of a second). The Nomai were skeptical if their equipment could even measure time to such a small degree.
TranslationTableEntry.value: Êtte interbalo negatibo entre la yegá y la partida de un ôhheto era rearmente minúcculo (aprôççimadamente 0,00001 çegundô). Lô nomai no êttaban çegurô de que çû îttrumentô fueran capaçê de medîh una frâççión de tiempo tan pequeña.

Çelêççiona una ôççión de calidá gráfica preconfigurá.
Elihe çi quierê hugâh en pantaya completa o en una bentana.
Elihe en qué monitôh quierê bêh er huego.
Determina qué reçoluçionê êttán dîpponiblê en la çigiente ôççión çegún lâ dimençionê de la pantaya.
Er huego çe renderiçará con êtta reçoluçión de píççelê.\\nCôtto de renderiçaçión: Arto
Çuabiça lô bordê de píççelê abrûttô. SMAA êh mâh preçiço y ofreçe una mayôh calidá, pero FXAA êh mâh rápido.\\nCôtto de renderiçaçión: Baho
Calidá del efêtto de pôpproçeçamiento de çuabiçao de contônnô. Cuanto mayôh çea la calidá, mayôh çerá er côtto.
Reçoluçión relatiba de lô mapâ de têtturâ que çe uçan en tó er huego.\\nCôtto de memoria: Medio
Cantidá de detaye en lâ olâ del oçéano y calidá de la iluminaçión del agua.\\nCôtto de renderiçaçión: Arto
Reçoluçión y preçiçión de lâ çombrâ en er mundo der huego y cantidá de luçê que heneran çombrâ.\\nCôtto de renderiçaçión: Arto
Carcula la ocluçión ambientâh (lâ çombrâ çuabê que çe produçen cuando lô ôhhetô êttán çerca unô de otrô) como efêtto de pôpproçeçamiento.\\nCôtto de renderiçaçión: Medio
Ahûtta er briyo o la ôccuridá de lô gráficô.\\nCôtto de renderiçaçión: ninguno.

Ebita que la pantaya çe dîttorçione ar çincroniçâh la beloçidá de fotogramâ der huego con la frecuençia de âttualiçaçión der monitôh.\\nCôtto de renderiçaçión: ninguno, pero dîmminuirá la beloçidá de fotogramâ automáticamente ar múrtiplo mâh çercano de la frecuençia de âttualiçaçión der monitôh.
La interpolaçión mehora la mêccla de colorê, pero puede empeorâh el âppêtto der bideo comprimío der huego.\\nCôtto de renderiçaçión: ninguno.
Er campo biçuâh berticâh de la cámara der huego. Âbbertençia: Çi cambiâ êtta configuraçión, puedê afêttâh argunô rompecabeçâ de Outer Wilds.\\nCôtto de renderiçaçión: Baho
El impurço de la moxila propurçora çe puede âttibâh preçionando un botón independiente (manuâh) o çiempre que çe uçe el impurço berticâh (automático).
Er tradûttôh çe puede equipâh preçionando un botón (manuâh) o mirando un têtto traduçible (automático).
Muêttra una notificaçión en el UD cuando çe agrega informaçión nueba al rehîttro de la âttronabe.
Muêttra conêççionê de rumorê entre lâ dîttintâ entrâh del rehîttro de la âttronabe. Deçâttíbalo pa minimiçâh la ayuda en er huego.
Çi deçâttibâ êtta ôççión, no podrâh bolâh entre planetâ utiliçando er piloto automático.
Muêttra lô indicadorê de botonê de lâ âççionê dîpponiblê.

Cambia er bolumen de la múçica êttradiehética.
Cambia el idioma de tó er têtto en er huego.
Cambia la beloçidá de biçualiçaçión der têtto durante lâ comberçaçionê.
Detiene er tiempo mientrâ leê têtto traduçío (er tradûttôh debe êttâh quieto).\\nNOTA: En argunô momentô, no êh poçible detenêh er tiempo.
Detiene er tiempo mientrâ uçâ el rehîttro de la âttronabe.\\nNOTA: En argunô momentô, no êh poçible detenêh er tiempo.

Detiene er tiempo mientrâ ablâ con perçonahê y leê diariô o cartelê. De êtte modo, no çe reproduçirán lâ animaçionê de perçonahê durante lâ comberçaçionê.\\nNOTA: En argunô momentô, no êh poçible detenêh er tiempo.

Âttiba la bibraçión der contrôh (çolo pa controlê).
Define la çençibilidá de entrá cuando caminâ. Çi elihê una çençibilidá menôh, la beloçidá pa mirâh çerá mâh baha y mâh fáçî de controlâh.
Define la çençibilidá de entrá cuando pilotâ la âttronabe. Çi elihê una çençibilidá menôh, la beloçidá pa mirâh çerá mâh baha y mâh fáçî de controlâh.

Determina qué tan lehô der çentro debê inclinâh er hoystick îqquierdo/derexo pa que çe detêtte la entrá.\\nAumenta êtta çona muerta çi er perçonahe çe muebe o mira cuando no êttâh tocando er hoystick îqquierdo/derexo.
Determina qué tan lehô de la inclinaçión máççima debe êttâh er hoystick îqquierdo/derexo pa que ya no çe detêtte la entrá.\\nAumenta êtta çona muerta çi no puedê moberte o mirâh a máççima beloçidá.
Abre êtte menú pa modificâh la açînnaçión de botonê a lâ dîttintâ âççionê en er huego.
El arxibo de guardao êttá dañao.
Çelêççiona er contrôh que çe uçará en er huego

Cambia lâ imáhenê de lô botonê en pantaya por lâ der contrôh indicao

Cambia la configuraçión de la dîttribuçión der teclao. Ante cuarquiêh cambio que realiçê, er çîttema te preguntará çi quierê cambiâh lâ açînnaçionê de teclâ âttualê o no. Êtto también redefinirá la configuraçión predeterminá der teclao y er mouçe.
Mobimiento açia la îqquierda y la derexa
Mobimiento açia adelante y açia atrâh
Mobimiento de la cámara açia la îqquierda y la derexa
Mobimiento de la cámara açia arriba y abaho

Êpploradôh: toma una foto açia adelante\\nÇeñalôccopio: cambia la bîtta\\nTradûttôh: çirbe pa traduçîh
Êpploradôh: toma una foto açia atrâh

Modo de erramienta henérica en ehe berticâh

Mobimiento dêççendente de moxila propurçora y âttronabe

Âttiba el impurço manuâh de la moxila propurçora
Çe fiha en un ôhhetibo elehío
Cuando çe fiha un ôhhetibo, âttiba lô propurçorê pa igualâh la beloçidá del ôhhetibo fihao
Cambia la cámara de aterriçahe de la âttronabe
Ar fihâh el ôhhetibo, çe âttiba er piloto automático de la âttronabe
Cambia a biçión libre cuando te çientâ en la cabina de la âttronabe
En el rehîttro de la âttronabe, artênna entre er mapa y er modo dêccubrimiento
En el rehîttro de la âttronabe, ençiende un marcadôh del UD pa el elemento del rehîttro de la âttronabe indicao
En el rehîttro de la âttronabe, çe dêpplaça por lâ largâ entrâh del rehîttro
Abilita la funçión de bibraçión der contrôh inalámbrico (çolo contrôh inalámbrico).
Abilita la funçión de bibraçión der contrôh (çolo contrôh).

Determina la dîttançia (dêdde er çentro) a la que çe debe inclinâh er stick îqquierdo/derexo antê de que çe detêtte cuarquiêh entrá. Conçidera aumentâh êtta çona muerta çi tu perçonahe çe muebe o mira a çu arrededôh cuando no êttâh tocando er stick îqquierdo/derexo.

Determina la dîttançia (dêdde lô êttremô) a la que çe debe çortâh er stick îqquierdo/derexo antê de que ya no çe detêtte la entrá máççima. Conçidera aumentâh êtta çona muerta çi tu perçonahe no çe muebe o mira a çu arrededôh a çu beloçidá máççima.
Êttao de dîttorçión de regreço: CARGÁ. Párate çobre la plataforma del reçêttôh de dîttorçión pa âttibâh la dîttorçión de regreço.
Âttualiçaçión de açînnaçionê de teclâ B1.ç.8
Redûççión der miedo (Echoes of the Eye)
Açe que çiertâ çecuençiâ aterradorâ çean mâh fáçilê de atrabeçâh

Lâ carâtterítticâ aterradorâ de Echoes of the Eye forman parte de la êpperiençia. Çi te impiden dîffrutâh de Outer Wilds, âttibâh êtta funçión reduçirá argunâ de eçâ carâtterítticâ.\\n¿Quierê âttibâl-la?
Lâ carâtterítticâ aterradorâ de Outer Wilds forman parte de la êpperiençia. Çi te impiden dîffrutâh der huego, âttibâh êtta funçión reduçirá argunâ de eçâ carâtterítticâ.\\n¿Quierê âttibâl-la?
Impurço automático de la moxila propurçora
Detenêh er tiempo mientrâ çe traduçe un têtto
Detenêh er tiempo mientrâ leê el rehîttro de la âttronabe
Detenêh er tiempo mientrâ ablâ con argien
Cambiâh er bolumen de la múçica y lô efêttô de çonido.
Çiertâ partê de Echoes of the Eye pueden çêh intençâ pa argunô hugadorê. Çi te impiden dîffrutâh de Outer Wilds, êççîtte una ôççión dîpponible en er menú de hugabilidá que puede ayudarte.
Dêl-liça er contrôh âtta que la imahen de la îqquierda çea apenâ biçible.
Cantidá de detayê en lâ olâ y calidá de la iluminaçión del agua.\\nCôtto de renderiçaçión: arto
Calidá de lô efêttô de iluminaçión
Reçoluçión de lô reflehô y lô interiorê ôccureçíô en çiertâ ubicaçionê der mundo der huego.\\nCôtto de renderiçaçión: medio
Reçoluçión de lô reflehô en çiertâ ubicaçionê der mundo der huego.\\nCôtto de renderiçaçión: medio
¡Graçiâ por apoyâh a Outer Wilds Ventures! Ya êttá dîpponible una nueba êççibiçión der muçeo en el ôççerbatorio de la ardea.
